Would be easier if we have one large bathroom. There were not many halal options for us Muslims in RWS. We had to drive out to Vivocity and Orchard for our lunch and dinner. Overall, we enjoyed the beach pool!
It was great . Mainly because is affordable. Free upgrade was a bonus.

Overall are good. The hotel near the sentosa atraction, beach, casino, and universal studio. It is easy to find food, street food, restaurantor cafe, all are available. All the staffs are friendy and informative. The room is clean, quiet. I book a nonsmoking room, but the room was smoke smelly, so i complaint to the staff and they give me another room which is better than previous room.
our stay was awesome. a very luxurious room. very comfortable bed. it was the best hotel ever!!
speechless. will definitely come again in future with families and friends
The stay was great and would most pribably stay there again.

This is the best hotel that my wife & i had ever stayed in. Fast check in & out. The F&B manager on the upper deck swimming pool which is the Sky Park Deck was friendly. Always ask the hotel guest in the Sky Park deck about how was the food served. The internet in the room is the fastest i ever had experienced. I definately come back to this Marina bay sands hotel.
Wonderful experience,can improve with changes in buffet breakfast spread every alternate day,at least, as everything is the same for the two days I stayed there. Will come back for more.
It was very nice. Would come back again in my next visit to singapore.
great awesome i would go back..its clean the pool was excellent for a range of people....
Great, check-in/out and attentive staff. Concierge were helpful, but not really all that knowledgeable, I found out most things on the internet myself. Location was awesome.
Nice infinite pool you should try.. Once at least.. We got room with garden by the bay view.. Quite stunning n nice scenery.. Take a night walk through the helix bridge.. Awesome!!

Was Superb. Everything was good. If I had to say 1 bad point about the hotel, that would be the breakfast which offers little variety. Had a great room with all the club benefits. Evening cocktail was great. There's also coffee machine in the room. That even had an indoor pool and is only accessible if you book a room with club benefits. It is also very near to novena MRT which you cant take a train ride to Newton food center to have awesome food.

Hotel has the close proximity to shopping/dining/healthcare/sports facilities that is located almost in the heart of the city, and is one train stop away. worth considering my next trip with the hotel again.
It was wonderful and my friends and I totally enjoyed it. A bit expensive but worth it.
quiet, near to city, friendly staff. Will definitely go back and stay with m hotel again.

Had a staycation t celebrate my bf birthday. Got a complimentary cake from the cafe below t surprise my bf. called room service a few time t request for items and it was always promptly attend to. Would come back here again in the future.
Room was big and clean. Amenities are well within the island and we had a full day of fun. Will return.
Wonderful stay in Singapore at a nice hotel such as York
It was a superb experience with the centrally located Hard Rock Hotel in Sentosa World. Staffs are great.

I would love to book a hotel room again in the future. When I just walked inside the hotel, I felt really comfortable. It's 4 star hotel but for me it looks like 5 star hotel. The room is just so comfortable to stay in. Hotel bed is so big and high. The best thing is Amara Hotel is just beside MRT.
Pleasant stay with free upgrade to club room. Nice surprise.

Check-in took awhile but it was a-breeze and the counter staff was really attentive to our requirements of hotel floor that is overlooking the Adventure Cove. They even prepared a complimentary cake (a big 1 for just 2 of us!) as we were there to celebrate my bf's bday in advance. The hotel surroundings were really quiet and peaceful as it was the furthest away from the rest of the RWS Hotels, but the attractions are still easily accessible by shuttle bus services (with intervals of 15 minutes) provided by the hotel. The huge deluxe room accompanied by the huge bathroom are what impressed us the most. Rarely do we find such huge rooms for Singapore hotels. The toilet accommodates 2 separate sinks, a rainforest shower, bathtub, a dry dressing table as well as a TV! The king size bed is huge and comfortable for a good night sleep. The gym shared by ESPA and Equarius is pretty huge as well, with extensive machines and equipments for an in-house gym. They even provide you with gym towels, locker rooms, and shower facilities. The swimming pool housed among the villas is quiet and peaceful for suntanning and a relaxing swim. Likewise, they provide pool towels as well, unlike festive hotels where we would have to bring our own. All in all, we really enjoyed our staycation at Equarius and we'll definitely be back soon!

Had a 2D1N staycation, Friday to Saturday. Surprisingly the check in and out was fast, just waited for 5mins. (Although I read a lot negative comments abt the check in and out). Honestly, most of the staffs were very friendly and they have nice smile. Only one cleaner which I think she is in charge on the lobby level which a little rude. She stares at guests weirdly and gives the feeling as if someone had offended her. Buffet breakfast was good. Food are serve hot. Best is to drive as the shuttle bus waiting time rakes quite a while as it's a loop route. Bathroom is really huge and pls ask for Higher levels as it has really good view and breeze. Just a little upset with the remote control for the tv. Doesn't seems to work properly. It's really more for Couples to relax and get rid of the stress we face during work. Would definitely come back.

it was awesome , comfortable and enjoyable. breakfast was disappointing but staff were good. check in was fast and so was check out. recommended for staycation of Couples. nice bathroom and big size room.
It was awesome Customer service is very detail and good.. Do not have to wait to checkout , they approached us nicely and help us to do those checkout documentation.

Cool and relaxing But pool too small The spa reception staff was cheerful when I came to check the menu but when I say I will come back again face turn BLACK and turn her face away ... Bad service at spa No customer at that time should be MORE attentive and SMILE more
Very comfortable and enjoyable. Used the gym and pool for morning exercise
Most awesome stay in Singapore so far! Got the best views of Marina Bay from our balcony. And most importantly, everything is so accessible from the hotel.
Awesome stay. Staff was very polite and attentive. Big and nice pool. Would definately come again.
Beyond my expectation! I'm sure its one of a kind hotel in SG which you can enjoy spacious room with very comfortable bed. Especially located in the heart of SG and most of all.. its value for money.
It was Awesome! Value for money, especially when you see the room size is extremely huge with 2 queen size bed. Located near to Orchard.

It was awesome! Upgraded to club room free of charge. The room was big and spacious. I was very much impressed with the hotel facility and the quick check-in and check-out. Hassle free. I would have loved to have complimentary car parking though.
Very happy with the service. Location is closed to city, easy access by public transport.

My stay in hard rock hotel was one of the best ever. Definitely will stay there again, this time round for a longer period. Worth the money and worth the stay...!!!! What more can i say, high floor, clean and also comfortable bed. Thumbs Up!!!
Overall our stay was pleasant and all had enjoyed the hotel a lot. Love the pool and we can use the pool at Hard Rock Hotel. We enjoyed the food choices and the shops.

I will definately refer this hotel to someone in Singapore. The location is good and convenient. A beautiful and tidy hotel to rest and relax. The staff are fantastic and helpful. The room is clean and comfort. A minor issue is the internet access. Anyhow, i will come back again to this hotel for my next trip to Singapore.
I stay at various types of hotels. This was one of the best...from arrival to departure.
this hotel is really awesome, I will bring my family to stay again
It was great, love the infinity pool very much! Can view nice city view from there. Although the price is a bit pricy
Very nice holiday with wife and children. Close to alot playing facilites for family. Recomended

I love Singapore and Park Royal Kitchener made our stay this time around all that more enjoyable. Staff were friendly and attentive, breakfast spread was amazing and the pool was stunning. The hotel is in Little India, which may not be everyone's cup of tea, but if you can deal with the crowds on the weekends, you're laughing. Staff were a joy to deal with, and we booked 'Orchid Club' not really knowing what to expect. Well, upon check in, we were wisked away to an executive floor for expedited check-in. There, they told us of our perks; free tea, coffee juice and tidbits all day and free cocktails at night with a superb view overlooking the city. Best of all we were treated to 4 items of free laundry PER DAY! This was an incredible convenience for us as Singapore is hot and we sweated our way through alot of clothes. Most impressively, 3 staff came up with a bouquet of FLOWERS on the morning my girlfriends birthday. Totally unexpected and such a sweet gesture which was most appreciated. Would stay here again without a doubt!

The stay was awesome as my room was upgraded to the club room for free. It was spacious and it was a nice relaxing experience staying there. Althogh I only spent one night there, it was really fun. The pool was a little bit disappointing as I thought they had a huge pool, but it was still good

The hotel was under renovation. If we had know this we would never have booked this hotel. Totally disgraceful! A noisy and unpleasant stay. Best experience was the departure, knowing that we need never return.

The hotel was under renovation. If we had know this we would never have booked this hotel. Totally disgraceful! A noisy and unpleasant stay. Best experience was the departure, knowing that we need never return.
It was a great stay-cation for our family of 4 and friend's family of 3. Our additional request for connecting room was also arranged. The staff were friendly and professional.

Last time I stayed here the hotel was so new that they didn't even have a resturant. This time around there was an actual resturant offering breakfast. Not my kind of breakfast with too much heavy food while I personally enjoy something a bit more lite with yoghurt, fruit and juice. Still, there are some gold sallads etc, so most people will probably settle. Location, cleanliness and price is what made me come back for a second time.
it was a cheaper amount also though agoda but excellent stay with excellent service, cleaniness, comfort, bed,spacious, location, food, value and list can goes on..

Stayed 1 night, good hotel location. Check in process was long as both checking in and out is at the same counter. Given us a room with a Kitchen but without any kitchenette, not even a spoon. The living room has a glass dining table which the glass table top that can drop off anytime. No free Wi-Fi service and the sound proof of the room are bad, you can hear your neighbor whenever they enter or leave their room. Our room comes with free breakfast but the breakfast selection wasn’t great. I think they might be really under staff as we were given a table with a milk jar filled with Bee Hoon which was left over by the earlier guest.

So disappointed when the moment i step in the room i smelled durian. But the staff do apologize and change another room for me. And about the bathroom design, it doesn't have a screen at the shower area and worse of all is there was no riser in floor level to prevent water coming out. This is ridiculous. A very disappointment of enjoy or relax in hotel while such a tsunami in bathroom. And sound proofing is too bad.

bad. with family one arrives at 10 am and there is a request for early check in, no efforts were made to alott room earlier. also there is no proper place for guests to wait especially in the morning after a tired international flight.
we did not have a comfortable stay. room was badly smell with cigarette smoke while housekeeping where run out of air freshener
The rooms are incredibly small and not very clean. The staffs are just not helpful at all. No wanders that they are selling at such low price.
when i check in the hotel,the reception staff was very impolite,didnt look guest upon checkin,but kpet looking at computer.

Never stay in this hotel! Their staff doesn't know the right way to serve their guest. When I reported that I found stain on my bed sheet and it was not changed even though I request the housekeeping agent to do it for me, the call operator was pretty irritated with my complaint and said " I started working at 11:00 pm and don't know what happened to you this morning okay?" and then she hanged up my call. My room was intolerably dirty, been here for 4 nights and the housekeeper didn't clean the room at all. The only thing she did: refilling the amenities, thats all she did!

very bad, the corridor when i check in was still under renovation. workers are painting the wall and knocking sound is heard all day. the door key is not working and i have to go down every time to ask for help. and help is so slow and at the end is no help at all. he just said door run out of battery and will replace only tomorrow! what! tomorrow to just replace a battery and i cant go out and in as i like as i have to always ask for help to open my room door. and you be mad on how long the help is! bad hotel.

Many eateries around to choose from. It is centrally located with the mrt station just nearby. The room had a smokey smell initially and the toilet had a pungent smell too. Quite a disappointing stay.

I had reserved four nights at this hotel and after two nights decided to extended my stay by one more night. I am a light traveller so this small and basic hotel was adequate for my needs. The bedding and pillows were very comfortable, the TV also had DVD movies, the internet fast, and there is free loan of an ipad which is quite extraordinary. I would definitely recommend this hotel to light travellers who do not require a lot of space in the room for baggage and to hang clothes.

Not up to par. Dirty bathrooms, mould on the walls, shower head too low, I'm a 6-footer and my head was almost touching the shower head. Shower stream doesn't allow entire body to be properly showered. Too small a cubicle. Only 1 HBO movie channel, which is a joke.

Clean room. However does not have in-room complimentary bottled water. Have to fill up water at the vending machine on each floor. Fast free wifi A lot of choices of free video-on-demand movies. Difficult to get taxi as proper taxi stop is located at upper floor, only acccessible via the backlane.

The room was somewhat small but it was cosy and comfortable. The staff were friendly and efficient. The breakfast was not great but there are many eating options within the vicinity. Cultural activities abound in the precinct and there are many museums and religious places of worship within walking distance. There is a 24-hour convenient store and coffee shop right next to the hotel.

Nice location and vry near bugis mrt station and juz abt 10 minuts walk to bugis location and the deluxe room was great,clean room and nicely staft but juz have no ideal why the hotel have strongly smell indian and it cause me feel a bit inadaptation..and a lot of indian guys are staying at this hotel too..overall was ok for me..but the smell is big problem for me..but was juz my personal opinion
Beach hotel,Centrally located,Attentive staff and family fun

Front office staff is really nice to upgrade my room from deluxe room to suite room. The room is nicely furnished and location is really convenient. Had a really wonderful stay with my boyfriend. Thumbs up for your great service!
Good shopping area, very beautiful hotel, large and clean room
Im very happy stay in marina bay sands. Beautiful hotel. Beautiful room beautiful pool. Great mall many things to do.

Beautiful character hotel (colonial style), great buffet lunches and high tea's etc. Breakfast was average - before 9:30am the food was cold. The staff were wonderful and easy to understand. The beds were a bit hard but a good pillow menu. Nice and quiet hotel, didn't hear the other clients. Very close to all the good shops, easy to get taxi's. Fantastic xmas buffet lunch - amazing, worth every penny.

This is my second time back to the hotel. Luxurious and well appointed, it's really a lovely place to stay. My stay was marred when the receptionist called to say we had too many visitors and she even threatened to call the police. The suite next door to us had lots of visitors and we had to go over and tell them to keep the volume down in case the hotel thinks the noise was coming from our room.

I love Amara.. This is my third time here and I want to still come back next time I have to attend something in the Resorts World Convention Center. It is near, taxis are very convenient. Beside it is a shopping center with the big grocery and fastfood stalls for meals. It is the best place to stay in Singapore!

here is very very good place for relax and charging the energy. singapore is very energetic country and diverse culture. but, sometimes, we would like to have calm and peaceful time in calm and peaceful place. i think capella singapore hotel is suitable place for this. during staying there, you can also approach to energetic place by walking, because it is localized in sentosa. the room had beautiful sight and was wide and high. but, there was no extra bed. that was a little flaw, because i brought my two children and wife. i strongly recomend this hotel. Hotel Feature Tip: This hotel has very famous spa (Auriga). You should try to do it!!!!
Pleasant stay , no disturbances at all.. Comfortable rooms, cleanliness .. A special mention to the relaxing washroom.. Early check in was allowed ....
Simply excellent, and could not wish for a more perfect stay and experience for my honeymoon.
Efficient staff and well designed rooms with spectacular views

stayed for 2nights for business. overall the hotel is ok. nice exterior, nice design, clean room, a lil bit pricey for a small room but that's fine due to the location. but 1 problem-bedbugs! at first i didnt notice anything until i notice i have a few bedbug bites at my back. then one day i literally saw a bedbug crawling on the mattress and killed it. and purposely put in on the table-hoping that the housekeeping took notice. should have complained to the management but i know they might change me to another room which im sure will also be infested with bedbugs. hope they can improve on this matter

I'm staying with my son which are 10yrs old, and the security wise is tip top. Great services which i left my wallet in the security box when i checked out. But the staff help me to get it and keep it for me until i get back to the hotel to collect it. Really safe n nice hotel. Fully recomment.
Poor TV reception, useless air-conditioning, haplessly small fridge, empty beer can on floor on arrival, slow and at times unfriendly room service, No bath robes

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Capella Singapore, it was a first time visit for me and I won't be my last. They have a world class spa and great location and hotel concept. The staff were attentive and friendly without being invasive of your personal space.
would definitely return to big hotel, impressive layout and impeccable service
My stay in Oasia was very comfortable. The room was large and clean. Room Service was fast and the food was nice. Woth the price

Had a amazing stay at hotel. It's a new property and little away from Center of attractions. Rooms are small but since it's a new property it did not matter. Checkin was fast and staff was too much courteous and helpful.

Featuring a Balinese-inspired pool with massage jets, Rendezvous Grand Hotel Singapore is 5-minute walk from Dhoby Ghaut and Bras Basah MRT Stations. This heritage hotel features a sauna and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs. Located around the corner is the Singapore Art Museum and the Singapore National Museum. Rendezvous Grand Hotel is a 5-minute walk to Dhoby Gaut MRT Station and Bras Basah MRT Station. The shopping belt of Orchard Road and Raffles City are a 10-minute walk away. It takes 25 minutes by taxi to reach Changi International Airport. Featuring a blend of classical and modern styles, the hotel features disabled-friendly rooms equipped with a minibar and tea/coffee maker. Its en suite bathrooms come with hairdryers. Ironing facilities and safety deposit boxes are provided. A fitness centre is available for guests to work out at. Sightseeing arrangements can be made at the tour desk. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also offered. Straits CafÃ© serves a local and international buffet while Asian and Western specialities can be found at Gourmet Gallery. Guests can unwind over drinks at Palong Bar. For alternative dining options, 24-hour room service is available.
Menyenangkan, nyaman, kamar yg bersih, lokasi dekat perbelanjaan Dan rumah sakit Mount E, staff yg ramah

The pool is awesome. I recommend to choose the pool view room. The bed and room are huge suitable for whole family. Location is good for tourist. You need to pay for internet. The hotel is huge and you may need to walk a lot before you reach the room

t was great, love the infinity pool very much! Can view nice city view from there. Although the price is a bit pricy t was great, love the infinity pool very much! Can view nice city view from there. Although the price is a bit pricy
very smooth, comfortable stay. it is money worthy hotel repesptect of location, service and conditions standard.
By far the best hotel we stayed in, in Singapore and elsewhere. We should have known sooner. Our room was so spacious, hotel was quiet but friendly.
very modern with original colonial building big rooms, great service
Capella Hotel give us a plesant staying and very good experience. Next time, I will choose Capella again and stay there longer.

Orchard Parade Hotel is the one of the best hotel where I stayed until now in Singapore. Location good, staff response quite nice and sincere, and pleasant room. I want to stay in this hotel next time also.
loved staying at Equarius hotel. Get best deal 3d2n attaction package.

Booked the Hotel for my anniversary and was given a free upgrade, Greeted by Friendly and Attentive Staffs who make me feels great. Clean rooms and big Bathroom. Middle of shopping District which makes everything accessible!

We intended to stay there for 3 nights but just managed to book for 2 nights as the room is fully booked. Relaxation and joyful feeling filled up our body upon on our arrival at the hotel lobby starting with glass of special blended iced tea and throughout our stay. Our family love the design and setting of the hotel. We really enjoyed the afternoon tea at the Library everyday and make sure that you dont miss it. Fast and free Wi-Fi within the hotel area. Like the others said, the best hotel in Singpapore. Special thanks to the friendly and attentive staffs, LEON and his team. We will choose Capella again and recommend to anyone.
Fast response by email prior to check-in. Fast check-in and out. very helpful front office's staffs. The staff who clean up the room cannot speak English, but still greeting with smile.
an enjoyable stay which was enhanced by the proximity of the hotel to excellent restaurants and shopping
The location was perfect, easy access to everywhere either by walk or MRT. Hotel room was big enough and the bed was vey comfortable.

Best thing about this hotel is the location, it is right in the centre of orchard road. Takashimaya is just 2 minutes walk away and Paragon is about 5 minutes away. Great dining are available right downstairs, at the Mandarin Gallery, restaurants such as Ippudo, Wild Honey, Lawry's. Nearest MRT like Orchard or Somerset is just 5 minutes walk away. Supermarket is within the vicinity too. Definitely will recommend this hotel.
It was excellent stay. It has friendly staff. Big and clean room.
It was my second time to stay this hotel. Staff are very kind and helpful, the view from my room was amazing.
Best luxury hotel in Singapore. The perfect setting with privacy against greenery, private pool, and the sentosa beach a stone's throw away. Couldnt ask for anything more.

Very pleasant feeling, at first I've booked standard room, but I think the hotel was full already for their standard room, and consequently I was upgraded to premiere room with no cost at all. Very Nice Grand Park Orchard, Keep up the good things.
Great quality of the room. Top notch services even from their staff who are not front line staffs.

i loved it.It was nice and a good choice of booking a perfect hotel.It was near to the airport. I was near to the shopping mart and also to all the pubs. All my business partner got impressed and for them it was easy to meet me at the hotel.
Really nice hotel and design, just too many people on the 57th floor.
Lovely. Had a great time with the 3D2N package. Nice location with a beautiful view.

The location was fantastic - right in the heart of Bugis shopping. The hotel was quite spacious and the breakfast is really lovely with a lot of different variety of food. However we found the bed a little too soft but their pillow selection is a unique and nice touch.

Capella has got to be the best resort I've ever been to. We booked a villa and it was amazing. The toilet was HUGE. 2 big tvs and a dipping pool. Absolutely love the place the moment I stepped in. Staff will drive a buggy to lead you into the villa. Wide array of choices while renting a DVD for free. Staff were all polite and friendly. If I have a chance, will definitely go back there again.

we stayed in one of the club rooms on level 2. the interiors were nicely done, high ceilings, nice homey feel all around. the staff were very pleasant and helpful. The food was not bad either. We probably will visit again.
We had a wonderful and relaxing time in the villa.My Children love it too. It is a huge and spacious villa. Good for Couples or family with children.

Stay was ok and price for a Family Room in the city area is considered reasonable. Noticed that the lobby is very noisy with many guests who hang around and people who came for the buffet. The rowdiness brought about a negative impression. Check in was slow and not impressed with the counter staff though the cleaners did a great job in ensuring that the room is spick and span.
It was a pleasant stay except for some uninvited guests (ants) & a night with water leaking from the air cond.
VERY GREAT STAY AT THERE, all are all attentive staffs they are so friendly and helpful as well.
The villa was awesome . The only down side was the need to travel to the villa by a buggy . Other then that , it was all great .

It was a wonderful stay at Cartlon Hotel. The location is centralized and it is within walking distance to malls, restaurants and MRT stations. The staff were attentive and friendly. The rooms were clean and comfortable with a great city view from the window. The gym facilities were well-maintained too.
good breakfast, nice swimming pool, access to resort world and casino with free shuttle bus services
Big spacious room with balcony and kitchen. Big and comfortable bed and tv with good channels.
nice and friendly staff, big room and clean bathroom, close to shopping areas. but it was taking quite some time for us to wait for taxi but overall it was pleasant.

It was nice. The room was big and spacious, a rarity in singapore. It was clean. Free fast wifi connection. Wouldnt recommend it to people who dont like to walk, as it is quite a walk to orchard or to the nearest mrt. You can go by bus though.
Really enjoy my stay at that hotel..last time stayed there...this time staying there again..will stay there in the future

Left our heavy baggage at the concierge fuss-free before the check-in at 2pm. Fast check-in service and we had a free upgrade! The room is relative bigger compared to other city hotels. We enjoyed our stay totally.

The room service was great. I have ordered french toast for breakfast. It arrived promptly and was served with a great smile. I like the bed, big and comfy. The view from the room wasn't that great but i enjoyed reading by the window.
ok -- just surprised how tiny i room can be the wine bar was nice the food selection was bare minimal ok experience
It was incredibly poor value for the price.
Home feeling and comfortable hotel, it's clean and nice design. In-room wifi are stable and fast, it helps me for business use.

Most of the staffs English was little to poor and as they were all 20 somethings, their experience level was not up to running a hotel like this. As with most larger hotels, their main concern was making money at every turn. They make you sign a note for $40 when checking out one of their hotel umbrellas. Come on folks...$7 for a cup of coffee w/no refills. I could go on. Bottom line, there are far better places to stay in town. Choose another.
We have fun experience on this hotel with our young kids. Will back in future
decent stay at the hotel - wifi is good clean rooms check in and check out process is poor with long cues and several untrained staff cafeteria is big , coffee is tasty and reasonably priced

This is a wonderful staying experience. I have been staying many various hotels in Singapore, this is so far the best amongs my stays. The staff is friendly and helpful. I am served by staff named Edward, and I would like to take this opportunity to thank him for his great service. Keep it up Edward! The room is big and clean. Housekeeping responses are fast and friendly. I will return again for sure. Good job RWS!
near to food court ,mrt station,big room, enjoy staying at Village hotel.will return and recommend to friends.
Fantastic stay. We had stayed in the beach villa.. The private jacuzzi and swimming pool were too good.. I will definitely come back again..
Great...in Singapore it hard to find hotel with big room with price under Usd 200...refommend for fwmily with children..
Good, but there is no power pin available to put the plug for my labtop. Such a big room, but not much socket available, which is very strange.

I choose this hotel it is because they have big room with tripple bed which is suitable for us as we have 3 adults and 2 children. Nothing much about this hotel, difficult to find, they are putting RELC Language center which is quite confusing and even the taxi driver also not quite sure whether it is a hotel. The breakfast is terrible, foods are bad, beverage are worst, I am not sure whether they have taste it themselve before they serve it. The breakfast cafe is very small and totally not enough to serve the hotel guest, hotel guest have to queue and also foods are not enough.

The downside to this hotel was that the swimming pool is located at the Pool Villas which are a distance away. Feels kinda weird swimming in the private pool area for the Pool Villas. It's also the furthest hotel away from the central food and Casino area. Another downside is the inability to walk (unless you walk via the carpark) to the central area where all the food is. You have to take a shuttle which takes a while and is crowded. The upside to it is that it is quieter at night compared to the more centrally located hotels.
We got upgrade Big room, but I think the food @ the restaurant need to improve
wonderful. stayed in another hotel in sentosa and this is wayyyyy better. very suitable for Couples who want to get away from the hustle and bustle of the cuty.
Was good. Central location. Was there for staycation.
Pleasant.the room is large, service is excellent. Access to swimming pools of other hotels are given

It was fantastic, polite and friendly staff up to the expections of far east hospitality. Room was comfortable but lacking visual aesthetics.. One of the pillows was dirty, with patch of dirt on it.. Shower was a little too squeezy. Though the package deal I bought was bathtub inclusive, there wasn't a bathtub.

Over all is good i have stay in this hotel 2 times these year. But i am very disappointed with the buffet breakfast my previous stay has the same issues with the buffet breakfast. First the food on the tray was empty not 1 tray at least 3 and above i have to inform them to fill up i believe it always happen, as same for the previous stay. Second food is always the same, hope to see there is some changes. Third the taste of the food really sucks better ask sam leong to taste for himself if he really care.
Big room,but not friendly staf,if u walking to orchard road to far.i don't come back again to this hotel

Excellent stay for my whole family.The internet was very fast.Booked throught AGODA at a very good price$.If u want to stay here better drive!Walking distance to Orchard road.The hotel staff is very helpful.Will stay here again for the next visit.Thumb up.
Actually location no so good, but the staf can help us to find taxi :)
comfortable bed , good breakfast, near shopping and restaurants

It was pretty good. The check-in counter was horrible, they should have a proper queing system. It is like a Macdonald's queue system. Other than that the stay was good. Room was big and so were the bathroom and bathtub. Loved the balcony facing the water park. Abit of a hassle to get back to mainland though, had to take a shuttle bus or a 15 min walk.

I decided to spend my birthday with my other half in RWS and to my pleasant delight, they gave me a free upgrade to a suite. Im guessing its because we checked in on my birthday. We're absolutely satisfied with the room that they gave. And the staffs were friendly and helpful with our requests. Definitely will be visiting RWS some time soon! Thank you for such a lovely staycation and fond memories of Hotel Michael. :)

Large nice room but badly designed, no mirror in one of the basins in the bathroom. No hot water in the washing basins... Very little closet space. A real zoo with a lot of parents with their children. Wait for the breakfast and the dinner. Only one restaurant with very little choice and extravagant prices. Situated far from the city, a kind of Disney world geared to children and casino goers. Altogether certainly not classy and too ecpensive.

I booked this hotel for my weekend trip. The hotel did not provide wifi in room and i have to go down to lobby to have access to internet. the breakfast was poor, very little of food selection. the only thing i can feel comfort is the friendly staff

Mail entrance of the Hotel appears backdoor toward Orchard road. Don't be confused with foto. Second time I've found out dirty dishes (chemicals remain on surface) at breakfast, maybe dish cleaning machine broken down. Poor breakfast. It takes 15 minutes to get to centre of shopping malls over Orchard. Hot weather will not make your shopping to and from hotel fun by foot.
Excellent hotel..great location..great room...very comfy bed
Nothing remarkable about this hotel. Functional, comfortable and clean. As expected and all we needed.

This hotel is WAY over priced. It claims 5 star, but we did not even have soup in the room and when we ask for it they told that they ran out of it. We asked for a king bed but we got two single bed put side by side. The TV channels are very limited and the quality of the image is terrible. When we complained about the bed the staff was completely indifferent. The room was tiny, the water pressure was poor and the room decoration was not impressive either. The swimming pool its nice though.

The staffs are very accommodating. Whenever we need something from the housekeepers, they respond to us quickly. We were surprised with the room's size which is really really big for 3 people. Also hooray for the free WiFi. It was fast compare to any hotel i've been to. The hotel's location is not that bad either. MRT is like 10mins walk and 5mins by cab. Just one thing, i think i also saw this with the other reviews. The bathroom sometimes stinks due to unknown reason which is annoying. I hope the hotel could work on that but everything else looks fine! Ill definitely recommend this hotel to my family and friends. ðŸ‘
Reception staff are not friendly and not smilling at all, after pass me the room card is did not mention which floor i will stay and where the lift.
The Ibis provided a decent staandard hotel at a reasonable price fo Singapore .
This is an expensive business hotel by Singapore standard. Close to the historic chinatown but the staff sense of direction is poor.
Business Hotel, Good Restaurants and convenient Location

Please note, the hotel is located next to a private hospital and is utilized to a degree for medical tourism(some may be put off by this). That being said, the rates were very reasonable considering the standard of the rooms given. While the room is not big it is comfortable. The bathroom facilities were clean and modern. It really is quite a fit for the business traveller and the central location is perfect for forays out into the city. There is also a convenient shopping mall located next door.
Great location and near MRT Station, only disappointed is hotel staff very unfriendly when we check in.
Great location and near MRT Station, only disappointed is hotel staff very unfriendly when we check in.
Great location and near MRT Station, only disappointed is hotel staff very unfriendly when we check in.
It is a clean and decent hotel a bit to pricy, but we are in Singapore so no surprise. The only thing i really did like was the "open" shower.
colleagues and i stayed at goodwood part hotel for 3 days. the rooms were clean and large enough and location wise it was very easy to move around.
You should wait long time to get on TAXI... Now there are construction. Little noisy.
10-15 mins walk to Raffles City & Orchard Road. Hotel looks relatively new but bathroom is rather small. Very similar design to Ibis Hotel is Bangkok.
Enjoyed my stay. Not too close to main attractions but not too far either. Thought laundry fees were expensive though.
As mentioned 5* cant fault it. Stayed in a beautiful room with large balcony with good shuttls service to the theme park
Attentive staff,cosy environment,large room Need to improve on the cleanliness level
Capella is always our favorite choice when the price is right
its so-so, because food not varianty and non halal & small swimmgpool.It avarage
The hotel is located in the center of Orchard Rd, I was given a handphone for free to use around Singapore. Free local and 23 international countries, that was a good service from the hotel.

I stayed here with my girlfriend & we had a great stay - we'd definitely recommend this hotel & would come back for sure. We stayed in a shophouse room with club lounge access. The Pros: - The hotel itself has got a great historic/colonial feel to it. They have kept the design cues which make it feel luxurious yet full of character - The club lounge continues this warm, interesting design & feel. The service & food in the lounge is great so well worth upgrading if you can - Our room was comfortable & well appointed - The overall service in this hotel was great & consistent. If we had a request, the staff tried their best to accommodate - Check in was quick and friendly. (We checked in at the club lounge) - Location was good, with lots of markets, shops, etc near by. The Cons: - There's only one small negative comment which is to do with the shophouse rooms. Although the room itself was good & I understand the reasoning (these were originally the shophouses back in the day) it just didn't feel as luxurious being on the 3rd floor of the hotel with no real views out our window. Personally I would prefer to be up on a high floor. Also, to get to the shophouse rooms there is 2 ways - the long way which involves a significant walk around the hotel, or the short way up a flight of un-airconditioned stairs. Either way is not ideal especially since the main hallway to the shophouse rooms is technically outside (under cover but no aircon) which is not comfortable with the Singapore humidity which can be quite unbearable at times. Other than that, we felt this hotel was great & as mentioned, we'd definitely come back.
always stay here, it a little overpriced due to the age but its just in the right place and the staff are good, overpriced breakfast.

the hotel location is very good,near central shopping areas,and easy to access to public transport. room is clean and comfortable. i would like to continue to stay at this hotel next time. no any issues during this stay
Ideal location to explore the Orchard area of Singapore. Also very good for the nightlife spots. Strongly recommend if you want to go shopping and don't want to queue for taxis
Very convenient as my office was nearby - just 3 minutes by taxi. Good value for money especially when hotels are quite expensive in singapore
Comfortable room with large bathroom and king-size bed ( Premier room) Easy to access shopping centers. It took 5 minutes to walk to the Somerset Bts. Staffs are friendly.

I was looking for a centrally located hotel for myself for one night. Used my agoda points and managed to book this hotel at a very reasonable price for one person. Room was basic, clean and comfortable with all facilities needed. Had free wifi and a swimming pool downstairs. A 10 minute stroll to orchard shopping too. I would happily stay there again.
a quick overnight trip so location was good. When one family member wasn't well, staff checked on us later in the day. Very thoughtful.
Very good location as it's near to few shopping malls. I requested for a late check out which they humbly obliged as I've informed them that my flight is late in the evening.
Very friendly staff. Requested to change a room with bathtub and the staff changed it immediately for me. Room very clean as well.

This hotel has met the 4/5 star international standard. A great happy & comfortable stay. Centrally located & 5 mins walk to City Hall MRT which allows us to travel to any part of the island without any worry. Need to improve on the check-in, there was no Q & yet the receptionist took 25 mins to handle our check-in... Cannot understand Y it takes so long...
Pleasant and easy access to Orchard Road for shopping and dining.

First time in Singapore. Grand park Orchid is superbly located in the midst of the best shopping malls and very close proximity to MRT. Hotel reception and concierge staff were excellent and very helpful.

So far so good, very centrally located nearby top shopping centres, local food hawkers, easy for public transportation (mrt/bus/taxi). The only thing is small room. Otherwise, it is perfect hotel to stay

Hotel was conveniently located. The hotel staff were friendly and help full. The hotel was very clean and well maintained. The price was both affordable and good value for money. Good transportation and access to shopping, restaurants, tourist attractions and night time entertainment. I would definitely stay here again and recommend to my friends.

Comfortable and stress free. I checked in while my house was being painted. We did not have to forgo the comforts of home and the MRT below ensured that my family got to work on time. 24 hr food ensured they were well fed before and after work. A very pleasant stay. I highly recommend this hotel for budget travellers who do not want to forgo creature comforts and travel convenience.
Good and enjoyable , swimming pool is clean, room is big I will stay again

mine was ok but there has been some error that my friend could not check in even if pre booked the room .We had to rush for meeting and came back in the later part of afternoon and still could not check in. Had to ask our contact to call the hotel in order to check in. I think the staff with is incompetent or their computer system is not working
pleasant stay, centralised location, very near to bugis junction, lots of shopping
Was good as it was close to shopping centers located in Orchard Road area, close to Dhoby Ghaut MRT and Circle Line
it was a good area and very close to bugis junction for shopping. easy to get on transportation as well. no complain. price is not bad for Singapore standard.
Overall happy with stay. Centrally located with easy access to transport. Friendly staff.
location, close to mount Elizabeth hospital. taxi is very tough to get

hotel is located very centrally in the middle of orchard road where all the shopping area is, abundant of food choices available within the hotel and also in the nearby malls. rooms were nice view and clean and comfortable. overall a very satisfactory stay.
good but staff or hotel system need improvement. hotel is centrally located to restaurants, shopping, cinemas
Pretty good hotel, clean, close to shopping district, would definitely come here again. Staff were okay... not as friendly.. but does the job.
very good and enjoyed.Hotel is very close to the leading shopping molls and some are open for 24 hours.

Our stay at the hotel was quite pleasant but the hotel is more suitable for business travellers. It will be better for people travelling with yoiung children if the hotel provides kids channel on TV. The lighting in the room should be improved as it was not bright enough.

First of all it is centrally located with shopping centre just next to the hotel. The club is amazing with nice pool and free alcohol from 6-8pm . The service of the staffs is prompt as well . Highly recommended.

Despite the negative reviews about the unfriendliness of the concierge and front desk staff by the at the Agoda Review Section, 3 of us (a Couples and a 15 month old toddler) did not encounter the unpleasant treatment. In contrary, the concierge staff off loaded our luggages from our car boot immediately when we drove up at the front of the hotel without any hesitation. The same concierge staff even trolleyed our luggages to the room with our son seated on the trolley all the way to the room. Similarly, we had a hassle free check-in at the front desk and the staff were friendly. A piece of advice to hotel guests is to be courteous to others and it is a human nature that others will smile back. As described in headlines, the rooms are big and the furnishing is of modern design and is well maintained. The only setback about the hotel is the size of the cafÃ©, where breakfasts are served is amazingly small. Due to the breakfast crowds, the wait staff can be relatively impolite and eagerly removing cutlery before one completes his breakfast. The selection of breakfast spread is sufficient to serve it purpose. However, both halal and non-halal spreads are not segregated based on the halal standards. Hence, the cafÃ© should not brand itself as a halal compliance venue. I had feedback the former to the hotel General Manager upon our check-out and he has taken the feedback positively to further improve the hotel performance.
OK but very tired hotel.Spent all our Agoda points on one night here and very disappointed with the room

The hotel was still undergoing renovation so you could expect a bit of drilling and such. Room was ok, quite small but clean and comfortable. The walls were quite thin so u could practically hear people outside,chatting or knocking their doors. Would recommend it for its location being so close to the shopping malls and easily accessible via public transport (train/bus). I bet there are other hotels around at similar room rates that comes with better view,unblock,view of the city area and etc.

The hotel was still undergoing renovation so you could expect a bit of drilling and such. Room was ok, quite small but clean and comfortable. The walls were quite thin so u could practically hear people outside,chatting or knocking their doors. Would recommend it for its location being so close to the shopping malls and easily accessible via public transport (train/bus). I bet there are other hotels around at similar room rates that comes with better view,unblock,view of the city area and etc.
Very good. good price too. near to all locations. easy to go orchard road and casino

Hotel was conveniently located. The hotel staff were friendly and help full. The hotel was very clean and well maintained. The price was both affordable and good value for money. Good transportation and access to shopping, restaurants, tourist attractions and night time entertainment. I would definitely stay here again and recommend to my friends.
We had a pleasant stay in Carlton. Everything went as well as we expected.

I have a pleasant stay at York Hotel when i traveled to Singapore. This hotel is centrally located, it is only 5 minutes to shopping area and restaurants. The hotel room is clean, comfortable and spacious. Staffs are helpful and friendly too.

Centrally located in the city, close to amenities and transportation. Easily accessible to food center. Nicely decorated hotel with comfortable bed. Affordable price compare to other hotels within same location. Rooms are small but clean and with comfortable bed. High speed Wifi for business travelers. Good for short stay visitors that have tight business schedule.

First time I stayed at this hotel, room is very big and comfortable. Many shopping outlets nearby and transport is readily available. Carpark is free for those who drives. Will not hesitate to stay again at this hotel. Hotel rate is a bit steep though. On weekends is a bit crowded. Restaurant in hotel serves good dishes.

As always, Ibis on Bencoolen Hotel never failed to meet my expectation/s. We had a great stay in this hotel as it has a very comfortable room and bed to sleep after a very tiring day. It's central location makes it very convenient to visit different places in Singapore. MRT station is walking distance and the bus stop is just outside the hotel. The bugis street is an attraction especially if one wants to buy souvenirs by bulk and cheap clothings. Also, not to mention the ABC store (the cheapest store in Singapore) where you can buy groceries and food to eat if you want. Overall, this will always be my favorite place to stay in Singapore.

Our stay at Grand Park was fairly comfortable. Although we were there only to sleep most of the time, we appreciated the efficient and friendly staff at the lobby. The hotel is centrally located and the MRT is only 2 blocks away. So going to and fro the various places we were going to was easy. The only "discomfort" I encountered was walking along the commercial center in front of the hotel when going to the MRT. During that weekend and at night, men were hanging out at the sidewalk drinking. Once, when we came back late, there was even a man sleeping on the sidewalk, I assumed he was passed out drunk. I was thankful I was with my husband because I wouldn't want to pass by there alone...
Location was good. The room was clean, except the toilet was not so clean. In overall everything was good.
It was a great experience.Easy access to all public transport and walkable to some shopping complexes.Near to eating places.friendly staff with spacious and comfortable room.
near MRT, delicious around hotel area, nice room and 4 stars hotel but budget hotel price
Nothing great to shout about. Delayed checked and waited nearly 1 hour.
Overall I was happy with my stay there. Theis is my second time staying at this hotel. What I like about this hotel is its location and very close to public transport

Very comfortable. The use of the executive lounge with complimentary cocktails was a nice touch and nice place to relax in the evening. Would be even better if it was bigger as it got quite noisy when more people entered the lounge. Hotel staff were very friendly and attentive. Good job!

The size of the double room was very disappointing. The room was too tiny to allow for free movement once the bags were placed inside the room. It was impossible to open up curtains as the see through glasses would open upto adjoining crowded buildings.The room service was almost non-existent. Cockroaches crowd the room in the night. Unless you are a big fan of chinese food (which we were not) the options for alternative food choices in the neighborhood were non existent.

We always stay in Mandarin Orchard whenever we go to Singapore because its central location in Orchard. It made us easier to go shop around the areas as well as finding restaurants. Not forgetting its walking distance to Mt. Elizabeth Hospital.

Nice hotel, centrally located near the town area. But the superior room is really small and the walkway between room also quite narrow. You can hear if people are walking along the way. About 15-20mins walk to Orchard road.

It was a nice stay for it was centrally located at shopping areas, restaurants and night life. With the help of the Duty Manager Ian and its staff Nelson were being upgraded to executive lounge on our second night. Will be staying again to this hotel.
Easy access. Popular local attractions within walking distance. Haji Lane is around the corner. Little India is not far from the hotel.

The room was clean and quite spacious; staff was very attentive and friendly. Of course the location was of primary concern to me as I have to walk to my appointment during my stay. Very near nice dining restos as it is in Bugis, not to mention Sim Lim.

Room are small and bathroom very tiny, but again if you compare with the location you wont be complaint The location of hotel is very convenient, just one step ahead there is mrt 24hrs food court is around the corner
Pretty decent. Service staff was friendly and helpful. Hotel is near to major malls and musuem. Very good location.
Pleasant stay, good location, local dining restaurants and supermarket was within proximity
Very satisfactory as I got upgraded to a premium room. The staff was very helpful and the location is fantastic. Free wifi was also one of the postives
I always stay at orchard parade when I am in Singapore. It is Centrally located and the Staff is very good. I will certainly be back here again.

Check-in and check-out was extremely quick. Hotel location is awesome, just minutes from the MRT. There's an NTUC across the road where we got groceries and it was only about 10 mins to Sentosa. The rooms were beautifully decorated and very well-designed. Restaurants in the hotel were very good and reasonably priced. Only downside was staff service was not superb but I can live with that for the rest of the pros.

The stay was good. Big Hotel is very centrally located, all good locations are easily accessible and very close. However, unlike the name, the rooms are very, very small. We got the deluxe room. It's hard to fit in a family luggage in the room. There is no cupboard or any place to fit in more than one luggage bags. Very less space to stretch yourself. Breakfast has limited options too. But the location is very good so I will recommend it.
Centrally located, close to shops, clean room, friendly staff, fast check in, easy access to transport
Centrally located, close to shops, clean room, friendly staff, fast check in, easy access to transport

I stayed in this hotel numerous times and almost staying in this hotel everytime I visit Singapore. I would say this hotel is centrally located and just stone throw away from the shopping district - Orchard Road. BUT I find this rate as 5 star hotel has things shall be refurbish such as the shower screen and bath tub which makes me feel discomfort about it. And also few staffs especially at the front desk might have lack of sleep in the last night that make me feel do not have a proactive attitude from them.
comfortable stay with attentive staffs, fast check-in and check-out and centrally located.
1. Comfortable and clean room. 2. Centrally located and convenient. 3. Friendly and attentive staffs.
1. Rooms are generally clean. 2. Friendly and attentive staffs. 3. Very convenient to move around in town area.
1. centrally located. 2. comfortable bed and clean room. 3. Friendly and attentive staffs.
Nice enough, friendly staff, coffee lounge, not a luxury hotel though, a bit pricey perhaps because of location
Value for money hotel, good room with extra bed to accommodate 3 kids. Location is very close to Bugis MRT. Lots of eatery close by.

We stayed in the main tower, It was a bigger room compared to orchard wing. Bed is twin double beds. carpet is old, but we pick that hotel as its location is flawless. close to paragon, takashimaya, and free internet.
The hotel is centrally located,shopping malls all at walking distance.Mrt nearby as well.i would strongly recommend for people to stay at mandarin orchard.

overall is okey, not so nice not so bad, but not worth the money. Stayed there for 3 days. the staff there was very rude (room service) . beside that it was okey. close to shopping areas like paragon. walking distance to ngee ann city, ion orchard and others major shopping mall. a bit hard to get halal food.

i was used to tiny rooms in chinatown, so imagine my surprise when i saw my room--just the right size. i find the bathroom, which can be seen through the wall from the bed, was quite amusing. i ordered dine-in--the cheesecake was lovingly plated. the day i checked-out, my singapore-based friend told me the hotel is known for its malay buffet. bummer! i should have read the reviews before arriving. i definitely have to return

i was used to tiny rooms in chinatown, so imagine my surprise when i saw my room--just the right size. i find the bathroom, which can be seen through the wall from the bed, was quite amusing. i ordered dine-in--the cheesecake was lovingly plated. the day i checked-out, my singapore-based friend told me the hotel is known for its malay buffet. bummer! i should have read the reviews before arriving. i definitely have to return
The hotel was centrally located and walking distance to Bugis MRT stop. The Bugis mall and Bugis junction were within walking distance too. It was close to all the shopping and lots of food choices.
comfortable, friendlt staff, close to shopping malls, and local eateries. mrt station is just minutes walk away.
My one of the favorite hotel in Singapore. Center of city, near mrt, chimes, shopping mall and etc. All in one place.
Good everything is good the air conditioner very cold .... Great
clean and strategic location for the meet - shopping and eating and easy MRT transportation

I booked 4 rooms in the hotel for my relatives from Malaysia. The rooms were rather small but definitely worth the cheap rates I paid for. Generally a good place to stay if you're hardly I the hotel, except for sleeping.
Good, the staff gave us the requests we opted for an even an upgrade to the next available room
Good, the staff gave us the requests we opted for an even an upgrade to the next available room

For the price that I paid for this hotel, it was great value. The rooms are simply massive, and very clean. The staff is very friendly, but please note that this is not a full service traditional hotel. There is no room service, and there are some cafe's on level 2 but they don't operate with the hotel so they open and close at their own times. The housekeeping was good and very efficient, they were willing to go out of their way to accommodate my requests which was a major plus. The front office staff was also friendly and helpful!

Just about worth the price pay for, nothing more nothing less. It is cheap but not the greatest value as the hotel still has to work out some of its processes. The Nexus tablet was not in the room when we first enter when I had specifically asked if it was going to be in the room (attributed to language barrier with staff). The staff was quick to pass me a tablet but a spoilt one ( had to charge for hours to only then realized it was not working. They eventually rectify the issue. Well at least it was cheap for the standard of comfort

average staff except for consierge staff who were very good.Check in staff were very average.My room was old and tired.Have stayed more modern rooms at this hotel.I did get a late check out at 2pm which was appreciated.

do not know if the hotel system or the staff incompetent. Pre block the room because checking in early, and found out they do not have my record , went back for meeting and still no record after 8hrs. have to call the hotel separately and they found my booking. Quite for a 5 star hotel

Breakfast menu should be more options not like a 4 star hotel, i think 2 star ( Breakfast ), walking far to reach public transportation. Very good linens i feel comfortable when sleeping on bed, internet is fast, large room but small bed, but it is ok.
Staff was very accommodating in our request to have rooms close to other people in our group despite having a lower-tiered reserved room. Very good location, close to Chinatown, malls, etc/
The breakfast buffet are standard. Nothing impressive. Avoid club rooms. The bedrooms are small.

It is great for anyone who came to singapore to shop in Orchard area. Most of shopping malls are withing walking distance from this hotel. However i found the room quite small with such a high price tag.

Stay was fine, staff took good care of us, found the buffets were not as extensive as they could be, we stay here because of the central location, great desserts and very nice swimming pool and lounge area. Staff at the Crystal Club on the 11th floor are very helpful especially Abby. We would stay there again mainly due to the location.
near to china town. lots of food. sightseeing. near to town area and Mrt

The hotel is fairly new, with a good location in the middle of Orchard Road . Convenient for shopping as there is no need to queue for taxis. It is near the MRT station and public transport is easily available. The room is small compared to other hotels. There is plenty of food places around the hotel.
Hotel is located near to Orchard road and I would say it's easy access to shopping areas.
It is ok for mini family. Parent come with one or two children. The people gave us good services and we are all happy with this hotel.
Its great. The hotel is centrally located, nearby various shopping areas and transport. There are good food around even into the night. Entertainments are just a stone throw away as well.
i only booking for 1 day, the room very clean and comfort. easy access to public transportation, its near city hall MRT.
You will meet very friendly hotel staffs at well-maintained classic hotel. Hotel is surrounded by shopping mall and lots of restaurants. I want to stay here next time.

The main advantage of this hotel shall be its location. It is located nearby to City Hall MRT which is about 5 minutes walk to it. It was reasonable price during its promotion period which made the stay in this hotel worthwhile. Suprisingly it is quite a large hotel in comparable to others of the similar rating.
Excellent comfortable stay in a convenient location. We were fortunate to catch a good deal.

This time stay is very pleasant in the Claymore Wing of the Hotel.Last time stay was a terrible experience as the room in the old wing is terribly presented, smoky smell that had made me sick for the whole trip.

Was nice but not great, after 1st night stay the next night I should always request to get mineral water and bathrobe (which I think for hotel such as MBS water and bathrobe suppose to be provided without waiting for guest to request it).
Clean & comfortable room close to Bugis night market and Bugis Junction shopping mall. Lots of dining options nearby to hotel.
Overall, I'll say it is a good stay. The location of the hotel is not easily located and it will be good to have some signs to direct hotel guests to the hotel.

the room is clean but really a bit small, however i m going on my own so its fine for me. it is near to shopping centre like bugis junction which is a very big one with many choices of restaurants. thus it is a recommended hotel for my frds.

Stayed here for one night on a business trip; choose the hotel because of the price (nice promotion package) and becasue it has a car park. The room was clean (but very small despite they gave me an upgrade). Didn't take the breakfast but there was 7/11 around the corner. Overall the hotel was good for a short business trip.
Near access to orchard gives enouth time to go arround in short time. Large nice & clean room was very confortable.
Clean but Very OLD , FIST I WAST THOGHT WILL BE VERY NICE , BUT NO

overall is very good except we left something valuable in the hotel room .15 min after we left. we notice our thing left behind and call back hotel to ask and after 30 min hotel staff told us nothing left behind and they cant find anything. Not sure what happening but feeling sad cause it only happen less than 15 minutes and it was in hotel room.
The toilet shower design is no good. Wet the whole toilet when taking shower
Michael Hotel offers big and clean room compare to other hotel at RWS Always being our preference of staying at RWS

Centrally located at the resort world sentosa Many major attractions Room is big and clean and comfort Bad thing is had to queue for a long time for both check in and check out Staff was too slow handling customer need

Outside from the hotel is old. Buy renovation inside the hotel. Room and furniture is new and comfortable. Located near to Hard Rock Cafe and Japanese restaurant. Opposite is 24 hrs TCC cafe. 10 minutes walk to ion with reasonable hotel rate.
highly recommended . very centralise location, clean and nicely designed room.
quiet room for short stay. not the biggest room there is, but gets the job done.
The room is clean the hotel is good and value for money
Everything's good, clean room, very comfortable to stay in...
family friendly, spacious carpark... and also love the relax chair inside the room.
it's been my second time to stay here, and still amazing.
IT WAS A PLEASANT STAY, HOTEL STAFF VERY FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL. STAFF LEND ME UMBRELLAS DURING HEAVY RAIN.
Convenient,comfortable,value with price and friendly staff.
The rooms were pretty big and clean. the bed was really comfortable and the temperature of the air con is adjustable. good location too, pretty near to mrt.

Perfect for business travel although the room was a little small, as is the bathroom/ toilet. But all amenities expected in an international hotel were present, including free WIFI. Contemporary, clean and fuss-free design.
It was excellent. Room was upgraded and was given free cocktails and finger food at the club. Attentive service by the staffs as well. Clean and spacious room.
Great location, nice and comfortable room. Near to shopping and public transport.
New hotel, nice clean and comfortable room, relaxing lobby, quite, easy access to public transport, complimentary parking, strategic location. Extremely satisfied.
The room was clean and comfortable though a bit too cold even after changing the temperature setting to above 27C. Otherwise, the experience was great.

The hotel located just right beside the MRT station which is very convenient for traveller taking public transport. Food court with 24 hours services available within the hotel compound. Recommended hotel.
We stayed at the club room and really enjoyed the breakfast, pools, cocktail, and the rooftop lounge. The room has large window and very comfortable bed. Will stay here if travel to Singapore again.
I'm staying for 1 nite, for some biz trip. Hotel near by MBS

The hotel staff was efficient and friendly enough. The food at the G2000 was reasonably priced and quite palatable. The service at the coffee bar was not good, as no one came to serve on the terrace. Perhaps I was supposed to go in to the counter first. Overall,functional but no character or personality, in keeping with the city state.

Its a no-frills hotel. Simple, efficient and clean. Amenities did not matter to us since we were in and out of the place. We spent our days at Universal Studios and Legoland. At night, we just looked forward to our comfortable beds for a much needed shut eye.

Good and fabulous. The hotel staff are very helpful and fast response. The environment of the hotel are cleaned and full of sight seeing. The food are great, it has lot of variety for both children and older adult.We will stay in this hotel again if we are coming to Singapore for holiday.
Overall experience is good. Rooms are clean, the check in / out is fast.

The room is clean, and a very convenient hotel that located just beside the 24 hours shopping mall, u can even go to buy food or fruit at 3am. missing something just go to the 24 hours mall. and opposite is a citymall, which will let u access to the MRT underground station.

Ibis is Ibis everywhere. Not very exciting rooms, very spartan, but spacious for the price and always clean and new looking. The location for this hotel is quite good close to the main shopping areas and Clarke Quay nightlife.
this hotel have clean Enough Hotel , close with central business in singapore,because they near with MRT station ;)
Not so much restaurants nearby the hotel. Only the buffet serve by the restaurants. The room is clean and large though
Very pleasant with easy booking & rebooking through Agoda.

It was nice and good value for the money. The room was big and clean. Free fast Wi-Fi connection. It is quite a walk to orchard or to the nearest MRT and not so easy to get a taxi. There is also a nice big balcony - would have been a nice place to relax if the hotel added some chairs/tables.
Returning visitor, happy with hotel location and new condition
The hotel price is quite cheap but it's located a little bit far from another restaurant or MRT station. But the good thing is they have large and comfortable room
Clean and nice room, but no wifi and the wifi is expensive
great and im seein forward to stay in this hotel again for my next solo trip to singapore because its easy to find taxi and food court from this hotel
Its fine, but they have renovations going on at the ground
Its fine, but they have renovations going on at the ground

Good, clean and quiet hotel. Supermarket and shopping mall are next to the hotel. free access to Zhong shan Park, free shuttle to/from MRT. Super fast free WIFI...... but there was no airport shuttle available which was the reason I selected this hotel.
Clean and wide room with reasonable fee. This is the 2nd time stay.
Great. The renovated room is clean and comfortable, looks new and modern, compared with the room at higher floor, which has no been renovated (my colleague stayed).

The hotel is centrally located at the shopping belt of orchard road. The hotel is clean amd beautiful. Unfortunately it is under renovation where cars are not allowed to park temporary for pick ups. Its a great hotel and I will recommend my frienda to stay there again.

The hotel is centrally located at the shopping belt of orchard road. The hotel is clean amd beautiful. Unfortunately it is under renovation where cars are not allowed to park temporary for pick ups. Its a great hotel and I will recommend my frienda to stay there again.
The room is clean but bathtub is very dirty. And internet etc is chargeable.
Hotel was centrally located with many places to eat even after midnight Mustafa shopping center was just less than 5 minutes walk which was open 24hrs

It wasn't bad but ithink the room and bathroom is very small, i'm not a big person, so if you think that you're always having problem with space then don't go to this hotel. It's clean and central to mrt, walking distance to bugis market and orchard rd. Taxi is cheap in singapore anyway, so nothing to worry about.

The room was clean but horribly small. Though it is understandable that with such a reasonably low price in a city like Singapore, you can't really expect much. Comfortable if you just want a place to sleep at night but if you are the type who likes to relax in the hotel, I wouldn't really recommend this. It's really very small.
Very good overall especially the check-in service provided by the front desk staff but the price could be lower as it is designated as budget hotel
Clean room, good service, nice looking staff, near the park
Clean good and wondefully located.hard to find such a good hotel
clean and good.Cheap too..hard to find such a good hotel
Will book this hotel again, very nice to stay it is better if come with breakfast
It was very good stay. They allowed early check in without any charge.
enjoyed our stay very much. loved the quiet pool and jacuzzi.

It was absolutely fantastic. Thr room i stayed was well organised, clean and pretty sizable. Staffs are very helpful and kind. I would love to visit the carlton hotel again when i come to this country again
Our stay was good. Clean room. Near casino and many other attractions around sentosa island. Good value for money
Good,I like it in a way about the hotel and it near shopping.
Although the rooms were slightly small, they were enough for our 3 nights stay. Rooms were clean and comfortable to sleep in for 3 nights
Clean Hotel, Comfortable Room and Close to Shopping area. 20 min walk to Orchard road
Is that a company policy that we do not allow to keep our luggage 1-2 days after staying at the hotel and we do not have any booking with the hotel after that?

Overall is a fair stay but the smell of the hotel is too strong it's a kind of Indian smell as this is very near to Singapore's Little India. Basically the hotel staff are friendly and nice with a fast check in time.

It is a good hotel to look around (shopping, visit theme parks, etc.) in Singapore. The location is also close to MRT, and shopping & restaurants areas. Although our room was small size, it was clean so that we could comfortably stay.
it was good, what i really like is the cleanest of the room, and the ac was cold the decoration of the hotel also great minimalist and cool
Overall a pleasant stay but might have use too much detergent for cleaning. My mum had mild allergy reaction. Have to pay for Wifi and it is quite dear.
I'd say ok, since the staff are not so attentive, also the room is a bit disappointed, lil bit too old.The bathroom is small.

Everything from check in to check out was smooth. The room is clean, big but simple. Great for families with kids and who do not want to over spend on hotel rooms. Just the ordinary basic hotel for a shower and a good nightâ€™s sleep (great for shopaholics). The room was very spacious and so was the bathroom. Hot water and air-conditioning were good, the beds and blankets were comfortable but the pillows could be improved as it was way too flat. Breakfast was under-par, better off having breakfast elsewhere.
Clean hotel and room are comfortable. Very friendly staffs and always with smile. Value for money. Clean hotel and room are comfortable. Very friendly staffs and always with smile. Value for money

We stayed in standard twin room (with two 140cm bed). The hotel has spacious room with classic Victorian style. Only 5 minutes walking to Bugis Junction Shopping Mall and Bugis MRT. However, the furnitures are a bit outdated, especially the carpet. The carpet looked like it's 20 years old with a strange smell. The room needs to be refurbished.

Like the hotel's room and location. Service was really bad though. Toiletories never get replensished fully (they'll give you shower gel but not shampoo). Had to call room service to get toiletories replenished everyday and was met with really rude staff. Once we called to ask for shower cap, only to realise later that we didn't have shower gel. When the staff came, we asked for shower gel and the staff simply said, "why didn't you ask just now when you asked for shower cap?". Came back and instead of giving, she threw the shower gel at us. I don't think I have met such rude staff even when I was back-packing all around Europe.
Love the hotel and the rooms. Great variety of room service food and nearby to local eateries and shopping!

pricing is a bit too high if compared to what i get., the plastic cup in the bathroom doesnt seem proper to use., only one free bottled water is not enough., decoration in the room looks quite cheap., the check-in process is very old fashioned.
Everything is fine except the pillows too flat to sleep on.
hotel is located at the 'end' of Orchard Road so need to walk quite far to reach the shopping area. It's noisy when somebody pass by or talking outside the room.
A pleasant experience overall. Room was big and could easily fit 2 adults and 2 kids.
Excellent with clean and big room space. Staff was nice and friendly

Room is clean and comfortable. However, the hotel lobby is located on 4th floor. From ground floor, we have to go to 4th floor and from 4th floor we have to take another lift to our room. It's only a bit hassle for this part. Otherwise, the location of the hotel is good.
Generally satisfied. Got problem with lights in the room but the staff came to fix it quickly.
Clean room n toilet comfortable bed, good service
The experience is positive. The room is small but clean and new.
I will recommend to my friends. However, price is rather on the high side considering our exchange rate.
lovely stay , safe , easy trasnport , friendly staff , near entertainment area.
It was an enjoyable stay as the room was clean and staff were friendly. Room service was good
upon checking out, took quite long in queuing. Should have free parking for hotel guess.

the location is good, easy to get a cab, near Chinatown and Orchard road, bed too small in my room, and no free wifi. Room was clean, quiet with quite new furniture... The bed's linen is soft and comfortable

Stay at the PARKROYAL on Kitchener Road Hotel was a pleasant one. Room was relatively spacious for the price paid for hotels in Singapore. Hotel is situated very close to a 24 hours shopping mall and several restaurants. It is also conveniently located near the MRT and travelling to the city is easy.
Good customer service with good amenities and facilities Will come back again

Firstly, I was impress with hotel employees. They're very friendly and welcoming. The room was nice, tidy and clean. Toilet is clean and cozy. Very reasonable price and nice location as well (about 10 mins walk to Orchard Rd.).

Generally we're satisfied with this hotel as the room was exactly as we expected, it's clean, spacious and the hotel also accomodate our special request for free baby crib and nice view. The hotel also have easy access to MRT and Bus Station, completely strategic location. The only thing we're disappointed about during our stay was the Menu of the breakfast was same everyday, and it was completely lack of Variety. They only serve us with Indian Food everyday, I couldn't find any animal protein there, not even a simple egg food. Yet, we absolutely will stay at this hotel at next visit to singapore, off course we will consider breakfast outside the hotel

Free wifi with high speed connection Clean room with lots of amenities Easy to access public transport ... direct access to mrt Located next to the shopping mall Bad thing is the room is kind of too small and the breakfast is so so
