Totally enjoyed our first stay at the Amara Hotel Singapore. The check-in was smooth and we were given two joining rooms which were great for me and my family. The breakfast was average but there were good enough selection everyday. The location of the hotel is near Chinatown and the Marina bay Sands, and about 10-15 drive away from Orchard Road shopping street. On the whole we enjoyed our stay very much. Will be back soon.
It was excellent! The staff were friendly and helpful

Very pleased with the hotel. It's only 5 minutesalk from Little India MRT station and is very close to shops and restaurants. It's a bit expensive but all hotels are expensive in Singapore but the Parc Sovereign is very clean and worth the little bit extra in our opinion. We looked for a long time to find a decent hotel at a reasonable price and the Parc Sovereign was a good choice.
It is very close to public transporation, which allow easy access to other part of Singapore. The hotel is clean and confortable to stay in with friendly smiling staff.
Very comfortable bed/pillows, buffet breakfast was good, a variety of foods to choose, very attentive check-in staff, checking out was a breeze.
Very comfortable bed/pillows, buffet breakfast was good, a variety of foods to choose, very attentive check-in staff, checking out was a breeze.
Staff is very familiar. They help me upgrade my standard room to be deluxe room.
We enjoyed our stay there. The location was conveniently located near to shopping districts. Many nice food nearby.

Our stay was a pleasant one except for quite slow room service. The best feature of the hotel is its central location, close to the train station, shopping and food areas. The rooms given to us were quite large and comfortable.
Overall pleasant, greeted w/ fruit platter in room that I didn't eat. Fruit smelled after few days but cleaning ladies strangely left it there.

The front desk staff are excellent in their service. Very attentive to my requests and accommodating as well. Although there were some toiletries missing from my room, putting through a call to housekeeping solved that very quickly. The room was spacious and bed very comfortable. I would definitely want to stay here again.
plesent, the staff is helpful. it's nice and cozy. the room is slightly small tho
Very basic hotel with all that you require. Not particularly cheap. Close to the MRT which is very convenient for traveling around. Close to some trendy boutique shops and Bugis plaza
It's really fun and nice, location of this hotel near to lot of shopping center, it caused us to do shopping every day.
Consistent good service, clean, convenient location
EVERYTHG ARE FINE EXCEPT THE WALL, WE CAN HEAR PEOPLE ON CORRIDOR AND NEXT DOOR SPEAK LOUDLY WHICH IS VERY UNCOMFATABLE AS MANY NOISE
Comfortable, cleanliness, honest staff and value for money.
Nice stay. Staff are helpful and efficient. Clean room and comfort bed.

It was a short but pleasant stay. The centrally situated location allows easy access to shopping, restaurants and sight seeing locations. The easy access of public transport also allows convenience around Singapore. Hotel is recommended for business and holiday travelers - whether travelling alone or with family.
Overall ok but next time would not come back cox their location actually very close with shopping area and need walk quite long distance. Staff at front desk some ok, some need improve.
Location is not really good. Hard to find taxi. They provide shuttle bus to novena MRT. However i found it trouble
I am very satisfy with my stay in this hotel. The price is reasonable, 5 stars hotel 4 stars charges.

Comfortable in a word. The staff are friendly and speak english well. Though didn't book breakfast, plenty of restaurants within walking distance offer a variety of options. Centrally located and easy access, all the taxi drivers know the place. Takes approximately 20 to 30 min to get to Changi airport. Close to all other transport.
Excellent, will stay there again. Staff very efficient and overall good value for money.

it was nice. the hotel is near from bugis market and bigis junction. the bus stop right in front of the hotel. but if you wanna go by MRT, you have to walk ard 5-10mins. the room is perfect for two person. not too big and not too small. the bathroom is clean. recommended hotel for those who want to explore singapore.

Generally a pleassant and memorable stay. However was not too pleased with the parking system as I was wrongly charged when using the complimentary ticket. The hotel should have given clear instructions on how to use it. This aside, I will still return to this hotel in the future.

My stay at the Big Hotel was pleasent. The hotel istelf is centrally located and Bras Basah was around 200 metres walking distance. The staff were friendly and helpful. Please note that when you check in you have to give SGP$100 deposit for the room. This is returned on check out. The rooms were compact and very tight but had character and were nicely finished. The decor was lovely, with beautiful Danish influence in all the furniture. There is no fridge in the room and very little storage but this was manageable for the 2 nights we were staying there. I would recommend this hotel for someone that needs a base for the weekend and is there just to shop. We did not go for the breakfast option, so I cannot comment on the standard of food. The restaurant/bar did look very nice. Overall a pleasent stay and I would use this hotel again.
Its was nice to stay there, everything is fine. Swimming pool is good. Staffs are very warmly and friendly.
we realy enjoy stayed at this hotel, n we will return to this hotel next occasion.
It was a good stay. The staff were helpful and friendly
We like to stay here because staf is friendly and near to go shopping and MRT also, so is recomended to stay here.
this was my second stay in this hotel, it was near to shopping area and the room was clean and wifi very good
this was my second stay in this hotel, it was near to shopping area and the room was clean and wifi very good
The room is clean & large for Singapore standard. We liked the super king sized bed a lot. However, the pool was down for renovation when we're there.
Car park is expensive as it's not belongs to Hotel. With same amount of money spent, other similar in Bugis will be better choice. Only great thing is location. No Swimming pool available too.

Stayed 2 nites with my family. Very satisfied with the rooms, clean & modern. Very friendly and helpful reception staff. Easy access to 7/11 downstairs. But internet was very slow. Overall its a good hotel which I would come back to stay.
i like it, comfort, but unfortunately my next room every night so noisy, they talking too loud. the voice come from the connecting door
Have stayed at this hotel on many occasions and each time we have been very impressed. Close to an MRT station and a short taxi ride to most tourist attractions.

Most taxi drivers don't know where it is as it's relatively new. we just said Zhongshan Park and then they seemed to know.There is also a shuttle service. The rooms are small but very clean and well presented. No faults as far as we were concerned. Just a bit small for three adults.

Central city location, easy access to everywhere with great transport system. Clean and spaces hotel room & bathroom.Comfortable big bed, walking distance to shopping mall , tourist spot & MRT station. Awesome!!

The staffs are friendly and helpful, prompt. Surprise though when 1 of them came in for room service and ask me to speak mandarin on my request. Imagine if I'm someone from Scandinavian countries? The villa is spacious, comfortable and love the option to shower outdoor within the villa. Spoiled by the huge bathroom. Pool is too small to someone who enjoys swimming. Perfect place to chill with small family.
Check in-out was fast, Staff was attentive and helpful, overall a pleasant stay

Overall it was great, really worth the money. Around 8 mins walk from Tanjong Pagar mrt, pool was great, there is a bar in the hotel for us to countdown. Room service is fast, the food is awesome and value of money.
It's great for our vacation because location of hotel in the center of city bugis, and near restaurant with indonesian food

Very satisfied with a special rate,nice and clean room,bright light,good bathroom but water pressure too low,free Wifi,happy with a supermarket just below and many other food stalls and even a drug store,also 24 hour convenient store,free shuttle bus to novena MRT.
clean and new,even the car park area. Good for first impression
good...clean..late check out at 2pm..easy to shopping place,,night drinks near by..food at braekfast is good..
Not that great as they did not provide us the bed we requested
convenience & shopping mall nearby like SimLim Square, SimLim Tower for PC notebook electronic parts
this hotal is very good clean room and near centar but internet pay money is not good condition

The hotel could do with a spruce up as it is showing it's age, nevertheless the room was large and comfortable. The bathroom needs redesigning as a shower in the bath inevitably spill over and the bathroom floor was constantly wet. The hotel is close enough to the major Orchard Road shopping area, yet far enough to be away from the hustle, bustle and noise. There are two excellent Japanese restaurants on the premises (independent from the hotel). and are must trys!
Very Nice stop over. Nice end of town. Close to shopping and sight seeing.

Booked a deluxe room but got upgraded to a suite on the 4th floor. Spacious but the windows are small and frosted and can't look out makes it dull. Small pool but can use facilities at Hard Rock Hotel. Close to everything.

i always stay in Singapore every time when i am here. it's not a super modern hotel but at least it's close to everywhere. easy walking distance to the station. check in and check out was very quick. the internet works so well and no complaints at well. staff are very friendly and nice. the food served at club lounge was fresh and quality was quite good. I enjoyed my stay. the bed is very comfortable. yes, i will stay again.
the room was nice, the bell staff were pretty poor.

By the time I checked in, it was already midnight, so I did not walk around. In the morning, I figured out it was so close to the major attractions. Location is excellent. No idea about the food since I did not try it out.
i highly recommend friends to stay : close to MRT and Bugis shopping area , comfort and large room

Check in was lightning fast. I was offered to top up another $20 to try their newly renovated rooms, and I did. I don't know how their old rooms were so I cannot give any constructive comparison between the old and new rooms. Hotel is very close to Bugis Junction shopping centre and Bugis MRT, which makes life so much easier.
Very quick check in, free wifi, easy access to MRT and supermarkets, close to night clubs

I have a good stay. However, we booked for 3 people in 1 Deluxe room, with extra bed, but the staff took us to superior room and no extra bed prepared. We have to claim at reception at 10pm. They changed us the room which is deluxe room and the maid came to prepare extra bed in a while. It will be better if they well prepared the room that we booked so we are quite not impressed much. As well as the internet, hard to connect. And the smell on first floor and at reception floor made me headache.

Close walk to the MRT Station, Large and very Comfortable room with king size bed. Very friendly staff who were very happy to assist us. The food at this hotel was really nice and option of a few restaurants within the hotel.
Nice staff,but the bed is not comfort very hard,nice hotel n very clean

Room and toilet was large but the hotel exterior and room decoration needs massive renovation. for a 5 star hotel, the interior is dated. Hotel is just above City Hall MRT Station with abundance of shopping and dining options for both locals and tourists. Close to the Marine Bay Sands Integrated Resort and Esplanade.
Very near to MRT and shopping complex. One could just walk across the hotel to find a shopping complex. Food is not an issue as it is suitate in Little India. The hotel room is clean and spacious.
It was very good, the staffs were very helpful and it was a quiet surrounding hotel, looking forward to stay there next time
this hotel is centrally located at shopping area. they provide high speed wifi and the room also very clean. But the swimming pool is very small
this hotel is centrally located at shopping area. they provide high speed wifi and the room also very clean. But the swimming pool is very small

I have to change the 1st room as it was smelly and a non functioning tv, the second room that was changed to us, unfortunately the mini fridge not functioning, thus it was changed to another one. The room was a bit old but it was clean. Breakfast was below expectation. Not worth its value. Free WIFI was only available at the lobby. I felt cheated as it was stated free wifi in the hotel facilities. Besides its location and friendly staffs, I may not highly recommended to my friends.
the Hotel is walking distance to Orchard Rd shops, but it also caters for students who can be quite loud.
The hotel is quite nice, at a great location, and affordable price. They have WIFI now but you have to ask for the access code every 24 hrs. That's a bit annoying.
centrally located, nice room and attentive staff. will recommend this place for business travellers as there are a lot of food options around

Not enough car parking slots as renovation going on. Had to park in a private car park where I had to incur additional expense which was unexpected. This was not disclosed when making the room reservation . Given that its a 5 star hotel, one would expect hotel to provide parking facilities or refund the expense incurred. Instead the manager spends her time arguing that its not their policy to pay. I pointed out that all other 5 star international hotels have their own car parks unlike Concorde. She then relents by 'upgrading' my room. Having stayed here several times before, i noticed This upgraded room entitles one to fre breakfast but that was declined. The 'upgraded' room is similar to a standard room except now its on the 9th floor. All in- bad experience w reception staff and manager- both with glum looks.
Small but clean room. This hotel is very near to Sim Lim and around 0.5km to MRT so while convenient location

This is a price reasonable for Singapore standard. Centrally located at all major attraction. The hotel is new, rooms are bit small but clean and comfortable. Strongly recommend to those who go for long stay due to a butget price.
It is quite good with friendly staff. But on my last night there was cockroach in my room.
Great hotel for me as business traveler with all those mentioned reason.

We feel welcome when we first saw the "living room" set up in front of the reception at Basement 1. Besides that, the handicapped platform lift is provided to assist wheelchair user for easy access from street level to basement level where most of the facilities are including a restaurant. For our Deluxe Room, there is a comfy king size bed in it and the our room is clean. In short, we enjoy our stay at this 3 star hotel.
I enjoyed the ambience and convenience of the hotel.
Comfort, near attraction travelling points, near casino, good restaurants near-by, big shopping mall just across the sea.
Is comfortable and the staff is very friendly and efficient ! For those who driving , this hotel provide free car park and the internet access is excellent !

The Equarius hotel is new and nice. It has large size rooms and bathrooms. The staff are helpful and friendly. Although the Equarius Hotel is located within the resorts world complex, you cannot walk directly from the hotel into the main area of resorts world where all the attractions and restaurants are located. Instead you must take a shuttle bus, which runs at approximately 15 minute intervals. I found this to be incredibly inconvenient. If you are planning to stay at resorts world and want ready access to attractions, then I would suggest staying at Festive Towers, Hard Rock Hotel or Hotel Michael.
The wifi connection is not good at all. We only can recieve the signal when keep the door open. The staff changed the room for us but still the same.

The rate provided in Agoda made this hotel stay a truly value for money offer. The room is comfortable and tastefully decorated. The location of the hotel is excellent as it is closed to shopping hubs, casino, entertainment, restaurants, etc. Highly recommended for families as there are sufficient entertainment to keep the children occupied. The complimentary shutter service makes it convenient for those who wish to shop outside of the hotel. The hotel is located in the same building as the casino and there is no need to venture out of the building for entertainment and fun.
nice hotel with centrally located and great value for family holiday

Friendly and accommodating staff / comfortable rooms and upgraded / early check in, late checkout / nearness to MRT, bus stops / plenty of halal and fast food / central location ... what more can you ask for. However taxi drivers were not familiar with the name of the hotel until we mentioned Golden Landmark.

in 26 oct i already stay in this hotel for one day, unfortunately my flight has change. and when i ask to customer service for extend the room, the hotel charges me SGD320 but i use agoda.com its only SGD 210, so thank you agoda, you give me nice rate. the room so far so good, i like this hotel, mear to marina, near to bugis.
We enjoy to stay at v, and this second time we stay at v
Comfort pillow nice bathroom opposite bus stop. Just 5 min to orchard road by bus
Hotel is clean and the design is beautiful. Suitable for family.
My stay is a pleasant one. The surrounding is quiet and yet close to local food eateries.

There's one unpleasant experience with Hotel Michael is the settings are always different. We have few colleagues staying in the same hotel last time round, there's always something missing or did not replenish for our rooms, e.g. 2 rooms are missing with clock & pen which the other rooms had. This time round, our stay, both my colleague & my room missing hand & floor towel and my colleague room is even worst, clock & slipper missing and iron has a crack iron plate that caused a torn to my colleague's shirt when he iron his shirt. He called the customer service desk, but there were late in delivering the slipper and check on the iron.
Fast check in and out service, fast wi-fi, spacious room and bathroom, very clean room. Breakfast was ok. Overall among 4 stars nearby, it offered reasonable price.
Standard dropping down; compared to last time Front desk staff not friendly enough; shouldn't let trainee to serve customer if they are not ready

Excellent and will come back to stay again. Highly recommended for al type of traveller to stay. Excellent location and friendly services and staff. It is hotel within the shopping centre, fun, and have a great nite life. The location is situated in the main shopping and transportation hub make it the best deal you gonna have in Singapore
standard dropping down; compared to last time front desk staff not friendly enough; shouldn't let trainee to serve customer if they are not ready
A nice and comfortable hotel, recommend for staying. Although it is a bit far from MRT station, there is free shutlle bus service.
Nice location with proximity to restaurants and MRT Breakfast menu monotonous Weak wifi signals in corner premium rooms

I adored the location for this hotel as well as the super comfy beds. However, the lobby area is rather busy, somewhat akin to a bus station. Perhaps the school holidays could be the reason. Comfortable beds and shopping a stones throw away. The MRT station is within walking distance and plenty of restaurants. Nightlife is across the road or at the roof. Overall, a wonderful stay.
Good rooms and service and pricing but only down side is it's far away from the train station
it was good but not that expactiation in my mind, good location for shoping nice walking street, nice resturante.

It was pleasant and comfortable. Room was big enough for us and the bathroom is large. Internet facilities is very good.. It is very accessible to shopping area and restaurants. Transportation is also accessible. Food is ok although the buffet restaurant is quiet expensive. Service is good and the staff are friendly and easy to talk to. Amenities are also good.

Generally, the overall service is not bad. As I requested blanket from the housekeeping department, I got it fast. But the staffs at the reception need to improve on their service attitude. They did portray their impatience when I asked little more questions during check-in. I do feel unwelcome and discriminated by hasty reply.

Everything is good about Goodwood Park Hotel bar two things. They charge S$30/night for wifi, and their "free wifi" notices were misleading. It's free for 1MB with options to purchase additional data once the page loads. In this day and age, complimentary wifi is one of those necessary features of a 4 star hotel that it's almost expected. The other shock of Goodwood Park Hotel was that you will need to purchase your own toiletry amenities. This was also a first for me. I've stayed at 3 star hotels that provide this basic necessity. Otherwise, there's very little faulting of this immaculate hotel. Reserved and majestic in it's own right, it's spaciously spread out and it's refreshing to be able to reach your room without the aid of a lift. It features 2 pools, large rooms with high ceilings and artsy decor to match.
It's not our first time staying here. Overall, we are staisfied and happy. Cheers!
It's not our first time staying here. Overall, we are staisfied and happy. Cheers!

We found the hotel easy to go to by MRT from the airport. First we thought the rooms were kinda small but we agree that it's okay and comfortable. It seems to have everything we need to enjoy our stay here. The staff are very friendly. Check it and check out are really quick. We do like the shopping just across from the hotel called Velocity. Guests don't have to have breakfast in the hotel. They can easily find food to eat in the shopping mall near by. We like the way they build the hotel right above the MRT station. It's very convenient for transportation.

It was a really comfortable stay, except for the fact that the room's King size bed was made up of 2 single beds joined together. the hard bulge in between the two beds made it uncomfortable, especially since it was for a Couples. The swimming pool was really nice, and it was shady. there was a nice jacuzzi just beside the pool, and there were towels prepared for us to use. Hotel staffs were efficient and friendly too. Requested for extra set of toiletries and it came within 5mins. The location was also good. went for a midnight movie just across the street.
Acceptable but not great. Not close to public transportation and food area. All is quite far to walk. Room is just basic

Checked in to Royal Plaza for 3 nights. Great location 5 mins walk to Orchard road, free mini bar, free wifi, stay was perfect. In addition to that the buffet was amazing, really good buffet restaurant at the lobby floor of the hotel.

Checked in to Royal Plaza for 3 nights. Great location 5 mins walk to Orchard road, free mini bar, free wifi, stay was perfect. In addition to that the buffet was amazing, really good buffet restaurant at the lobby floor of the hotel.

I am a regular in this hotel for short weekends breaks. All the staffs r familiar to me n they adreeses me by my name. I hwve the habit of upgrading fr premier room to club rooms. All I need is just a top up of upgrading$15 to enjoy tea breaks , cocktails n breakfast at the club lounge. I prefer quiet n spend my time leasurely n thus club lounge is ieeal where its smaller group, privacy n serenity
We stayed over Christmas for 4 days and really enjoyed my time there. I was even sick and bed ridden for one of those days and I felt super comfortable the whole time. Highly recommended!
It is always a pleasure to stay at Oasia hotel. The staff are helpful and friendly and the hotel is new,clean and thoughtfully designed
I had a nice stay. My only complaint was that I found urine on the toilet seat as soon as I first entered the bathroom.
It was a comfortable stay. Staff is attentive and hotel location is good.
The staffs are friendly and helpful. The room is clean and comfortable. Sure I will return to the hotel
The hotel stay was good, service was good. Staffs were friendly and helpful. The room is clean, cozy and large.
Everything is good. Great location with easy access to food and public transport. Unfortunate that the famous Nasi Padang has moved.
The check in was not so smooth as housekeeping were still cleaning the rooms when we reach at the given check in time. Other than that, rooms were nice and comfortable.

The stay at parkroyal was very comfortable, I recommend this hotel to any Couples or family with children itsbvery close by 5o major shopping area and many street food restaurants. Mustafa center is just 2 min walk from the hotel which is the largest department store in singapore.

It was not too bad the room was spacious and the bed was comfortable. I was however slightly disappointed with the television channels that were available in the hotel. There were limited channels ( no HBO or movie channels) the sports channels were however, not too bad.

Pros: 1. Location is very central and convenient - walking distance to everything - raffles place, orchard, bugis, marina bay. 2. large room - rooms are very spacious (we got upgraded from classic to business advantage) 3. Concierge - very attentive service provided by concierge during arrival and departure. 5. Lounge facility - if you arrive early and your room is not ready, you can use the pre-checkin lounge and the pool facilities to relax or freshen up. Cons: 1. Dated lift lobbies - e.g panelling, carpetting all need a facelift! 2. Dated furniture in rooms - particularly wardrobe and mini bar is quite old. Gives a 1980s hotel feel. 3. Bathroom - bathtub is old and needs to be replaced- there are spots where paint is chipped off. 4. Check in staff - while they get the job done, there is a terribly strong lack of hospitality warmth. I feel like we were checking into a hospital where boxes are ticked off and a smile is plastered on at specific points which they must have been told to do on an instruction list. 5. Pool area is overcrowded as it caters to TWO hotels. Overall, overpriced for a classic room. I paid USD200+ for it. If not for the upgrade, i'd be thoroughly disappointed.
As usual, the stay was pleasant. The Breakfast spread has improved but frequent break downs of their hot drink machines causes some inconvenience.

The hotel is nice, clean and located in the city central. The check-in/check-out process is quick and the staffs are also helpful. It is also very close to the MRT and easy to access to public transport. We can also walk to the nearer shopping mall in Dhouby Ghaut. It is also walking distance to Bugis.

It was my first time there and the room was good and large sized except there was a bug of some sort on the bed one night. Unavoidable in the tropics perhaps. Breakfast was not great either but overall for the price of the hotel and its location, i would go back there again.

The location of the hotel is strategically located, less than 10 minutes walk from the hotel to the nearest MRT station. The environment of the hotel is good and comfortable except that one section of the hotel is facing a construction site. The room which was assigned to us was facing the construction, hence we were able to hear the noise till late in the night as well as in the morning. Will appreciate if the staff had informed us during the check-in. Otherwise, we had a good stay in the hotel

It was no frills, easy to make this reservation, good value for money compared to other hotels in the same area, centrally located so you can get around very easily and lots of options around the hotel anyway. I was on a business trip but got to explore around a bit due to its convenience.
The best part was my room has balcony overlooking the pool, which was great and private for early morning swim; really friendly staff and quick service.

It was a pleasant stay. The reception was quick in checking us in. They were also friendly and responsive when we requested for upgrade to queen/king size bed. The hotel room is extremely spacious and comfortable. There is also a nice big balcony - would have been a nice place to chill out in the evening if not for the fact that the hotel did not put in any chairs/tables. If there is one point of improvement for the hotel, it would be great if they could put in some sofas in the bedroom and some chairs/table at the balcony. Overall, great and comfortable place, responsive staff and value for money.

We enjoyed our stay at the RELC hotel. This is our second time staying at this hotel. It doesn't have a plush or expensive outlook but it provides comfort and convenience. There is also ample parking within the hotel compound and within walking distance to the shopping centers on Orchard Road. The rooms are large and clean. We like the simplicity as our main concern is cleanliness and comfort.
Comfortable and conveniently located hotel and all taxi drivers knew the hotel.
Great staff, especially the room keeping staff who turned down the room perfectly. Great swimming pool and gym facilities just round off the luxury feeling hotel

Carlton Hotel is a five minutes walk to the Bras Basah and City Hall MRT stations. It is also close to the Raffles City Shopping Centre. Unfortunately, this is a non-smoking hotel. Quite a hassle for smokers like me. Free wifi is accessible at the lobby. So you can expect lots of people sitting at the lobby to access the free wifi. Food - no comment as I didn't eat at the hotel. Didn't give any halal assurance for muslim like me. All-in-all, good hotel.
Nothing much unpleasant about the hotel except the aircond is extremely cold. I really like cold but this is really very cold. Perhaps if the rooms were carpet, it would not feel that much cooling.
It was a great stay. My mum, age 95, was most happy. She love the food. The only problem we face was the handicap slope were not that friendly.
Very Comfortable. Quiet room with good views. Very good cheap noodle bar.
enjoyable and comfortable stay. good location easy access to shopping

Enjoyable stay , high security and good customer services espcially staff Subra. He is very polite and gave me another breakfast coupon even though I had registered the wrong number of breakfast set. I would like to thank him and other helpful and polite staffs for servicing us.

We are very happy with the service, friendly staff, comfort and large Room and Toilets, easy access to other major shopping attraction,, and even the MRT sevice at Ferrer Park will link us direct to Harbour Front and Sentosa Island. many local and halal restaurant just a minute walk from hotel. Musataf Centre( 24 hours) Shopping Mall just next door.
fresh, relax and comfortable, expensive car park, near to mustafa centre

Very happy with the hotel in terms of location (right next to Raffles), cleanliness, facilities and helpfulness of reception staff. After an overnight flight and 15 hours travelling I was able to get an early check in without a problem. Nice swimming pool and gym make this good value.
Good and easy to access location made it easy to go anywhere.
Check in and check out was quick and fuss free. Expensive but probably because it was situated in the business district.

It was comfortable, rooms are clean and quiet. Centrally located , near MRT station and there is a bus stop right outside hotel too. Short walk to bars and restaurants nearby. Many restaurants available and at affordable prices. Less than 10 min by cab to Sentosa and vivo city mall.

Comfortable pillows and duvet, enough selection for buffet breakfast, and overall good service. Although the fitness gym has to be improved ASAP and access to Orchard Road should be more convenient which is currently being constructed. The shopping center is also not very fitting to the quality of the hotel.
It was surprisingly good, and our requests of high floor, late checkout were adhere to.

The stay in park royal , Kitchener road was excellent Nd comfortable. The location is perfect for a business traveler as well as families...the famous Mustafa shopping center which is open 24 hrs is right next building...can do last minute shopping and night shopping without any problem.. The rooms are clean , big and well maintained.
happy in all the way, easy access to internet, neat room, big beds, very good light from outside, looks open and spacious
I chose this hotel for its location that is close to my destination that I do my business. I checked other hotels around, other hotels cannot beat value to money to Parc Souvereign.
location was good,though not perfect. Mandarin Orchard would be a better location, and the facade of the hotel is undergoing renovations. However, considering the price, this is a very good deal.
Very relaxing, comfortable bed, nice environment,friendly staff, walking distance to foodcourt and shopping malls.
It is near the MRT, has a hypermart in the building. The corridors and room is very nicely designed.
The room is quite small but clean. walking distance from church and shopping malls.

Next to mall and very convenient. Close to the business district and many food choices around the hotel. Also many drinking places around the hotel that opens till late. Pool and gym facilities are adequate.
Stay was great except the confusing car park! Should have a more detailed instructions for drivers.
enjoyed our stay at the hotel. specially enjoyed the afternoon tea and cocktails at the royal club lounge.
enjoyed our stay at the hotel. specially enjoyed the afternoon tea and cocktails at the royal club lounge.
Very comfortable and the room is very spacious and clean.
Quiet good, location is suitable for those that want to be close to local street and hawker food.
Business trip - quite and comfortabe room - hotel layout is very convoluted but easy to find room. location to tanglin and Orchard shopping and entrtainment is ideal.

I stayed 2 nights at this time. The room is huge with one bedroom apartment concept but its far from the lobby and swimming pool. It is at the separate building. The hotel is closed to shopping malls and orchard road. Very quite surrounding. The room has a separate living room and kitchen.
The staff are helpful and friendly. The stay is a pleasant one.

Comfortable room and bed. Room has minimal walkway but overall a comfortable place. Location is quite central as it is about 10 minutes walk to Plaza Singapura and 2 minutes walk to the local food court.
comfortable, relax and expensive car parking, easy eccess to city center
Huge room and twin queen bed is hard to beat in Singapore, not to mention it is quiet and near city.
Really liked the hotel and will definitely stay there next time.
clean and comfortable room, good quality restaurant, near to shops and restaurants
It was a good stay ! I enjoyed it and would stay here again !

My stay at the Resorts World Sentosa - Equarius Hotel was perfect! I really enjoyed my stay a lot even if it is only for a night. I would stay longer if I had the chance. The hotel is beautiful and clean. Check in was a little slow but that is fine for me as there are sofas and couches at the lobby. I had 2 rooms, both adjacent to each other on the 7th floor. Our rooms faced the forest, which was ok for me. The green trees were really pretty and feel very relaxing looking at them. The room was really spacious with a large comfortable bed, sofa and a huge bathroom. i love the concept of the bathroom. I will definitely come back for a stay with my family again in future.
Very relaxing and with very friendly staff with recently renovated rooms.

Had a good deal as agoda was having promotion. Room was surprisingly nice and big, from what I heard, the rooms have just been refurnished. Bed was big and Comfortable and I would say that it's value for money for the price I paid during the promotion.
Very good location as it is close to shopping area and nightlife..pleasant looking and comfortable room as well
Perfect stay with comfortable room. Large bed big and Clean toilet. Nice view facing marina bay sands (harbour view rooms).
The staffs are friendly and efficient, The room is spacious and comfortable. Free fast speed wifi internet access. Breakfast was a let down. Plates did not look clean and found few with stains.

Room was clean and comfortable. Bathroom is very spacious. Free wifi and minibar. It will be more ideal if checking in/out can be more efficient by having more staff being allocated at the front desk.
Its an old hotel but reasanably maintained. Bfast was quite good and offered so many oriental and western food.
Nice hotel but a little worn around the edges. Room signage needs improvment
The staff are all very friendly and helpful. The room service is good and daily newspaper are provided. Location is close to city. Near to major shopping centers.

Lobby was very big, the condition of the hotel was very new as well. Although the hotel name is big hotel, the room size proved otherwise. However, we already knew this when we book this hotel. It was an extremely affordable and value for money choice. Love the cleanliness and bed. It is only 2km away from orchard road so it is really not that far away.

It was a good stay. The room was big and spacious with all the necessary equipment (iron, hair dryer...). Room generally clean. Counter staff was very friendly and attentive to our needs, really liked the way she helped her when we checked in. There's also an ice machine at lobby of our area which I personally feel that it's good because I find it convenient to take ice by myself and not calling and waiting for hotel staff to bring it to me.

Good though the check in timing was so late. The room was really small good thing the bed was comfortable and it has a free movies and wifi. It is a bit pricey for such a small room and breakfast should be provided.
Room is of good size, air on is very cold and efficient. Bed is comfortable. Staff is helpful. Ok hotel for short stay

Our 6 Days, 5 Nights was great. Our room was clean. The bed was big and comfortable for 2 adults and a child. The staff was friendly and all smiles. The hotel was near to shopping malls. Overall, we would definitely come back.
Comfortable stay, comfy bed and nice bathtub. Efficient room service.

Excellent. Clean bedroom, clean bathroom, comfortable bed, good quality restaurant, menu in restaurant is international quality, nice staff, close to shopping areas and mount elizabeth hospital. Quiet surroundings so can rest comfortable. All staff in this hotel nicely.

The rooms are comfortable and the beds are very comfortable. The location is great as it's only a 5 minute walk to Orchard Road MRT, but the poolside areas are green and you can get away from the bustle and noise of the city. The breakfast is NOT included in the Agoda booking! We didn't realise and had to pay $35 a day for the buffet, but it was a spectacular breakfast! The hallways and rooms seem a bit dated and in need of a refresh to be value for money, as it's a bit pricey for a hotel that feels a little over the hill

Great stay cation... Low season so not crowded... 2nd time staying @ Michael... Near to monorail station.. Can go Vivo shopping centre by monorail, one station away... Near to universal and other resort world attractions...

Check-in was terrible. Our original hotel accommodation fell through, so we called BIG Hotel at 2am on the 7th to see what date we need to book online. They told us the current day (7th) instead of the 6th (day before). When we arrived at about 4am, the check-in staff denied us our room and told us we could only check-in at 10am at the earliest. We asked to speak to the person who told us the wrong information, and they promptly lied to us that he had left. Shifts don't change at that hour. In the end, we wanted our original room and be out by noon, as we still had a second day of accommodation left in our original location. In the end, we after much arguing and continued denial of by them, we had to agree to pay for an upgraded room so we could check-in "now". Free morning breakfast was disgusting; cardboard bacon and watery eggs.
comfortable and will not mind coming back to stay at this hotel again

Room is comfortable and clean. However, despite i am put on a non-smoking floor but the corridor and room still have persistent cigarette smell. Currently construction within vicinity so can be very disturbing in the day.

I think overall it's comfortable. However, there are a Couples of things that disturbed my rest. 1) the ceiling fan: it creaks very loudly. For someone who can't take air con for a long time, I need the fan for ventilation. However I can't switch it on due to the noise and spent the night adjusting the temp. 2) design of the room: for a Chinese - especially during the 7th month - seeing staff knock on the door before entering and seeing the art work with clothes hanging bamboo (which resembles incense during prayers) highly disturbed me.

Staff generally seemed tired. You would definitely not find any particular reason to lavish praise on them except they get the job done. Location was the pull factor for choosing this hotel. Room interior was decent.
Decent for business trip but overcrowded surroundings with too many inconsiderate crowds.
great! would return again when in Singapore. clean, classy, and central!

The staff is helpful and suggest alternative way to leave my luggage with them because I check out earlier. Easy to get taxi and access to bus and MRT. Located in the centre of business district and easy access to shopping mall.
i'm stay 3 days 2 nights, my destination for business in singapore, nice hotel, clean, good service, near from public transportation.

Was there for a night to meet an old friend on the next day. The room was clean and quiet. located within a moderate shopping complex too, thus its very convenient for me to just go out to coffee shop, fast food and even a Chinese food restaurant. Train service by walking distance and the hotel is very close to the main attractions for night life. Pubs and bars are within walking distance.
It a hotel located in City, easy access transport like MRT, taxi and buses.Walking distant to food court, restaurant and shopping center.

Excellent stay. The staff are very courteous and friendly. Free parking and easy access to all parts of Singapore. It would be great if the Hotel provide ironing boards in the room for ironing. However, overall, it is still a good place to stay

No complain, the hotel room is very nice and clean, alll staff are helpfull. The location is very good because very close to shopping area and easy access to public transportation. Hotel room have free minibar to guess room and provided cmplete facilities like tea and coffee cattle and also ironing table etc.

No complain, the hotel room is very nice and clean, alll staff are helpfull. The location is very good because very close to shopping area and easy access to public transportation. Hotel room have free minibar to guess room and provided cmplete facilities like tea and coffee cattle and also ironing table etc.
It is a very comfortable stay in Grand Park City Hall Hotel. The room is clean and the staffs are all user-friendly and attentive at all times.
Good Experience, will be having more visits for my staycation in the future.
LARGE ROOM , LARGE BED, CLOSE TO ORCHARD ROAD, WILL RECOMMEND TO FRIENDS.
Ok.. Not bad. Comfortable. Enjoyed my stay, friendly staff and nice ambience. ...".".........
Nice greetings, even get a congratulations memo for my birthdayin my room
pleasant and pretty much enjoyable. hotel is with balcony so easy excess to smoking
pretty good. old hotel, some of the rooms have been renovated. we were upgraded to "signature room", its pretty small, but the bed is comfortable.
The floor was sticky. The cleaner must have used too much detergent

Booked this hotel when arrived in airport through airport counter. The rate is cheaper for SGD288 nett per night inclusive of breakfast. We would like to extend the second night using this rate but cannot reach airport counter via phone. Thus, we booked through agoda and paid higher rate (without breakfast). We were quite disappointed that no free WIFI in the room and common area. We were informed that we can purchase 24-hour wifi access for 1 device for SGD30++ which is very expensive. It is very inconvenient for a 5-star hotel without free wifi service.
It was generally good.however your reception staff needs to enhance pr skills.

the hotel good for muslims near with mosque and this hotel have qiblat for easy muslim pray. this hotel also quiet silent event near with shopping mall. this place easy go to shopping mall especially bugis junction and other mall.

It was alright. Had to wait for quite some time to check in as there was only 2 staff at the front office. Breakfast was good by too crowded. Room is very clean and comfortable. Swimming pool is rather small.
it worth for what i payed for this hotel, big room, good location and friendly staff. many restaurant nearby which is walking distance only

we're enjoy the stay at hard rock hotel. especially my young son because he liked the swimming pool very much because he can play in the sand like playing in the beach. he asked to go there again next time. he also like the playland universal studio singapore, sea aquarium, etc.
nice hotel and I will back again with my children It is very atttactive hotel with facilities surounding it. We choose this hotel because the location and the it has a big room
it is a very comfortable, cheap, clean hotel. Value for money too

We chose this hotel because it is near Mt. Elizabeth Hospital and Paragon shopping center. Room is comfortable but a bit outdated. Bathroom design, especially the bathtub is horrible because water from shower head will spill over to the floor. Concierge is very helpful for calling taxi and storing our luggages. There is a restaurant in the hotel but we did not try it out.
Overall uneventful and comfortable. Check-in took longer as the check-in staff had to hunt for the Agoda confirmation at their end.
staff very friendly ,location is easy to go anywhere

I only stayed one night and this was my first time at this hotel. I have stayed at Royal Plaza on Scotts before. This area is quieter but still very close to all the shopping such as Ion, Far East Plaza and others. I booked an exec room and was on the 17th floor club lounge. Room was quite pleasant and having a balcony is good too. The service was very efficient.
Very unique hotel with perfect location. Its very good to bring your family here for relaxing and resting.
Overall is good, near to major attraction like Orchard road and Sim Lim Square.
Comfortable and clean. Near many eateries and shopping.

The hotel was comfortable, breakfast was good although at Sing$21 a little expensive. If you just want a croissant and juice then you can get from the next door 7-11. Tried the lunch menu which was excellent.
My self and my Daughter stayed on 1 Night in a delux room. ( This was our 3rd Night) We had to pay 25 S$ for breakfast and it was not worth. But the room and bed was very Comfortable
the only issue is the glass door at shower area cannot close
the stay at Amara Singapore was great and comfortable. It was a weekend getaway from us Couples and its a change from the usual orchard area that we frequent
It was a pleasant hotel stay with other family members.
It was excellent. WIll come back again as I had a great time.
It was a great time to be with family. Very Very good breakfast
As usal, quiet nice stay. Feeder bus to other attractions in rws. Love their balcony and bathrooms. However recently no free upgrade so pretty sad. Still love this hotel.

A relax weekend getaway. Large room and bathroom. Minus point is, wthe waiting time. One and a half hour. Seriously? And no staff told me that my room was ready, I have to find out myself. Only checked in at 4:30. Wow. Please do something about this. Other then that, comfortable stay

My overall stay was good however the checkin process wasnt good. I checkin for one room at 12pm and didnt get the other room until 5pm. I was a little upset and dismay as I have young kids that needed rest. I feel the checkin staff needed training and a little bit of polishing in their professionalism.
My stay at York hotel was great stay. The location is near Orchard Road and this enable me to shop easily at Orchard. The room is big and confortable.
Nice view, comfortable room and close to shopping areas.

Other then there's no bathrobes,slippers in our room or were forgotten,everything else seems ok.The room is big comfortable other then it's old.The window view is nice & location is easily access to all nice foods & shopping.The hotel building inside out looks kind of old but the room is still comfortable thou.Will consider stay again if not too expensive,as the price per night is quite expensive.

Overall was a nice stay but the toiletries was not completed. I had to buy a toothpaste because it wasn't provided. For the amount of money, I don't think the quality is equal but it's not a bad hotel either.
Excellent and the hotel staffs are very attentive specially those at the entrance. They really come to your assistance even you never ask. Really enjoy staying here.
Excellent and the hotel staffs are very attentive specially those at the entrance. They really come to your assistance even you never ask. Really enjoy staying here.

Overall, good. One comment, i'm using a nokia symbian phone and the wi-fi access web-page did not work for my phone and i could not access the internet. I think they should use a dummy-proof method of just asking for password during connecting to wi-fi.Xavier P.

My room is clean and comfortable with quite large bathroom. The staff service is very good, i said we're on honeymoon and they gave us a box of chocolate with warm wishes greeting card. The internet speed is very fast. I tried the restaurant for breakfast time and very satisfied. I'll come back to this hotel again in the future.

My room is clean and comfortable with quite large bathroom. The staff service is very good, i said we're on honeymoon and they gave us a box of chocolate with warm wishes greeting card. The internet speed is very fast. I tried the restaurant for breakfast time and very satisfied. I'll come back to this hotel again in the future.

Understanding front dest staff who knew that we have 2 young kids that staying with us, he upgraded our room to a Family suite at no additional cost. Our kids likes the room and bath tub so much and we enjoy 3 days 2 nights stay with a relaxing and yet fruitful trip.

We stayed in Goodwood Park Hotel for three nights. It is a big hotel with very comfortable rooms. But you may get lost easily for the first time as there are so many accesses and corridors to lead you to the hotel rooms. The room was very big and comfortable. I especially impressed the high ceiling of the room. One of the advantages to stay in the Goodwood Park Hotel is that it is very close to Orchard Rd from there you could reach all kind of shops and restaurants. There are two swimming pools in the hotel. We liked very much the one at the back which was a smaller pool but with deep water and comfortable seating surrounded by trees; it’s very private. We loved it very much. On the whole, we had a very nice stay at Goodwood Park Hotel and we would like to come to stay here again for our next trip to Singapore.

Need more service staff at the recept counter. Easier if car park coupon was redeemed at concierge then no need to queue with other check in and check out guests which took a longer time. Staff were friendly and helpful. Tv channels were pathetic... You only had fox channel and local channels, and the tv signal was inconsistent and fuzzy most of the time

it was okay. big room, comfortable room, fast internet, big bathroom, and the location is not too far from the shopping areas. 10 minutes walking distance to the raffles, and 10 minutes by taxi to the orchard. we celebrated the new year's eve in the lobby, and it's fun & satisfying. 711 and minimart only downstair the hotel, and there's watson near by.

The service was good and check in was fast. Overall the room is very comfortable and nice. New hotel and deco as well. The housekeeping was quick, prompt and not forgeting efficient too. Thumbs up for them.
This is my third stay & again very satisfied with the hotel.
Comfortable room with a HD TV with a great selection of movies. However espresso machine was leaking.

I have stayed many times at the Orchard Parade Hotel over the past 7 years and it is my first choice in Singapore as I can rely on getting a comfortable room close to shopping and nightlife, with a nice pool to bask by if I have time and a Couples of decent restaurants down on the street level.

It was pleasant stay in junior suite room. The staff showed us the way to the room and quickly deliver iron and ironing board when we asked for one. The check in and check out was fast. Room was cleaned frequently and was comfortable. Location is central, walkable to MRT and just beside local food at Far East Plaza.
The hotel is a walk time.ing distance to Mount E hospital. The breakfast were variety of Asian And European food. The staffs were very helpful and always welcom me back every
The staffs were friendly and the room was clean and comfortable. Daily breakfast were also variety of Asian and American ABF.
Variety of breakfast incliude Asian and American breakfast. The staffs are friendly and helpful. I feel very comfortable every time since most of the staffs recognize me as frequent guests.
Stay was good especially because the front office was very accomadating with respect to the check-in procedures. If I knew they would be so good, I would have planned the trip in a better way.
Staff were friendly and highly professional. Room was a little small but very comfortable

Not my first time staying here. As locals, naturally we assumed parking was complimentary. Until we were told otherwise. Parking amounted to 80 SGD. We went back and told them previously we didn't have to pay. A lady, if i remember rightly, Diana - she told us that all along we have to pay. Granted. Perhaps the previous time was complimentary for us as we were moved from Changi Village Hotel to Rendezvous due to a miscommunication. Perhaps CV Hotel paid the parking for us. We don't know. She then showed us an option. We could buy the carpark ticket for a standard price of $12. We gladly did. My point is, when we asked the first time, why didn't she tell us of the $12 parking ticket instead of us having to get to the gantry to realize a whopping $80? We didn't mind paying at first but $80 was too ridiculous. She should have told us this available option earlier instead of having us make a trip and come back later only to tell us there was this option. I even had to reason with her n tell her it would have made us happier if she told us earlier. I wasn't concerned about even paying the $12 compared to the $80. She should have handled it more intelligently.
Very attentive and friendlt staffs, nice and spacious room, great location close to shopping areas.

One of the worst check in ever where the receptionist insisted I handed in either electronic copy or paper copy of the booking even though he can find my booking in the system. It was really frustrating because I booked it on the road and didn't have a chance to print it out. Other than that the room itself is perfect with nice amenities.

The room was spacious but the bed wasn't clean and we had to inform reception to get the sheets changed. The staff were very helpful and responsive though. The bathroom was large but the shower door was faulty and water floods the bathroom floor when you shower, which was very unpleasant. One major issue is the inability to hail taxis from the hotel, and it's difficult for taxis to drop off passengers at the hotel since the hotel entrance is remote and hard to find. There should be better signage.
Very comfortable bed, good to sleep in. Free & fast wifi. Check in/check out - speedy service. Nice breakfast.
Comfortable room, good location, nice and helpful staff
Good, there was no serious issue, it's very crowded all the time
Nice bed and room decor. Plenty of food surrounding hotel. Breakfast terrible though.
I had short but great stay at the hotel. The room was clean and comfortable. The hotel was also close to loads of F&B as well as entertainment outlets.
Had a very relaxing stay in the comfortable room, ample food choices around the hotel. Nice to stroll around in the evening.
the location was near the train station which made it easy for me to go places. the room was very comfortable. overall, i'd go back to this hotel.
A relaxing ,comfortable stay.The room was of a high standard of cleanliness and the bed very comfortable. Buffet breakfast had plenty of choice.
three of us stay in a room... quite convenient , clean and comfortable room ... i will recommend my friend to choose this hotel
I enjoyed my stay..the rooms were big enough and comfortable..the only bad point is the location of the hotel..we had to walk a lot to reach the main orchard road..

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at goodwood park hotel. The check was quick, the rooms really clean with great, comfortable beds. The location is perfect, just 5 minutes walking from orchard road, which means you are in a quiet location but have quick access to shopping/dining/nightlife.
Room was large, flooring was stained and overall did not represent the star value of the hotel. Beds were very comfortable and staff accommodated our requests well.

Overall we were quite satisfied about this hotel. The price were reasonable and the room was quite comfortable. The kids enjoyed the buffet breakfast very much. It's also very near to Raffles City Shopping Mall and City Hall MRT station which is just a 5 mins walk. We could also easily get a taxi from the hotel. The things we don't like about the hotel was the poor WiFi service in the room. The kettle provided was rusty and after changing a few times all kettle were the same, either leaking or rusted. We think that this hotel is slightly over-rated, it should be a four star hotel instead.
The stay was a pleasant one, although check in and check out took a while because they have a lot of guests. Breakfast is cater to international guests than to Asian guests.

Honestly, I was a little worried having read reviews commenting on the worn out state of the rooms. It is not that bad. If I do have to nit-pick, the bedsheets did look a little worn(small tears and holes spotted). Overall, I didn't have any problems with the room except there was no hair dryer to be found anywhere! View from the 25th floor of the Classic Harbour View room is gorgeous especially at night. New Asia Bar is definitely worth a visit. Good mix of music, nice crowd and friendly bartenders. My friend was celebrating her hen's night and we had a lot of fun!

The hotel looked very old and run down but the rooms were spacious and clean. It was a pleaasant stay with very fast check in/out. Walking distance to malls and eateries. You can hear some morning prayers from the mosque. Slightly disappointed there there is no bathtub with the price I paid.
It was okay. It would have been better if the rooms were thoroughly cleaned. Dust were everywhere and the bathroom/toilet had a funky smell.

Very good location just next to City Hall and Raffle City shopping centre. Staff helped me bring my luggage to the room and gave me an induction on the in-room facilities. I stayed at 62/F and it was just amazing to view the city at the balcony. Having comprehensive in room facilities, the room also provided complimentary luxury goods, such as toiletries and even TWG tea bags. The size of the room is big though the decor is a bit old fashion. The shower is a fixed one but not a handheld. I also preferred a large bed but it was a twins bed room. Overall I am highly satisfied with the experience, especially the in room supplies and the city view. Deserve a high score. Minor recommendation would be a renovation in mid-term, but understood the room price will be increased in this case.

Teh room was clean and of a good size. We asked for a baby cot on the agoda booking. Reception thought the cot was in the room. We determined it wasn't. Then there was no cot available in the whole hotel. We were given a trundle bed and made it all work. Breakfast was satisfactory.

The stay at the Park Royal was comfortable. There was an issue with the Wi-fi though when connected for the first time, it wouldn't connect and the IT department had to intervene to establish the connection. On the first day the connection was available on the smartphone, but from thereon no connection, till it became absolutely necessary on the last day to request the IT department to intervene.
It was a good experience at Park Royal,nice comfortable rooms,and affordable,and walking distance to (MRT) train station.
Very nice hotel. Business hotel, Close to major attractions and Comfortable room.
Very comfortable stay Central Close to mrt and shops Only thing is the rates are not exactly cheap for this level of budget hotel
great food nearby the hotel, much cheaper than what the hotel has to offer, near lau pat sat market, full of glorious local cuisines
It was lovely. We arrived early and were able to checked in immediately. The staffs were attentive.
It was lovely. We arrived early and were able to checked in immediately. The staffs were attentive.

The room is small but nicely designed. It was perfect for our stay since we just needed a place to sleep during our vacation in Singapore. I was appreciative of the free internet access provided. The room also has a working area which is a nice added feature. Most importantly it is located right next to the mall and Novena station of their MRT system.

Rather big room by Singapore standard and it is comfortable and clean. The gym is small, but equipped with treadmill, cross trainer and weights. Swimming pool was pleasent and there is a warm pool as well. Also, the hotel is linked to MRT directly. I had a good stay here.
Beds were comfy, walking distance to Bugis Junction and other eateries. Staff were friendly.fast check in and out.
Good and comfortable experience and will return surely...
sweet smelling lobby greeted me as i entered the hotel. had a good night's rest with the comfy bed. toilet was clean.
The hotel has a great location with MRT right below the underground, and it is close to many shopping malls. Great place. Although the room is abit small thou.

The hotel is located near CBD and Orchard shopping belt and yet away from all the bustling at night to allow for a comfortable stay. The only downside is the on-going construction of a new MRT just opposite the hotel that can be noisy at times. But the construction work stop at 11pm so it is still bearable. The staffs are friendly and the check-in and check-out process was a breeze.

We are returning guests of Concorde Hotel whenever we travel to Singapore for work assignments. The location is very good and rooms adequately spaced thus very comfortable for medium to long stay. Although it is time to improve the access to Orchard Road, which thankfully is being worked on currently. Also, the hotel can do a lot of changes to the fitness centre. We hope that will be addressed next. Nonetheless, it is worth coming back to Concorde because of its competitive rates.
Comfortable and convenient. Very near shopping malls with great restaurants and shops.
Stay was comfortable, baby cot was available for our toddler, morning breakfast had a wide variety, and being located near to the orchard shopping belt by bus and mrt, it was easy for all of us.
Good but free Wifi service is recommended
Overall a pleasant stay, worth a revisit. Staff was attentive, checkin and out was fast

This is our 2nd stay in park royal Relax and comfortable stay with my family. Clean rooms and friendly staff. Faster is process from hotel staff. Ambient in hotel is very good. Shopping mall and all location are accessible from hotel.

It is a very short stay and I don't have the luxury to roam around the hotel to check out the facilities. The escalator was not working and there was long queue at the elevator. However the room is very comfortable allowing me to relax and rest.
rooms were clean and we had a comfortable stay. but not as 4-star hotel as it claims to be.
Stayed for the second time at this hotel. It has an ideal location near bugis mrt. The room is spacious and bed is king size and the pool is also good. It is value for money.
This was my second stay there. Still as good as before.
This hotel is near MRT station and the rooms are large and clean. It is also near a few eating places.
Pleasant stay, though there were renovations going on in the lobby, so having to wait an hour listening to drilling and inhaling paint fumes wasn't exactly great.
Great City with a fantastic location. Being on orchard/tanglin road you can walk to all major shopping stops
Great City with a fantastic location. Being on orchard/tanglin road you can walk to all major shopping stops
Good experience, friendly staff and good service. Experienced a pleasant stay.
Turned out to be a better hotel than expected - generally ticked all the boxes
Overall, a comfortable stay. Will definitely return.
Comfortable stay. Friendly front desk. Internet is difficult to connect in the room. Breakfast selection is average.

The hotel was very nice. It is quite expensive, but that is normal for Singapore. The buffet breakfast was very good, the bed was very comfortable. My one complaint is that there was construction happening which meant there was a banging sound for 8 hours on the Saturday. It made it tough to enjoy the morning in our room

The location is a good choice for travelers as there are various types of shopping options (malls and street). The room is spacious and comfortable but it is a little far from the lift and guests might feel awkward to walk in bath robes to and fro the swimming pool.
The stay was great and comfortable! Glad to experience a night stay at Goodwood Park, especially when it let me felt that the money spent is worthwhile for this enjoyable stay.
Comfortable stay. We enjoyed the close proximity of local food and sight seeing around the heritage Kampong Glam. Nearby the Bugis junction n bugis village for shopping.
Checked in on club floor, nice view there. Breakfast and cocktails are quite good, varieties not a lot, but great quality! Room is not so big but new setting, clean and comfortable!

Our stay was okay. It's just that,the housekeeping failed to put soap at our bathroom,& when we requested for 1,it took us 4 hours before we get it. Also,not so much choices for buffet breakfast. But the hotel is very near to MRT.
My stay was good. I was upgraded to a suite which was a wonderful surprise.
very confortable bed, very fast internet access, not so bad breakfast.

I have stayed at this hotel probably a dozen times over the past six years. While the cost and the room details seem to bounce around like a yo-yo I have always had an enjoyable and comfortable experience there. In good weather the pool deck is a nice place to lounge around as are the outside areas of Modesto (pizza)and Black Angus (steaks) on street level. For country music, beer and 'old men behaving badly' bar scene check out Jamboree located in the building kitty-corner. My only knock's are the cost of the self-service laundromat (10 SGD for each of wash and dry) and the breakfast hours which cut off at 10am for room service and 10:15 in the restaurant with an hour or so gap until lunch is available. I prefer to work early and eat later in the morning.
The room and service were fine, but this time we experience that all the food we ordered were salty. We do not know why.

The deluxe room which was upgraded into a suite made our stay more enjoyable. Aside from the tickets to Universal Studios, adventure cove and SEA Aquarium that came with the room package we got, the buffet breakfast we had was completely satisfying!
It was pleasant stay at the big hotel. The room was small but it was nice designed and the city view from the room was fantastic.

This was a great hotel and I was glad I booked this hotel. The staff were friendly and hospitable. The location was great, close to the MRT. The room was comfortable and housekeeping did a fantastic job. Our stay was enjoyable and made our trip to Singapore worth it.
Very satisfied with hotel comfotability, cleanliness and strategic location. It's value for money. Very convenient for hotel guests in accessing public transportation.

It was a last minute booking. And I didn't plan for it, but I had to stay overnight in Singapore. Basically I just need a comfortable place to sleep for a few hours. RELC was a try. The price was inexpensive. And unexpectedly the hotel is very clean, the room very large, internet connection was very fast, the breakfast was very nice! All in all .. it worth for the price!
It was relaxing when I returned to my room after a tired day's of meetings. The room is so clean and big. I am surprised by the amenities provided. I think it's value for money!

Stayed there for a night. There is an Italian restaurant named Palio at the hotel which serves good and nice food. The hotel room is big and comfortable. There's a welcome note shown when the tv is switched on which surprised me. Everything is good except that there is no stable Wi-Fi. The handphone signal is bad at that location as well. Overall this hotel is value for money and I would recommend others to go for a stay there.
mediocre experience. the furnishing looks and feels old and dull.

As always, had an amazing stay at Royal Plaza. We got an extra bed the last minute and only waited for 45mins for them to set that up. They even have an sms service to text when the room is done, and during that time, me and my friends grabbed lunch. FREE internet, can't stress that enough. Friendly and amazing service!

As always, had an amazing stay at Royal Plaza. We got an extra bed the last minute and only waited for 45mins for them to set that up. They even have an sms service to text when the room is done, and during that time, me and my friends grabbed lunch. FREE internet, can't stress that enough. Friendly and amazing service!
comfortable stay, kids friendly, clean room, easy access to MRT, near local halal restaurants
Great services from check in to out, spacious and clean room
Great services from check in to out, spacious and clean room
Hotel staff was eagerly helpful. Family room are very spacious and comfortable. Walking distance within famous Orchard street for shopping. Room rates are definitely worth it. Thank you! Agoda.
no complaints as being a new hotel especially there were so many hotels to choose from.
Super, just what I needed for one night - wish I had more!

Overall, I was happy with the hotel. It was quiet, clean, it had a small but well-equipped gym for my purpose, great location (though it is a good 10 to 15 min walk from MRT), helpful staff, fast internet! The rooms were rather cramped though well designed to optimise the size. Pricing was reasonable. Overall, I'd be happy to give the hotel another go.
Comfortable and quiet. Had a good rest as the mattress was comfortable and the sheets were clean
It is superb, however, it is a long way to get in because of the mrt construction (they need to turn 1 round in order to get into the hotel lobby.
comfortable, nice design, clean room. Location is disadvantage of this hotel. 10 minutes walk to reach shopping area not suitable.

Comfortable stay and relatively incident free for such a large hotel, which is a compliment. I was allocated a room with breath-taking views of the bay and the city. The rooms are big by today's standards, although the lack of a separate shower fitting given the space available, is slightly disappointing. Hotel location is the biggest plus, with an MRT station directly below and being somewhat on the edge of both the bay area and the orchard road downtown. The bewildering array of food options in the adjoining Raffles City makes opting for hotel breakfast pointless, especially if you have time to wander. Not a good choice if you need to request for late check-out as it appears they have a high turnover and are likely to turf you out to make way.
As Usual, the location with great food and shopping just around the corner.It is also great for religious visits.

Overall it was a pleasant, comfortable and enjoyable stay except for the fact that the wireless internet keeps dropping. RSW should do something about its wireless internet. Its time to upgrade. Apart from this small glitch, I was pleased with the stay.

Hotel was located just out skirt of orchard area, easy access to many shopping mall & restaurant. Hotel with complimentary for guest. However the internet speed was a bit slow at time. Room is spacious & clean.

I stay in Singapore for a night for business purpose and the hotel is near to Bugis area where as you can find all kind of shop around. The hotel is clean, and easiy access. However, the no of parking bays in the hotel is limited and parking space is very small, typical parking in Singapore.

Easy and hassle free (check in, check out). Our one night stay for a relaxed night was good. With the great offer, it was a smart choice to choose the hotel for a relaxed stay in. Great time to stay in bed while watching the wide range of channels available. Nice gesture with the complimentary bottles of water.
enjoy, comfortable relax etc near to MRT station easy eccess to city center
It was what as expected. The price was reasonable for the location. The room was clean. The wifi was inconsistent and slow.
Overall very pleasant. A little bland and boring but good nevertheless. We would return next time mainly for the location. Breakfast uninspired.
Good,confortable room, too expensive but high class, near to shopping centre
It is awesome and absolutely perfect!!! I would recommend my friend to stay this hotel!!!

Satisfied with the large & clean room. Strategic location, easy to move around to any nearby shopping mall n Bugis MRT is just 10 mins walk. Many local Chinese & Malay food around. Arab street is just along the same side of the road, can get good quality & nice silk material

This hotel has good location. Just have to walk 5-7 mins to train stations. Very close to the shopping district. Hotel is very comfortable, the bed likewise. Overall, very please with the stay.Value for money.
It was very comfortable. The room was very clean and tidy. Staffs were also attentive and helpful. The location of the hotel was superb as it was at the heart of most shopping malls.

A hotel I would stay with whenever I come back to Singapore. This is my 3rd stay and I even book a room as a getaway for my nephew! A good hotel with their guest's comfort and convenience in mind is a hotel that will keep guests coming back.
The stay was good, it was located near the MRT and thus very accessible. The shopping centre is just across the road, with many eateries and places to get groceries.

Chose the hotel mainly because of close proximity,to halal food outlets at Kampong Glam and Arab Street. Bugis Junction shopping mall and underground station is 5 mins walk away, and 20 mins to the airport. The king size bed and pillows are extremely comfy. Room is large and clean. They provide the LAN cable, but have to buy a prepaid card for the wifi. Staff are friendly and taxis are easy to come buy. Wish there were more choices for their halal breakfast buffet. Although, the food at the indian restaurant is not bad.
Good communication and service mind of hotel staff. Calm atmosphere.

The hotel is located just behind Mustafa center and nearby many local restaurants and shopping. It's just 2 min walk to Mustafa center. The hotel staff are very friendly. I was traveling with my family and had two rooms. Superior and deluxe. Comparing the two room types deluxe which are on high floor and charged more than superior I felt that the deluxe room was even smaller than superior and the television on the superior room was big and the deluxe room was small so I didn't find any different between deluxe room and superior room other than getting only extra complimentary water bottles and on high floor. my room was not included with free breakfast and hotel charges for breakfast is very expensive. It's better to eat out side near by restaurants. Overall I had a very comfortable stay.
Pleasant stay!Nice comfortable room and bed. Sufficient lighting. Wood panel flooring a nice change compared to many others with ceramic.
comfortable bed, overall clean but not so neat like got hair on shower, and on pillow. Air con not cold. good location, easy to access to shopping and eating places.
Stay was quite good. Stay was comfortable and peaceful, room was clean and big, bed was comfortable. Hotel is situated near to all amenities like public transport, shopping and entertainment.
Overall stay was quite good. Hotel is in the center of city, close to most of the shopping malls and night entertainment.

Fast internet, love the wooden flooring, love the bathroom, however no toothbrush provided, channels on TV are good too and acoustic is good so we did get pretty good sleep. However, the MRT is a bit far also returning to the hotel via bus is a bit hard as we don't know where or which bus takes there though it stops right infront of the hotel.
Pleasant and comfortable!Recommended to stay. Centralise good location, subway, food court, good resturant and shopping departmental store.
I love that they upgraded me and my kids to a bigger room. It was very nice and big room. Love the view from the room. My kids love it.
comfortable, relax and enjoy, centralised to the attraction area, shopping malls
comfortable, near to local muslim food center, walking distn to sim lim square and sim lim tower

Equarius Hotel althought is kinda far apart from other hotels of Resort World Sentosa and it has no link way to walk to Universal studio but it is more quiet compare to other hotels like Hotel Michael and Hard rock hotel. It is a great hotel to stay in for relax. travel to other part of island maybe troublesome as there are no walking path leading out from the hotel and the shuttle bus that comes very 15 mins only bring you around the hotels in Resort World Sentosa.
Good. Only this part on late check out. Upon check in, was given late check out by staff at 2pm but my access card was not functioning after the official timing at 12pm.

Our stay was perfect. Check in and check out was fast. Best part is that after showing our Adventure Cove tickets to the Hotel staff we were ushered to the hotel's entrance to the park which is only 1 minute from its lobby as opposed to walking to the park's entrance about 10 minutes away.Superb!
