Service from the Equarius Hotel staff were exemplary!

Great location with 5 minutes walk to subway. Room was incredible, cosy ambiance, great hotel ammenities, staffs were friendly and courteous. I'm loving it. Will visit again.
Restaurant Tip: Breakfast are delicious, but need to arrive a bit early otherwise some foods will run out!!!
It was okay. We booked the clubroom that comes with club lounge at the 22 level. Provides cocktail in the evening that is not bad too. It has a infinity pool and a gym.
My stay was only for a night, so I really did not have time to enjoy all the facilities. Nevertheless it was relaxing enough for such a short trip.

Boyfriend and I had a great weekend at Oasia, we especially enjoyed the club room with the great view and huge windows, and the club benefits, which included the 6-8pm refreshments & free-flow cocktails, and the heated pool which opened til late at 11pm. The staff was kind to obliged to my birthday request too, however requesting an additional 30sgd for that. Our only gripe was that the 6-8pm refreshments and breakfast buffet was not topped up frequently enough. As a result, there were always people waiting at the buffet stands for the food to be refilled.

This is a comfortable, reasonably-priced hotel in a very central location. The staff was pleasant and the hotel was in great shape overall. Not quite 5-star luxury, but it's got everything you need for leisurely travel. The swimming pool is very nice as well.
Frequent guest at this hotel. Close to areas of interest to me. Not flash but very acceptable.
suitable for family, luxury and big hotel, clean.come with a balcony.food around the hotel.but a little bit far away from mrt station.

We and our children spent a great night at the hotel as we got a free upgrade to corporate suite although its just for one night, we had spent the most memorable time with the children at the hotel.We will definitely be back again in the near future!Cheers!
Fine, although it was indicated as Orchard Road but it was really a distance away from Orchard.
First room given to me had a very foul odor. Actually smells moldy.I noticed the aircon vent is full of molds, which could be the reason for the smell.

First we were really happy and satisfied with the rooms. Second the buffet breakfast was great and tasty. Third was the clean and quiet surroundings of your lobby and even each floor of your hotel. We LOVE TO STAY AGAIN in your hotel.
Nice and comfort to Stay. Easy to access in transport around Singapore.
Better than expected . Comfortable room , easy access to local dining and public transportation

Went there for my girlfriend birthday. It was definitely a value for money stay for a big room, king-sized bed! Located centrally in Sentosa and easily accessible to nearby attractions and eating places. One thing that I was disappointed is that there is no free wifi for hotel guests. Check out was a bit slow during 2pm, luckily reception staffs are very friendly and attentive. Overall a enjoyable stay.

Everything was ok except items in the bathroom/toilet.There were no face and hand towels.There was no bath floor mat.When complained,the house keeping dept did not take the compliant seriously and simply gave a petty excuse stating that they have a problem with the laundry company.He wanted at least 15 minutes to provide missing items.I received some items after 30 minutes,that too after giving them a Couples of call.Hand towels never came.This was the first time I experienced such a situation.Management should should ensure that guests are not inconvenienced
it was satisfying, I joined the standard chartered marathon where the finish line is not far from the hotel. I can just walk to the hotel after I completed the running race
staff was great and rooms was comfortable.still renovating the facade and shopping area, surely will look superb with more facilities for guests to enjoy.

it was good besides the bed sheets smell of OD so maybe didn't wash very well. No free wifi. and the elevators are very far away from the lobby. otherwise the quietness, the lushy greens and spacious room were all excellent!
Excellent good management comfortable easy access every where anytime for restaurants to jump in. Room was perfectly in size, clean,

It was pretty decent except that check-in was extremely slow. Usual checkin time is at 2pm and we reached at 4pm but still had to wait till 5pm for one of our 3 rooms. Loved the jacuzzi steam bath and sauna facilities. They are nice. Fitness center is decent too.
no change compare to my last stay and all is just the same old same old

As purchased 2 nights' stay on 2 occasions, noticed front desk upon checking in on the 2 nights. Front counter called my room at 1215hrs after my first night asking if I would want to extend my stay despite me noticing them I have 2 nights upon checked in. Best of all, I went shopping at 1500hrs. I did not hang room tidy up signage outside my room door, when I get back to my room, to my horror, the room has been tidy up. There is a safe box but it is locked when I checked in. I personnel valuable is laying round in the room!! Called front desk, a pino answered, however despite easing down my anger, she said it is their policy to tidy up the room even though I have 2 nights stay and no signage. She is very rude and asked me to check my items to see any missing and if any missing, notice front desk. I told off, items are missing, the hotel expects police to step in and pino says go ahead. Before checking out, front desk called to remind me to check out. Call this hotel a 4 star hotel. Lousy service and attitude.

It was overall a memorable experience to stay at one of the iconic hotels in Singapore. However, hotel is pricey and breakfast doesnt come together with the room unless u are willing to pay more. Bkfast per pax is about $39++ which doesnt make any sense since it's not like the breakfast is prepared by top celebrity chefs.

I stay here for 10 days, this is our last stop for honeymoon after europe. overall the stay was good. The hotel is located very strategic at the central of orchard road, everything else was good and can't complain at all, but one problem the room cleaning up service is just average, they didn't make up the room as good as we expect to, many litter are still in the room when we come back to the room at night. But it's maybe our fault because we have to much stuff. But it's a good stay

Book the deluxe room and got upgraded to the deluxe with garden.. Had the view of adventure cove! Huge and comfortable room, loved the bathroom. Very convenient access to adventure cove as the hotel had it's own gate, which will probably be THE reason to book this hotel from now on due to our annual passes. Staff was great and attentive. Only disappointment was that we couldn't extend our stay for half a day.. Seems like they are always fully booked?

It was wonderful! I was upgraded after I mentioned that I was an Iprefer member who didnt rmb that she could book through iprefer. Immediately the person upgraded my room. Its close to shopping centres, very accessible. Only thing now, the front facade is under renovation.
very convenient from airport and very good access to city center, definitely the value for price.

The hotel is ok, I am very happy with the front desk staff and the concierge staff. They are very helpful and also friendly. The room is nice but nothing special actually, comfy bed and also pillow! 6 pillows! (I like many pillows). Restroom is quite spacious too. Very close to MRT station.

The hotel is situated in City area and it is very near shopping mall like Plaza Singapura and teh rest in Orchard Road. It is actually walking distance of about 15mins to Plaza Singapura and there is a Cathey Building nearby with Cinema. At night, there are few pubs and eatery stores nearby the hotel. Basically location is good and easy to navigate around. Staff are very couteous and hotel looks new.

It was okay. We stayed 2 days then flew out. The room was very small for two guests plus luggage, and there was only one electrical socket. This was the first place I've ever seen USB ports built into the room - for charging phones, iPads etc... Staff need to be able to direct taxis to the place but weren't really able to do that effectively. Even after I told them that they had got my taxi driver lost they seemed a little confused and said they weren't really sure how to direct drivers. Driving/taxi advice: drive along Bencoolen towards Middle Road, turn right just before Middle road, Then turn left into the multi-stores car park. Taxi drop-off is on the 2nd floor of the car park. Go into the lobby area, find the lift and go down to basement 1 with your luggage to check in. If you find my tip helpful, please give feedback. Thanks

I enjoyed my stay there, I really like the design in my room, it is a very small, compact but cozy room for a single person because it is not too spacious. There is a fire fighting sign there to remind customers of the emergency exit in case of fire. There is also a LED torch light available in case of electricity break down. So I really like the design, makes me feel that the designer really think for customer's needs. This makes me feel very special staying in my room. And it is quite near to MRT and sopping centre such as Bugis Junction. I really don't mind the walking because I can exercise a bit by walking since I seldom exercise. There are plenty of eating places near it too.

The room was small and dirty, with hair all over the bathroom floor and partially used toiletries still in the shower. The hair-dryer burst into flames in my hand when I turned it on. Two of the lamps in the room had broken bulbs. The building is old and needs renovating, and the pool is dark and dingy. The front desk staff were rude, unaccommodating and unhelpful; they refused early check-in before 2pm without even checking first to see if a room was available. Given that Singapore has hundreds of better hotels for the same price, I will definitely never stay here again. It is completely undeserving of its 4-star rating.

the hotel have a great location, easy access to our business area, easy access for muslim food there is a lot variety of food that easy to find and the staff are friendly and help easy check in and check out.

I always like this hotel for its friendly atmosphere and very near to famous ZAM ZAM restaurant.I will not miss my morning prayer at Sultan Mosque because it is so near.I can stroll at the Bugis street juncture for dinner and shopping just at the walking distance from the hotel.
Always enjoy my stay at the Royal Scotts I have been there many times in the past and it has always been good while not over priced.
Always enjoy my stay at the Royal Scotts I have been there many times in the past and it has always been good while not over priced.
This is a great hotel ever stay in SGP. It is just few step connected to MRT (Novena). Having a long walk from sight seeing come back to stay in this hotel is really comfortable.
The hotel has a connecting tunnel to novena mrt, 1 minutes walk to shopping center, the twin bed is so small, the swimming pool is nice and the internet is fast.

The bad: -Construction beside hotel (Piling works in the day) -Poor aircon (First room aircon too cold and cannot be adjusted, second room aircon with rattling sound. -No complimentary breakfast -No complimentary parking (Have to purchase day-pass at $12) -Choked drainage (Both sink and bathing area) -Stranger walking into hotel lobby and selling key chains (Even scolded us when purchase is refused) The Good: -Staff offered free room upgrade -Good central location
Considerably big hotel given the location n price. location , big comfortable bed and clean

I stay regularly at Oasia and it feels like a home away from home. Thoughtfully designed rooms, comfortable beds and quiet location with super easy access to transport. Friendly and helpful staff. Only omission is no bar or evening lounge.

Almost needed to check in at 3pm due to full room. Almost a disaster however due to we bringing in an infant they manage to get a room for us around 11 am. The bell boy took about 20 min just to get to our room when we about to check out. Not sure whether being busy or we are being forgotten.

My fiance and I had a very comfy and relaxing stay at the Mandarin Orchard Hotel. We love the easy accessibility to shopping and dining areas. The bed is good but the pillows are too soft and thin. The staff at the lobby greeting us upon our arrival makes our day. She approached us and led us to the check in counter right away without much issue.
Good value for money and enjoyable experience. Close to amusement park Universal Studios and shopping mall.

staff was very helpful and courteous..and the checkin /check out process was quick and hassle free. There were other hotels with probably similar services and covenience, however the deciding factor for me was the halal kitchen, i can rest assured that i could eat anything without any doubt. hotel is also close to key shopping areas.

staff was very helpful and courteous..and the checkin /check out process was quick and hassle free. There were other hotels with probably similar services and covenience, however the deciding factor for me was the halal kitchen, i can rest assured that i could eat anything without any doubt. hotel is also close to key shopping areas.
The location is very convenience for MRT transportation. The room condition is in standard level. Check in and check out process may take too long.
The hotel looks old but the room is quite and clean. Location is strategic and near MRT station.
Conveniences, Easy transportation, near to Local food & shops
I got what I expected plus a little more. The TV options were great; many channels in English and a sports channel.

This was an average hotel in a wonderfully convenient location. The room and bathroom sizes were satisfactory, but the major complaint I have is concerning the "bouncy' pillows, which make for an uncomfortable night's sleep. Otherwise, everything from check-in to check-out was adequate without being quality. This is a budget ;evel / tourist class hotel, but in a great city-centre location. Tv and internet access are average. Thank God for Spinelli's Coffee on the ground floor level...

Stayed in the Village Hotel Bugis (most taxi drivers still only know it by its previous name Landmark Village) for a week over the Christmas holiday. The room was comfortable for two people, and the service in the club lounge is good even if the food isn't all that great. The hotel was busy but the room was very quiet both in terms of indoor and outdoor noise. One minor problem is that the elevators are quite slow and often full when they do arrive. I also wouldn't have minded a few more English language TV channels. The Arab enclave is just across the road with some great food, and if you're willing to walk about two blocks there's piles of shopping and the MRT to anywhere easily. By Singapore standards, this is good value for money.

Royal Plaza on Scotts is usually our first choice if we come to Singapore because of its location, free mini bar, and its excellent buffet restaurant Carousel. This time we were upgraded to the Royal Club level, which rooms are much more comfortable than the standard rooms. Because it's located in the higher levels, rooms get more natural lighting and not as dark. The bathroom is also much nicer with a bathtub and rainfall shower. The free mini bar is also very convenient for those who do not have time to run to the convenience store; there's water, soda (regular & diet), beer, juice, cookies, and Nespresso coffee! The hotel's facade is under renovation, but it didn't bother us.

Everything was fine, except for two aspects, viz a number of baby cockroaches running around the rooms at night and inconsistent wifi. The baby cockroaches are not a major issue, but the inconsistent wifi is irritating and disruptive to work. The room was large, the bed huge, the views excellent, the food in the hotel superb and its location at the top of Orchard Road excellent. The bathroom was a touch small and cramped. The staff were as helpful as they could be and my stay was good
experience the hotel staffs are friendly and approachable. prompt room svc
just great. near public transport (bus, MRT). would be back again.

We had a good time there. It was clean, comfortable, and very relaxing. I think the website is a bit misleading. You only show the club pool online, but then you try to up sell us upon check in. We had access to a gym and pool, but it was not the one featured on the website. Also, there were only two channels that were barely appropriate for children. I would have liked more tv channel options for children, and I did not appreciate that HBO was just another channel, with inappropriate content both day and night. The staff was very helpful to help me mail some letters, and to change our bedding to hypoallergenic upon request.
Excellent hotel, very friendly and professional staff, superb service specially for premier rooms. Convenient location to many malls and restaurants.
Overall good experience, it wound be better if wifi service is available in every room.
Stay was pleasant and hotel location convenient and near to most of the shopping centres and eating places.

I stayed 2 nights at this hotel. It is closed to the Cathay and plaza Singapura. Beside the hotel, there is a nice food court at affordable price. The room is standard, clean, fast Internet, and quiet.
Excellent the staff and location is fantastic. Easy access to the MRT. Fantastic shopping location. Overall excellent place to stay for young and old.
Generally good.
Great. Looking forwards to stay in the hotel again.

A good hotel to choose if you want a base to explore the island that is clean, friendly and efficient with decent links to the airport and in the Bugis area. However, a place for sleeping rather than enjoying the hotel itself, which is pretty plain with small rooms. Friendly and helpful staff however. Fair value

Overall I was very pleased with my stay at the Ibis. Only a three minute walk to the Bugis MRT, bus stops right outside, a Guardian pharmacy and a 7/11 convenience store on either side, close to shops, malls, cafes, restaurants and bars. Very clean, quiet and tidy. Not a luxury hotel and no room service - you can order food from your room, pick it up from the restaurant and take it back to your rooom. The food was nice, fresh and tasty, but more buffet standard fare rather than 5-Star gourmet. The staff are LOVELY....very sweet and helpful and a great sense of humour. The perfect place to stay if you want a comfortable bed and a clean room to return to after you have spent your days (or nights) exploring the deilghts of the city. Many tourist attractions within a 5-20 minute stroll (early in the morning before the sun gets up). I would definitely stay there again. By Singapore standards, reasonably good value for money.

Amara is a modern and centrally located hotel in Singapore, close to CBD and the Tanjung Pagar MRT. It is easy to travel from there by MRT to any where in Singapore as well as by taxi. Next door is a new shopping complex with central air conditioned comfort for shopping in supermarket, food outlets and other small retail shops. Opposite the hotel is the cheap Fair Price supermarket plus other cheap local hawker food stalls.
It was a good stay for a quick trip to S'pore although it is still under renovation. (I thought it was done).

I consider it a nice & relaxing stay. Staff service is good and friendly. In the room they also provide coffee machine, with 3 flavours. You can make your own coffee in the morning. Free wi-fi in the room which is a plus thing for all travellers.

Standard room nothing special. The toilet are smelly and very strange that the hand basin come out only hot water, the cold water side are not working. We asked for fix but nothing improved. The bath towels are broken. No time to complain as I know if we complain it will take a lot of time to wait here and there for investigation and solution. The only good thing are the comfortable bed.
Taking long time to check in, staffs are helpful but not very quick.
All was good except weak unstable wifi service. Staff were friendly despite being a busy hotel. Breakfast can get very crowded with long wait if you get there late.
Good enough for rest after all day shopping , my family likes a noddle in the Taiwan restaurant in far east plaza next to the hotel , we can easily get taxi and bus there

Good value compare to other similar Hotels. Near MRT so it has easy access to get to other part of Singapore. Easy to find Hawker stalls with yummy and relatively cheap. Check in and out was pretty fast. Staff services is OK, but since it's Singapore you can't expect a lot. Everyone just try to be efficient without taking care much on hospitality.

The location of the hotel is perfect. It gives you an easy access to main areas in Singapore. There are many options for food - from a market nearby to some upscale restaurants. The price is a bit high, just like most prices in Singapore, but good location, clean rooms and fast service are worth it.

The hotel is next to the plaza where the Myanmar hangout at night and weekend. Very surprise to bump into so many of them taking beer cans in their hand. Feel insecure esp to the girl if we were to venture out till late night.
1. Ample and free parking. 2. Conveniently located. 3. friendly and attentive staffs.

Pleasant and quite convenient. When you are hungry, fast food (Kopitiam) is just in the ground level behind the hotel. Its about 8-9 stops from the Changi airport if you are travelling by MTR and takes about 20-25 mins during non-peak hours. Also very cheap as it cost slightly more than usd 1 per way.
It was pretty comfortable and basic stay. Convenient location within Orchard area.
It was pretty comfortable and basic stay. Convenient location within Orchard area.

Overall it's a great hotel to stay at. Given Singapore's generally high hotel rates, this one gives a good deal. Centrally located and nicely decored. Only bummer is the parking where complimentary parking could have been given for guest's own vehicles.
Very comfortable hotel, nice room, centrally located. No complaint.

It was pleasant. not excellent but will do for a short stay and close proximity to Bugis MRT which makes it very convenient of traveling. There are nearby cafes and restaurants which is worth a try. Bugis Junction and Bugis+ with the market is nearby too which makes it easy for shopping. Overall good stay because of the location. The room was so-so given it was a superior room. Should have carpeted the place.

Overall my stay was OK. I had to attend a conference at the Shangri La, which was a walking distance from RELC. Expect to wait for taxis specifically during rush hours. Only two elevators at the hotel which sometimes may cause a longer wait. Breakfast wasn't all that great - almost the same menu throughout my 3 day stay there. Staff were friendly and the room was quite spacial with comfortable beds. Very clean!

Except for two things, the stay was pleasant - the sour faced staff member at the hotel reception when checking in (we were attended to by a younger stff member who we presumed was not as senior compared to her colleague - the staff who attended to us had twice sought clarification for some matters from her more senior colleague but the response was terse and unfriendly), and the almost septic tank stench on the left hand side of the room close to the bathroom. We had informed the hotel about the stench, they did not change our room but had a contraption plugged in, presumably to take away the stench. The odour remained but to a lesser extent.

Generally happy except for the 'rude' reception without a smile service. Not very helpful front desk people. Room aircond also too powerful and too cold. Water pressure very low- were told by maintenance personnel that it was hotel policy to conserve water. I am sure increasing the pressure a bit more would make the rain shower experience more pleasurable.

it was ideal for a short stay as it is conveniently located. It has easy access to shopping both at City Mall and Mustafa Centre. The MRT is quite near and taxis easy to get. The staff are friendly but I had to wait a long time for checkout to be completed. I would reccommend this hotel definitely for solo travellers who want to spend sometime shopping. I would stay again at this hotel.
Pleasant and will revisit again as it is convenient to take mrt. there are diners surrounding the hotel and shopping outlets around. It is suitable for all kinds of travellers

hotel was near both the circle line and northeast line, along a major bus route, and a 5-10 min walking distance to many attractions like the national museum, Singapore Art Museum, Peranakan museum, Fort Canning and Little India.

Overall, I was fairly pleased. When I checked in, the water pressure from the sink was low and the Aircon was making lots of noises. After I reported these problems, action was taken and water pressure was corrected. Aircon noises were also improved but there is still a bit of sound as these units seem to be a bit older split-types that probably need to be replaced. Breakfast is absolutely crap and the staff in the breakfast hall are not helpful at all, so I stopped eating breakfast and just filled my mini-bar up with lots of food for the morning so I can eat in the room before heading out.

I have stayed at the hotel prior to this trip and have never been disappointed. Hotel is consistently clean and well-maintained. However there was just one thing that I did not appreciate and perhaps to an extent it was beyond control. There was some rather noisy construction work being done on the roof of next building facing my room. As a result, my sleep was interrupted on Saturday morning. Apart from that, everything was within expectations and I would recommend staying here. However if anyone is looking for a serious shopping trip along the Orchard Road belt, I would recommend staying closer to the Orchard MRT station as this can be a bit of a trek especially for travellers with young children or with many bags.

It was a pleasant enough stay until the last day. Packed my bag but left my toiletries in the room. Went down to the carpark to store my suitcase at around 9 am and decided to go for breakfast outside at the nearest Kopitiam. Came back at around 10 am and found not only did housekeeping cleared all my things but the whole room was being cleaned - bed sheets were off, blankets and pillows cases off, towels on the floor etc. in other words, I was unceremoniously thrown out even before I checked out at the front desk. The hotel did offer to make up the room all over again and apologized but I declined. A pleasant start but a not too nice end to the stay.

I enjoy my stay. The room is clean and cozy, big enough for 1 to 2 people. Considering being in a busy location, the room is very quiet. Fast check-in and check-out with friendly staff. All in all, I think it's good value for the money for a mid range hotel.

I usually stay at the Orchard Parade Hotel because the staff knows me and will upgrade me to a nice room with amenities included. The pool and gym are excellent for my purposes and of couse the location is perfect for shopping and Jason's is just a Couples of blocks away for getting gormet food products and meats. I always know what to expect with the Orchart Parade and it never disappoints.
Great stay, would definitely come back again. Near to popular local delights like soy beancurd and chicken rive

Pleasant, centre of the city, convenient to nearby shopping mall, such as plasma singapura, city hall, bugis and orchard roads. The only negative segment is the bathroom ventilation not working. Clean room and nice large bed. Internet wifi is quite fast. Recommend to anyone who like to use public transport a lot.

Overall the stay was acceptable, convenient location & good sized room for Singapore, small details to be improved: room could have been made more comfortable with the addition of bed-side light switch. Requested a room change after the first night as some other guests made a lot of noise in the evening, talking at high volume outside my room & keeping their door open as they had loud converations. I was promptly offerered a room on the other side of the floor at the end of the corridor, overall this was quieter although still had an incident with guest leaving their door open and making lots of noise late at night. Fortunately this was not repeated the following night.

The hotel is conveniently located in the central district of Singapore. It is clean and a smoke free hotel. The hotel room rates are attractive relative to some other 4 stars hotels in Singapore. Given its design and services, i would pick this hotel over most of the budget hotels in Singapore.
Satisfactory, but have stayed in far better hotels in that price category in Asia
Very well located , within walking distance to Orchard, Marina and Bugis. Room is big but needed some upgradation as most of the furnishing are old. Can even feel the spring on matress.
I have enjoyed it very much. and its been a few times I stayed here
We had a pleasant stay for one night, thank u. We will come back here again.
happy stay in this hotel , comfortable stay, price is reasonable, easy access to anyway i wanna go .

Everything was fine, except the wifi, which was frankly awful. The room was one of the best I have ever had in Singapore, the staff were friendly and helpful, the food in the Coffee Shop was excellent, the bar great fun, the bed comfortable, plenty of tv channels, the bathroom of good size and with good shower, and the whole experience was value-for-money. But, for a business traveller, fast and stable wifi is essential, and this was seriously lacking, especially during peak morning and evening hours. It was bad enough that I had to register a compliant.

Everything was fine except for the billing. I was charged for 1 diet coke which no one in the family took from the mini bar. I couldn't confirm with my husband since he was not near me at that time. He was mad when I told him about the charge. Nobody had anything from the mini bar.
Everything is standardized. Size of room, cleanliness, convenience.
room quite small but have comfortable bed and pillow bring a great dream sleep. Ice machine and water machine right at floor corridor. You can control lighting and tv by nexus tablet..interesting
Great location for shopping at Bulgis, small room but interesting with Nexus tablet to control lighting and TV in room, wonderful bed and pillow...make my sleep was great and super comfortable

big room, great location, friendly staffbig room, great location, friendly staffbig room, great location, friendly staffbig room, great location, friendly staffbig room, great location, friendly staff
Repeat visit. Standard of design and cleanliness still maintained. Wonderful bed and sheets that offers the most comfortable sleep comparable to 5 star hotels
was cool but breakfast menu was poor too much peoples past 8 am.
Weird hotel in a language college. Taxis can be a challenge so get them to book one for you. Very slow elevators
As usual a flawless stay. Taxi queue is well managed and good internet

The hotel location is really convenient, near business areas/parks. Getting around was so convenient, near bus stops, train station, etc. I even had to just walk to a computer retail shop when I needed to buy a keyboard (emergency) as my laptop broke down. Hotel staff is great, especially the restaurant staff. I've stayed in a lot of hotels, big and small, but this is the only hotel where I was greeted by my first name, everyday.
Great stay with good location. will come back again
mostly satisfied. nice view and nice swimming pool. clean and neat room. Cool
Everything was great except for the slow check-in.

I enjoyed my stay. The hotel is centrally located and close to shopping mall, Clarke Quay, food markets, tourist attractions, Marina Bay Sands and business district. The food was very good. The Shanghai One was nice as well. Beautiful girls singing and having a good time. Singapore is the place to be in the future.
cosy and comfortable, clean room, nice hotel and friendly staff
cosy and comfortable, clean room, nice hotel and friendly staff
This was already my second stay at the hotel. I am very satisfied
Nice comfortable enjoyable memorable hospitable and helpful staffs and easy to find a taxi
Large and clean rooms with friendly staff to help you. Bathrooms are spacious and amenities are decent. Good view from the window of the city skyline.
Overall it was a pleasant stay, shopping areas and restaurants are near. Basically everywhere you wanna go, its juz a walking distance away.
cosy and confortable, can smoke in room make my life easier
Cosy and quiet holiday eve stay, was quiet with some fun.

the hotel is located next to bugis junction and bugis+ shopping malls. it is also walking distance to bugis village too.
Sightseeing/Attractions Tip: Do check out Sim Lim Square for electronics products.
It was a cosy stay with clean room and we enjoyed the stay very much as it's quiet at nice with a good and nice swimming pool and gym.

Stay was very good. The hotel is centrally located. It is close to everything. Shopping mall, food market, entertainment, business district. Everything was work. The internet was a bit slow. But it was alright. The food was very good. The small spa shops below the hotel was very good as well. Generally I like Singapore. Its a vibrant country, modern, clean and peaceful.

All 4 of us enjoyed staying in this hotel for its location, friendly environment, clean room. The staff is very helpful in all ways. It is just walking distance to Bugis Junction which we enjoyed shopping. Dining is abundant in or near the hotel.

The stay was overall good, I manage to get the renovated room in the hotel and apparently the wall is too thin, been receiving complaints for making "too much noise" when I was just having a chat with my girlfriend, the staff is attentive and called my room straight away which is good, but maybe a noise reduction tools is more needed for the room.

Fantastic. Friendly staff. We were at the club lounge and enjoyed the high tea and evening cocktails. Great view of the city and wonderful food and drinks available within the club lounge. Breakfast we had a choice to have it at the main cafe or the lounge. Opted for the cafe due to it wide variety of food available. Great stay.
Good. Hotel was clean and all the stuff was polite and very helpful.

I am happy to stay in Concorde Hotel Singapore. The staffs there are friendly. The services are good as they upgrade our's room & allow us to check in early at about 11am. The hotel are close to major shopping mall within walking distance...

Very nicestay at Intercontinental Singapore People extremely nice for checkong in,The room was large and well organised. Vry clean, large bathroom with bath tub and shower cubicle Breakfast is very international and extremely good quality

I like staying in Peninsula excelsior. Location is very good. Lobby ambience is nice. Easy access to local food and convenience stores. Taxis always available. I have stayed there several times even from years back. Rate is reasonable. Good value for money.
Staff are helpful and polite, rooms are not really big but quite spacy, fast internet available.

I loves the room as its very cozy, great location with supermarket around the hotel. However I quite disappointed with their customer service n housekeeping. The first day when we checked-in, the guy that serve us didn't greet us, when he handled us the key, he didn't mentioned anything to us like the check-out timing etc, he was busy talking to his colleague. On the other hand, when we enter the room, we saw an additional bed in our room, we quickly check with the housekeeping just next door to us, as we didn't request another bed. Her attitude is poor, after she kept the extra bed, she asked us to push the sofa back to the original place by ourselves. We also notice stains n hairs on the bathtub. However, we will still chose this hotel for our short getaways
the room very small, comfort bed, good location & near to Bugis street/junction/village.
I enjoyed the stay in quiet, cozy, and comfortable room with scenic lookout through large windows.
Good contribute , great stuff , bath room , large bed and easy going to other place , quick reception react , good elevator
Clean bathroom, room is small but cosy. Using Nexus tab to control the lightings in the room is very convenient, especially when napping/sleeping time.

Would recommend to Couples (not a group). Room is small but everything else was great. Hotel is new & centrally located, staff were friendly & extremely helpful. Will be back soon! Only missing a mini fridge in the room.

The whole theme of Hotel Michael is that it is very arty-farty. The lobby and rooms have that very gallery effect which is great but totally lost on the kids. They just want to have an awesome pool. So we would walk all the way to Hard Rock Hotel to their very awesome beach-pool. That's right, they have real sand in segment of the pool and the kids just love it. So do I as our beaches are not always very clean. So this is getting real sand, just clean sand and clean water. Wonderful combination!! To be fair, the room at Hotel Michael are comfortable and the beds very comfy to sleep in. So no complains there.

It was a very nice stay for a Couples like us. We had the crystal club room & were very well taken care of. There was free flow of drinks the whole day. Free alcoholic drinks & light bites at night too (enough to spoil your dinner haha). Free wi-fi. Free 1hr use of conference room (we didnt need it). Free breakfast buffet, can either dine in the lobby restaurant or at crystal club floor (10th) for more privacy. Room was really clean & comfortable. Hotel was quiet & wide selection at breakfast buffet. TV channel was okay. I dont watch sports so the was only Fox movie & National Geographic for me, but it was enough. Bathroom is not big, but enough space. Staffs were polite & attentive.

The room was clean and comfortable. But service was slow. The area around the hotel is different from the usual shopping areas of Singapore in terms of the buildings and structures. Hence this makes the walk around the hotel a refreshing experience
Beautiful, but too expensive. Massive size. Beautiful pool. Why does it have to be so expensive?
The stay was a pleasant one with no surprises. The rooms are large compared to most newer hotels and at the room rate it is a value for money.

I didn't expect the beds to be that small, rooms were really big but it's probably because it didn't have any furniture inside. A little tough to find and it's a 1 km walk to Orchard road. Taxis are hard to come by, might be easier to walk over to Shangrila next door and line up for a taxi there.
The stay was decent, location was good and amenities is okay
Ibis Bencoolan rooms are small and there is not enough space to place your luggage. When you are heading to your room.

Not particularly impressed with the staff friendliness and service level, but cannot expect too much given the price point. For the location and room comfort level, the price is very reasonable. Extremely nice and cosy bar at level 1, and the overall hotel is well designed and decorated. Recommended for average budget travelers.

This is a solid hotel with well above average accommodations. There were a few things missing (scant towels, no facial tissue paper or room slippers) but the necessities were provided and were good quality. Our 4 night/5 day stay was comfortable and quiet. Easy access to other parts of Sg because there is a bus stop right outside along Bras Basah Rd and an MRT station 2 very short blocks down. The hotel is next to the Singapore Art Museum and in walking distance to several major historical places (St. Andrew's Cathedral, the war memorial, etc) and shopping malls and dining centers (CHIJMES, for example).
all fine except the rude service of the hotel receptionist and certainly non-professional
Surroundings are overcrowded with chaotic foreign workers.
It was decent place to stay - a bit crowded - good place for tourists - spend less time in hotel and more outside...
It was a pleasant stay and we don't mind coming back to this hotel.
It was one of my best hotel stay/experience so far. Location was great, service was excellent and expectations were met.
will definitelycome back here again. the place is clean and the bed is very comfortable.

I celebrated my anniversary there an now i am back to celebrate early xmas. Hotel gave us a free upgrade and we were very pleased with the room. The bed is so comfortable and room is so cozy we couldnt get out of bed for our buffet dinner at Straits Cafe. Food there are very local but was to me, my husband and my sister's liking. The seafood like prawns, snow crabs, salmon, oysters were all very fresh. Really satisfied with the dinner. My sister dropped by to join us for dinner likes the room so much that it was a drag for her to go home becos she had to work in the morning the next day hahaha... Next day we soaked outselves into the jacuzzi at pool area. It was a rainy morning and the jacuzzi is great becos its filled with pretty warm water... Upon check out, staff did a small talk with me asking me how was my early xmas celebration an asked if i would be back for New Year. The staff definitely made me feel very welcomed.
It was very comfortable. The room was very clean and tidy. Staffs were also attentive and helpful. The location of the hotel was superb as it was at the heart of most shopping malls.

I can't emphasized enough of how friendly the staffs were. It's kind of hard to get a taxi from the hotel since it's not located on the main street, but the staffs will get you a taxi, or there's shuttle every 30 minutes to the nearest subway station. The hotel is located next to a small shopping mall with restaurants and a big supermarket on the top floor. The breakfast was acceptable. Not the best I've ever had, but also not the worst.

When we arrived, I was surprised with the busy lobby. There was a long queue at the check in, and things felt chaotic. But then when I walked into the room, all negativity vanished. Rooms were nicely designed, comfortable bed, with a great view, and a high floor. I always used to go after big branded ones spending really big bucks, not knowing how delightful Mandarin Orchard really was. I am glad I made that choice this time. This is probably the best value for money hotel I have been to in Singapore, and in near by Asia Pacific.

I have stayed this hotel a Couples times in past. Since it was a very good service and hospitality previoustly, I wanted to try again just for a night since I had to stayed other hotels due to my business. However Japanese lady duty manager, screwed up my stay from check in till check out time. She is not only friendly but also not helpful at all and forgot what she promised and not applogy... Worst thing about her is create so many excuses which does not make sense.... Japanese woman duty manager, I think you give pretty bad impression about this wonderful hotel and spoil guest stay. It does not make sense why the person like her could be duty manager who does not smile, not deliver promise, no applogy, cannot solve any problem for guest.... As I checked out, she just gave me a bad face to me..... Really terrible experience...
Order through Agoda

Considering the Swissotel brand, I was surprised when I arrived to my floor seeing the walls worn down. My room design was nice, but the bathroom was dirty. Big stains on the shower curtain and the bathtub was grey.. from dirt. I also expected to have at least a low bandwidth wifi for free, but not having that is bearable. dirt is not.
I question value if rating so high. Hotel was a total waste - for same price I could have stayed much better. Felt like a convention hotel for grade school children.

Whilst a convenient location, overall stay was disappointing. The room felt old and in need of an upgrade. Carpets were less than clean and having clumps of hair on top of the towels in the bathroom did not add to the ambience and necessitated the first time ever to call housekeeping just after checking into a room.
The maid can't keep up the standard on room cleanliness.
we are Disappointed At night time so noisy with the voice from the guest next door, we have to wait for a long time to get in to the lift, and also its smell bad
Room - (1608)- A/C has controls in room but they control nothing. Had to keep the balcony doors open to keep from being too cold. Shower head is wrong type for tub/shower.
Disappointing as a room with a queen bed was requested however the hotel changed the room to a room with singles and after arriving from a long flight at 1030 at night was to tired to argue

staff competency and attitude was disappoonting along with th lack of facilities and perks that comes with other luxurious hotels in the city. hotel location is far from the attractions, hence the need to uae the shuttle service while the rest of the hotels have direct access to the rest of the attractions.

I was there several times now, stayed in a room at the club. The club rooms are basically the same rooms as those for none club customers - no difference. Rooms are old, need renovation, in my bathroom a pipe of a hand-wash sink was nearly blocked that the water flew away very slowly. TV - there is a flat-screen TV, but no HD channels. The selection of channels is mediocre. The service in the club is lousy. The service staff is busy talking to each other, and they do not watch the customers. Customers are waiting to receive service.

This was my fifth or sixth time using this hotel since it opened earleir this year. I have given feedback before, including direct to the GM. Nothing lacking has changed. The nice rooms, nice location, and reasonable overall set-up of this hotel are all sadly lost by the fact that none of the front-desk staff would seem to have had any training on how to serve the public and deliver great service. In a city awash with similarly priced 'boutique' hotels, the standards of service and staff attitudes should be seen as a major differentiating factor to get guests returning again, and again, to BIG Hotel. This seems to have been lost on their current team.
would not recommend other travellers problems when arrived - incorrect room, waited for the problem to be sorted out poor communication between staff and guests disappointing facilities

im very dissapointed with the staffs during my checkin.. check-in is at 2pm but they make me wait till almost 6pm, 4hrs just to get my room. The reason they gave is the room is full and the room is ready in terms of cleaning. 4hrs to wait just to clean a room, really ridiculous..the staff is unfriendly and rude.. they should be more customer service oriented as in approach the guest to update us if the room still not ready aftet they promised that the room will be ready within 1hr but after each hour they ignore us with no updates till ive to approach them every single hr for our room availability till at 6pm then i get my room. They are so irresponsible. Im not gonna come back if the service are so poor to their own people as singaporean..
Im very dissapointed, i was given a small room. not as i expected.
Im very dissapointed, i was given a small room. not as i expected.

Bad service on the front desk,Im arrive at the hotel lobby at 3pm to check in,but my room haven't ready and have to wait fopr another 1/5 hours..that make me piss for paying high price room and i still have to wait..sad to get this service as i expect a good service from this hotel so i do spend on the price on the room..
Dirty bathrooms and toilets. Simply unbelievable. Bed very uncomfortable. Bed joined together....cheap mattress and pillows and sheets

Our stay was very disappointing. One of the rooms in our President suite were contaminated with urine on the carpet by the bedside. Upon informing front office,the cleaning was done only at toilet area but not the carpet.Second day,we were locked out of our room due to some technical issue on the card.Our guest and his family had to sleep on the floor at the hall due to the bad odour in their room.

I have booked this hotel because of the **** together with an average price and an overall rating of 7.4 on Agoda. It is a new hotel, nice pictures on agoda, but I didn't like the actual experience. The room was small (that's fine), smelly (no open windows), blankets smelled very bad (chloride), reception is not customer friendly and at checkout the luggage get's stored outside the hotel. I have stayed in Singapore hostels for 25% of the price and a much better experience, but also high end like Marina Bay Sands. Normally i know what to expect.

This is my first stay at Ibis. I was disappointed by the small room and the lack of room service at the hotel. I had expected more and felt that it was not value for money. The hotel only looks impressive from the exterior but seriously lacks comfort, service and facilities.

Frustrating. My initial impressions were very good. But then I had the check in process and frustration grew and grew. The front desk really struggled to understand English. The bell staff were rude and unhelpful. Whilst the bedroom was very big with great aspects on both sides, the bathroom was far too small - there plenty of room to easily expand the bathroom size. The carpet was worn and stained. The bath had blackened mold around the shower area. The tv picture was terrible. Later, other staff admitted it's always like that. No welcome pack describing how everything works, charges for the phone and channels for tv..etc. One other thing, the elevators are a real pain. It's not clear which ones take you only to the lobby and which ones go up further to the rooms. And if you get in because the arrow indicated down, doesn't mean it'll go down just because you hit the down button. Very frustrating. Overall, it's poorly managed and poorly designed. It needs thoughtful investment.

Quite a disappointing stay at Hardrock Hotel. There isn't much wow factor when you step into the lobby of the hotel. We had to queue like 15mins or longer during check-in as there wasn't much staff at the reception.During our stay, we found out that the room we had isn't really up to standard of a good hotel. Firstly,the remote control of TV can only work well from certain angle.The flush button of the toilet bowl got stuck after a few tries. No free-WiFi in the hotel for stayed guest was one of the letdown where as nearby McDonald's can offer it to public at no cost. Last of all,we tried but failed to adjust the room aircon temperature during wee hours as it was like freezing through the nite.Eventually had turn it off to increase the warmth of the room. Aside from all the bad things, the soft comfortable bed and nice pool view are the bonus points.
We chose smoking room, I had stayed before many hotels before but this is the first hotel that have the smoke smell even at he corridor!
Nothing was up to standard. The staff were helpful and efficient but the rest was totally inadequate. we look up their web site and it was misleading.

It was great. The Staff are friendly. The amenities are excellent (they provide l'occitane for royal premier rooms. It was raining during our stay, but the hotel provide brand new umbrella. I asked for baby cot and they delivered it to our room right away. The only minus point is, they renovated the hotel right now, so the entrance is really small and crowded.

It was great. The Staff are friendly. The amenities are excellent (they provide l'occitane for royal premier rooms. It was raining during our stay, but the hotel provide brand new umbrella. I asked for baby cot and they delivered it to our room right away. The only minus point is, they renovated the hotel right now, so the entrance is really small and crowded.
Room space is huge, with twin queen bed is hard to come by. City is walking distance away.
great hotel location where you can walk to get almost everything from food to clothing's and movies. safe walking even at 3am. good and helpful hotel staff.

Bugis station is not far from the hotel and can go to the Airport direct. If travelling south to Sentosa just need interchange in the middle. Hotel surroundings plenty food stalls and Sim Lim in just nearby. Bus stops in front of the hotel and goes to Orchard Shopping area. The room is clean and comfortable although is small. Free wifi in the room is the reason I come back to this hotel for the second time. I like the Orange scant shower gel. Hotel staffs very friendly. Breakfast is good, I like the varieties of the cornflakes.
great and bring memories, easy to access and comfortable places

Our stay at the Rendezvous Grand Hotel Singapore was great! The staff were very friendly and efficient, the location was perfect, very close to Bras Basah MRT Station (and using MRT is always way cheaper than getting on a cab). Restaurants were very close, but the mattress was a bit too hard. The housekeeping team was very helpful.Free internet in the room was useful.

It was just a short one night stay for me. I like the park that was part of the hotel development i believe. It is not crowded with a bar and late night restaurant for steamboat. There is a shopping mall which is part of the hotel development i believe gives you good access to breakfast and food. "All in one place". Kind of like that, convenient. It is located near good local restaurants as well.
easy to access MRT ( local transportation ) - shopping

It was only for a night. I got the room exactly as I want it, although I have to wait a bit longer for that. I don't mind at all. Large window. Big bed. Clean room. The most important: access to MRT just underneath the hotel. Shops and mini resto in the basement were good. I have breakfast there. I had morning run around and it was a good path as well. Staff was helpful and smile - not often I got this in Singapore.
Rabiatul A.
Great & fantastic!! will be back anytime for my busainess trip..

I was staying for 2 nights in v lavender. The room was small also the shower room. We didn't expect too much so that its all that we could get. Many shops nearby and it was very easy to reach MRT. We just want to complaining about the cleanliness that the floor in our room needs to be sweeped. We found paper and hair near beds. Also it doesnt have free wifi. Overall it was a good stay..

Meet a friendly staff able to change our room to a newly renovated room. Have few days pleasant and comfortable stay in this hotel. Very near to mrt station and shopping center. For those shopaholics can considered to stay here. There a 7-11 24 hours convenient store opposite the hotel.
comfortable room, swimming pool, good food, nice lobby, attractive major bldg., and local foodcourt nearby.

It was my second time booking already within two months period. Great value you get for the money you pay. Breakfast included as well with fast internet. If you are ok with the neighborhood not that it is dangerous or anything, it is all good!
Stay here if u want to waste your money, poor service.
Hotel was comfortable, close to good shopping and restaurants, perfect for a stopover en route to elsewhere.

Good design and comfort bed, big portion of the breakfast. cannot boil the water in the room and not any bottle of mineral water supply but have the mineral water machine near the lift. the bad things is the hot water machine cannot function.and the cold water is really cold.

pleasent stay at this hotel, they let us check in early at 12 noon without extra fee which is so convenience for we have young children & todler with us. This hotel almost muslim friendly for they have a kiblat signage in the drawer and water paip for easy abulution but the restaurant/coffee house is no no for muslim ( they serve pork there). Do not book any taxi (they have extra charge), many taxi come to this hotel and you can also go infront of Sultan Mosque (1 minute walk)to take taxi or bus.
nice to public transport and easy to do shopping .Mustafa shooping complex is near to the hotel.

The hotel is centrally located with easy access to MRT and buses. Staff are friendly and helpful. Our room is moderate in size yet clean and comfortable. It is well serviced during our stay. Wifi access is occasionally interrupted and need effort to re-establish. Overall it was a nice stay.
It was just as great as I expected! I truly appreciate all the work the hotel's staff puts in to make my stay enjoyable.

We choose this hotel because the MRT is in the same building. Once we got there the hotel filled with group tour so it's very crowded. The room itself small but comfortable. The aircon is cold at night. The Bathroom is very small. We have a hard time to move around in the room. But I find this not very bothering since we only spend it for sleeping after the long exhausting sightseeing. We don't get wifi, but they provided with charges apply. Bugis is only 1 stop away from here so I like the easy access to MRT. I guess that's the big plus for this hotel. They don't clean your room or change the water bottle for you if you don't ask them too, so don't forget to inform them if you want everything got cleaned. Overall, i probably want to comeback to this hotel, if what I'm looking for is easy access to MRT, but if you want to find comfort, this hotel does not suit you.
perfect central location with city hall mrt. good price and great staff willing to help.
we felt comfortable while at reach of city places we needed. We enjoyed the room design, good mix of modern comfort with a touch of old colonial style.

1. Got an upgrade to a room but didnt get a kingsize bed which wasnt what I wanted. 2. But luckily got a room switch next day without waiting thanks to Ms Mala of Front Office. Great effort and arrangement 3. On the last night, there was a foul stench (like sewage smell) that was coming in from the room. Seemed like from the AC Vent but upon chceking by maintenance, AC was declared working properly.

Our stay at the hotel was good. The room was comfortable, with a safe box, refrigerator and hair blower. Free wifi as we signed up with Agoda otherwise is $10 per day. There is a swimming pool. The place is well located, near to Little India, Sim Lim Square, and within walking distance to the MRT.
A little hassle getting to the city. Some surcharges if you take transport to the Island where hotel is.

I chose this hotel because we were 4 adults and 1 young children need to share 1 room, and this hotel Premiere room is the best for us. But unfortunately the staffs service is not 4/5 stars service (not match with our high expectation). When i was going to checkout i need to send some stuff to my country, and they didnt help much, instead of giving me ticket for EMS and asked me to called them by myself and make arrangement with the post office which i dont know where and i didnt have so much time for that, it was a very unpleasant experience, very much different with the previous hotel i was staying not far from this hotel. But overall it was quite worth it, for the room price and size, just dont hope too much for the service.
Had to ask for the room to be cleaned. Lifts long and slow. Sometimes long taxi queue waiting.
Lovely stay. Attentive staff. Excellent facilities. We all had a lovely time at MBS
It was a sanctuary after a long flight and business days.

I had spend 2d1n in Hard Rock Singapore. It was a good place to spend over my holiday. The pool is big but without facility. Due to having event inside the pool area, the access to the Casino/ The Forum was blocked. It caused me need to make a big round by using under ground access in order to reach THE FORUM. My pool view room also block by trees, only can saw the trees from my room.
enjoy. good location. good size hotel room. will come back to this hotel
Good hotel with great location. DFS Galleria is next door. To ION or Wisma Atria only takes 5 minutes walk. It's a heaven for shoppers.
It was very enjoyable although very disappointing that they don't have free wifi…

Very good except we had a fire alarm go off one morning early. There was no direction from staff and when we walked down to the foyer via the fire escape, the glass doors into the foyer were locked with a combinatiin lock. The person in charge of the cafe did not know the combo of the lock. This is very bad practice and could have been distasterous had there been a fire.Also there was no announcement made when the all clear was given.There was some confusion among the guests. No real organisation for a problem.

Check in and out was swift. Hotel offered to upgrade my room for free. Upgraded room came with king size bed and good city view of the Singapore flyer, esplanade and gardens by the bay. Hotel is next to Raffles City Shopping mall. Location of the hotel is convenient and easily accessible.

I am pleasantly surprised at the great service standard displayed by the staff. They were very attentive, helpful and friendly. It is pretty rare to experience such good service standards these days in Singapore. Will definitely go back to Oasia again just because of that. Enjoyed the club privileges. Also really loved the huge glass window with a good view.
Wonderful. Alot of privacy for guest and close to major attractions and shopping area.

Booked this hotel with the intention of celebrating my friend birthday , indicated on my remark while doing the booking via agoda. But didn't really get any responds for them thinking that they didnt take note. So just went in with a simple idea of celebrating my friend birthday. Upon checking in, i heard a door bell rang and i was really surprise that the Front office team came up with a cake . My friend was delight and taken aback by the surprise and really make this celebration memorable. i was too surprise that i didnt remember the name of the 2 front office staff. Knowing one is a Caucasian lady, the other is a local lady. i deeply want to thank them for making my friend birthday a memorable one. Other amenities - you pay for what you get, just that the pillow is kinda soft, i think not much of an issue and could inform the hotel about your requirement. overall a good hotel. Thanks Parkroyal
I have been staying in this hotel only mostly when ever I visit Singapore for the last 15 years.
Great and enjoyable experience. Will return there again.
Had fun and very relaxing atmosphere away from the city life & work stress. Shopping is heaven and good food as well. Meeting a lot of people from all walks of life while staying in this hotel.
Central location was excellent, yet still very quiet. Cleanliness exceptional. Staff were always most helpful and friendly even when the hotel was at its peak capacity. Highly recommended!
Good. Main reason was for the Sands casino. The price of the Sands hotel was too high this is quite near the casino and reasonable too.

Staff were polite and prompt with requests. Spacious and welcoming lobby. Enjoyable buffet dinner with lovely durian deserts. Comfortable bed, tidy room and adequate amenities. Nice area to stay due to proximity to Singapore Art Museum, City Hall, Bugis et cetera. Convenient to have 24hr kopitiam, 7 eleven and coffee bean across the road.
Smooth without the slightest of glitches the serenity of the environment not forgetting the large bedroom

We checked into the deluxe room for a staycation over the weekend, loved the spacious room and nice lemongrass scent within the hotel, but was a bit disappointed with the quality of the toiletries provided. The swimming pool was huge, our son had great fun wading from one end to another. Think the hotel management should do something about the speed of checking-in the guests. MOre staff should have been deployed to help with the check-in so that there won't be a long queue waiting at the lobby.

We enjoy staying in the hotel, a bit disappointed when we are waiting for the shuttle bus to go to Universal studio.After half an hour waiting, the chief concierge told us that the bus is full.Not a big deal we can find the taxi but why not to tell us earlier
i loves the pool and many food outlets around the hotel.
I was impressed with the refurbished done by the hotel, and found the room and services quality was excellent.

The hotel staff upgraded our room to M Club floor for free which is a bigger room. The room is very clean, and the bathroom is big too. The surrounding is quiet on Christmas eve and it is an enjoyable stay!
Comfortable rooms. Near shopping malls and restaurants.

This is not my first time stay here and I am actually glad to be back. The service was impeccable as usual. Was hoping that they will upgrade me to club deluxe room but didn't manage to. In any case, the location of the hotel is fantastic too due to the proximity to a great range of shops, malls and the MRT.

The hotel rooms are very well designed. Very comfortable stay at the hotel. It was easily accessible from the airport and we did not have any trouble getting to the city area as well as there are many public transportation that bring us to Orchard Road and Shenton Way. We are glad that we chose the hotel as the rooms were very clean and well-maintained. The staff are also friendly.
my stay was awesome, its convenient to go anywhere from the hotel by public transport or taxi.
We experienced some clitches when check in, but problem was soon rectified by attentive and helpful staff. Enjoyed the stay...
Excellent. Love the deluxe room design and spacious room. Love coming back to stay
Check in and checked out were fast and staff were very helpful and friendly. The room was big. About 10 minutes walk to Orchard Road. Wished the pillows were better. All too flat.

Check in was quick. Asked for non smoking room on high floor with king bed - not available first night. Room available 2nd night unfortunately as I was out of hotel all day, returning 7.45pm - the preferred room was let go at 6pm. So tried again following morning - all good. Stayed 4 nights, changed rooms to preferred room after 2 nights. Stayed 6th floor first 2 nights and 15th floor last 2 nights. Laundrette on 6th floor was a godsend. Rooms were quite spacious. Bathroom was small but modern and still functional. Pool was nice and clean. Hotel directly across from City Square Mall which gives you direct access to Farrer Park MRT station.
The hotel location is superb. Very close to Plaza Singapura and The Cathay. Bugis is just a short walk from hotel. The bed is a bit too high and not suitable for children and family staying.
We have enjoyed our stay at M hotel, spending much time in the pool and the jacuzzi.The room was spacious but the bed sinks in the middle and there was stains on the floor.

The overall experience was good though some areas could be improved. On the online booking, we have requested for a non-smoking, sea view room with King size bed & a baby cot for my 6 months old infant. But during my check in, we were told that they have ran out of baby cots & only left with twin beds for non-smoking rooms. The next option offered is to take a smoking room which has a King size bed. As I need a King size bed so that the baby could sleep between us (since we couldn't get a cot), we took the risk & opted for the smoking room. The desk officer told us we can call room service & get a air purifier. Luckily, the room don't stink with cigarettes. The check in was slow & took us 15 mins though we were second in line. There isn't any clear instruction on where to queue & we can see that some guests were actually confused when the check in crowd came at 3.15pm. The room was surprisingly spacious & big. We have stayed in another RWS hotel. The deluxe room at Equarius is almost three times the size of that. The room was comfortable & looks clean. But I had a shock to see a baby lizard in the bathroom. The bed was very comfortable but the pillows are rather high & firm. We took quite a while to get used & fall asleep. The pools are quiet & I think more suitable for Couples on honeymoon than for families with young children. Thus, we took the hotel shutter bus to Hard Rock hotel instead for their pool. Though it was weekend, we didn't have problem getting onto the buses with our baby & her stroller. The shutter bus goes to other parts of RWS too where we settled our meals & visited the SEA Aquarium. Equarius would be a good choice if you are looking for spacious & comfortable rooms. There's even a couch in the room.
i will definately going back for future staycations
Enjoy staying, good service, beautiful staff, uncomfortable for under construction
Enjoy staying, good service, beautiful staff, uncomfortable for under construction
Overall is good but i hope they can improve the taste of their breakfast, & staffs too forgetful as they actually miss out my honey for my pancakes.

I had an superbly good tym. I have preference to checked into this hotel bec of its large rooms, fast checkin n outs. A balcony where I can smoke. A private tea breaks, cocktails n breakfast. Room service is fast n efficient
Overall, we had a great time in RWS! The deluxe suite room is very cozy and relaxing. It was posh and classy.

Considering they're a multitude of hotel options in Singapore - I was very happy with the P.E.Hotel. We managed to score a heavily discounted deal which included Breaky & Wifi :) Our 5 night stay was both enjoyable & memorable.
The staff was good but the superior room seem to be a small and cramped for two pax. The breakfast is not buffet style but serve one pax at a time.The internet is quite good.
Good hotel and friendly staff...its the center for business section and nightlife stuff...

Oasia Hotel Singapore by Far East Hospitality is a great choice i've made for my first hotel experience . love that we can sit beside the big windows and enjoy the view and also the comfortable bed and blankets in the club room .the hotel environment is quiet and nice too.the improvements that can be made is that the tv hangs quite often and the breakfast could have more choices . but nevertheless i enjoyed my stay and will be recommending this hotel to my friends .
Our stay at the Orchard hotel was very enjoyable.

Great view from balcony to nature, quiet surroundings to afford calm & soothing environment. Close to spas and well connected with shuttle service from hotel lobby to other parts of Sentosa Resort World.
Staff were very friendly, very good location that is in the heart of the city and near MRT
My stay was great a cute hotel. The rooms were so well designed small but with everything.

it was all great, except the integrity and professionalism of the management staff. i'd like to recommend this hotel to anyone, but to those who brings their relatives on wheelchair. my father-in-law (on wheelchair) fell off from the cab in front of the hotel's lobby on his first day of checking-in, and he broke his left upper arm. the bellboy accidentally did a failure while assisting him alighting from the cab. my wife then reported to manager in charge on the same day and the manager said she needed to investigate over the surveillance camera. till the end of their stay, the manager never came up to meet my wife, so my wife went to meet her and so disappointing that the manager totally refused to be responsible on the accident (hospital bill, etc.), moreover, so sad to hear the spoken language of the manager didn't express either goodwill or sympathy. *the surveillance recordings were not shown to my wife till the day they departed from the hotel. **this article is not made to offense anyone, just trying to make an actual and factual review of their stay .
it was extremely nice n comfortable,clean n specious room,quick room service,i really like n recommend to business men specially

It was fantastic. The staff went out of their way to help me out. The front desk agent was very personal and attentive to help me. The doorman was even better, he helped to foot my cab bill first when I was short of cash. He is superb.

My family and I had a great time in this hotel (we are a family of 4 with kids aged 2 and 7). The room was comfortable for us despite sharing beds. Location was fantastic esp when you travel with kids. There is also a big toys r us just beside the hotel. Only issue is when I requested for an extra towel early in the morning, it never came. Never had a chance to follow it up though since we were in a hurry for a tour. Also the girl in the reception, Liane, seemed unfriendly and sarcastic when we asked her about events/happenings in the area that are for kids. Or maybe she is just tired, I'm not sure. But the others like Jolly and the bellman (I didn't get his name, old cheerful guy) were superb. Overall, issues were minimal and can be tolerated. Will definitely come back and recommend to others.
Very Great and make us enjoy, but surrounding us there is recontruction building
The pool access room is very nice, excellence room service n best spa tat I ever been
Exceptionally great. We were given late check out. Breakfast was amazing.
everything was good, except for breakfast. everyday the same and food not much variety

I booked the 1 bedroom villa, was huge and had a mini private pool. Excellent service staff !! treated me well. Was offered a free spa or dinner for 2 due to the room not ready for us upon check in. Worth every penny
we hv an offer to free upgrade to suite with swimming pools in Hotel Equarius , is super big and luxury room ....
Good Enjoyed a lot. Hotel staff was too good . Centrally located. good atmosphere . a perfect location for stay if any one keen on shopping , indian food .

It was a nice experience. This second time staying at this hotel was even better. Friendly staff. We arrived early and was offered early check-in service, but we hope that in the future, for hotel's regular and frequent guests we will appreciate that hotel applies special early check-in price.
The stay was great and the staff are great and did a lot of shopping
No Complaints, was bit more expensive as compared to location and rooms, Nice swimming pool.
Very good and recommended hotel to those looking at staying marina bay area
It was a pleasant stay and relaxing. Shopping belt was just a stone's throw away from the hotel too!
Excellent and very comfortable. Rooms are great and closeby all attractions. Go for the attractions package, worth the value!
satisfied, all the staff are friendly and polite. During I stayed, Singapore are full of smoke but it's ok for me.
Pleasent stay and recomended for any boddy visiting singapore,
I like the friendly staff, the location of the hotel, just walk its the MRT station, and shopping arcade. Easy for food and entertainment. I loved it.
I suggest the club lounge not allowed to use children.
excellent.i will come back again.the tolet was clean, nice ambience

I love it. The rooms are clean big comfortable and nice scenery. The hotels near to newton circus good for food at night and it's at the fringe of town area. Super near to 711 as well. Lots of shoing. Would recommend people to go for staycation
Pleasant and comfortable. The staff were helpful . Near shopping areas and Indian food restaurants. Easy excess to transportation.
Save, Clean and Comfortable Will be back next time.
Nice for a short holiday. I have stayed at MBS and intercontinental. But this is like home.
Highly recommended. Good location and friendly staff.
me & my family realy enjoy stay at this hotel. the hotel close to all shopping complex, the staff's are friendly&helpful , in future i will stay here again.
me & my family realy enjoy stay at this hotel. the hotel close to all shopping complex, the staff's are friendly&helpful , in future i will stay here again.
Excellent. Enjoyed the location and closeness to MRT and Bus Stops.

My stay at the hotel was great, check-in was fast and smooth and everyone was really quick in catering to our requests. The location is perfect for shopping and is just a few minutes walk to the train station.

we had a very pleasant stay with our one year old baby. The room and bed were large and comfortable. Nice swimming pool for the baby, great restaurants, very helpfull staff and just e few minutes walk from Orchard road.
Unforgettable...
I was very satisfied, and i will stay at Goodwood Park Hotel again everytime I visit Singapore

The location is good because it has some bus stops just right in front of the hotel and the bras basah MRT station is just at the corner, also beside the hotel there's a kopitiam that opens for 24 hours
hotel staff was very friendly and kind, rooms are very comfortable and clean, easy to go everywhere,easy transport
Very good,this hotel is really a good value for money, nothing to complain.
good stay EXPENSIVE FOOD-$23 FOR TWO CUPS OF COFFEE-nicely located

The hotel is spacious and clean like the whole country. The bathroom was beautiful and the room was large and had a great bed. The location was fantastic, you walked out the door and Universal Studio was right there, the casino is right there and the Mono Rail was right there.

We were offered a free upgrade to a suite, so the room is very large, comfortable and very nicely designed. The hotel is very close to the beach and all the entertainment activities on Sentosa and also just a few minutes express rail ride (free for hotel guests) to Vive city for shopping. We'll definitely recommend the hotel and will stay here again for next visit to Singapore.

This is my second time staying at Capella. The first time was when I proposed to my fiancee at the villa. The staff were so attentive that we fulfilled every single request i instructed and made it a very enjoyable stay for us.

I would say excellent to this historical hotel. It is just a 5-mins walk to the shopping malls and MRT at Orchard Road which is very convenience to every tourists. The room is very clean and tidy which i can give a A grade to it. Highly recommended for living with Goodwood Park.

Excellent stay at the hotel. Great staff and rooms are always clean. It's also a walking distance to malls and the MRT. The area is also close to the Arab area and Little India, perfect for those who want to see the different cultures in Singapore.
great hotel location where you can walk to get almost everything from food to clothing's and movies. safe walking even at 3am. good and helpful hotel staff.
First Class accommodation in a great location, and at a reasonable price

I stayed here for 2 nights before xmas 2013. The hotel has an old world charm about it. The room I had had was of a good size (for Singapore) and very comforamable and clean. It is only a 5 minute walk to the shopping hub of Orchard Road. The afternoon high tea should not be missed.

Overall had a good stay. We were 3 adults in the group and the staff was very nice & friendly. The Superior Twin room was really huge and worth the money. Wifi was fast. Taxi to Orchard road is just 5 mins away, however during non-peak hours a bit difficult to get a taxi. Room interiors were good and as per international standards. 2 Queen Size beds in one room is good enough to accomodate 4 adults.
