There is not much of breakfast option available, thereby it is avoidable. If you are in a Group and wanting to stay near Orchard road at a reasonable price, this is a good hotel to stay !

The hotel is great as it has a good quiet area, very relaxing and enjoyable. All rooms come with a balcony which is safe for children, nice Sentosa island view where you can enjoy it. The room ceiling is high and clean, while toilet is very spacious and all facility is in the room for your needs.

The hotel's hallway is very small, and there are only a few (6?) rooms per floor, but the family room we stayed in is quite large with large windows, comfortable beds, large bathroom, spacious walk in closet. Our only suggestion for improvement: the internet connection in the room is not very reliable. The wi-fi connection went on and off, and was rather slow. Overall, we enjoyed our stay here and definitely will come back to stay here if we travel as a family. Great staff, great value for money, great room, great location.
Rest-full and entertaining.Help-full staff always with a smile, and nothing too much trouble.
The city view from the hotel room is superb but need to pay additional $$ for the view. Nevertheless, it is worthwhile and the sky garden view is excellent
Excellent. Enjoyed my stay and the convenience. Excellent business hotel to get away for own time

Planned for some days to relax and re-charge. The hotel was the perfect place for that. You have all amneties you need and the hotel as well as Sentosa provide a holiday environment close to the city of Singapore. Stay was so nice that we fonally extended for one more week
I stayed at this hotel before. They did a great job of renovating the hotel. Excellent value for money.
I love the Hotel So much. Opp has a 24 hours NTUC open daily 24 hours. So convenient.
very nice, since it's our first time on Royal, they upgrade our room so we can go to exclusive club which is very good, thank you Royal Hotel.
very nice, since it's our first time on Royal, they upgrade our room so we can go to exclusive club which is very good, thank you Royal Hotel.
It was a lovely stay. The club room was lovely for lounging in with the club pool which was lovely. Breakfast was superb and the staff were so helpful and attentive. Will definitely stay there again.
Rooms are much larger than normal and really well appointed. Hotel is a two minute walk from Orchard Rd and very convenience. Cantonese restaurant in the hotel was fantastic
I had a great time stayed at rendezvous hotel. Nice room and good facility make me feel home. The location is the best you can walk to orchard or cityhall.
good and excellent. i really enjoyed while I am staying in goodwood park hotel.
Pleasant and I keep on coming back. I would recommend this hotel
Enjoyed our stay and will stay there again in the future
It was fantastic, close to the action. Can simply walk to the major shopping malls, restaurants at clubs/bars. Bustop is just outside the premises. Various nice eateries around.
easy to go everywhere from hotel whatever you use; MRT , Bus , taxi or walk. Located beside Orchard road the main shopping street.
Excellent. I like the size of room and the bed is so comfortable. Also, the bathroom is big. Love it !!
I like the big comfortable room including bathroom. Comfortable high bed and spacious room. Excellent.

The hotel room is comfortable but the renovation looks dated. The location is superb. Located above public transport interchange station - City Hall MRT Station. The hotel is served its own shopping mall. It is located in Marina Bay shopping belt - Marina Square, Suntec, Funan Shopping Centre, etc. However, the hotel service is passable for a luxury hotel.
Great stay, only issue there was construction next door, so was noisy
Very good. No issues. Staff are friendly. Didn't eat within hotel as good eating options close by. Beds are too soft for me. Clean rooms. Some have been renovated. Good value for money.
It's central location is superb, with a pleasantly surprise good buffet breakfast spread. Room is a little worn off though, but still comfortable enough to have a A good night sleep.
it was a comfortable and peaceful stay. Will definately come again. Rooms are excellent.
Location excellent near Sultan mosque, Bugis junction and MRT station.. Hallal resto available near by. Hotel' Staff are friendly but toiletries are not changed for several days.
excellent location, Classy rooms, centrally located
Hotel Staff has no complaints but a bit expensive, staff is some time not friendly. but a good place to stay. Clean rooms and a good swimming pool to relax
excellent location, shopping and food nearby . though during check out takes a bit of time
very good with easy access to pool, resturants. Also the grreting satff were very helpful in getting our luggages and helping on taking the baby stroller above the ground level.

We (a family of 4 adults and one toddler) had a fantastic 4 nights' stay at the Goodwood Park. The serene surroundings with lush greenery makes one forget that one is in the centre of a metropolitan city. From the time we entered the hotel, we experienced wonderful service. We asked for 2 rooms with an interconnecting door and having nothing of that sort available, the hotel staff then upgraded us to a 2 bedroom suite, complete with its own living room, kitchenette and dining room. The kitchenette came with all the basic utensils, crockery, cookware etc. The hotel staff were also attentive enough to realize that one of the members of our group had a birthday during one of the days we were resident in the hotel and sent a birthday cake up to the suite. A most unexpected and extremely pleasant surprise. On one of the days as we were stepping out of the hotel, the skies began to darken and instantly the hotel staff offered us umbrellas in the event we required such. All in all the staff's attention to detail and mundane everyday matters was superb and made our stay one of the very best that we have ever had in Singapore (we visit at least once a year but have never stayed at the Goodwood Park). We will certainly be back!!!

We have been upgraded from deluxe to club room with view facing the flyer (though part of it is blocked by an office building). We were worried of we have made a right choice when we reached the hotel. Upon checking in to the room, we are relieved and very happy that we chose Village Hotel Bugis.
Excellent and comfortable stay. Very near to little india.
stay was pleasant. Short business trip, happy the front desk had kept my profile and they ushered me with a welcome back.
Excellent Hotel. Other than waiting for the bugy to take me anywhere as the place is too big, it is a great weekend getaway for my family.
Excellent and able to walk to most attractions in Singapore. Public transport also close by and access to the river as well.
Received free upgrade to Club Room at top floor. Everything is fantastic there after. Thanks!
It has been a great experience to stay in this hotel. Spacious room with a great sofa and bathroom has an attached tv.

Three of us stayed booked a deluxe room with an extra bed for a one-night staycation. We were both awed and annoyed by the hotel. The guestroom was awesome - it was big, well appointed and had a huge bathroom. The balcony faced a hillside, which was beautiful with birds chirping in the morning. The bed was small, but very comfortable. The seatee was huge and comfortable, too. There was TV in the bathroom for those who wanted a bubble bath. The only downside is the coffee/tea making facility. For that kind of price, we would expect a coffee machine, and not just a kettle with 3-in-1 sachets. The service was awful. We arrived at the lobby to find the Front Desk unmanned. We asked a staff who went to the Front Desk to get something, only to be told that she was not from Front Desk. She just walked off without helping us get the FOA. It was a good 5 minutes before an FOA went to the desk (again, to get something!) and we asked for help. She called her colleague from inside the office to assist us, and we had to roll our eyes again. This FOA wore costume bracelets that extended from her elbow to her wrists. She was probably the most poorly groomed hotel FOA we have ever seen (and we have stayed in many, many hotels before, from boutique to invitation-only hotels). This FOA proceeded to check us in and ranted standard answers to us in a very un-enthusiastic manner. Overall a great hotel, the best in RWS so far, if you can overlook the ridiculous service.
Very pleasant hotel to stay, clean room, good design and comfortable very recommended
excellent stay with caring staff, clean room. and high speed internet and on the clock service
I like the hotel but the check In seemed abit slow but staff attentive and good service
Stayed for 6 days. Staff are very helpful and friendly. Rooms are big and nicely decorated

Fantastic Large Rooms With Private Patio in Central Orchard Shopping District....What more could you ask for? Room was newly renovated and the level of appointments was very welcoming. Staff were very helpful. Enjoyed a few snacks during the Durian Festival at the hotel and enjoyed them immensely. Pool and Garden setting are welcoming in such a Cosmopolitan Setting.
great time with friends iiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii
i like the staff, very attentive, willing to help. the room is big with full amenities. near to shopping area and easy to find local food.

it suits my business meeting as the client's office in located in beach rood; i intend to stay again for future business meeting as apart good service; i am keen to enjoy the local restaurants in the area. i am also avid visitor to Bras Basah Complex.
Fast check in and check out, good hospitality, friendly staff, easy access to SMRT, close to shopping mall
Overall and recommended for travelers with families or business. Attentive service and prompt service.
Good quality hotel at a very affordable price. Excellent location with easy access to the city

We have booked several hotels directly and through Agoda, but this one, Rendezvous, is the best among the hotels we booked. The location of Rendezvous is easy to find from Dhoby Ghaut Station, which is just a 5-minute walk. We arrived the hotel at 10am and when we checked in, the receptionist offered a promo of room upgrade, late check out, free breakfast for two, and free unlimited use of its club lounge with snacks, drinks and cocktails. At an affordable price, we took the promo offer. He gave us the key card after we checked in even if their check in time is at 2pm. The room is not small but big enough for a Couples. It is complete with safety box, a fridge with snacks, nice beddings with pillows. The bathroom is organized, complete with toiletries (FCUK), and what I liked most is its heated toilet bowl with wash controls. We were given the privelege to use the Club Lounge at the 11th floor. The lounge has stocks of refillable snacks and fruits, canned sodas and brewed coffee. Wifi in the room and around the hotel is free and unlimited. Service staff are excellent. Very accommodating and always approachable. Right outside the hotel is a bus station. It is convenient to go to anywhere even to and from the airport. The MRT is convenient as well, it was never a problem to go to tourist spots in Singapore. We would definitely go back to Singapore maybe next year. And we will definitely check in again in Rendezvous. Two thumbs up to Rendezvous Grand Singapore.
excellent, the staff was very helpful. they go out of their way to help to make your stay a pleasant one.

Good, we enjoyed our stay & the Staff was Excellent. We got there early & had to get an extra day & I feel they jacked up he price on us because it was after midnight so $300. is what we were charged. The rest of the stay was $170. per day.

Our second visit to the Orchard Parade Hotel, and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We would recommend taking the Club Suites, great value for just a little extra price. The Club lounge is such a great bonus for those who just want to chill. Club staff are excellent, they looked after us VERY well.

Our room had a nice decor, formerly one of Singapore shophouses- - so the experience was quite exotic. We loved the location - easy access to vibrant Bugis area, also a nice stroll to Marina Bay area. A decent shopping mall was just across the street. Overall, a wonderful stay!

We booked 2 rooms for our stay during CNY. The rooms are great and have excellent sea view. Except the swimming pool is a disapppointment-the sun chair cushion is dirty as well as the pool which does not attract us to swim.

I come to Singapore roughly once/twice a year for business and i have to say this place hasn't let me down once. excellent location, helpful staff (the concierge even recognized me and welcomed me back)nice pool area and decent buffet breakfast... my only criticism is the rooms are a little dated but honestly how much time do you actually spend in your room anyway? i will continue to use this hotel moving forwards, bravo Carlton Hotel!

Excellent place.fast check in & check out.Hotel concierge was v good.Took a wheelchair to help my grandmother who is unable to walk a distance to the room.The receptionist was very attentive.She arranged a birthday cake for my son knowing that it was his birthday that day. Very good service.

Excellent place.fast check in & check out.Hotel concierge was v good.Took a wheelchair to help my grandmother who is unable to walk a distance to the room.The receptionist was very attentive.She arranged a birthday cake for my son knowing that it was his birthday that day. Very good service.
Very very comfortable stay with excellent food& services

the stay was wonderful. its near to universal studio and the casinos which means its suitable for adult and children stay. one thing bad is the toilet. the door couldnt be locked. if you are staying with kids and the kid is naughty, they can keep open your door while you are having your bath.

The room was very comfortable, clean and modern. Staff was fantastic and attentive. Very good toiletries provided by the hotel, inclusive of toothbrush and toothpaste. Bottled water is now provided. Location is just fantastic, just a Couples of minutes walk from Cathay cinema and Plaza Singapore. A 24 hours Kopi Tiam (food centre) is located nearby at well. Bedding is excellent. Loved the stay there.

It was a great stay in this hotel. The location is excellen and close to major attractions like Marina bay, Clarke Quay. It is also easily assessed to MRT stations - City Hall. The staff are quite friendly and we got a free upgrade to Premier Room with city view. I would recommend this hotel to those traveller who likes shopping and sightseeing in Singapore.
I had a wonderful time. The room was fantastic and the staff were really helpful and friendly. The location was very convenient for a solo traveler like me.

Excellent stay this time, the room is much bigger than the first time we stayed here, with large room, bathroom and a walk-in wardrobe. Either we were upgraded or it indeed was the correct sized room that we booked, anyway the receptionist did not say anything about us being upgraded. A little tip, the big bottled water provided is not complimentary, it is better to go around toward cuscaden rd (hard rock cafe) and go to cold storage to get your supplies of water and snacks.
great and looking forward to visit again.great food dining spa's and shopping
The room is very nice, clean and tidy. Room service was quick. All the staffs there are really nice, friendly and helpful. Will recommend the hotel to everyone and hope to stay there again.
it was great though the hotel receptionists can use a little more smile while serving. The room is clean and quite spacious.
it was great though the hotel receptionists can use a little more smile while serving. The room is clean and quite spacious.
Hotel was good and pleasant. Location near city so shopping is convenient.
The hotel was clean, comfort and near to MRTs. The staffs were helpful
Great. Will try and stay again next time. Nothing to complain. Better Internet outside of room will be better. Logging in is a major draw back.

From a smooth and efficient check in (after midnight) to the late check out - I could not fault the staff at the Concorde. Premier Lounge service was excellent. Location fabulous for shopping or sightseeing. Third visit in two years, can't wait to go back!
The hotel is located centrally and has good sized comfortable rooms that have been recently renovated. The price is very reasonable.

This was the second time I put up in Big Hotel. This time around their Nook Cafe had opened and their Grape & Vine bar/restaurant was in service. The selection of wines are good for a budget hotel and is very affordable SGD 30-40/bottle. The rooms are well designed and as usual normal (read small) sized for Singapore. The showers are rain showers with good pressure and very clean. The best feature of the room is the comfy bed and free wifi.

My first time to stay at Marina Bay. and it was excellent! The room was big and cozy! and we had a nice view of the Gardens by the Bay! The front desk clerk was very kind to us, we have a baby and she allowed us for early checkin. :)the pool was gorgeous! i have nothing to say!!! it was perfect! me and my family had a great time swimming!! :)
it was superb! the staff were very attentive to our needs!
The room was clean and they have very friendly staff!
Centrally located in shopping area, easy access to variety of restaurant transport facility, sight seeing tour package facility, all over value for money good hotel.
excellent and awsome location , fast check in and check out

I had used this hotel many times in the past, and we chose it for a quick weekend visa run. As always it fitted our requirements to put up 3 adults and one child very well. One surprise was that in a hotel where it was impossible to escape the decorations and incessant Christmas carols over the p.a., and where they would have happily served me a bottle of vodka for breakfast if I had so desired, the food choice was limited to halal items. This will certainly be a consideration next trip, however if the room rates are still as competitive, I may well return.

I had used this hotel many times in the past, and we chose it for a quick weekend visa run. As always it fitted our requirements to put up 3 adults and one child very well. One surprise was that in a hotel where it was impossible to escape the decorations and incessant Christmas carols over the p.a., and where they would have happily served me a bottle of vodka for breakfast if I had so desired, the food choice was limited to halal items. This will certainly be a consideration next trip, however if the room rates are still as competitive, I may well return.
It was a wonderful experience with comfortable beddings and friendly and attentive staff. Closely located only a walk away to all the shopping and dinning areas.
Excellent, very comfortable, friendly and receptive staff, its a one stop hotel with everything a traveller needs
Very comfortable stay and only a short walk to shopping centres, to the MRT, and to Boat Quay for a wide choice of restaurants
Laundry costs way too much. Apart from that a great heritage hotel in an excellent location for downtown Singapore
Excellent experience. I can say its the best hotel of Singapore

Stay was excellent.all major shopping malls and famous restaurants are just within walking distance. I did a lot of shopping and hands are full, i can just walk back to the hotel drop my shopping bag and go again!!!i will stay there again.
we enjoyed it very much .It is well located in the city and has a fair bit of perks being close to the shopping area.

Our stay in this hotel was amazing. Staff were friendly, fast check-in and check-out. It's a benefit to Muslim community as the restaurant is certified halal. Variety of food to choose from and it was so amazing dinning. Value for money. The hotel is located in a walking distance to the shopping area.

Our stay in this hotel was amazing. Staff were friendly, fast check-in and check-out. It's a benefit to Muslim community as the restaurant is certified halal. Variety of food to choose from and it was so amazing dinning. Value for money. The hotel is located in a walking distance to the shopping area.
I enjoy the stay, the staff are friendly and very efficient. the bed too are comfortable, good tv and sound system.
It was great as the location is near to the shopping place. The staff upgraded my rooms and bar is complimentary
execellent and affordable room stay.the place is strategic . right in middle of the town. price is reasonable and easy access of mrt. the room is clean and nice. the food is great

Conveniently located in the center of the city just 5 minutes from Bugis MRT Station and Shopping complex. Lot of Dining places around the hotel as well as affordable. Pubs in the surroundings. Only a throwaway distance from Little India, CityHall and other shopping areas. Even 2 of the largest IT malls located nearby.

I love this place ,whether it be for businesss of pleasure ...or both i think it is the pick of the hotels to stay at ...with an affordable price for rooms and various types of rooms to suit any indivudual needs...its close to most of the major shops for the shopa holic and provides great eateries and nightlife all within walking distance...clarque key is only a short 10 minute taxi ride if that is more your style...Orchard parade...is great..
Travel with 2 young children, booked for deluxe room but we got upgraded. The room is huge. Thanks for the "gift". Highly recomend hotel in sentosa.
I had two comfortable nights at there. The service was good. Nice swimming pool.
It was only one night but very relaxing. The roof top pool and the view are like magnets- can't get away from it.
It was so so, never meet my expectation. The other hotels at RWS are far better than this.
The single bed was really small and uncomfortable. Expensive for the room accommodation.
Rather expensive, but enjoyed the nearby attractions.
For what i've paid per-night. I expected to have free wifi but Silly me

There is no DVD player in the room because they have inhouse movies but the inhouse movies will cost you approx SGD$20 per movie. The cable channels are limited and movies you watched before sleeping will be showing again the next morning. Room service breakfast pricing is atrocious! It cost us SGD$75 for 2 pax breakfast of scramble eggs, sausage, bacon and croissants. Room service dinner pricing was cheaper than breakfast! It was only approx SGD$50 for 2 pax with 1 order of meatball spaghetti and 1 order of Half roasted Chicken. If you are not staying on the first storey, you will have to share the Villa's swimming pool which is quite a distance from the main building and you will need to walk out of the front lobby to access the pool.

Very friendly hotel staff, great service. Room was clean and spacious however some furniture looks old. Television with bad reception and quality. However very quiet environment. No view from room however located at orchard makes it accessible to major shopping mall and MRT station. you could go anywhere from there. plenty of night spot around the sarea with great food and entertainment. Overall was a great stay there, verry plesant experience, definattly going back for a longer stay at their suite. However ona side note, there are numerous small little tags which writes"this "item- e.g pouch, box etc" ius not part of the room amenities. Should you wish to purchase it kindly contact One Touch Service." if there is only a few I could understand it but it was on almost most of the small items in the room and toilet. Hope they could find another way to solve this problem as it is getting really irritating seeing that.

Extremely bad experience with the rude swimming pool staff in this "5 STAR RESORT"! The opening hrs of the pool is from 0700, we went there at 0700 it was not open yet and was opened around 0710. Unfortunately at 0800 there's a staff with very rude attitude, slapping our beach chair claiming that he need to clean the pool and ask us leave the pool when we were taking a rest there, and he said will be reopen at 1000. I was wondering why the cleaning would be taken during opening hour and refused to leave. The most ridiculous thing happened we were being scold by foul language! How can this happen in a hotel? And even a 5-star resort?! We went to reception to complain, manager there apologied but I can't receive any investigate result from the hotel. This is my first time to Singapore, and I will never forget what memory from this hotel brought me!

I enjoyed the stay immensely. Hotel offers a great selection of in-room dining and has great quality food. Cleanliness and efficiency of room clean ups were very satisfactory, and front desk staff were very very helpful and also very polite, professional and knowledgeable. The location I would say is one of the best in Singapore, and waiting for taxi pick ups without booking at this hotel lasts no more than 5 minutes, which is really efficient. Restaurants within the hotel's vicinity are top notch and overall, it feels like home, but in a more luxurious and 'one-stop' context. Perfect.

I think nothing makes a stay cation better than friendly, warm and caring staff upon arrival. What makes my stay cation worthy would be the impeccable service standard lasting the entire stay. Not only were the staff friendly, they exercised flexibility whenever possible to help with requests. The club private pool is quiet and great for relaxing. Definitely reasonably priced. Hotel located centrally, close to public transport for non-drivers, easy access to shops and restaurants nearby. Will be back again for sure.

Travelling with 3 small kids and 3 adults, rooms were equipped with two queen size bed. Room size up to 40 sq mtres. Very very comfortable for family with kids or groups of 6. Exactly the type of room you would like to settle in after a whole day sightseeing especially with small kids. Public transport are not readily available, but taxis can be arranged and arrived at the hotel in 5 to 15 minutes. 2km from Orchard Road. Breakfast are simple, nothing to shout about. But what we were looking at are the rooms. Superb Rooms! Would highly recommend!
the hotel is very nice with friendly staff the location of the hotel is nice and strongly recommend this hotel
Satisfied, nice staff, and quick. Breakfast is just ok, not many choices.
Amazing like last year but the hotel renovation a little bit "not good to see". But we still enjoy the food and hotel staff are very friendly..
Amazing like last year but the hotel renovation a little bit "not good to see". But we still enjoy the food and hotel staff are very friendly..

Our stay was memorable as the hotel gave my friend a complimentary birthday cake but advanced registration is needed though. They also gave us a complimentary room upgrade that allows an extended "garden/field" at the balcony area although there is no nice view. Felt a bit short-changed but we were contented with the free upgrade anyway. The bathroom was so nice, with a big bathtub & TV set where you can relax & watch TV while relaxing in the tub. There was also a clear glass panel screen that separate the bathroom and the main room. You can easily screen it down with a touch of the switch. However, we were not pleased with the in-room dining (ordered laksa which tasted horrible - tasteless laksa & it cost $20 before GST, and beef sandwich which was average) and the fact that such a luxurious hotel do charge for Wi-Fi which is provided FOC at most hotel rooms or even at their lobbies. What misery that was! Anyway, overall the nice hotel room compensated for the loss. It was a good stay all in all.
Satisfied Stay; free upgrade of room type. Setback is the carpark is quite far from the hotel.
Stay was perfect with no complains at all. clean and big suite room and hotel staffs are attentive to hotel guests most of the time. Large King size and comfortable bed as well.

We loved everything about the hotel, it's gorgeous. The only thing that let us down a little was the room service - it was very ordinary food considering the quality of the restaurants. That's my only complaint, the rest is divine.
Marvelous and Great. The front desk were so polite, attentive and fast.
Good price and large room. Location was okay, but rooms are a bit dirty and old.
so so ,bed was small,toilet was old with fowl smell and water pressure from shower was small.safe box was faulty and there are food wrappers under the bed.

It used to be an old hotel but it has been renovated. The room was quite small with a bit of cigarette smoke smell in the room, the rest is quite good especially location of the hotel, from the hotel you can walk Bugis junction just a few minutes or even to Mustafa store, the hotel was also quite close to the nearest subway. This hotel was in one of the best location for shopping and food.

fairly decent. just that the staff was rather cold (not rude though). in similar class hotels i've stayed in, its staff would greet guests if we meet at the hallway. but in this hotel, they never bothered to.
It was a pleasant stay at Hotel Micheal. Though the room is quite small, the two single beds are big enough to sleep an adult and a young kid each! The only drawback is there is no free room wifi!
Good location Easy to use transportation Comfortable room
My stay was good. There were no major issues during my stay.

It was a memorable experience, truly unforgettable stay. Love the room, best room we ever stayed. Super big & the bathroom was incredible. Only set back was I needed to pay for internet & worse still is that its only for 01 device. If I have to login to another device (ie Ipad) I need to pay for another second internet charge. WTH??!! Ridiculous!! But overall it was a great stay experience, wished that I could have booked another night.

We were provided with an upgrade to fabulous accommodation on arrival following a request for late discharge at extra charge. Couldn't have been more perfect. Only issues is the shower over bath combination we have encountered in many hotels on our trip, that causes water to get all over the floor of the bathroom.

Feel good, and everything are okay.The swimming pool was nice, and I'm happy the swimming pool open until 11pm...Besides that, the gym room also wonderful and can see the Singapore view, very nice. But a sad thing is the price was too expensive... If can lower the price a bit is better...
Was great to come back to a very comfortable place to relax after a hectic day, pool was great, staff at the lounge were abs perfect and very helpful, wine was great
My stay there was very relax and comfortable. The city view down the orchard was great and different.
Its good to more than enough. nice room, service, food. perfect for business trip.
Overall, it was a great experience. But the carpet at level 25 and 21 i stayed before was not desirable
I enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Big, nice, pretty nice and clean room.
I enjoyed my stayed at this hotel. Basement Room: Big, nice, pretty old but nice and clean.

Relax and entertained. The atmosphere is very cozy and full of fun activities for family vacation, especially the swimming pool which is spacious and safe. The connection to all the parks is its prime attraction and value througout the whole stay. Despite that, variety of foods is worth to try out, especially the Malaysian food center. It is very near to the shopping center (Vivo City) which is just a stone throw away, impressive.
Great, attentive staff, nice clean bedrooms, good sound system (bose). Swimming pools penlty

Hi, this is my 4th stay at royal Plaza on Scotts.. And as always im happy with this hotel, staff is very helpful, the room very big for singapore size, and near orchard road. But in my stay period there some maintenance in front of their lobby, which make some noise sound, but its still ok for me, and i will stay in this hotel again when i visit singapore

Overall experience was excellent, We (myself, my wify and our infant daughter) checked in on 24th Dec. Hotel is centrally located in the city and is near to Marina Bay. Superior room selected by us was beautifully designed, large and the king size bed was very comfortable. Though the speed of the wifi provided in the room wasn't very good. We stayed there for 2 nights and enjoyed our stay. I will highly recommend this hotel for the value of money.

I had a great stay at Oasia Hotel. I was really impressed by the customer service. My flight arrived at 5 am and I figured there was no way I would be able to check in that early. The room I reserved wasn't available when I arrived but the hotel gave me access to the hotel gym so I could change and freshen up. When I came back down they told me if I was willing to have a two twin bed room, instead of the room with a double that I reserved, they could check me in then. I was thrilled and very impressed. I really liked the hotel. The room was very nice and it was a breeze to get around Singapore as the MRT station is connected to the hotel basement. Would definitely stay here next time I visit Singapore.

Hotel lobby is spacious and staffs are friendly, helpful and attentive. Check-in is fast and within a few minutes we got hold of our key and proceed to our room. Hotel is centrally located and is just a few steps away from Raffles Shopping Mall. Another Shopping Mall, Bugis Junction Shopping Mall is just 5-10 Minutes walks from the hotel. Public transportation is convenience and 3 MRT station are within walking distance.
We greatly enjoyed our stay in this hotel, from the greeting to the room size and comfort it all was perfect.

This is my 4th staycation with my family (3 kids) at InterCon. They have always maintained their high standards throughout my stays from service to food. I love their club access the most. I have stayed in a few other hotels in Singapore but they do not allow children during cocktail hours in the evening. However at Intercon, they had the flexibility not to deny family with kids of such priviledges. Kudos to Intercon for this benefit extended to family with young kids. My kids never fail to choose InterCon as their choice staycation.

i stayed at 50th floor which is same view with Marina hotel its was awesome at the night view and room was very clean my boy friend said this is better than Marina i think i will stay again this Swissotel Stamford

Well worth the money. Booked a city view room which was comfortable with large windows to appreciate Singapore city by day and night. Enjoyed the infinity pool and great service for poolside food and drinks.
The staff was more than helpful and accomodating with our requests, we will stay there again without a doubt!

A very happy and memorable experience. We got all that we requested, an king size comfortable bed, a huge bathroom a high floor with great view of the attractions and sea. The hotel staff were very professional and friendly. We tried the restaurant Forest, and were impressed by the quality of service and food.

We recently had a wonderful stay at Goodwood Park Hotel with our toddler. Their service is impeccable from the word go. I contacted them from the UK prior to our arrival to request a cot, and also an inter-connecting room for my parents who would be joining us from Indonesia. They replied within less than 24 hours to confirm they have received the request and to ask for our flight numbers. Check in was quick and smooth, and all the staff in the hotel were very friendly. The room was spacious (even with the cot) and they reserved 2 inter-connecting room for my family and my parents, like we requested. The bed and pillows were very comfortable, and the bath and shower was great. What really made an impression on all of us were the service - from their front desk staff, to concierge and room service, everyone was friendly and polite. A special mention should be made for their room cleaners, who even arranged our toiletries on top of a towel in the bathroom - it was very much appreciated! I didn't go to the main pool (feeling slightly too self-conscious with a rowdy toddler as the main pool is in view from the cafe and restaurant) but my daughter loved the smaller pool. It feels like a private pool and it has a nice shallow area where she can walk and splash around. I will definitely be coming back to stay here when I come to Singapore again. They have a great location (Far East Plaza and Scotts Square are literally on your doorstep), fantastic rooms, and fabulous service - everything you can ask for in a hotel!

value for money! stronggly recommended to stay this marvellous hotel! staff well trained, helpful nice & friendly & efficient n provide excellent services! hotel location convenient easy find food n close MRT & near cheers n NTUC. room n bathroom was spacious, modern clean room. free wifi. easy access to public transport. hotel connected to a small shopping mall

Great hotel close to Orchard Road Shopping. We were very happy with this hotel and will stay there again. We had to depart on the next leg of our holiday early and informed the staff that we would be checking out. they packed us a lovely breakfast to take along with us. Will definitely recommend to all
it was a very wonderful stay at royal plaza on scotts. the minibar is free of charge! lovely hotel, very pleasant.
it was a very wonderful stay at royal plaza on scotts. the minibar is free of charge! lovely hotel, very pleasant.
The room and bathroom was surprisingly large. The view of the forest was superb and relaxing. Totally enjoyed my stay and would love to come back again. Definitely one of the best hotel rooms ever.
Our stay was wonderful with helpful and attentive staff. Easy to get around the main shopping belt in Orchard Road.
Great stay staff were very helpful and great and location was fantastic

Stay was pleasant despite ongoing renovation works outside the hotel. Staff were very prompt in arranging transportation from the hotel to airport, and I cannot understate how centrally located this hotel is (3 minute walk to Orchard MRT, stroll away from Singapore's main shopping district, 10 minutes away from Marina Bay Sands). Would come here again!

Stay was pleasant despite ongoing renovation works outside the hotel. Staff were very prompt in arranging transportation from the hotel to airport, and I cannot understate how centrally located this hotel is (3 minute walk to Orchard MRT, stroll away from Singapore's main shopping district, 10 minutes away from Marina Bay Sands). Would come here again!

My wife and I stayed for 4 nights and we were both impressed by the hotel. All the staff are on there game and the hotel has a nice relaxed feel about it. The breakfast is fantastic and sitting with a few cocktails listening to a nice piano in a lovely lobby area isn't bad either. The rooms aren't far of needing a refurb, they aren't dirty or worn but just a little dated. Although I fully expected that.

Everything about the Goodwood Park Hotel was great Thank you for the great staff willing to assist with every request. Location is fantastic. Close to public transport,shopping and restaurants. Fast Internet Will return to the hotel on my next stay.

Classic, tasteful decor throughout and excellent service at every turn. Efficient and welcoming check-in. Large and beautifully appointed room with everything provided. Great selection of TV channels and arm chair to relax in. Most comfortable bed in the world! Very good room service menu and quick service.Really high quality hotel. Highly recommended.

We loved it! It was soooo comfortable. Hotel staff was friendly. Wanted to try our luck at the casino at around 11pm but not sure how to get there, in the end we were given a ride there by the hotel staff using a buggy. Just too bad the price is super ex and it only fitted one night in our budget.

Clean room with good size. The room ceiling also reasonable height. The hotel service is good with friendly staff and very helpful in all types of enquiries. The restaurant offer very interestingly delicious food with nice ambiance. Hotel location is good and strategically located, easily access to the airport and City Centre. This hotel is suitable for business and holiday purposes.

When we first entered the room, we were amazed by its size! Even the toilet was huge! Everything was fantastic! The bed was big and comfortable. There was also quite a wide variety of food for breakfast buffet. The only downside is that the hotel is located quite far away from the monorail station. Walking may take quite a while and i recommend waiting for the shuttle bus to Equarius which arrives once in 15mins at the other hotels. But other than that, we got a good package deal. Highly recommended if you want a quiet getaway with your partner.
It was a great 3D2N stay. Shuttle was quick with no queue. Room was spacious and well-kept. Buffet breakfast had good selection of food.
Fantastic service, went on a staycation leaving our little ones at home and was all we wanted - quiet, fantastic food, beautiful room, good massage and wonderful pools - would definitely return
It was a fantastic weekend. Truly had an amazing time at this hotel for a very good rate. Comfortable bed and a nice tub. Free internet too.
had a fantastic stay at the royal plaza, they were busy so goy upgraded to a large business suite!!

it may a bit steep it terms of cost but you definitely get what you pay for - beautiful room with a view that comes with complimentary nespresso (i'm a fan!!!). service staff is always on hand if you need assistance. wonderful breakfast as well.

Wonderful hotel in a beautiful setting. There are three swimming pools on terraces that make you feel that you are in the jungle, only glimpses of the ships in the harbour. There were a few noisy children, albeit very well behaved and polite children, round the pool. Food was great and the spa was brilliant and had free access to the facilities for the whole of our stay.
Very satisfying. Will certainly book again. Price and location was very good. Best value for money.
Excellent short stay....... Superb comfort, clean & spacious room. Nice bathroom. Will come again soon
As good as the last time we stayed there - 49 years ago in 1965
I love the room, its very spacious, comfortable and clean. The design was awesome too. The swimming pool is unique, it actually comes with an artificial beach. Will come again for another staycation.
The hotel located in nice location, easy to access many shopping areas, sightseeing place, food place including nice restaurants, food court and hawker. Room is clean bed is super fine.

fantastic stay, room was very spacious,i had a problem with door lock to manager moved us to another room no fuss,managers help was fantastic and very appreiciated, all staff were very polite, Rita in the dinning was always laughing!!, would definatley stay again and highly recommend.
Generallly very pleasant. Will stay there again. Love the restaurants, sky park pool.

Oasia Hotel is a great place to stay, it has easy access to the MRT under the hotel. The staff are always friendly. The club level offers are great breakfast with a Chef to make you something nice. The staff on hand are always happy to assist. The swimming pool is really nice and relaxing. If you do have an opportunity to stay here try the club level, it had all that we needed for our stay.

It was indeed a pleasant stay. Got a pool view which was a bonus. The pool is a nice concept with division catering to kids and adults. The room however was a tad too cold as the centralise air con could not be lowered down. The design of the hotel us truly a hard rock trade mark. Well done.

Fantastic stay. Fully satistified with the hotel in terms of room, environment and staff performance. In addition the it is the cost is reasonable and value for money. Strongly recommended to friends and relatives.
We had a good stay at this hotel. This is not 5 star, so you should compare with the equals. We had an easy check in, Room service is really good, had no delays in attending to our requests.
Good! Staff are very nice, accommodating , helpfully. Our bedroom newly renovated has good design.
it was really nice, the dulex suite room super big, enough for a family

I Love to stay in orchard parade, for me its the best hotel in singapore, one the centrally located, and the friendly staff, they almost can help me whenever I needed help during my stay.. Overall, I would really recommend this hotel whenever u're visiting singapore.. Try & be amazed.
It was a nice hotel to stay. Staffs are friendly. Room service is fast. Quality of food is also above expectation.
I enjoyed my stay overall and is very satisfied with the room condition.will definitely return if I have the chance to.
Very comfortable, nice view (Vivo City).I will highly recommend to my friend and will stay again.

was an old but big hotel, room is ok, but the bathroom wif old tiles, i think it shouldnt quote with 4 stars with such room rates. Is quite far if you comes back from the orchard road by walking after shopping ie from takashimaya etc but is ok if u take a shortcut to scott road where there is far east plaza etc.

I would not recommend for shoppers or family. I was staying with my husband and 2 daughters 12 and 11 years. All of them got bored -- no swimming pool, no gym. With the kids, walked down to Orchard took about 25-30 minutes. When we got Orchard, they were tired already. The closest MRT is in Orchard. No shops near the hotel. Breakfast also served limited.
not comfort 'cause must be use a cab to go shopping mall or casino

The executive twin room that we got was spacious and clean. Comfortable beds, big restroom and free wifi. there is one small window in our bedroom with no view. However, the hotel is located far away from the CBD. There are no convenient stores nor restaurants nearby. you have to take a cab everytime you need to go to places. its a 20-30 minute walk to orchard, not recommended for those travelling with children. breakfast is bad, by the way
My stay at the Rendezvous was overall satisfactory and pleasant. A bit of noise during daytime due to construction site nearby.
Quite a nice and pleasant stay and fast check in process. Too bad no free wifi which is the downside. Other than this, overall been a good hotel stay

The stay at the Capella Singapore was to celebrate a birthday. The booking was done via Agoda and everything went smoothly. As it as not our first visit, the staff have come to recognize us. Our favourite part of the stay was the wide open and quiet spaces. We will be back.
I felt quite good with one night at this hotel. But feel it's a bit expensive on that location.
feel great. keep up the standard and SOP. need to further improve parking system and charges.

This is the worst room i have ever stay. The toilet is dirty there even have a smell. The bed sheet also have a smell. The check in and out counter staff is the worst like people own him money he is also rude to my father in-law. I have stay in a lot of hotel to be honest this is the worst hotel i have ever stay. For me i love staying around Singapore hotel with my families and friend especially during holiday but i will never stay in swissotel the stamford hotel again. Very disappointing with this hotel.

Service staff have the key and right to open my door when I m in bath. When feedback to service counter and they told me the staff have the right to open my door if I failed to response after the staff ring the bell 3 times, this is my first time experience this in my life which I did not heard about this rules in other hotels. And worse after my feedback no action taken at all. This made me sad and feel unsecure in whole night.
i was amazed to see the hotel is so clean and neat,and i got the 16th floor and i was happy to see the view from the window its awesome i love to visit
Pleasant stay. Hotel service staff were friendly. Conveniently situated within Raffles Shopping Centre and Convention.

Comfortable. We were in Singapore for a convention and the venue for the event was near to the hotel. It wasn't the best time to visit Singapore as it was at the height of the haze. The staff were very attentive and helpful in making our stay enjoyable and comfortable amidst the difficult time. Their concern over the health & safety of the guests was felt throughout our stay and we are very thankful to them

The only good thing is the hotel location in front of MRT station and beside a food court. The room was standard, the way it supposed to be with the value they charged (no breakfast). The reception staff are not very nice. The housekeeping accuse me for cooking in the room because they said my room smell like curry (i ate Indian food in the room, i bought at food court the next building), and they didn't apologize at all. The only helpful staff are the doorman. I lost my personal belonging in the room and there was nothing they can do, not even a compliment. I was very disapointed.

I did instant booking for this Hotel because i can't stand to stay at the other Hotel that i already booked for 3days. This Hotel is far better. Even the Deluxe room in this hotel is better than the Family room in the "other hotel". Worth the value. Room is ACTUALLY 32m2, and they ACTUALLY have a bathtub for deluxe room. All descriptions meet with reality.

overall it was value for money. i got upgraded on arrival which was nice. rooms are very small and there is not much in them. staff are friendly and service is fast. they have a funky restaurant with old record theme..worth seeing. dinner food ok. long pool so good for swimming laps. outside, there is nowhere nearby to eat good food or coffee...only have a food hall nearby. nothing to see either. money exchange is right near v ..rate not good but convenient. train subway right at hotel. i think the price no breakfast but free wifi was value for money, however would not stay here again as i like a bigger room and quality eating places in the vicinity.

it was a fine and comfortable stayed. an easy access to any public transportation either mrt or buses and taxis. it is centrally located. a walking distance to international plaza where MRT line is located.

1. The set temperature in the room is far too cold, even after the thermostat to 30, the actual temperature was about 22-23. Fortunately I found the extra blanket in the wardrobe. Still I departed with severe flu. 2. Only one bar of soap in bathroom, which is an irritant. 3. The TV operation is not as simple,fast and logical as it could be.
The room is big...tv channel very limited.no slipper provided ...

The check in was slow and to my shock, the hotel do not provide free wifi in the room and also at hotel lobby. In this era, no one charges these things especially in Singapore. The beach were filled with mosquitoes and have to be careful. Wish the hotel could do something about it.
Worst experience ever. It brought embarrassment and unhappiness to my father's birthday. Will never stay here anymore.

I must have made an error when booking and ended up in a tiny room with twin beds and a large bathroom with separate shower. Changed to a bigger room with a huge bed two big windows and a tiny bathroom, but the big room made up for the small bathroom. Walking distance to Singapore river, Bugis, China town and marina bay. Singapore is a very expensive city but the food at the smaller eateries is great and cheap.

Upon check in, sadly i didn't manage to get the guy who was in-charge of the recep name. He was one of the few i have encountered in Singapore's city hotels, to be sincerely polite and really helpful and engaging. Do not be put off by the interior of the hotel lobby area, it felt to my partner and i that we were kinda teleported back to the 90's kind of hotel feel. He suggested that we upgrade to the newly renovated deluxe room at $30++ , so we took that offer. The room itself is actually pretty big for a city hotel and the room was newly renovated which once one was in, it felt like the 90's vibe was gone. All was fine with the room apart from realizing the queen size bed was actually 2 twin beds combined together, which made sleeping slightly uncomfortable, housekeeping too needed to be more alert, as i found tissues under the bed. At 10ish, we were rudely awaken by a staff knocking loudly on our door, only to realize he was at the wrong room. We checked out shortly after that but i have to give the recep staffs at Village Hotel Bugis for not only being professional but going an extra mile in waiving off the upgrade. Thank you

Because of its location, access to any place was quiet easy. Being near to Orchard Road, it was an easy access to major Shopping Malls & resturants around Clark Quay. Lot of local resturants around the hotel, so you have a wide range to select from. The buffet breakfast at the hotel is one of the best range you can come across.

Having known this hotel as where most of my Japanese clients will stay when they come over, I thought it will be good to have a staycation over there as I was joining "Illumi Run", an event held rather nearby. The room was clean (and spacious enough). We find it costly for what we are paying though. However, the room service was quite excellent. We requested for assistance to warm our chicken bought for our celebration and they gladly did it for us. Our request for Ice, and extra towels, amongst others were answered very promptly.
Room was very small but for the location and price, it was ok.
I stayed second time at this accommodation.It's also very easy access from airport until here.Especially, here is very comfort and convenient to enjoy city life.

It was very gorgeous staying. Room was extremely comfortable and relaxing. Lunch and dinner we had in all restaurants were all great!! Staff were always servicing with courtesy. Pool was quiet and chilling until some kids came in to top pool.

My friends and I really enjoyed our stay in this hotel. The location is superb as it has easy access to public transportation. Having Filipino staff works to our advantage. We had a free access to wifi in the room for one day.

My friends and I had really a good stay in Parc Sovereign Hotel. I must say it was really a good choice. The location is very good especially for my friends who are first timers in Singapore. We had a 1 day complementary wifi in our room. Having Filipino staff in the hotel works to our advantage. We'll surely stay again in this hotel.
yesyv5y4ev5y45y4d5y4wt54y6rdub6druc6rubrd6hbrhdxrberyhby54y45bybe45
Always a nice experience staying in this hotel -- centrally located next to a MRT. There is a construction next to a hotel which is a minor inconvenience.
The stay was good the staff s friendly, walking distance to bugis, near MRT / BUS stop if talking a tirp to Orchard Road

We really enjoy our stay in oasia. The room is comfortable with good size. Clean and modern bathroom. Complete room amenities. The bed quality is excellent. Located above MRT station, we are very comfortable to go anywhere in singapore. The internet is at good speed. ***Unfortunately i was stay there many time and the refrigerator is not cool at all 5 nights stay and also previous stay.Definitely still will comeback to this hotel.
I enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Comfortable and efficient and close to downtown shopping and eating areas. I had not stayed here before but will stay here again if the price is right.
very very pleasant, staff extremely friendly and efficient
Hotel is near mustafa center 24 hours shopping mall, near mrt station and hotel lobby very nice design. The staff very helpful and friendly
Nice hotel centrally located and access to shopping centres. Friendly and helpful staffs. Quick access to bugis village and bugis junction and illuma

good no problems, room was of a reasonable size, loved being able to control all of the lights from the bedside table, they were not very good at replacing the mini bar but that probably saved me some money
Pleasant and Comfortable with friendly staff always ready to help....The room are clean and abit tight but comfortable

I would like to thanks edmund from front office for the excellent service That he provide me n my family. Very attentive when he saw me with my kids He offer me an extra mild of service. He approaches me by offering me if he can assist me upon Check in n check out. He deserve an awards. I am sure he will contribute A quality service for the hotel. He deserve this compliment. Well done. Very warm service from him. Thank you. Definately will come back.

My stay at this hotel was a real joy, any questions or problems were delt with immediately by the staff. The location of the hotel is ideal for anyone going to the Singapore F1 gp or just for great food and shopping so close at hand. The large clean rooms make any stay just that little bit easier too.
Very pleasant.Greatly helpful staff too but the hotel is still keeping our $89 bond after 2 weeks, which is unacceptable and will cause us not returning to this hotel

Location was fairly easy to locate. Taking the train on the red line to novena, follow the signages to the hotel. STraightforward. Staff were very friendly and since we got the club deluxe room, check in was to be done at the 'living room' on the 22nd floor. Staff who attended to us at the living room was very professional and detailed when explaining our privileges to us. Made us feel valued. Room was really comfy. On the 25th floor. Overlooking the city. Would ask for the mbs view tho. We wanted to see the fireworks of the new year. But got a room which faced the other side of the city. But no complains. Room was comfy. Mini bar was free!( since it was the club room) had an expreso machine. Overall a good and comfy place for a staycation.
Great and I will go back again. Next time hope can try the breakfast n restaurant there. Fully utilize the facilities as well.
WE ENJOYED THE STAY AT MBS. SO SO GOOD BUT COSTLY.
Rooms are moderate size but a little run down. Friendly staff
A subway tunnel is being constructed, traffic is diverted and noisy at night due to heavy drilling. However the restaurants available in the hotel are great.

Thanks for Jason, a friendly person who helped us looking for a taxi and handling our luggages. Overall staying is okay, except this hotel doesn't help a bell boy so if you bringing a lot of bags then you need to carry them by your self.

Really worth it due to the flash deal from agoda. Comfortable room with sufficient space. Nice washroom. Centrally located for easy access to town. Very attentive staff with excellent service Cons: They should make a separate queue for check in and check out instead of together

Our fourth stay with Oasia. The friendly staff always leaves an impression esp the sweet Charmine!:) always enjoy the facilities. Special requests were acceded to, the room as usual was so comfortable and we like everything about Oasia! The basement connects directly to the mrt level. The check in check out process was fast and fuss-free. All room services handled to within 10 mins. Everything is efficient. They take pride in things they do, Thanks!

the hotel is close to everything, all the attraction. close to MTR, tons of shopping and restaurant. lovely building and staff is very friendly and helpful. The room is spacious and clean, the breakfast also is very good. highly recommend
Great, will friendly staff, easy for public transportation

Iâ€™m happy staying in this hotel. Fantastic - very clean, good service especially the front-end counter (always smiles and very helpful). The housekeeping service is very fast and efficient. One of the best hotels in term of service and location within Orchard road. Highly recommend for those who plan for family or business trip. Hope I can have the same experience in my next trip

All staff are friendly. RMG TOUR (local tour) is well organized. Pls add more extra bed. I'm not comfortable to sleep cuz the bed is very small. Extra beds are all out. No more available went we check in.

generally pleasant, will go back again, good value, great attendants, valets, helpful front desk. older part smells somewhat moldy, but generally modern, great swimming pool.hotel room previously booked was not available, staff generously upgraded to a bigger room. this is much appreciated.
Great and good to stay with family. Easy access to all places. MRT is close. Food place and orchard road shopping is right there.

Generally good; minor things disappointing: - requested room near elevator ~ only was able to get 20 rooms away - paid wifi ~ used only about 10 mins each day, but had to pay the 1 hour package each time - swimming pool really small ~ had to wait half hour for towels

The Goodwood Park is a beautiful colonial building presently undergoing renovation, The work is unobtrusive and I am sure when complete it will be back to its original glory. The rooms are a good size with high ceilings, quiet surroundings, comfortable beds and very clean . The staff are gracious and helpfull. There are two nice usable swimming pools. The menu is basic but the food is fairly good. We would stay there again.
Amazing, front desk was very helpful with every request we made.

Choice of restaurant is a bit limited, so for dinner you'd rather want to go out and find what you want to have. Except this, we were quite satisfied with the gorgeous ambience and the friendly services.
Clean - friendly - central
I stay with my little family, my son very enjoyed play at pool area. And near to Universal Studio so We can back to Hotel when we're tired and going back to USS after a short break.
Enjoyable and comfortable. The facility is great and the package come with USS tickets.
We had a pleasant room with good hotel facilities (e.g. hotel shuttle bus) for the guests, makes our stays really enjoyable and relaxing with our young children.

Had a wonderful time in the hotel at the swimming pool and artificial beach with son. Great music in the cafe. Chic design bedrooms and great ambience. gfjhgjhhjkhkjlkjlkjlkjlkjkljlkjl;kjl;jjhjyguyhuhiouiuiajhsdaskhfsdjflsdkf;lsdkfljsdkfhsdkhkjsdhfgkjsdhfkjsdflkjsdfl;ksd;lfkdslkfjkldsjflksdfjsd sdkjfhjsdfkldsklfsdjflkdsjflkjdo
Clean rooms. Friendly staff. Great restaurants in and around the premises. Quick and easy check in and check out. No serious issues whatsoever.
Enjoying it since the room is clean and comfortable. I was able to rest after a hectic day and the service is good

The rooms were spacious but not cleaned very well as we saw some litter in the corner of the room. For a 4 stars hotel, it was ridiculous that they wanted us to either pay for a ice bucket or go down to the restaurant to collect ice in plastic bags! Toothbrush and all were not provided but can be requested for. The best part about the hotel is the central location as it is a 10mins walk to Far East plaza/somerset.

Hotel staffs was accomodating to request especially seeing me with young children. Though check in process was a abit long, having stand and wait. Housekeeping staffs was attentive but slower response to pick up calls. Overall thumbs up!
Hotel is merely 5 mins walk to universal studios, S.E.A aquarium. Good for family who intent to visit these places. Breakfast however was disappointing, not much variety.

It was too bad we had a short stay in this hotel. With its proximity to the them park, we could have visited all nice spots only if we had enough time lounging in the hotel and enjoying its amenities.

We booked a junior suite, and on arrival and we were put in a room that was the farthest point from reception, dark, imposing and what the strangest layout room ever - small circular dining table with 2 chairs occupying about a third of the room. In fairness when we asked to move to a lighter room the front desk upgraded us to a pool facing suite; after they had dealt with the 2 weddings going on, obviously; and whilst still a little strange in layout we were very happy with that. The pool is great and open from 7am to 10pm. I like getting some laps in first thing and it was great for that. During the day there is a bit of a scramble for pool side chairs/recliners as there are nowhere near enough for the number of residents, and apparently the Japanese are the new Germans when it comes to reserving their space. Still the days were nice and relaxing, the staff come round the pool and offer drinks, etc (when they are not dealing with weddings... do you see a trend here), we had rom service one evening and the kitchen were able to customise some food to meet my wife's food allergy needs and all in all the staff were generally friendly, helpful and attentive (when they were not dealing with multiple weddings). BIG NO NO - The Chinese restaurant (Min Jiang) has a full page of shark's fin soup options, which was not advertised until we sat down and read the menu... and then stood up and walked out again. Even Hong Kong restaurants have stopped selling this barbaric dish. The steak restaurant (our back-up that evening) was nice enough, some of the staff were excellent but one in particular and taken one too many energy drinks (or something) to get him through his shift and was overly energetic and annoying, and I suggest going for the steaks as they were simple, well cooked and delicious whereas the chicken was literally dying under a torrent of fois gras and truffle. All in all I think we would not stay here again, but I might try and sneak in to use the pool.

The stay was excellent and we were happy with the room. However, the housekeeping needs to be improved as we found a clump of hair in the bath tub. We also found a letter that was meant for the occupants in another room placed in our mail bag in the morning. The staffs were probably working to the maximum capacity as it was the peak season, but such errors do affect our impression of this hotel.

The stay was excellent and we were happy with the room. However, the housekeeping needs to be improved as we found a clump of hair in the bath tub. We also found a letter that was meant for the occupants in another room placed in our mail bag in the morning. The staffs were probably working to the maximum capacity as it was the peak season, but such errors do affect our impression of this hotel.

The staff are very friendly and helpful. the hotel room is very clean and spacious,all my family member are happy with it. Basically, the hotel located within walking distance to the Orchard mrt. You can see Mc donalds, starbucks, 7-11, coffee bean cafe and many other great shopping store when you walk out from the hotel. Pretty convenient.

My stay at the Marina Bay Sands was most enjoyable. The rooms were extremely clean, the staff was very nice and informative, the food was great, there were many stores available, it was near a nice mall with a very diverse food court and the subway had a stop at the hotel. Everything about my stay there was great. You won't find a better hotel in the city.
Decent stay. Hotel is walking distance to Orchard Road shopping district. Decent sized rooms; my only gripe is the lack of and poor quality toiletries provided.

I stayed at the executive floor that has a fantastic view over the city and a cool pool area. As part of the Club floor, foods and drinks are served throughout the day although they were a bit limited, especially the breakfast. Also, calling guest services was bad and I regularly did not get an answer. Carpets in the hallways are also tired and need replacing. Overall, I like this hotel and I would consider staying here again when I am in Singapore for business. Tip:Club floor is work a look if you can afford it.
overall good place. there was free wifi. clean hotel. if i were to be picky, i would criticize that the toilet doesn't look classy at all. the metal sink makes it looks like a cheapo inn.

First time having a staycation in this hotel, the staff might have given us a small upgrade to the corner room which afforded great views of the city. There are simple in-room dining options plus good selection of IPTV channels that worked alright except for some pauses through-out. The bathroom was OK with most toiletries provided, just be careful when closing the door at night, as there is almost no gap between the door and the wash basin. Just a stone's throw away, there are 3 typical heartland malls we can find in SGP selling sports stuff, supermarket, food court, fast food etc. There is also a direct access into the mall and MRT via basement 3 of the hotel lift lobby. Orchard shopping belt is just 2-4 MRT stations away. This is recommended for visitors who find Orchard hotels too costly, yet want to be close to the city's main red metro line.

We chanced upon a flash deal on agoda and decided to take the chance to experience an RWS hotel. Hotel Michael has a great artistic vibe that is consistent throughout the hotel, yet doesn't compromise on room comfort. We got a room located near the Sentosa Express station but there wasn't noticeable noise pollution. The room was clean except for dusty chairs that have been tucked under the desk for quite some time, and the bath towel seems a bit small for a hotel of such standard. The lack of free Wi-fi may be an issue for foreign tourists as well.
Check in and out are quickly. It was easy to get the MRT and found the location of hotel. It was near Little India. We can see the culture and sightseening of India.
Lovely nice hotel - Big rooms - excellent pools - attractions at universal studios and santosa. Worth the value of money that you pay per night.
General OK but I think it bit too expensive for this class of Hotel. Very Convenience as there are two Shopping malls next to the hotel and location is right on top of MRT.
Small but clean room but most of our time spent out door. WIFI was not free even with the amount paid, disappointing.
Centrally located and easy access to Orchard road and MRT station. We enjoyed our stay at the hotel. Room was clean and comfortable

it was pretty good. however, my boyfriend accidentally left his cables in the room and receiced many different answers ( some said they found it and some said it wasn't there) so that kind of made me angry at the customer service. when we went back to collect it, we had to wait at least 30min for them to bring it down. I mean, you've already found it, so why are you taking so long to return?
it is a good hotel with reasonable price. The room design is a bit old though
Good location for the hotel, room are generally clean but bathtub a bit small and shallow.

Essentially good. Super location on Orchard Road. Lobby's a bit tired..and can be a bit noisy with construction next door. Excellent bed quality. Great staff generally…but breakfast a bit below par. Good hotel though, and quite affordable. I had 2 weeks so comfort important.

As a Malaysian, I drove into Singapore. I think complimentary parking should be accorded as practiced by most hotels including the Mandarin@Orchard that we stayed just before your hotel. We had no idea that parking would be chargeable. The overnight parking fee of S$53.00 is exorbitant and crazy! Just on parking alone, we spent almost S$150.00 in the 3 nights we stayed in your hotel. I complaint to the reception 3 times and there was nothing offered to us. The excuse that the car parks belong to the shopping mall is not acceptable. Some form of arrangement should have been made. Guests should not be penalized for staying at your hotel! We certainly need to think twice before staying at your hotel again.

Good.. However I noticed many small unpleasant details like sharp corners in the bathroom, lack of proper mirror due to see through bedroom glass windows, and so on. Hope they can iron out those small little things that irk me :)

I really enjoy my stay in MBS. It is such a hotel. Alot of choices of food, leisure and easily access. The infinity pool is really my highlight for the hotel and I love everything about MBS. Very recomended!

nice hotel..it takes times to check in...but its okay...the room is bigger than i thought, the breakfast with many variety...what i love most is the tickets (3 different pass ticket in sentosa) that include with the room rate...thanks to agoda...next year, i would go back again to sentosa...
How was your stay at the The Quincy Hotel by Far East Hospitality? Please contact our Customer Support if you experienced any serious issue.
How was your stay at the The Quincy Hotel by Far East Hospitality? Please contact our Customer Support if you experienced any serious issue.
Clean, close to shoping area, the breakfast is very good, nice staff.
weakness-Sound proof for room is bad can hear noise from outside
My stay at York Hotel was good. The room is big, spacious and comfortable. The location of York Hotel is convenient; near Orchard where shopping is great and access to restaurant is easy.
nice place ,City view,Fast internet but shower room too small ,i think only bathroom too small too bad
memorable stay and staff are helpful and friendly all the time
Good and Comfortable Stay. Really Good Location, very convenience.
We were happy to be upgraded to the suite. However, believe we were given the old room under the old wing of the hotel. I booked this hotel for the new wing instead.
I enjoyed my stay at the hotel, I was satisfield with teh facilities, staff, room, etc, the internet connection was poor,
Great stay and great hotel staff. Had a good time in Singapore and will certainly stay here again. Really loved being here and comfortable.

Apparently you can add on breakfast @ SIN20 per pax upon check-in, which the Front Desk staff didn't inform us upon check-in and when we called Operator from our room we told the same too. So we proceeded to Spice Brasserie for Breakfast and the Cafe staff informed us its SIN35 per pax for walk-in guest. We were Room Guest NOT Walk-in Guest! Its not the amount/money but more to SOP of the Hotel that annoyed me.

After much searching our travel agent recommended the 5* Carlton Hotel based on past reviews, the reasonable rate offered through Agoda and we were not disappointed. We were celebrating our 3rd anniversary together and our agent emailed the hotel to inform them of this occasion, and at check-in we were upgraged several room categories which was very nice and much appreciated. The Carlton Hotel is 5* and it looks it, good location, attention to details and very attentative staff. All in all we had a wonderful stay and will return in the not too distant future.
fun and relaxing convenient shuttle service were provided toilet has different smell when it rains which is bad everything is expensive compared to the city

Second stay at this hotel in two months. Centrally located with a choice of MRT stations and a bus stop right outside. Raffles Hotel and the Chijimes Restaurant complex are a 7 minute walk away and there is a pub, 24 hour food court and a coffee shop within a block of the hotel. Staff were very accomodating; my brother arrived at 6.00am and was invited to have a swim while the room was prepared. (Not even I expect a check in at 6.00am) Sure enough he was able to check in at 9.00 am and I arrived 30 minutes later. Comfortable enough for two adults, with room for us both to work on our lap-tops. The free wire-less fast enough (there was a speedier alternative available)Needed some help with directions and the concierge were quick and competent (and accurate) with their suggestions and advice. Good hotel.
Good stay, close to bugis market and little india. taxis available all the time
pleasant stay with affordable rates and nice places to visit nearby

I was stayed in Concorde Hotel with my 3 daughters. The staff is friendly when I talked to them for check in. They upgraded my room to Premier which is larger and very comfort. The swimming pool is very clean and internet is also free.
good and nice. the lady that help to clean the room is very nice.

Overrall the stay is alright but the only negative part of the experience is that the check in and out process is quite time taking. There is only 3 - 4 personnels available in the front desk and if there is a Couples of people check in and out at the same time, it might took 15 minutes in order to check in or out. They should improve on the process and make it more easy and shorter time for the process.
Good and clean room, staffs are very helpful, CBD area around, very good for business people

Good location for family that wants to shop but had a Yong child, we went there with our 3 month new born and my wife can go shopping because all the shopping mall just on the same road. The room are new design and clean. If you drive there the parking is free. The swimming pool is a bit small and the staff is still not friendly enough.
Good and comfortable. easily accessible for myself to my Singapore Office. transport to the shopping area is near. variety of food for me to choose especially for asian food.
Great stay. They charge for 1day for early checkin. This was very upsetting.
Very good and friendly staff. Next to MRT and good places to eat

A wonderful watering-hole in the midst of the chaotic shopping bustle of orchard road. The hotel is feeling its age but the excellent staff and service made up for any hiccups. Easy check in and check out, good size room with very comfortable pillows. Only tried the breakfast buffet twice- its international but the same variety each time. Always a helpful person around to accomodate your every need. My family and I enjoyed ourselves very much. Thank you RP!

A wonderful watering-hole in the midst of the chaotic shopping bustle of orchard road. The hotel is feeling its age but the excellent staff and service made up for any hiccups. Easy check in and check out, good size room with very comfortable pillows. Only tried the breakfast buffet twice- its international but the same variety each time. Always a helpful person around to accomodate your every need. My family and I enjoyed ourselves very much. Thank you RP!

My stay at V hotel Lavender is good, comfortable but room is quite small. The reception staff is not really friendly. The room I stayed was booked with WiFi but we need to go to the receptionist to get the WiFi password. The password can only be use in 24 hours time which is not really convenient.
All right, only problem was the pool there were no attending staff at all. Poor Pool too bad.
Fairly well and room are clean and tidy. Room was at same level of pool and gym. Not too crowed and easy access to mall (within walking distance)

The staff was very friendly, and was able to check us in early. Our room was large and quite clean. I'm very particular about bathrooms so was happy to see that this was very clean as well. Krishnan, the staff who helped us with our luggage, brought out a map for us and was quite informative, answering all our questions on how to get from the hotel to the places we wanted to visit. He also volunteered to arrange for our transportation to the airport on our last day without our having to ask him. He was also quite pleasantly surprised when we tipped him, as he did not seem to expect it. Very nice place; i would stay here again next time i am in Singapore.
Very good. Big beds for family of 4. Clean Room, Fun Pool and Good roomkeeping services.
