It's always great, the staff is very friendly and helpful
Was upgraded to suite due to given room's door was faulty. Changed room at midnight. Given wine and cake for our anniversary. Overall good experience.
very kindly staff and nice swomming pool so my children very happy
It was a pleasant stay in big hotel. Lift waiting time is a bit too long and it should be improved.
nice . big shopping just opposite near to airport. and near to little indian. food is great
It was nice swimming pool and fast wifi internet and very kindly staffs.
Satisfied customer. The place is clean and the staff are friendly. No issues on check in and check out. Everything went smoothly

Booked the deluxe room for my Taiwan friends which first time in Singapore for holiday @SGD200.00 per night which consider very cheap because it was at the Sentosa Resort world. During check-in, was given a free upgrade to an Executive suite room at no additional cost charged. The room was very big in size. There's living halls with minibars area and guest toilet and a kings size bed bedroom. Nice bathroom and toilet. Also a makeup area for lady. My friends very happy with the stay and mentioned very comfortable and value the money.
overall have a good experience staying in the hotel. with the friendly staffs and the room are clean too.
the hotel has big room and also big toilet. location likewise was a bit hard to reach but it was worthwhile.
last I staying here is more better with low price I had a beautiful view but now in high price I only had city view and small room. hopefully marina bay sand can trim the hotel prices :)
satisfied , good location and friendly staff and good business hotel

Well, the hotel is centrally located, and quite cheap. I bought room with free breakfast, I thought that it is for 2 persons (usually standard for every hotel). However, they charged me $39 for second person who enjoys the breakfast. This was surprised to me. Be careful when you order, you have to check the free breakfast is for how many person.
Very good hotel for buainess and holidays with family too
Nice stay. Near the MRT station, Farer park and little India. They had nice Christmas decorations up when I was there. Mustafa is opened 24 hours so that's nice for shoppers.
Nice Clean room can't complain, very close to the CBD
Very Good but price too expensive for average travellers.
clean and close to shopping centre, close to MRT station, but they give the wrong wifi password so i had to try by myself until it get correct. one of our group's room smell smoke.

Overall it was okay. However, the room was small, and gloomy. Nothing stood out, except for the man-made beach styled swimming pool. It was exhilarating to swim in the pool, lounge by the side and have a drink or two in the pool bar. Totally worth it for family and kids, the pool is so much fun. Other than that, it's a normal hotel, which is at the brink of dipping into the "poor" category.

fine, but the quality of food need improvement. for 3 days, the variety and the taste of the food there is not so good and boring. The access in and out to shower area was blocked by the closet. The entertainment in the club quite ok The back access from the old shopping centre need to be improve.

It was good but im not that satisfied. I booked a room with a bathtub which is one of the reason why i booked it in the 1st place but was given a free Ã¼pgrade to bigger room but with no bathtub! and room is nt properly prepared with no towel. Good affordable place still.
Good hotel centrally situated near MRT, near Plaza Singapura Mall and Bugis shopping district
Room was made up regularly, staff was mostly cordial, close to shopping,MTA, and tours
Good and cheap. Value for money At City Central and shopping central, easy to go around the place.
Good choice for central business location and convenient to most tourism spots.
My stay was comfortable and I did not experience any problem.

Very clean and comfortable room. My kids love the TV in the bathroom. Easy access to attractions, especially to Marine Life Park it took us only 30 second walk. My kids (2 years and 4 years old) love this hotel!! The staffs are very friendly!
Good city hotel, great location, clean room and friendly staff. Will consider to stay again. Top value for money in singapore
more improve,ment center city good thing we need more staff coopration

Very glad to return again to this hotel for our weekend stay. Was given a free upgrade to the club floor so thanks very much for that kind gesture. We would be choosing to stay here again when we wish to book our staycation.
IS a very nice place , close to shopping area , dining place , transportation is friendly and the people here was friendly enough to help you
Here is good, staff is friendly and helpful. Near centre, also near good food place
clean room and large size. affordable and near to public transport. near to shopping and mins away from casino
It was a good quiet, clean room that we had. Has a small swimming pool and not so much view from the hotel. Just affordable clean room
good hotel for holiday but the hotel must be complited witd awimming pool and big gym area
good clean room, near bugis area for budget shopping
Goddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddd
the hotel is quiet old, but its homy , if we are looking for fanciness its not this one,but for vintage its one of the classic ones, clean is fair, and we always get a late check out, thank you.
If just play santosa theme park, this package is a good choice. The theme park is really very nice for children.
It was very nice enjoyable and comfortable very nice staff they were very cooperative and fast service and also a very good buffet breakfast.
good hotel value for money we enjoy it very much will come back again.
Great stay in the hotel with good pool virw, central totally located near town area very convenient
Good comfortable and friendly experience..location is perfect for shopping.
The hotel is in not good condition, It seems old. It has many culture in the services. May be I come back on next time.
Friendly staff, accessible, cozy room, comfortable room

Small bath room with an serparate shower area. The room floor feel sticky. Believe they mopped the floor with high concenrated detergent, hence leaving the floor sticky when it dries. They should keep the floor clean. Other than this, overall is good
Just 10 Mins to the MRT Bugis & Bras brasah stations.
My stay at PEH was good. Nothing amazing. The hotel begin to be a little bit old. Check in and check out was efficient. They have smocking rooms by the way.
Below expectation: small room, above expectation: friendly staff, good location near mosque and local restaurant. near mustafa as well

Overall speaking, the stay is good. The room is clean and big , especially in Singapore standard. Room is allocated in high floor with nice city view. The bed is comforatble. The wifi connection is good too. Staff is friendly. However, they are not efficient. I am checking in at 6PM. but they took more than 10 mins to allocate me a room. When i take back my baggage after check out. It took another 5 mins, which is extrememly in-efficient in my opinion.

For a hotel with 5 stars rating, I would expect the staff to provide the customers with better and friendlier service. There was a lot of transferring of calls to direct me to the "right" person who can serve me. Also, despite having a bathtub, the toilet/bathroom is extremely small.

The stay was a pleasant one, nice room. The breakfast offered was nice. The only bad thing is the young children running around the corridor early in the morning, which disturbed the sleep. Other than that, I will continue to book Village Hotel Bugis due to its friendly staff and comfortable room.

Good environment and nice experience with this hotel as I am firs time to stay here. Friendly staff and spacious room are really made my mind relax and comfortable during my trip to Singapore. The hotel rate will a bit higher as my own opinion if compare to other luxury hotel. Anyway I will come to stay here again.
It was good, stay at Village Hotel gave me easy access to a few attraction area in Singapore, and near MRT.

Price for the type of accommodation is reasonable. Rooms are clean and brightly lit. Staff are warm and helpful. They are pretty efficient as well. One improvement that can be made is that the lifts are kind of slow. Would be better if they are upgraded.

My last trip to singapore was to buy books for my daughter. Only walking disctance to go to a big popular book store from the hotel. There are two MRT station we can reach by walking, it was fun because i went with my older child. It would be considered far/long walking distance for younger children or old people. The bencoolen hotel is simple and clean
Stay was good and enjoyable. My husband and I are singaporeans, and we love staycations. Will definitely come back to Grand Park Orchard again..

This is my 2nd time staying there, very comfort, and nice, but I face a not friendly receptionist. I hope could stay there some other time with my big families & friends. The location that easy to access from and to anywhere, make us save time to discover more places in Singapore.
it was a great time over staying there, and the location is perfect

in total, there were more bad than good - check in process took me standing for 40mins in queue and a bit more in processing and it looked like my special request sent in through agoda booking was not heard by them either. rooms were spacious, had a good view and amenities were very well prepared for, but out of two rooms i booked for myself and my parents, my parents rooms tv did not work properly, for which three different servicemen came up and fixed but became mal-functional again the next day. there was a live band on the ground floor and the loud music was well heard in the room even with the door closed - that was totally uncalled for, for my parents. the famous swimming pool - surely had a great view of the country and the ocean - was very unfortunately too cold at night but what was worse, the water was absolutely filthy - lights under the water were very well lighting up fragments of dust, hair and so on. in addition, for such a well known hotel with proud facilities, they did not have shower room - we were guided to a rest room - the toilet, and no shower (apparently they do have shower rooms in fitness gym but that is for fitness gym). overall, for my parents, the experience of staying at the famous hotel counts but with a very disappointing remarks. they should really improve their service and overall experience for their guests.
Fantastic Stay at the hotel. Fantastic staff and near to shopping area. Will stay here again!
Front desk staff could be more friendly
ok.It was a stopover for us on the way back fron Europe.We find that everything in Singapore also the Hotel is very expensive in comparison with other major cities in Australasia

Booked for 4 nights and only stayed for one night then moved to a different one. I guess we were having high expectations on the hotel, the Superior room was small and there were no space for my little one to play and move around (approximately only 2ft width surrounding a queen size bed) especially when we have his stroller and our luggage bags. OMG!! The bathroom too was a tad bit small and we find it inconvenient to handle our toddler whilst showering him. The room is clean though and the check-in and check-out services were carried out unexpectedly fast! The thing I like about the hotel is that fact that right below it is the Lavender MRT station. Has kiosks that sells fairly good halal food for us to eat especially for breakfast. I would recommend the hotel for backpackers yes..but not those bringing small children. Price is rather expensive for the size of the hotel.
I got the room in the evening due to the high occupied so I have to wait for a few hours. The other things are good.

The hotel is located in arab street, so a lot of indian people stay in this hotel. The internet is fast and free, the price is affordable, and will stay there again if theres a trip to spore. Easy access for shopping , mrt, foods.
Not bad but there's no wifi and pool's quite small. The smoking rooms have bad smell but we easily moved to a non-smoking one.

it was nice since it near to shopping mall, near to MRT station, and have a lot of local food restaurant, but since i have superior room and bring 1 kid, the room and bath room quite small but it has clean room.
pleasant, but have to paid wifi internet access, but not sure if the price included when booking the room.very convinient near MRT station

Though I do not think it is a 4 star hotel like it claimed, the hotel was good for the price (110SGD). The bed sheet in the room I booked contained stains so the staff gave me an upgrade to better rooom class without charging which was great. The Fitness room is very small with just 2 running machines and 1 all-in-one weight lifting machine type. This price of hotel with a pool is considered very good in Singapore.
good friendly clean comfortable easliy accesseble ... value for money

The hotel was centrally located. Just 5 minutes walk from the train station. And 3 shopping malls are just 5 minutes walk away!! There are numerous eating places available for choices. Clean room. Bathroom was well equipped. Good friendly staff at the front office.

I arrived at the hotel at early morning, there are rooms available, so the staff let me check in. The location of the hotel is very good, near the red line, purple and circle line of the MRT station. The check out time is strickly 12am, not negotiation. The staff is friendly, the room is clean, but there are many ants on the table.
we were given a free night and the staff made sure we were comfortable
It feels haunted somehow. But overall is ok for the cleanliness etc.
Good services and attitude . Nice swimming pools . Comfortable room . Room is clean . But room size too small .
There weren't any bath towels when we entered the room and it took more than 2 hours before housekeeping brought them over.
everything good and fine, clean, friendly staff. good location

The hotel room is smallish, but it isn't a problem to me. After all, I didn't spend much time in the room. However it may be a problem for those who have large luggage, coz the space may be too narrow for you to put down your bag flat on the floor and open it. It was not a problem for me coz mine was just a small hand carry bag. Previous reviewers have commented on how the staff were efficient but not-smiling. But I beg to differ. The staff were friendly and quick to help. In fact, most of the Singaporeans whom I met (taxi drivers, sales assistants, etc) were warm and friendly. My one contention is that the hotel is not entirely that near to the MRT. It may just be a 7 to 10 minute walk, but after a long day of shopping and sightseeing, a walk of such distance is quite daunting. I have always managed to book hotels which are within steps from the MRT, but not this time. However, I am overall happy with this place.
Good and good and good good good good good good good good good good good good good good good
good location, fun and so close with uss. thanks to upgrade my room from deluxe to suite. nice

Hotel location is a bit far from MRT, walking around 15-20 minutes from Orchard MRT station. But you will get greenery view during walk and get peaceful hotel. Room is large even enough for stay 3 person in same room. Staffs is efficient, helpful and very friendly. You can find great buffet dinner at Shangri-La hotel just right beside RELC hotel.
every thing is good,thanks to the help of a good staff

Very good staying, good food at restaurant and club hotel, good area for business, arroun shopping center. Good service for helping desk but a bit trouble to get cab and also because renovation for restoran and hotel. Free mini bar and wifi,
We were enjoy staying at the Hotel. We are sorry to say that the internet connection was awful

The hotel is nice and well located. Good taxi service which in Singapore could be an issue. The only problem is the MRT works on one side of the road that make the entry and exit a bit inconvenient, overall a nice stay in a comfortable hotel. I recommend it both for businnes travelers or for tourists.
Overall experience was good! Would recommend in future...

Room was huge along with the huge bathroom. Had access to the ESPA gym which was probably the best hotel gym I have been too. Check in was rather quick on a Sunday. Overall a good place away from the heart of sentosa and the city.

The hotel is good and the location fantastic but I was not impressed by the service. You can find many others hotels (of the same category) offering a much better service for the same price. Some of the staff look bored and not willing to provide the quality of service you might expect from this kind of hotel, especially regarding the room service.
It was good hotel but because of old building and we have little trouble from supra natural thing

front desk staff was friendly during the check in time, but it took us forever to have the room cleaned.., called 3 times to have the room make up, and they only came around 5pm :( overall, location is good, easy access to everywhere and near arab street too.
Great except staff in front deck need to improve their service level
Nonstop disco till dawn. Too noisy could not sleep well
The decoration of hotel is trendy and nice. Though we have the added bed, the room is still not too small. We have the good view for the high flyers and swimming pool. The staff is nice and polite.
Good service by the staff, clean and comfortable room, strategy location to site office
Overall is a good hotel. Easy and close to casino. Easy to find. Worth for money. Spacious room. Available translator
I am satisfied to stay in this Royal Plaza on Scotts
I am satisfied to stay in this Royal Plaza on Scotts
Is a good hotel, the room is clean and nice and with wifi also. The staff very helpful and good location.
Good and perfect hotel with a good bed for relax, nice bathroom too nice design inside and outside hotel
sastisfy and nice hotel,easy access to city and central.
This is a very good hotel, very convenient since it is very close to train station. However, the price is a little bit expensive. Overall is good.
Use this hotel when on business in Singapore as close to business district.
The hotel staff were pleasant and the breakfast had a reasonable selection of local and international food.
had a good stay maybe can be upgraded a bit as some are a bit out dated
We enjoyed there, comfort and relax, and I will recomend Ibis Singapore on Bencoolen to our friends.
It is nice hotel which located in good place. Fast Check In and Fast Check Out. Many facilities surrounding.
good hotel, nice view, staff ok, room bid, room clear
hotel is good, staff very friendly always smile. clean rooms feel like home

I always stay at this hotel and will continue to do so. However from my previous visits I found this a bit less inviting. The Hotel was fully booked so the staff can be excused for some minor inconveniences. Alex and his staff at Chances bar are always welcoming and friendly. There is a variety of local food choices from Chinese, Indian, Nepalese, Arabic & Western all within close proximity to the Hotel. I was only there for one night on this occasion but overall my stay was satisfactory and will stay at this hotel on my next visit to Singapore
Based on the price when we booked this hotel..we are really satisfied. it was 3 min walks from orchard road..very close to shopping and eat area.
good stay, decent distance to restaurants and near theme park
large room and clean room enjoy for 2 young children the breakfast is standart, nothing special, very small breakfast room

We had a good and fast check in. Check out was also fast as we used express check out. Breakfast was reasonable but long queues every morning to get seated. Room was big and nice. All in all a good hotel, great location and we had a good stay.
the hotel is very near to MRT bras basah, in front of hotle there is kopitiam 24 h easy to find food
My stay at this hotel was excellent. Staff were friendly and attentive. Service is fast. The room was large and nicely designed. It was very clean and had comfortable bed at nice linen.
With free internet and near MRT. Orchard also near by for shopper.
Very good hotel. The rooms could be a little cleaner.

Stayed for 3 nights and enjoyed the central location between Orchard, Bugis and Little India. Everything was up to expectation, but when i paid 28 SGD for two fresh juices in the lobby bar I felt ripped off (they cost 2 SGD/each in the hawker centre).

I booked the room for my friend. Overall the stay was pleasant and all had enjoyed the hotel a lot. Love the pool and we can use the pool at Hard Rock Hotel. We enjoyed the food choices and the shops.

Located at the center of sentosa island which holds lots of entertainment and activities for family. Better use the shuttle and mrt to move around sentosa and singapore city since the taxi is a bit expensive friendly staff, big nice room with decent view. One thing that is lacking is wifi access. Overall, it was a pleasant stay

It was just 1 night that I stayed here for trasit. Good lacation to access to anywhere in Singapore. Staffs are so nice to give a assistance. This hotel is not the place to stay in all day, but it would be very good place to go around and have a rest in Singapore.
Nice stay. Shuttle bus for mrt station was really useful.
my stay was good as the staff give warmth services. also it is centrally located
very comfortable room to stay and it is very near to main destintion
Nice hotel ,Modern and Business style .Compare with the price is very good value
we can sleep well because of comfort room, we can find many restaurants in shopping mall..
ok, but shower might be cleaner, hotel not up to standard of peninsula, surprised, that a small bottle of water one can buy for 20 cents will cost in the hotel 6 dollars.

Basically a good hotel, friendly staff, clean and rather spacious rooms. What was irritating is that you have pay for Internet/wifi connection 30 SGD per day! Even in the business center - which is closed on Sundays (why??) - they charge you 50 cents per minute. I expect Internet to be included, specifically when you pay close to 200 USD per room/night. Moreover, the room was not really made up properly on the second day: bed was ok, but the large pillows were left on the work desk, along with other garbage (candy wrapping paper, plastic bags). It's no drama but I would have expected more for the price I paid. The concierge, on the other hand, was very helpful and polite. Strange enough, I wasn't charged breakfast (even though I asked twice) which was not included in the room fee. Lucky me I guess. Overall: good for a short stay. Centrally located and taxi queue right outside the front door.
the stay at the hotel is pleasant and walking distance to orchard road suitable for shopping and the area is quiet, nice.
good for shopping and near MRT so in easy for travel around the city, have food center near the hotel.
it is new hotel, close to all transportaion, close to all sigtseeing location, good prce, nice staff.recomend it.
good stay, decent room, may come back if price is right
Very helpful staff, extended check-out time with no additional charges. The hotel is centrally located just 5 mins away from Orchard Road shopping malls
very enjoy my stay here. very comfy im recommend this hotel to you guys near shopping near public transport

It was a fairly good stay. The reception was kind enough to source a room that meets our requirements. The only issue that I have was that the elevators were not as frequent as I'd hope for. Perhaps too many group tours in the hotel .

pros: really near the main shopping area, great room service menu, clean and simply decorated cons: minor stuff- bedsheets/duvet are a bit thin and worn out, TV was awful- they swapped out the remote for one that only has up/down buttons and the image was fuzzy/doubled, had a club room which meant that i had to go up to the 17th floor to check in and come down to my room on the 8th floor.. pretty silly idea. had a close up view of.. the building next door. which sucked. went up for free cocktails but all the tables were full and there was no food left anyway. no bathtub. had not much service at the main entrance, security guard looked at me for 5 minutes before coming over to offer to turn on the taxi sign for me. got a good deal on agoda when the hotel website didnt even have any rooms available, but won't stay here for the same price much less the full price because there was a constant loud hum from compressors of building next door. but if you're a traveller on a budget and want something semi-luxurious and don't mind not having a view and a constant hum then it's not too bad.
Just excellent for a business trip,comfortable hotel
I already wrote in to the management about poor staff attitude.

Our stay was good. Even though we didn't get the things we requested. It was still good to stay. Room aren't as private as I thought since the doors have cracks at the bottom. All in all, it was okay.
it's a nice hotel, close to shopping centre and food court. and the hotel surrounding by trees...
actually the location is good but lack of the cleaness

I stayed at the Swissotel the Stamford for my recent business trip to Singapore. It's a perfect location for a short visit. Easy access to most of my customers and with the adjoining shopping center and food courts its a perfect place to be for me. The Hotel Room rate can be on the high side compared with other hotels so it's not a must stay but desirable if the rate is reasonable. Purchasing Agoda pre-paid vouchers bring it in to my business budget .

The location of the hotel was great since it was close to Plaza Singapura and the rest of the shops on Orchard road. The MRT stations were close by as well which allowed for convenient access to other areas of Singapore. The location of our room however was on a low floor and on Friday and Saturday night noise can be heard from the lobby which is in very close proximity. A high floor would be recommended.
good location 24 hours food court swimming pool nice transportation , reasonable price , how much u pay how much u get
I'm sure i will stay here again on my next trip because its near to the hospital and shopping center
Staffs are friendly and helpful. Location is good for shoppers. Our room was clean, and spacious

excellent location with great breakfast. however do not expect to have quality service from the staff. very commercialize 'friendly' service. definitely not from the bottom of the heart kind of services. i do give credit to the car jockey service crew. very friendly and feel welcome.
The service very good,all staff very friendly.. Very near to go to shopping mall & Mrt Definitely I will come back to stay offer there

the hotel is just next to paragon and takashimaya so its a heaven for shoppers. the room is in decent size, modern and new. the bathroom has large glass window to the room so u can admire the view from the bathtub. water pressure for the tub is strong but the shower pressure was weak. the bed is comfortable. whats good about the hotel is its fast internet access but that is already priced into the high room rates.

Overall it was a pleasant stay in this hotel. It is relatively small especially the bathroom. There's only one thing that turned us down is the wifi service. We have to pay SGD10 for the wifi service for only 24 hours and restricted to 1 device only. Obviously that hotel is not for leisure stay where most of the time you will be out from the hotel and will not trap yourself in that small little room. I really pissed when I had to pay $10 for the internet when I only want to use for few hours to contact my family. Internet is free everywhere but hotel charge us just because we booked through agoda? This is the worst part of the hotel we had experienced.
good location, nice staff, food is good but the room condition is quite old.
good location, nice staff, food is good but the room condition is quite old.
Everything is fine. I don't think I have to write 50 characters.

This hotel there are 2 wings, I stay at Excelsior wing , I take wrong lift and see some prople confuse like me. However that a little bit , I'm not serous. The location is centralize and near business city. Near city hall that I love it's!!! \
good for everybody because food court close to the hotel. most taxi know this hotel. Nice front desk staff. Helping booking minivan without hotel charged.

I always stay at this hotel when I am in Singapore, but I thought paying $37 for breakfast was a joke and the level of food on offer was not the best so avoid the breakfast, the bar prices where very high, I ordered two cocktail drinks that honestly tasted like water, not much was done when I complained, apart from that its a good hotel
An attractive colonial style building. Good location near transport and shops. Comfortable and clean rooms. Efficient checkout but check in very busy.

This was our 3rd stay this year at this Hotel and have noticed that they have re-painted the outside and balconies as this hotel is getting old as I stayed here 35 years ago when it was called "Ming Court". My only complaint is they do not have a sanitary wash hose next to the toilet like 90% of Asian hotels.
pleasant stay , good sleep , close to shopping area , many restaurants nearby easy to find taxi
Good customer service and friendly staff arrange the early check in . Nice good location easy go around everywhere and 20 mins catch taxi to airport .
This is a new hotel in central location. Room are bit small but clean and comfortable. Stroll recommend for long stay in Singapore at their reasonable price.
Good. a bit cramp at d entrance due to on going renovation.
the hotel is afforadle and easy to access. the breakfast is ok. will come back again for future visit
Very friendly staff, good location make the trip worth coming back again!
clean room, friendly staff and close to eatery and quiet
Very pleasant and comfortable room, very quiet and nice in the club lounge.
Everything is good. I will definitely choose Grand Park City Hall hotel again.

Check in was a breeze but delayed during check out as we have to wait for another staff to get our car park ticket validated (charged at SGD12). Room is tastefully furnished, pillows comfortable but mattress a tad hard. Wifi connection is fast and room amenities are as expected.
Nice hotel & convenient for business trip. Not a family hotel
Very nice. I only stayed for one night but it was enjoyable.
Quite good so far and will be considered to stay here again for next travel
It is an old hotel and some parts of it could do with a renovation. Still comfortable and very good staff.
The staffs were friendly and insisted to carry our bags to the room and location is very convenient. Near to shopping malls and many restaurants. Nice and relax environment.

Comfortable stay, short walking distance to Orchard Road for shopping.Friendly staff and too bad the Chinese restaurant was not open when we were there.It was within walking distance to Mount Elizabeth Hospital for those seeking medical treatment there.The breakfast was standard but adequate for our needs.

I like to stay in this hotel because it has a nice quiet surrounding. It is perfect for relax and calm yourself. The room also very spacious comparing to most of Singapore hotel. The downside just the public transport. I think it is quiet far from the nearest MRT Station (the Orchard MRT station). But if you like to exercise a bit, it will be great for walking experiences.
Very nice, well maintained heritage building and conveniently located near bras basa mrt. Some construction nearby makes it difficult to flag a taxi but the staff takes care of it.
good location but not seem like 5 star , beside penisular hotel which alot of myamar people , near to clarke quak and city hall and orchard ...

Good experience BUT 1) Reception is disorganised. Waiting time to check in was too long, because there was only 1 staff doing the check in. People held up the staff because they are transacting activities other than the right purpose of the queue. Poor management to be blamed. 2) Asked for non-smoking room, but even if it was non-smoking room, when I arrived, the balcony was seen with cigarette ashes on the ground. Poor housekeeping to be blamed.

good location, close to MRT station and airport. Room is small, hair dryer is broken. No free wifi, need to pay $10 for 24 hours per head. Not clean, dust on bench and desk. No power point in bathroom. Staff are friendly. Only one pillow available for each person which is not enough
The hotel is located at the city very near to all attraction but the room is too small..staff are friendly but the room is a bit noisy...will stay here again

The hotel is located smack right in Orchard Road so it's perfect for shoppers who need to go back and forth to drop their things in the hotel. However, for the price I paid (and this is relative to other hotels you can get within its price range), I would say you can a better deal. The hotel is very old and needs serious renovation. The rooms are tired and although I don't have complaints about cleanliness, this hotel just looks like it was built in the 80's and never got an upgrade since.

The hotel surrounded shopping center and restaurant. Also closed to OG department store. Closed to Bugis street, fit for traveller for looking value and fair Price. Transportation easy to get Taxi and Closed to MRT Station. Water also save for drink from Valve.
Good location, near MRT station and Hawker Food. Room a bit small but overall was a comfort stay
spacious room and comfort bed near shopping area good location
clean hotel nice staff but small bathroom very near at the mrt near in attraction in marina bay

When I checked in I booked for 3 booking as the middle day just decided later. Staff was talking like complain that I have too many booking. I purchase the internet, you have to pay for this hotel, they said that for 4 devices but it is actually for 2 devices. On the last day, I left my back at the hotel. The staff also very rude just take the ticket from my hand. This hotel is recommended for business traveller as it close to many office in Financial distinct but the staffs haven't train to be polite.

Calls made to helpdesk were answered but issue was not attended to promptly. Had to call them multiple times for issue to be resolved. After housekeeping, there was one towel missing and no bath mat in the room. Called housekeeping to provide Couples of times but they never showed up. After housekeeping was done realised that some items in the room ended up at different spots (e.g. left drinking glass on make up table but ended up in bathroom). Also after housekeeping noticed the fridge door was left slightly ajar. Overall, hotel is in a central location. Ideal for tourists wanting to visit attractions. The housekeeping service could have been better.
It was a nice stay for me. Great location for Arab Street and Bugis MRT. Room is very clean, bed very comfy and fast connection on Wifi. Staff at reception & concierge are excellent.
Good, did not like that you did not tell me about the extensive renovations!!!!
Good, did not like that you did not tell me about the extensive renovations!!!!
Good, especially if you want to spend a day or two in uninsurable studios and surrounding area. However I would recommend the movenpick as a better hotel in he same area for the same purpose
The lobby was awesome, a pity we didnt get to stay at the newly build building

The check-in was smooth, we've been allocated to a room with a king sized double bed. The room was nice and quiet. The bathroom has a large basin and bathtub surrounded by mirrors. There's a beautiful swimming

The check-in was smooth, we've been allocated to a room with a king sized double bed. The room was nice and quiet. The bathroom has a large basin and bathtub surrounded by mirrors. There's a beautiful swimming
It was a smooth and trouble free stay. The hotel is centrally located near to places of business.

Good location, nice size rooms, near MRT, but hotel is adjacent to construction work site, very noisy even during the weekends starting from 8am sharp hear lots of drilling and construction work noises.
long line to check out, less receptions to help when the waiting line is getting longer.

The check-in was fast and quick. Staff was polite. I got a free upgrade to deluxe room. However the room was not as clean as I thought. There were plenty of hairs on the shower floor which I have to clean up before I can start using. The aircon was good and cooling as I was staying for the Singapore bay run. The best thing is it's location. I went to Raffles City and Funan as well as Chijmes. they were all within 5min walk from the hotel.
GOOD STAF. THEY GIVE US FREE DRINKS AND LATE CHECK OUT. GOOD LOCATION, BUT EXPENSIVE.
good room, big room, clean room, good location. nice lcation around
it is a good hotel with good location,good service.
It was good and service and housekeeping were good. The room was tidy and clean
I was very impress on the facility they provide a mobile phone that I can call locally and Internationally for FREE.

The Rendezvous Hotel location is very good, centrally located at city area. Near to the Dhoby Gaut MRT station. Staff are polite & friendly. Room is comfortable. However during our stay the hotel lobby is still under renovation, which is quite noisy and dusty

Hotel is quite good. Specially the new upgraded one. We booked two room, the renovated one was ok. the other one has old carpet, and it was smelly, it gave gad experience. staff was friendly. check in was slow and room was not ready even after we wait until 2.30pm
So - so.We had to wait long for check in and room service was very poor - both food quality and time they took to deliver food
Been staying in this property since last year, the room is clean and well maintain
Good location convenient to shop and the staff provide a great service
location was good. close to all shops on Orchard Parade. Hotel was a bit old but still clean.
Near to shopping centers, friendly staff, big room, comfortable room

The staff are nice, can get early check in and fast check out to. The room was large,clean, comfortable bed and large bathroom with a bathtube. Near MRT station and easy to find food and shopping mall.

This is a great hotel, location is good and right in the centre of the shopping area, Orchard Road. MRT station is nearby so getting anywhere around Singapore is quick and easy. Isetan, a shopping mall is just around the corner and so are the eating places. This hotel staff are friendly/pleasant and check in was quick and simple.

This is a great hotel, location is good and right in the centre of the shopping area, Orchard Road. MRT station is nearby so getting anywhere around Singapore is quick and easy. Isetan, a shopping mall is just around the corner and so are the eating places. This hotel staff are friendly/pleasant and check in was quick and simple.

We were initially put in a room which was dark, musty and had a loud sound from moving elevators. After putting in a word with the reception, we were shifted to a newer brighter room which was comfortable and definitely value for money. However, there was still the sound of aircond dripping but we were too tired to request for another room. Overall, I would recommend it for its location with close proximity to cafes/ restaurant/ train station, friendly staff and value for money if room condition is not your top priority.
Pleasant stay. Room is a good size. Has gym and pool facilities. Near MRT station and next to mall. Close to business district too.
Overall, the service is really good, problem solved instantly. Good location to shopping area and food court
Good location and ideal for public transport. Shopping mall is in front of the hotel and lots of places to eat.
it was nice dispite dirty carpet as the hotel is not a new hotel. near bugis mall, in front of raffles hospital.
Food should be improved both breaksfast and indian reataurant
Location,Friendly staff, Large room and large bathroom
Great n no complaints at all. But the lobby and public areas of the hotel needs refurbishing.
All enqueries and problems were addressed by hotel
Everytime I go to singapore & stay this hotel nice location
good location near shopping mall,clean room, not too far to walk to night market
it was good place with nice service. great location
Attentive staff, very courteous and helpful.rooms are old but clean

The breakfast room is best avoided, it was crowded, share tables, bad coffee, not enough room for people to walk past tables. I recommend you pay room-only and get breakfast nearby as there are many options within walking distance. The gym is reasonably well equipped. The location is good for shopping, Orchard Rd, restaurants, coffee and pubs etc all very close.
very poor especially free wifi. every single time i had to ask to reception because of it was connected to charging admission everytime.
I was most impressed by the staff at the front desk who shared information in the interest of the guest. True hospitality.

The rooms are clean and the staffs are friendly,This hotel is perfect for Families and Couples who want to spend quality time together away from their busy lives,at the same time,the hotel is nearby the shopping area ion...ochard mrt...
so far, the benefit from Parc Sovereign is only in location, that close to the Bus stop and Train station.
strategic location for all fun - to mrt and sightseeing
It was good. Centrally located, nearby the famous Orchard Road and Mount Elizabeth Hospital. You can save taxi fee, just by walking.
GOOD, I JUST STAY HERE B'COS NEED TO SEE MY DOCTOR AROUND THE ORCHARD AREA
Relaxing and comfortable. Very convenient for shopping.

The best thing about this hotel is that it is very close to public transportation, particularly the bus/taxi terminal to Johor Bahru. I just needed to spend a night in Singapore before going to Legoland in Johor Bahru. I chose this hotel because it was very close to the taxi terminal to JB.

Good location with nice service and design rooms. Very near to all major attractions like the Universal Studio Singapore. Food and eateries are a plenty nearby. Many shops and dinning options. Nice facilities like the gym but swimming pool is a bit small for hotel of this size. Overall nice rooms with very comfortable beds and near to many amenities.
It was a nice room. However, upon check-in, the carpet was damped and had a musky smell throughout the stay.
Good location with shopping area nearby and also MRT. The only thing bad, they do not have any parking for visitor!

Comfortable room but small, near to Orchard and easily access to public transport. They also provided free shuttle bus to Sentosa Park. However, their staffs are not efficient. Requested for extra blanket but end up nothing from them. Overall, good stay
Average with comfortable room and location is good.

The hotel is quite good, I chose this hotel because the price is cheap for the location which is at orchard. Near the malls such as ion, wisma atria, nge ann city, and the most important thing is very close to mrt station.
it was pleasant, would recommend to anyone who doesn't have problem with budget .

When it comes to package holiday deals, few destinations provide the same value as Turkey and nowhere in the country is as popular as Marmaris. Located in the South West of the country, package holidays in Marmaris are particularly great value for those looking for sun, shopping and a lively nightlife. Along the beachfront, which is long but perhaps not the best beach in Europe, youâ€™ll find numerous restaurants, bars and clubs, many of which are a lot cheaper than other holiday destinations. For those that like to do a bit of shopping, Marmaris provide plenty of opportunities to pick up a bargain.
it is a good hotel, with good location, good service
Good N nice hotel, suitable for business trips and families.

I stayed in a Club Room because the breakfast, Internet and free cocktails are included. If you book a normal room then you pay for internet, which in my opinion should be free in all hotels. The rooms are a little dated, and there is no 24 hour room service. It is expensive for the quality of room and service they provide. Good location for shopping in Orchard Road.
GOOD LOCATION, CENTRALLY LOCATED, EASY ACCESS MRT, GOT 24 HOURS FOOD COURT, BUT WIFI NEED TO PAY EXTRA. BREAKFAST NOT SO NICE. BUT THE STAFF IS FRIENDLY.
excellent location, Classy rooms, centrally located

The hotel is located in Bugis area. The nearest MRT station is Bugis, which is at least 10 mins walk away. The room that I occupied was very small. The bed touched the 3 walls of the room. But as I was single, on business trip, it did not matter much. But if you go as a Couples or 2 people, then you would have problem. I think there were other larger rooms available in the hotel too. But I decided this one due to price. The price is more higher than expected. There is no room service available in this hotel. You will have to go to the restaurant in the lobby, which is self service.There was a small flask in the room. It should have been with a heater.There was sachets of tea, coffee and sugar in the room. But since you cant heat the water, the sachets are of little use. The selection of the free movies on the TV was good. The bed was comfy. I will stay in this hotel again, should I visit Singapore again.

We stayed in Amara Hotel during Ramadan Holiday. It was a nice stay, the room is clean, spacious, convenient bathroom. Unfortunately the room which I stayed got broken A/C controller, aircon was working, just the controller was not click, probably previous guess unintentionally broke it. I need to call requesting for technician to fix the aircon controller twice. First calling in first day took quite long time, probably due to short of man power. But second calling was just in time, only 5 minutes waiting, the technician showed up. The hotel location is lovely, opposite of the road, there is NTUC Faiprice supermarket, they have all the things there. Tanjong Pagar station is just 5 minutes walk behind the hotel. Every time entering the hotel after a tiring whole day trip, we felt like entering our own home, the ambiance was so warm, the lobby perfume is pacifying. Overall this hotel is highly recommended

it was a pleasant stay. the staff are friendly. they upgraded my room to a superior room. Everything is great except the room faces the construction sites. even with the thick glass, I could hear the drilling noise. Luckily, the noise stopped after 10pm. Otherwise, everything is perfect.

Love the location of the hotel'..at bugis area and very near to attractions such as the temples along waterloo street. Also walking distance to cityhall and dhoby ghaut area, with museums and attractions located along the way. You can find local rrestaurants and coffee shop arond the area too.a bus stop is just found right outside the hotel.
Overall we are happy to stay in this hotel and I think we will stay in this hotel again next time
Was pleasantly surprised with a free upgrade to a club room
It was good. I got everything necessary that I needed. Good use of space for the room, perfect for short stay

It was meant to be a staycation over new year eve to catch the fireworks at marina bay. Bus stop with buses running through the city is right in front of hotel, and MRT station is within walking distance. Major shopping centres and restaurants are jusr around the area. Room is clean & comfotable. A bathtub would be good.

the room was nice, comfy and large that you could do acrobatics inside the room. location is quite nice it has a suburban type of feel to it with all the plants and trees surrounding the area. But after a 10 to 15 minute walk you can already reach Orchard road one of the main shopping and entertainment district in Singapore. Its quite nice to live in if your on a budget. Though there aren't any amenities that you could enjoy on like the gym and pool but its quite alright. Also breakfast was fairly good, it was complete with fruits, veggies, cereal and a chinese breakfast.

Been patronising this hotel quite frequently since 2008 and all this while was satisfied except this last round which the room had a very bad smell and i realise they do not change the sheets for me the next day even after i requested, happen to recognise some stains on pillow case and bed sheets. Not comfortable. Simple things hotel can do to make the whole experience alot better. Regards

My stay with Ibis Singapore is GREAT EXPERIECE. I'm very satisfy with Hotel Room rate, Bath Room and its location. THe staff is very responsive especially early morning on waiting taxi. It would be great if they can improve the slow internet issue.
overall above average stay. It is comparatively pricier than other hotels in the area
Pleasant, it meets all requirements. Swissotel though albeit old, still remains a good value for money stay in downtown singapore

Quite happy with the hotel, not over enthused with having to pay for internet usage (only use a tiny amount to check flights. This cost 29 dollars). Great view from the room via larger window/doors to balcony. For us a really good location, freindly helpful staff, secure holding of baggage prior to evening flight and ability to shower and rest prior to this.
Stay was ok but could be better if bathroom fixtures are improved and replaced. Getting old.

The check-in was smooth, we've been allocated to a room with a king sized double bed. The room was nice and quiet. The bathroom has a large basin and bathtub surrounded by mirrors. There's a beautiful swimming
I always stay in this hotel in Singapore, economical and quite corner of the Orchard area

The rooms were quite small but the bed was comfortable and the bathroom layout was quite ingenious. The room would be big enough for 1 person and a bit tight for 2. Won't recommend it for families as little kids won't have enough room to play around. I was unfortunately placed in a room 2 floors over the hotel bar and it was extremely noisy. I loved that it was right beside the paragon and with all my favorite malls around. I usually stay at the mandarin and I wanted a change in venue. I probably would stay here again if there's a good promo.

Good location but wish the rooms would connect to wifi other than in the lobby. Paying to use the business center and connecting to the internet in the rooms by Ethernet cable was a big turn off for future booking
this hotel is on the start point of shopping area on orchard road. Easy to go out eat and shopping , there r a lot food counts and restaurant The room quit big and standard service .
It was a good time during business trip. not to far from subway station

We traveled there as a group of 4 people, me, mom and my 2 aunties for 4 days 3 nights. The 1st day staffs put us on 5th floor and I was quite shocked of how tiny the room was. Next day I told staff, she upgraded us to the top floor with swimming pool view, bigger nicer and very clean. Services staffs were friendly just reception at the front were too busy to pick up the call. Location is great even though it's not that good to subway train but it's convenient to just walk to shopping area.
not great value. I was upgraded but the room was surrounded by office towers about 10 metres away from the large windows
I got an upgrade to a room surrounded by office towers. Needless to say the blinds were closed during the entire stay.

Knowing that the hotel is fairly new, we expected better finishings. We were upgraded to the Club Floor but was disappointed. The aircon and shower temperatures do not follow the setting and turns hot and cold the whole time. Also, the walkways are very dim. It felt dodgy rather than the "upscale" look it was going for.

Pros: Centrally located, near MRT, bus stop, business centers, malls Nice modern room design, Buffet breakfast - (although not enough choices) Friendly staff Fast check in and check out Early check in allowed Clean bathroom and amenities Cons: size of room was pretty small (not the same size as what is being advertized in Agoda) no free shuttle service (not even free airport transfer) not enough elevator service

My stay was ok . One thing has caused problem that is the basin and bathtub was not up to the satisfactory quality and not well maintained . I think the hotel authority shouls consider about the same and shall take necessary action .

Its a convenience place to stay, as it is located at Orchard Road. Close to a lot of Malls and restaurants also major attractions. The hotel looks kinda old, yet the service is good and the room is not bad.

good location, shopping area, good food. this hotel is not the huge hotel but its worth for money and easy to go anywhere. close to paragon shopping mal and opposite to mandarin orchard and quite short walk to TAKASHIMAYA and many shopping around this area. this hotel is in the middle of start shopping and so it is to find good food and luxury brand. night time the light decoration on the strip is very nice. you can see from your window and walk around to take a photo. People are crowded on late afternoon till night time. also, easy to commute to other in the city.
The standard toiletary are not provided. Not worth to the score.
the room is small but clean. the location is perfect for shopping.
Enjoyable stay. The bed and room is big to accomodate many people.
Went to lobby and being given a key card to go to club floor to check in, a bit confusing. Breakfast not up to standard (both variety and quality)
Good location. Nice staff. Clean roomGood location. Nice staff. Clean room

nice area that the hotel is in. near to lots of food and stuff. nice internet connection with up to four devices per room. complete set of toiletries (except for comb. lots of power outlets to charge stuff :)
Need to have swimming pool. B/f prep not as expected. Spacious room n clean.
The hotel is near city hall mrt station. Near a lot of shops. Easy access to central area and night life. Staff nice and friendly. Room is old and furniture is old. Hotel rooms quite old.
Service very very bad.My room was big, clean and simple. It had a terrace as well. Internet connection in the room was good. The hotel is a walking distance from Orchard road/ MRT.
Good experience with the hotel. Everything was smooth. I will recommend to my friends.
Great. My boyfriend & I love the cozy feel & its a nice hotel for family who wish to have a short getaway.

Room was spacious and bed was comfortable. Good shower with powerful water flow. Breakfast was ok. The Hainanan chicken rice at the chinese restaurant was delicious though. The hotel is popular with tourist groups but it wasn't an issue to us - check in was fast as staff was efficient, and we avoided the same time for the buffet breakfast. A little downside : the smell from the restaurants is rather pungent - you get it as you enter the hotel. But we tolerated as we don't stay all day at the lobby.

it was my second stay in Grand Park. they auto upgrade me to deluxe room and on the 8th floor. it was way better than the 4th floor we stayed previously as our views was obstructed. the good thing about this hotel is it's great location. As i was taking part in the Singapore Marathon. The proximity of this hotel to the finishing line was very close and it was really good to be able to head back to the hotel and enjoy a hot shower after the run.

We where able to walk to most things. The bed was comfortable and the room was quiet and dark which was good for sleeping. Lots of food choices in the motel and close by. The staff where friendly and helpful. The gym and pool looked good but we where too busy to use them.
it's amazing with swimming pool and gym center. includes delicious food and services

Stayed for 2 nights on a stopover and found the hotel good for the (Singapore) price. There was a very good Hawker centre just around the corner and it was a 5 minute walk to Clark Key and the river and there were several shopping malls close by.
Good Location, clean room , friendly staff, very fast check in and check out
Nice lovely small room . Nice swimming pool , close to town and shopping

Orchard Parade Hotel is a nice old hotel. Large & clean room, good breakfast, friendly staff, close to shopping places and MRT station. It located on the famous orchard road. I enjoyed my stay with family at Orchard Parade Hotel.

Food in the restaurant is not superb, but there are plenty of options to any kind dietry. Bed is confortable and even the hotel being in the middle of the buzzing little India, you can enjoy a very quiet and piecefull night. Orchid club benefit is fantastic and the happy hour offered was really good with a great service.
Good points above counterbalanced by a general tiredness in fittings and facilities in (ex-smoking) room.
We have a upgrade to the club room to our surprise this made our more pleasant.
Stay was good. Service was friendly and pleasant. Processing in was simple and was able to get into the room quickly enough.

Easy to reach the hotel and found this hotel is situated on the best location of Singapore. Good for family traveller cos it's near (just 2 minutes walk) the Forum which has The Toy R Us, And you can find ZARA, HERMES, Garrets pop carn, Mango, mnimart ect.
Nice play to stay, convenient location and staff are friendly and helpful. Good for business travellers
There is nothing you can complain about!! Everybody can enjoy the holidays there.
its great.had fun. love this hotel.... good comfort, nice bathrooms........near to all places...
The experience was GREAT. The staff were friendly and very accommodating, giving tips and advices for all our questions.

My stay at Marina bay sands was okay... The view from the infinity pool was awesome, but I expected some more depth and better features in the pool. It felt like the whole pool was made for child friendliness. Also the pool was crowded as Marina bay sands is famous for it's infinity pool.Rooms and Facilities are okay but not anything special. Other than the 'Location' of the rooftop infinity pool the Marina Bay sands offers nothing exceptional than most other 4 star hotels use to offer.

we made a stop over in our trip from Italy to Australia, the hotel is 30 minutes far from airport. It is in a very central position, ideal for shopping, By the way Singapore is very expensive, but we did enjoy the city and the hotel . Baby sitting service is alsa available
Good for price. Room not too big, but clean. Internet is free. Need a bit walking to MRT.
Location good for me, good price, don't know much other

It locate near city centre and very close to famous shopping centre Orchard Road. We book this becaus we have two kids and we need two queen size bed. The room size are large and clean too. In general, it is a nice place get rest after one full day outdoor activity.
Perfectly good city centre hotel, good location, and fine for a few days, cheap when compared to the very expensive big hotels in Singapore. would stay again.
It was a short stay, only two nights. Check in was quick, was given a room upgrade. Large room, comfortable bed.
Very comfortable, large room and comfortable bed English TV programmes including UK soccer.
Rooms are large and of good quality. Fitness centre is not too bad for a hotel. Pool is fair to good in quality.

The overall stay was satisfactory as the room was comfortable and spacious. Facilities in the room were well maintained except that the iron was spoilt when I wanted to use it. The room's mininbar was not checked properly and we had to inform housekeeping that the minibar was not fully replenished. The hotel staff that helped us to check in did not inform us that a deposit was charged to the credit card and she also did not do the basic stuff like inform us where is the breakfast area and no one told us how to get to our room. There was no smile on her face and it felt like I wasn't welcomed at all. The breakfast at Forest was chaotic. There weren't enough tables and there was no staff at the counter so when we walked in, we were being told to wait outside and the staff was quite rude to us. Overall, the service of the staff at the front counter and the restaurant need to improve as I think this should not be a service standard of a 5-star hotel.
did not meet my request for a big bed; there were still wrapper of condoms found under the bed when bed was placed together.
Quiet, comfortable stay on a really comfortable and large bed. Super good for relaxing when the CBD area is quiet.
Nice and comfort.. near just a few step to casino & any attraction place in sentosa.
Comfort, Close to Universal Studio, Valuable Price, Suggest to go Santosa by booking this resort.

pleasant stay for Family, WIFI was good, Breakfast was simple & nourishing, Our room was newly carpeted & air-condition Worked well, bathroom was clean & shower had sufficient pressure, Hotel was accessible by taxi but Only about 5 kilometer from Orchard shopping area.
Super big room,but not friendly staff and if u walking to far to orchard road,I'm don't back again to this hotel

There are good rooms in central of business district. But the reception staffs were very rude. Even I stay in front of them for check-in. They talk unprofessionally about our booking. The staff who taking care about luggage also quite rude. He taking ticket from my hand and throw the luggage back to us.
Good. I will stay again and recommend this hotel to my friends.
good stay as usual , clean room friendly staff great location.

Check in was routine as I had been to this hotel for 3 times already, however this time round, the towels and bathrobes were not in the room and I had to call the counter and waited about 10 minutes for the items to arrive. Otherwise it was a pleasant stay.

Poor service was not a good start to my trip - every instruction had to be repeated three times, and they were so tight with money they refuse to even print out my account saying it was an Agoda Acount

Rooms were comfortable, though little choice on TV. There was too much noise in the lobby especially at the check-in time. They need to have better and faster system for check-in. Also internet access on Apple was a problem at times.
Very comfotable.I would recommend to my friends and colleagues
The hotel truly deserved 5 stars plus. I am amazing surprised by the service level. I will come back again surely.

General impression is good especially the relaxing atmosphere. No free Wi Fi in rooms and even in public areas is not acceptable. With this drawback, this hotel shouln't be rated 5 stars, 4 stars is more appropriate.
I was on my holiday with group of friends and my stay overall is quite excellent. The room is not so big but still we need to understand that in singapore and the price is quite reasonable.

i feel v happy to stay there with my family and we like this hotel! the hotel staff are v nice and always smiling. they won't charge u on tiny things and they re always trying to serve all your request! the room is big although the private pool is smaller than expected.
Suitable according to room rate, facilities are convenience.
no problem all smooth sailing, very expensive to eat and drink, head down to the mall for food, internet not free anywhere, and very expensive. Clean and tidy, prompt service, easy check in

it was a good stay. room are just nice for a family with two small kids. the hotel is build in a big property with low rise building, not a normal high rise buliding hotel, so making you feel like in a country side but actually you are in the middle of town. with just 10mins walk and you are in the heart of orchan road shopping belt.
This is a small and new hotel. the usage of space is amazing, the rooms are small but work well, you dont really feel its that small.
Very pleasant and easy to get around from this hotel
the stay was overall extremly good and comfortable. But the room service was very poor. they havent cleaned the room properly and refills was not made approperiately.

It was a good stay and bargain since I booked the room at special price plus I redeemed my Agoda points as well. The room is clean and comfortable. The staff are very nice and helpful. I will stay in this hotel again in future especially when the new MRT station in front/opposite the hotel is in operation later.

5 star hotel but without the service of a 5 star. the swimming pool is great on the rooftop but only 1.2 m deep and not allowed for kids. the breakfeast are very expensive for a buffet breafeast (39SGD exclude service and GST), but have to stay there for the unique experience off the biggest highest swimming pool in the world.
Efficient staff and well designed rooms with spectacular views
I liked the hotel for its location. The room provides complimentary mini bar as well as a nespresso machine (with 6 capsules). Room is clean and with a big bed.
I liked the hotel for its location. The room provides complimentary mini bar as well as a nespresso machine (with 6 capsules). Room is clean and with a big bed.
Good. Room was clean, staff was friendly and service was efficient. The twin sized beds were spacious n one even had a pullout bed
We had a good stay in this hotel but we find the room too small. Hopefully the management could consider of enlarging the room abit more to make it more spacious.
Overall, it was a good stay there. the room is well maintain and amenities are complete. location is quite accessible from few mrt station, but still need to walk a distance. It was a nice stay ther

Though the first room we were assigned smelled like cigarrete though it was a non-smoking room, we were promptely changed to another room. Have no complaints. It is my second stay at the M with my girlfriend and will deffinitely return in the future.
Overall is good, it's just the room is quite small compare to other similar grade hotel
Clean room and warm staff. Excellent hotel for biz trip. late checkout was given to me due to late leave to airport
Very good, except breakfast during full occupancy was a nightmare ! Staff struggled with service and many had to wait 45 mins, me one of them !!!
It was great, our room was upgraded to club room which is more spacious for our family
Booked the hotel for my guests from MAS. They loved the hotel and looked forward to staying in it again. They were really impressed with the staff. Kudos!
Good location and near MRT. Good service and clean room
It was one of the good option ig you decided to stay around orchard area, mrt station is just nearby.
Good stay big room, stay was spoilt only during my visit to the biz lounge. they wanna to charge extra for my guest

Overall an alright experience. Only changes I would highly recommend especially for any customers who wishes to book in RELC International Hotel is that picture used for Executive Twin and Executive Queen differs and not the same as was under the impression that Executive Twin is a queen side bed.

Overall an alright experience. Only changes I would highly recommend especially for any customers who wishes to book in RELC International Hotel is that picture used for Executive Twin and Executive Queen differs and not the same as was under the impression that Executive Twin is a queen side bed.
I have stopped at this hotel a few times before and it does not disappoint me. Will stay again.

The staff were friendly, kept smiling, the check-in process was fast. The room was clean as well. The location was good, within walking distance of Bugis and also there were restaurants nearby. Nightlife was visible too.
nice stay! Recommended for Couples or bussiness travellers. Its very near dhoby ghaut mrt and plaza singapura.
Went there with my girlfriend for New Years Eve. Had a great time, would do it again.
Had a nice stay at Ibis Bencoolen. Near to workplace, convenient and clean
Great location. Everything is within walking distance, Price reasonable
Every thing is good. Room is clean and spacious. Very convenience to locate the hotel. Accessible to mrt station within 5 minutes walk. Shopping mall along the street.
overall stay is good only the price is always increasing especially during holiday or some event exhibition
Good stay, but staff at reception a bit cold and calculating. Need to be more friendly and warmer.
Good stay in this hotel and it had all the ammenties necessary for us to stay for a week plus.
We did well,,, the king bed and updated shower made it a good room,,, the Buffet Breakfast needs an upgrade from Canned Fruits and soggy bacon,,
Good stay. Check in and check out could be improved. I had to wait for some time as there was limited persons at the front desk. Rooms werre comfortable and clean. Wifi was good.

It was a 2 day staycation, the hotel is actually very old and although they refurbished it not too long ago but it still feels outdated. Entrance is very narrowed due to renovation and further cramped by people queueing for taxis, no slope therefore we had to carry our toddler in the pram up and down several steps especially worse because it was raining everyday in December. Hotel entrance gave us a very bad vibe about the place. On check in, was told that they will upgrade us to premier and asked us to wait, therefore we went shopping until 6pm and was told later that room was not available. it was really disappointing, then , was told that on 2nd day they will upgrade us so we looked forward to it again but no news again,suddenly 9pm on the 2nd night midway eating our dinner a butler came to the door and asked us to move now and we packed hastily and the disappointment for the 2 days was lifted. Was initially in the deluxe room but it was really very gloomy and tiny. The so called free drinks and snacks in the fridge was just some cheap soft drinks and 2 packets of quaker cookies with fridge that is not cold. they have Nespresso in the room which is quite a nice touch. The bathroom was so small that 2 pple can't brush teeth at the same time. there is practically no view at all because the windows are facing some carparks or walls. TV was small and limited channels despite being cable channels, no cartoon network nor child friendly programmes on. Requests to have a cotbed in the room only happened after 5 phone calls and 2 hours later after check in. However, The location is excellent in the middle of the shopping central of Singapore and near the subways, lots of good food around and transport is not a problem. the premier room is much better with a lovely bathtub and room is not so gloomy, therefore is worth investing in if you want to stay at this hotel.

it was a great stay especially for the Couples. it is quiet and able to let the Couples a focus and relax getaway from the daily work. its room is also spacious enough for moving and placing of items. the most important is the buffet where it had a wide variety of food all over the place. the staffs are friendly and easily approachable.
Pleasant stay. Need to improve on the lift/elevator. Not very intelligent programming on the elevator systems.
we're happy about the service given to us by the hotel management…
Not to bad to stay that if you like quiet place and it far from shopping mall dont try this hotel because price are the cheaper in orchard area.
one of the best hotel.it's like a 5 stars hotel though the hotel is only 3 stars,i will be back here again for sure.thank you agoda.it really help the review or comments to find a better place.
I would recommend this hotel for people wanting good value accommodation in an interesting area with good transport options. Also excellent shopping on Arab Street and Hanji Lane.
Restfull and handy to my needs. Close to shopping.
It was an enjoyable stay because of its easily accessible location and service. Very helpful and friendly staff.

Just one night stay ,was good location close to Little India MRT,and nice restaurants/bars in Albert Court /City.Room not so large for 4 Star hotel but clean and tidy with comfortable bed.Pool is nice too.
The hotel is close to shopping and cultural places for visit. The room is quiet and comfortable.
No complaints - a good value compact sized room with adequate space for a short stay
basically good but the location is not ideal. the hotel is more suitable if you are into casino or with children to visit Universal Theme Park. Its not a good hotel for business traveler.

good value for money, fast check-in and check-out. Got upgraded to deluxe though I do not know which part of the room was "deluxe". Nice though little swimming pool outdoor on 3rd or 4th floor with panoramic view. Right on top of Lavender MRT, very convenient. Walk one or 2 blocks and you find more hawker centers. Will probably stay again next time (good value for money) because I do not mind the small room.
Quite Happy
We chose Goodwood Park Hotel for its central location and good restaurants. The staff were attentive and service was great. We would definitely recommend it to others!
Clean hotel and fast WIFI service. Near to MRT station and local food restaurant
It was very good for me. There is a shopping center right across from the hotel. There are plenty of local restaurants to just walk in. It is fairly close to the airport so that's good as well.

For someone visiting Singapore especially with young children, it's a must stay hotel! Park Royal is not only surrounded by Indian restaurants, but also a 24 hour shopping centre called Mustafa. City Centre Mall is bang opposite the hotel for ones who prefer branded stuff! Everything under the sun is available in both the malls.
Room is slightly small but overall experience was cosy and enjoyable.
Overall it was good value for money, good location, but room could use renovation.
The hotel is located in the Orchard shopping area and is within walking distance of all the major malls, restaurants and cinemas in the area.
The hotel is located in the Orchard shopping area and is within walking distance of all the major malls, restaurants and cinemas in the area.

I enjoy my shopping as the hotel were surrounded with shopping mall. All the staffs are very friendly and helpful. It is easy to enjoy local delicacies as a lots of restaurants nearby and the taxi services are easy by request.
This hotel was very good value (for Singapore!) when booked at a special rate.

Comfortable, quiet surroundings, bathrooms are a little small but adequate. Booked a non-smoking room with large bed got a room with two single beds instead. Staff seemed helpful and willing to assist, friendly, over-all enjoyed my stay, would consider staying again.
Satisfactory and comfortable. Close to Eatery. A place to stay if you really want to know the life and culture of Singapore.
The room was nice and clean, good view to the pool, but the bathroom is too small
Overall a good experience. The gym was one of the best I have seen in a hotel. The hotel is new and close to local food outlets. Price is reasonable.
Overall a good experience. The gym was one of the best I have seen in a hotel. The hotel is new and close to local food outlets. Price is reasonable.
Overall a good experience. The gym was one of the best I have seen in a hotel. The hotel is new and close to local food outlets. Price is reasonable.
Very impress in location of this hotel, in the middle of city, near by MRT and shopping centre. Lots of food available around the hotel.
Overall a good experience. The gym was one of the best I have seen in a hotel. The hotel is new and close to local food outlets. Price is reasonable.
The Orchard Parade Hotel continue to offer some of the best value accommodation along Orchard Road. Close to all amenities but away from some of the noisier sections of this shopping strip.

Hotel consists of the old 4 star building and the new 5 star building, they market the 4 star rooms at a fairly good price compared to other 5 star hotels in highly overprice Singapore hotel scene. Those rooms are reasonably good size, with bath tub and separate shower. The gym is with modern equipment in the 5 star part of the building, reasonable size pool. Breakfast so la la….

We stayed at Hard Rock Hotel for 2 Nights. The package deal we got included 2 days passes to Universal Studios Singapore, 2 passes to Adveturecove Waterpark, 2 passes to Sea Aquarium and breakfast for 2 people. It was totally worth it and real value for money. Went there with my family (2 adults and 2 kids) and it was a great place for family with young kids. Only not comfort toilet without tap and main door for the bathroom (changing place no door).
Found this hotel stay to be very pleasant. The location is centrally located in Singapore's shopping district and has a lot of restaurants to nearby.
Value for money as able to get good deal via agoda.com. Centrally located and easy accessibility as public transport is near the hotel

This is a wonderful hotel I ever stayed in Singapore, it is value money and strategic location, staff very helpful and service very good, I can go to somewhere with the MRT and taxi station where easy to contact, I will choose the same hotel for the next consideration.
WiFi no good major water leak in piping in bathroom

With my mother and my 5 years old daughter, we experienced a nice hotel. with clean room and helpful staff. we didn't have major trouble during check-in nor check-out. Good quality breakfast with wide variety of food. fast response for room service. Nothing to complain. Recommended for family with children or business traveler

With my mother and my 5 years old daughter, we experienced a nice hotel. with clean room and helpful staff. we didn't have major trouble during check-in nor check-out. Good quality breakfast with wide variety of food. fast response for room service. Nothing to complain. Recommended for family with children or business traveler
Great! Enjoyed out stay. Children loved it as well. Good communication, good location, great breakfast

My stay was very pleasant. The front desk and bell counter staff were very accommodating. The Heritage walk is great to knowing about Singaporean culture more and having a gift at the end is a great idea.
I enjoy staying at Equarius Hotel as it was very comfortable and the room is spacious.
This hotel never fails to impress. The service is outstanding and they have over the years maintained the luxurious colonial feel.
It's was ok, we were upgraded to to a bigger room. Both my husband and I had a good time. We are vegetarians so we had a hard time finding food there.
excellent. good location and the place is clean. I would recommend this for short stayer in singapore.

Have stayed at this hotel on many occasions for business purposes during the last 7 years. On this occasion ( 4 nights) there was a noticeable decline in the management of the Club lounge. None of the staff in the cocktail lounge were aware of the recipe for a gin and tonic - i.e. lemon was never available and a staff member had to search for it each night. On the last night there was neither gin or lemon and it was suggested to me I might like a vodka instead!! I suggested someone go next door to the 7/11 and buy a bottle.
