Needless to say whilst waiting for the general manager's explanation a bottle of gin was found (with lemon) after about 40 minutes. This was about the standard of a 2 star hotel, not a 4 star such as the M hotel. I must emphasise this was in no way the fault of the waitresses in the club lounge - they were very helpful and concerned . This was entirely the fault of management.
room very small, large window , poor views, modern applances

Very good. Room was clean. The pricing of the room per night per stay is very affordable and reasonable. The hotel is centrally located and many amenities around it. Popular nightspots are also just minutes away from it. The size of the room was also acceptable for its price. Definitely will return to stay again.

Very good. Room was clean. The pricing of the room per night per stay is very affordable and reasonable. The hotel is centrally located and many amenities around it. Popular nightspots are also just minutes away from it. The size of the room was also acceptable for its price. Definitely will return to stay again.
Overall nice and clean.can asset to mrt station by basement 3 and shopping central.near to taking a mrt to ion or Takashimaya where that you can go around in orchard.

Good. Quite sceptical initially after reading all the negative reviews about the hotel's slow service especially the check-in n check-out. However, my check-in was average, not fast not too slow. But can see that the check-in and check-out is an area for improvement of this hotel, just hang around the lobby and observe for a while you will know why I said that. Kind of dis-organized . Other than that , the rest was quite okay, my stay was a shirt one though.
the room is large enough, however need update some furniture. No free wifi. Location near MRT, shopping mall such as rafless city, marina square and suntech city.
near orchard road just walk about 10 minutes, wi-fi access smooth.

The Goodwood Park Hotel has always been the favourite hotel for my family whenever they came here for a visit. Large rooms and highly accessible, the hotel boasts modern facilities without losing its colonial influence that characterizes the hotel. This time round, we booked the Junior Suite. The 50sqft room featured a living room and a bedroom that was segregated with a sliding door. Picture how the Dutch would design the interior of the living room - a set of sofa with lamp-tables on the side, round marble table accompanied with Victorian-like chairs, a huge cabinet and an ancient-looking fan perched on the ceiling. But the room was nothing short of modernity - flat-screen TV sat in the cabinet with Nespresso Coffee Machine and fridges resided below it. Mirrors and artistic lamps are also used to enhance the feel of modernism of the room. The bedroom was large; the bed was comfortable; and there were two cupboards - one for the gent and one for the lady. The bathroom, however, was tiny as compared to the impressive living-room and bedroom. Since the room was probably designed decades ago, the bathroom only housed a bathtub, making showering a messy business with water dripping out of the tub. We were also greeted with a grinding noise from the bathroom ceiling every morning that lasted for a few minutes. Despite these short-comings, we were still satisfied with the hotel. Service staff was attentive and friendly. Bus stop that brings you to the major malls across the Orchard shopping belt was 7 minutes away. Orchard MRT that brings you to many other exciting places in Singapore was 10 minutes away. And the food was yummylicious as always, although they were pretty pricey. The breakfast spread, however, was disappointing - I wish to see more varieties in their hot-item offerings. The quality of food, nevertheless, was top-notch. Overall, we were once again pleased with the hotel and looking forward to our next stay.

It was a pleasant stay in Goodwood Park Hotel. However, my expectation for a 5 star hotel would be much higher. The elevator to rooms can only fit. The room was big and equipped with all necessity but they do not offer anything additional such as mobile phone docks etc. Our room window was blocked hence there are no view available and the faulty sliding wooden panel is really heavy for some to seal the light from coming in.

goodd stay, but something weird happen, when i want to change the room into the room that don't have connecting room, i call to front desk staff and one of the staff was told me that inhotel only on the 4th floor that don't have the connecting room, so he insisting to move us to the 4th floor, cannot to other floor because he said only 4th floor that don't have connecting room,how come it possible the very big hotel only in the 4th floor that don't have connecting door? i was disappointed of that answer, because it made me like a dumb! have to! must to!move only to 4th floor! we don't have other choice. could it possible only the 4th floor that don't have connecting room? i meant dont lie even if i was very talkative, but still have to fullfill my request. because i have already pay expensive hotel room,so it deserved for me to have the satisfaction in staying there. i hope the staff more helpfull to the guest. thanks

The hotel and it's grounds are gorgeous. The room is comfortable and luxurious. The minibar was complimentary but only stocked water, juice and some coke- could do better! Staff weren't particularly helpful and there's really only one restaurant to eat at with a very limited menu. The location and rooms sell itself, but the soft aspects could use much work.

Stayed for one night in their one-bedroom garden villa, beautiful suite with complimentary drinks in the fridge and an umbrella which came in useful when it started raining in the evening. Room complete with small private pool, and large bathroom and outdoor bathtub; perfect for honeymoon getaways, however going out of the hotel is rather inconvenient as in order to get out of the hotel you have to walk all the way to the car park in order to drive out for dinner/etc. Not very convenient for those planning on travelling in and out during their stay.

I thought the Capella lived up to its 5-stars and was really really lovely. The seaview room was gorgeous - I've stayed in lots of flash hotels but I thought this was really special. The service was impeccable in every area of the hotel; subtle and helpful every time.

Stayed for three nights while breaking a long haul journey. Perfect spot to rest - comfy beds and pillows, lovely high tea, great room service - and a good base to explore Singapore - walking distance to Orchard Road, buses, MRT, even the botanical gardens.

Overall good. One morning the room people forgot to leave any towels and it took a while to sort out. The wedding on the Saturday night was a bit noisy and other people could not use the pool. Otherwise no real issues.
I am very satisfy with RELC, I was stayed with my big family and we all enjoy stay there
I am a regular at Goodwood Park so it was a bit disappointing they couldnt upgrade me to a better room when I asked for it but I got what I paid for.
I enjoy every time I stay, for medical or business, every stay was worth spending, mount Elizabeth is so near, even orchard is so close.

It's always been a nice stay in concorde hotel. Concorde will always be my first preference place to stay in singapore. I had nice breakfast in the morning and the location is so close to the shopping center, mrt station, and bus stop.
Very very convenience to move around. Opposite is City Hall, on the hotel right is Orchard Road and on the hotel left if Raffles Hotel.
Would come and stay here again... but a bit pricey
Great! very comfortable and centrally location among all the shopping and dining district.

Positive: Very family friendly Hotel. The Staff was so accommodating they even gave us a baby crib for our daughter when we request for one while booking. Water in the room is drinkable/potable. free Hand-Drip Coffee for two per day. complete with iron, hair dryer, water heater, huge Flat Tv. Spacious dressers,.The Room was large, the Bathroom was large and very clean. Room Service was fast. Taxi was very accessible and the hotel concierge can arrange for your taxi transfer very conveniently (the guy who takes care of the taxi boarding was superb and very helpful). It was the hub of many shopping stalls and it is also connected to the mandarin gallery which is another shopping destination. very close to food courts where a wide array of food selection can be made. Hotel arranged bus ride to sentosa, universal studios which only took around 30 minutes to reach destination. Check-in Staff gave us a room near elevator for easy access as we had children with us. Toiletries where given on a daily basis and request for extra was well accommodated. the air-conditioning was great. lights and electric being controlled by a central remote near the bedside. great side sofa for lounging. it was very nice to know that there is a swimming pool at the 5th level.

Check-in took about 20 mins. Initially there was 2 staffs attending to me at the counter but halfway through she was telling her colleague to attend to something else instead.. n make me wait and hear their conversation. Lobby was crowded with guests of families n children hence makes it noisy. Room was nothing to shout about - 3 bulbs in the room doesn't work n that makes the room not well-lit. Staff was great though being very helpful. Still, won't be making a trip there again.
he hotel is beautiful and clean. The room was really spacious with a large comfortable bed, sofa and a huge bathroom. The stay was great, left me with a lot of nice and beautiful memories.
great & fantastic! great room & close to my company at International Plaza
near orchard road just walk about 10 minutes, wi-fi access smooth.
It was a pleasant stay cation. Will come back again.
The check in was ok. Less than 10 minutes wait. THE ROOM was quite clean and still looked quite new despite it coming to almost 4 years of age.

Went with my 14 y.o. daughter and 82 y.o. Mom for a business and leisure trip. The hotel was perfect as i could take the MRT straight from airport to City Hall station and come up to the hotel. Great shopping and dining within close proximity of hotel.
And excellent stay for family. Easily accessible from the airport, and free transport was provided to local attractions.

Great and satisfying. Good location for shopping centres and great restaurant close by. Orchard road always one of the main attractions of singapore. It always managed tp have a new things from time to time and mandarin orchard is a good place to see and feel the ambiance. The staff is bery healp ful, polite and attentive.

I stayed for a 3 nights at Peninsula Excelsior during a conference in Singapore. The hotel is a little far from the major shopping area such as Orchard but was much closer to the Marina Bay area where my conference was held. Overall, the hotel is very nice, clean and comfortable. The staffs are very friendly and attentive. Breakfast buffet was nice but standard. The internet connection is decent.

Our second stay in this hotel and in both occasions my husband and I had the club rooms. Club guests can use the club room anytime, coffe is always available. At 6pm to 8pm drinks (alcoholic and non-alcoholic) are served and you could help yourself to a variety of snacks while chatting with other club guests or just looking at the view. Good wifi connection in the room. The room is equipped with safe for your valuables,iron and ironing board. Dressing gowns, slippers are also provided. Bottles of drinking water are supplied daily. Bugis junction is just a few minutes walk to MRT, shops and food shops/restaurants. Great stay, will recommend.

The check in and check out process was smooth and swift. Staff were friendly. Room was really clean. The underground walkway from mrt to the hotel is really convenient and its clean. A really recommended hotel to stay in sg
Very relax and nice, having staff that is attentive is the best experience we can hope for
It was a great stay for Couples or family during weekends as the room is spacious enough and it was very cosy. Surrounding CBD that is close on weekend makes it a quiet place for relaxation.

Great, room was large and bathroom huge. Pity the view wasnt the best. The bed was soft and comfy, room service was prompt when asked to change the kettle. Location was excellent right in the middle of Orchard Road. Only drawback is some sleezy bars in the lower ground floor. Definitely will return. But not with kids.
Overall will be great but would recommend that the room to be more light source as it is too dim.

fast internet wifi, good location, easy access. But the staff did not keep his promise. I supposed to have one more extra bed but until the next morning they dont even bother to ask or at least say a sorry. Bad attitude.
My third time staying at Capella, still one of the best hotel in Singapore.
Superb, nice location to get access to shops and food. Clean environment and great staffs

Great and pleasant. Staffs are attentive and friendly. Room is of good size, clean and comfortable. Hotel is centrally located with good food and shopping. Only downside is check out time is at 11am. Would be good if latest checkout time is around 1pm or 2pm.
Great and relaxing staycation. Away from the buzz of the shopping area but yet short distance and accessible to shopping mall in less than 15min either by bus, train or cab.
My stay was quite welcoming, the environment was excellence. Would probably will stay there again if the price is right and affordable.
This is the second time we decided to stay. nice location close to two MRT stations. makes everything worth while. The rooms are comfortable and is good value for money.

We always stay in this hotel because is in quite and central area, room very spacious. Reception is very nice. Just if I ask them to help with the luggage, the bell boy is really grumpy and not happy. Specially my last visit there. Only 1 bell boy very nice and freindly, the other is so scary and grumpy. Till I regret asking help to them. And some many the manager also look scary and not friendly. Bad grumpy face all the time, never say grettings ...
AC need to fix because really loud the noise. Great space and always clean. Some staff is very grumpy and never smile. Location is perfect. Need to improve in the staff performance and AC.
They really need to change or fix the AC, the noise is like truck engine. And need a new friendly bell boy and teach other staff that is there to smile and be more friendly with the guest.
it's a nice hotel, close to shopping centre and food court. and the hotel surrounding by trees...large room, comfortable bed, close to attractive location
Big room with 2 big bed very generoius space, clean, fast internet.
Great hotel however location is not as convenient as other resort world hotels especially for elderly.
Overall great experience although very poor staff at the reception upon check in. Great pool experience with poor service …
Everything was great except for the wifi. They make you to pay for it based on 24 hr use, but the connection was painfully slow or didn't work at all!!
Very good. That is all
Great A/C in room was a bit cold Easy access to everything
We had a great time there no real complaints from us we will visit again

I stayed there for business trip. Very convenient location as it is centrally located and i have access to taxi easily. Shopping malls nearby and restaurants easily accessible. Room was clean and reception service was efficient
Royal plaza has never let me down all this years.. Staff is always reliable and friendly
Royal plaza has never let me down all this years.. Staff is always reliable and friendly
great stay at Royal Plaza on Scotts Hotel with great location to many shopping locations.
Excellent.
ok good, friendly staffs, nice hotel. Feel good to stay in this hotel. Thank you.
I  got myself a very good bargain for a club room, and it didn't fail me at all. Great lounge, great drinks, great staffs and great perks. Definitely will stay again.
everything was perfect, except for the rude security guard's accusation, again.
Refreshing. had a long tough week so headed there for a refreshing break
Its new, contemporary and clean.connected to a mall with lots of food options. Behind it theres is a nice park

Pleasant, centrally located with all public transport. SHopping and food is between walking distance, very convenient. all international brand could be found here. Acception, please bring mosquito repanlant. Dengue fever is on the peak in Orchard Road during this time of the year.
Friendly staff and always willing to give a helping hand. Family hotel feeling.
Feeling of home. Staff offer good choices for consideration and provided updated information about Singapore.
The hotel is clean. The location of the hotel is very closed to shopping area and food stalls. Ibis hotel provides free transport to Universal Studio Singapore.

It was my boyfriend's 30th birthday on the weekend that we stayed. I had written an email to the hotel requesting a cake to be brought in on the morning of his birthday. When we checked in the front desk staff had told us they have given us a free upgrade to the premier suite as we originally had a 2 night reservation for the deluxe suite. I was so surprised and it felt like winning the lottery. The room was amazing and they did bring the cake to us, with a signed card from the staff, and a candle. Concorde really topped off our 2 weeks holiday in asia. Thank you for the thought Concorde! The location was great as it was right on the bottom of Orchard Road, we pretty much walked from one end to the other. I can't comment on the deluxe room as we had the premier suite for the two nights, however, the lobby looked very clean and there were a Couples of restaurants on premise that looked nice as well. All in all, I highly recommend the Concorde hotel, for the service, location and cleanliness.

The staff was very helpful and friendly. The hotel offers a shuttle bus to the closest MRT station,but it is best to call ahead to reserve seats. Taking the bus + MRT is the best way our family traveled around the country. The room was not super spacious, but just the right size for our needs, and the design was very sleek and modern. The room was always clean, with a comfortable bed. The bathroom was nicely sized and the toiletries were well stocked. Overall we all enjoyed our stay. Having the Zhongshan mall connecting to the hotel was nice, and we enjoyed the pool and 24/7 gym that the hotel had to offer.

We were in singapore for a short 2 nights stay, this is our second stay at Oasia, and we still are very pleased just as with our first stay back then. The design of the hotel is very nice, it also has great access to MRT by just using the hotel elevator. It's 2 stops to orchard road if you're in Singapore for shopping, and also a few stops to Marina Bay Sands without having to transfer. As you enter the lobby it has a very nice smell, the rooms are also very neat and nicely designed. The rooms are not large but just enough. This hotel is located between 3 big hospitals, so if you're in Singapore for medical reasons this is also a good hotel to stay in.
Great location, located above MRT and beside shopping malls. Nice swimming pool. Comfortable room, well equipped with amenities.

We have great time to rest after one day hospitalize at Raffles Hospital, our room was clean and comfortable, easy and fast excess internet where we need It the most when we are away from home and business. This was our second stay at Village, and definitly will return again for our next visit.
As usual staying in MBS is very great fun and amazing experience. But little bit Couples trouble with the key can not access to my room several times, make make up and down for 5 times.

We had a great time staying at this hotel even though they are doing some renovation. It does not disturb our stay at all. At first I was afraid the noise would disturb our peaceful slumber there but thank god I asked for higher floor and it was very peaceful. I guess this is because the renovation was at the lower level of the hotel. The food are still good and tasty. The room service doesn't take very long. The staff are very helpful, attentive and friendly. We are sure to come back here next time.

We had a great time staying at this hotel even though they are doing some renovation. It does not disturb our stay at all. At first I was afraid the noise would disturb our peaceful slumber there but thank god I asked for higher floor and it was very peaceful. I guess this is because the renovation was at the lower level of the hotel. The food are still good and tasty. The room service doesn't take very long. The staff are very helpful, attentive and friendly. We are sure to come back here next time.
It was good! Even though the receptionist made a mistake by assigning us to a double bed room, she was very friendly and rectify the problem immediately . All is good.
room was abit small and the tv was not place directly in front of the bed like any other hotels. It was place on the right side. Breakfast is simple & nice.
Process of checking in is very smooth. Hotel gave me a cake because it was my birthday. Kudos to them!

The hotel built with sky up ship shape swimming pool was indeed a must experience at least once in a life time. Having a tea break at sky park over seeing the Batam Island was again an "a stone kills two birds" kind of experience.

Clean room with good size. The room ceiling also reasonable height. The hotel service is good with friendly staff and very helpful in all types of enquiries. The restaurant offer very interestingly delicious food with nice ambience. Hotel location is good and strategically located, easily access to the shopping mall and City Center. This hotel is suitable for business and holiday purposes
It has been a wonderful experience. The hotel was nearby the shopping areas and transportation was within reach. very great when comes to wanting to have different cultures of the food.
Great experience! Good location, friendly staffs, rainshower bathroom.

Rooms were large and very well appointed..we did book 2 rooms for 4 people, and upon arrival asked if the sofa bed could be made up, this was not attended to at the time and we did have to ring and ask..consequently there was only 1 key to the room, 1 bottle of water and no pillows for the sofa..apart from that it was a marvelous stay..best buffet at RISE, we have ever had...simply spectacular...I sent photos of the chocolate fountain to all my friends...we loved the pool and took heaps of photos of us near the edge, just like everyone else..a truely enjoyable and memorable stay at this fabulous hotel.

The staff were friendly and tried to help us in every way. The greatest feature is of course the swimming pool. It's a great fun for all families. The location is also great as it is near the RWS which has a lot of entertainment and food places. Will go back. The staff were friendly and tried to help us in every way. The greatest feature is of course the swimming pool. It's a great fun for all families. The location is also great as it is near the RWS which has a lot of entertainment and food places. Will go back.

Overall, it's a good hotel with a good baggage safe keeping facility. Swimming pool need to be upgraded due no circulating water thus make the water dirty and smelly. Fast check in and check out during peak hours is a good point to note at this hotel.

Staying 3 days in Parc Sovereign is a great experience for our family vacation. the hotel is near Little India MRT or Bugis MRT (same line with cahngi airport MRT -- it's in green line!) swimming pool is quiet large and clean
Great. There is no complaint on the hotel, services etc. However, if the price can be slightly lower and more affordable. That will attract even more customers.

This is our third time at this hotel and we are always happy with the service and standard. If you are able to, it's worth upgrading to the Royal Club Premiere. Not only is breakfast inclusive, you also get complimentary tea-time and cocktail (which is good/filling enough to replace dinner). We return to this hotel each time because of it's fully Halal Restaurant - which means we can eat in peace and not worry about consuming the wrong food. Additionally the staff are wonderful - when we wanted to extend our stay, they helped, when our safe was accidentally locked, they responded in less than 5 minutes.
Overall it was a good hotel. Very close to Universal Studios. Hotel room was clean and nice staff.
good but staff or hotel system needs to improve. in the middle of shopping area, food nearby and easy excess to transport
Room is spacious and comfy, gym is really well equipped, close to malls

As this is my 2nd time here, I am very happy with this hotel. That's why I am back, Being in Little India, it is close to all the other suburbs that I am interest in, from Orchard road through to Marina Bay, China Town, Bugis, Harbour Front etc.
Had a great time resting in the hotel. Had fun with all the attractions that come with the package. Hotel room is big and quiet, allow us to have a good time in the room itself.
Awesome!It was a great stay in a centrally located hotel.
The room was spacious but don't like the toilet as the door cannot be locked.

Long waiting time before I could check-in and room wasn't ready when I wanted to check-in. Although friendly staff offered to upgrade my room to deluxe with pool view, I have to wait for another hour before I could check in. It has been a wonderful stay at hard rock hotel!
comfortable, silent and relax. The hotel also have many facilities and near with the restaurant also shopping mall
Good location, big room, v centralise. Near to party location. Near to anywhere
Awesome stay in town probably the best u can find with such great comfort
Very wonderful and comfortable to stay, near MRT station and have the breakfast. Wifi is very fast.
The hotel was great. Very large rooms compared to its competitors and also still located close to Orchard Road. So easy public transport access and to food and shopping.
good and enjoyable. Value for money. Good location to major tourist attractions. Very easy assessed to MRT which is a plus traveling in Singapore.

Had a wonderful, albeit short stay at Hotel Equarius. Luxurious, high ceiling room with a large bathroom. Only thing that seemed to be missing are some wall hooks in the bathroom! Otherwise, a comfortable stay. Did not get to visit the gym which was closed during our stay.
It was good. Friendly staffs. I got free upgraded, good lounge. Breakfast was ok but not much for Muslims. Business centre was very useful. Great location for my purpose.

Our stay at Marina Bay Sands was very good... Fast Check in and check out with a friendly staff. Shopping mall under the mall and there are variety of restaurant also food court in the shoppes ( Mall ).
It was a good stay, centraly located in orchard road which we can sightseing, shopping, eating and many more. Good hotel with swimming pool, so cozy with internet free.
Excellent and the hotel was providing the request of providing a room that was equipped for the handicap which was very nice for my mother. The restaurant we took our buffer dinner was very nice.
It was a great stay and the room is big, clean and upgraded. A pleasant trip and happy to recommend my friends.
Generally a good hotel. We found it an all round pleasent hotel to stay at. Would stay again!
I love this hotel because of its location. Centrally located and internet access for free. The staffs are friendly and very accommodating. The food is also good.

this hotel is a buzz-worthy property. it is one of the tourist attraction of this country. staying in this hotel you do not have to go too far, the accessibility and the amenities that it offers is plenty.
had a great stay in this hotel... Comfort, great view, friendly staff. The eternity pool is amazing,It's centrally located.

My stay was a good experience. Hard Rock is a well known hotel as of course i have a high expectation throughout the trip. The staffs are friendly and nice. once i get into my room, i was greeted by a beautiful interior..with purple walls and entertainers pictures. not to forget the open-concept bathroom. But there are no bath tub..Amazing pools and my kids aged 11 months and 2 years old really enjoy playing the water game. However the breakfast is a disappointment. Not much choice.My kids also dont like the pancakes..its not fluffy as it should be.Hard Rock need to improve in the breakfast menu..Overall my stay in Hard Rock Spore is good and i would recommend it to my friends.

It was a family vacation and the room was comfortable and value for money for the price we paid. Walking distance to MRT and Raffles city. Ample parking space and parking was complimentary. The hotel staff was friendly and efficient. I would recommend this hotel if you are travelling with young children.
our stay were great. nice room and location. the hotel also close to shopping area (orchard road).
pleasant.. the hotel is at good location with much to offer within and surrounding the hotel, from fine dining to local eateries.. good shopping location too..

luv it.. perfect location, plenty of dining choices within and surrounding the hotel.. shopping available nearby.. near tanjong pagar mrt.. and direct bus from right in front of the hotel to many places such as maxwell market and vivocity/sentosa

In short, our 24 hours stay was great but unfortunately the food did not meet our expectations - whether the cantonese restaurant or the breakfast... My main criteria for such hotel is the juice at the breakfast: it has to be freshly skeezed, which was not the case... Both dinner and breakfast were OK but OK is not sufficient for a five-star hotel... So don't go to the Capella with "gastronomy" expectations.
very satisfied but to reach the room,it's have to go through the restaurant which are sometimes very noisy
A very comfortable hotel, clean and conveniently situated. It is close to shopping belts, sightseeing and practically close to anywhere.

We stayed there for only a night, and was upgraded for free to the presidential suite. We were very happy although we have to wait another 30 minutes. The hotel was very busy, but the staff were all helpful.
Clean and comfortable hotel with good beddings. It is close to shopping belts, sightseeing and practically anywhere. Taxis is just outside waiting for you.
Great location. Located at the heart of Singapore, there are alot of shopping centres and entertainments areas surrounding it. Very comfortable rooms and very nice and friendly staffs.

The hotel was great, friendly and efficient front desk persons and staff. Room was huge, which is great for the kids which quickly felt at home and almost didn't want to leave the hotel the first day. Tub and Shower are separate which is nice. I always forget that Singapore uses those 3pronged sockets which is not the same as other countries, but the hotel will lend you adapters if necessary. Huge Flatscreen TV.
We enjoyed our stay with this hotel. We really appreciate the complimentary room upgrade. The room was so amazing. Thank you.
Great hotel, the greatest thing is its proximity to famous medical facilities & shopping district and yet, quiet. The downside is a little bit pricy.

The hotel is near to historic Masjid Sultan at Arab Street. Muslim food easily can be found there especially the famous murtabak at a Couples of indian muslim restaurant there. Strategic location for muslim traveler to shop and dine at the surrounding area. The hotel also close to Bugis bus and taxi station (all bus and taxi going to JB). Bugis MRT station also about walking distance to the hotel. In general, I would give a thumbs up for the hotel.

We arrived very late (2300) and the staff on duty soon had us checked in and off to bed. The breakfast was superb with a great variety of choice. Busses left outside the door to various parts of the city. The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom/shower were very good. The hotel was quiet. They gave us an extended checkout to 1400, took care of our bags and gave us access to their toilet/changing facilities while we waited for our 2315 flight.

I am very happy and enjoyed when stay at this Hotel with my family during 5 nights, Hotel facilities are very good, room clean, king size bed (I like this very much). Hotel staff are very friendly and professional. I will recommend my friend to stay in this hotel.

we checked into the hotel early and was given a room that was available. from the check in to the check out I did not have any problems and did not have to go to the front desk until check out. I was given a key and internet access code and they worked for the whole week . I stay at hotels over 200 day a year and always have something not work or some small problems.
the room was nice and comfy. the bathroom was big and clean. the stffs were friendy. this hotel next to shopping area and food district.

I really enjoyed my stay at the Goodwood Park Hotel recently. I found a great rate on AGODA and stayed there for 3 nights over the weekend. The hotel is well located just off the Orchard Road shopping district and is close enought to be super convenient but far enough to be quiet. The hotel is set back off the main Scotts Road so its quiet. The pool area and lobby is well designed, modern but also classic. The rooms are large and roomy.

I was there for only 1 night but very happy with the room and the staff. Location is fantastic...Orchard Road....walking distance to everything...MRT is also a short walk and lots of cafes and restaurants around....No problems at all
The stay was great at this lovely hotel. We got a complimentary upgrade that was more than welcome. Right opposite two excellent bars at the Hyatt. Walking distance to the MRT station at ION orchard.
Great hotel in the orchard road. Next to Takashimaya - a good shopping center and easily access to restaurant.
it was a great stay. since they have nice swimming pool up there. and it is near the casino and shopping centre

We’ve decided to book a hotel last minute for our graduation staycation and York hotel turn out to be a pleasant surprise for us. We looked around and found that York had a family/premier room for four and we decided to go with it since there were 5 of us. The beds were combined single beds so it was actually more than adequate with the super spacious rooms. In addition to these, it had a perfect location within just walking distance to orchard, the bus stop and train station. This was totally worth it for the amount that we had to pay. The rooms were clean and spotless. They provided us with conditioning shampoo, shower foam and towels etc which were clean. The shower was good with sufficient space and all. We asked for a bottle opener and the staff came promptly to us. In summary, there’s nothing to complain but I will also expect all hotels in Singapore to have the same standard.

I arrived very early, but my early check-in was not available due to non-availability of the room (full occupancy the night before). But the hotel made an effort and so i could check in by 9AM instead of 2PM. The room was great with comfortable beds. Clean bathroom and all amenities i needed as a business traveller. The breakfast was great too.

It was great.. One of the best hotel that I've stayed so far.. We went to Singapore to celebrate our friend's birthday... We booked a superior room, but got upgraded to the club room upon check-in.. My friend even got a surprise birthday cake with birthday card by the hotel delivered to our room when we back to the hotel.. Location was very convenient. Just few minutes walk, there's 24hrs McD and 7eleven.. Tanjong Pagar MRT station just 10minutes from the hotel.. However, a bit dissapointed that the hotel didn't provide free internet.. even wifi is chargeable..

Very enjoyable. The hotel is great for Orchard Road shopping. The taxis difficulty finding the entrance which is in a back street. Supermarket nearby at back of the hotel. We would prefer Burgis area because Orchard Road shops were not our scene but we couldn't fault the hotel. The buffet breakfast was excellent. I would like to find a soft bed in Asia though.
It was great, it's just the waiting time for the room is 1 hour even though we have wrote them to not to in the special request.

We arrived in Singapore at 8AM and went to the hotel to leave our luggage there, but much to our surprise they said we were able to check in early! Never before have I checked in that early to a hotel, normally it's only 1-2 hours before the standard check in time. We stayed in a twin room which was a very good size compared to other hotels I've stayed in in Singapore. The bathroom was very clean and big, particularly the shower. I've always had issues with the water pressure of showers in Singapore but this one was great. The decor of the room and throughout the hotel itself was very nice. From the room you could hear people walking in the hallways if they spoke very loudly, but most of the time we were out so that did not bother us very much. It is also very close (about a 5 minute walk depending on the traffic lights) to the Dhoby Ghaut MRT station, which is the major MRT station as it has 3 train lines going to it. The red(that takes you to Orchard Road), yellow and purple. As well as this it is about a 2 minute walk to the Bras Basah MRT station which is on the yellow line. You could also walk to Bugis from this hotel in about 15 minutes. Overall this is a great hotel and I would definitely stay here again.
very centrally located on orchard road , good value for money
on orchard road, great staff and a centrally located hotel.
Great stay!

The location is very good, top end of Orchard Road, so has easy access to many department stores. Local bus stop in the front of the hotel, which we used regularly. Lovely large rooms with modern furnishings.The restaurant had a huge spread for breakfast which changed daily.
friendly staff, great location as it was within walking distance to bugis shopping area and nice restaurants nearby. spacious room with comfortable bed
i had a good stay here at RELC for budget wise it is ok compare to other hotels around orchard and the place is quite, clean and spacious
I was very impressed by the room design and staying on the executive floor is definitely worth it. The private access to the pool means more privacy and the service is great!
I like the room and the bath room aswell,the location great for shopping and dining,definetly will come back this hotel again.
Comfortable, clean room. Will surely come back to stay at Ramada.
Comfortable, clean room. Will surely come back to stay at Ramada.
this is a really great hotel with an awesome location - i can only recommend this hotel. breakfast is great, the rooms are big and it is very close to Orchard Road

Swissotel is located near the MRT so it's easy to get everywhere in Singapore. The hotel is connect to Raffle City where is a shopping centre with great restaurants.The room is very big and comfortable. If you stay at excutive lounge you have lots of benefit.

We had a lovely stay and will definitely go back! The villa was amazing and the service and food stunning! They were very caring. They provided us with everything we needed for our 1 year old daughter which made our stay more relaxing!
Me and my wife had a pleasant stay. Staffs are friendly, large rooms and great location
The hotel was very nice and modern looking. And it is just a short distance away from Orchard Shopping Center.
GREAT! I would come back for return stay in the near future!

We got upgraded to Premier room, which is so much better compare to deluxe room. Room is with nice design and spacious, although the internet is pretty Slow there! Rest no complaints! will definetely come back again!

It's a very lovely and beautiful hotel to stay and enjoy with your love ones. Capella has its class and standard with its staff most helpful and given you a great feel of most welcome and feel at home. Althought it maybe expensive but it's worth every penny of it.

Warm welcome received upon arrival. Doesn't need to wait too long for check-in. Layout and guidelines were briefed by receptionist along the way to our room. Good view from the balcony of the executive suite with clear view of the South China Sea. Surprise
alright
Value for money! Will stay again! Clean and great food! Easy access to MRT

Had a very good stay. Front desk Staff friendly. Rooms clean. The breakfast selection is very minimal and the juice was watered down. If you arrived in the last hour of breakfast sitting, most of the food was finished. It would be good if they gave more attention to the breakfast.
Wonderfull hotel, with friendly staff, easy to find, and near Orchard
The hotel is great, nice view, very clean, big room and I like the surrounding area. However, the sound proof is bad.

Very nice hotel and centrally located to most visitors wanted. Pool is a bit small for me but good size for family with children. Breakfast is ok. Shower is little tight for big guy. Suppose to provide Airport Transfer as stated at Agoda but was compensated an extension time till 6pm. Yes, I would recommend this hotel.
Nice hotel, peaceful , great service. A bit high for price but you have all kinds of support. Especially great friendly smile from the front desk & great durian cake.
Enjoyable, worth for money. My room is next to Orchard room that gives good view for watching the street light attraction.

We stayed six days - 3 days leisure and 3 days at a conference. Our rate included breakfast and the buffet was superb. Also included was the "basic" wifi in-room internet. This was more than adequate for checking emails, web browsing and small downloads. The staff were friendly and helpful and our room while not large was comfortable. The public areas are modelled in a more traditional style rather than the modern chrome glass and granite so prevalent today. If you are travelling from the airport by MRT, get off at Bugis station and walk through the airconditioned shopping mall to get to the hotel. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel.
Our stay was really great and will definitely come back.Near bars, restaurants and shopping area and MRT.

very comfortable hotel, well worth the stay, close to all the resorts. we stayed there as we were in Singapore for the F1. new hotel and very friendly for families, Couples and solo traveler. best to book through agoda for the best deals..

We went there as a family with my 2 years old daughter. It was fantastic. We really like the swimming pool because it has beach sand for my daughter playing. Nice swimming pool view from my room. Big bathroom. And really near to casino.

Disappointed during the check-in at 4pm coz my rooms were not ready and I waited for 20 minutes. The room is clean n comfortable. The best thing is the breakfast. Too bad that the wifi is available at lobby n swimming pool only. Overall, is a good n recommended hotel.

Disappointed during the check-in at 4pm coz my rooms were not ready and I waited for 20 minutes. The room is clean n comfortable. The best thing is the breakfast. Too bad that the wifi is available at lobby n swimming pool only. Overall, is a good n recommended hotel.
As always very nice, also the Exceutive club is definetely worth its value

it was all great, except the integrity and professionalism of the management staff. i'd like to recommend this hotel to anyone, but to those who brings their relatives on wheelchair. my father-in-law (on wheelchair) fell off from the cab in front of the hotel's lobby on his first day of checking-in, and he broke his left upper arm. the bellboy accidentally did a failure while assisting him alighting from the cab. my wife then reported to manager in charge on the same day and the manager said she needed to investigate over the surveillance camera. till the end of their stay, the manager never came up to meet my wife, so my wife went to meet her and so disappointing that the manager totally refused to be responsible on the accident (hospital bill, etc.), moreover, so sad to hear the spoken language of the manager didn't express either goodwill or sympathy. *the surveillance recordings were not shown to them till the day they departed from the hotel. **this article is not made to offense anyone, just trying to make an actual and factual review of their stay (as asked by agoda.com).

It was all great, EXCEPT the integrity and professionalism of the management staff. I'd like to recommend this hotel to anyone, BUT to those who brings their relatives on wheelchair. My father-in-law (on wheelchair) fell off from the cab in front of the hotel's lobby on his first day of checking-in, and he broke his left upper arm. The bellboy accidentally did a failure while assisting him alighting from the cab. My wife then reported to manager in charge on the same day and the manager said she needed to investigate over the surveillance camera. Till the end of their stay, the manager never came up to meet my wife, so my wife went to meet her and so disappointing that the manager totally refused to be responsible on the accident (hospital bill, etc.), moreover, so sad to hear the spoken language of the manager didn't express either goodwill or sympathy. *the surveillance recordings were not shown to them till the day they departed from the hotel. **this article is not made to offense anyone, just trying to make an actual and factual review of their stay (as asked by Agoda.com).

Very good and I will go back. However, I hated the shower. The lack of doors means water splashes all over the bathroom floor making is wet and slippy. This is dangerous. I also hated the design of the bathroom taps which were impossible to turn on with wet hands.
From the warm easy check in to the comfortable room and great location A very good place to stay
I'm trip to singapore with my families and the hotels is great, my families like this hotels

I stay here with my dad for one night only, and booked a room from agoda. And because i was so excited i put the wrong date and realised it after i got the tiket voucher. I make a call to agoda customer service, and one of staff try to help me. So in the end the man told me that he will cancelled the booking, and i can make a new booking at MBS. So finally i made another booking for deluxe city view room. Got my voucher 5-10mnts after it. After i got my voucher, i checked out from the place that i stay at the moment and rushed to MBS using taxi. Arrived there, the lobby for tower 1 and 2 is full with people. We went to the desk, but our room still not ready. We come back at 3pm and got the key for our room. The room is so comfy, and my dad love the view from the balcony. But what i want the most is to go to the infinite pool. We went twice to the pool. First time is around 5pm. Enjoy some sun, but the place is so full.. So we decided to come back later to enjoy the pool. We come back at 7.30pm, the pool is more empty. So there i go enjoy my first experience at MBS infinite pool.. The view from up there is amazing.
Overall a great experience, was way too short to see everything, will love to go back and do more shopping and sightseeing. Would recommend Sentosa & the Hotel to all.

Great stay and my family enjoyed alot. One thing terrible was the cafe we went for breakfast. Super pack due to its small restaurant and cannot really accommodate 15 rooms patrons dining at the same time. My family of 6 adults and 4 young kids have to queue and squeezed into the small square table which can only fit 4 person. RELC need to seriously enlarge the restaurant.
Had a pleasant stay in the hotel with good location and facilities.

the hotel has a great location seconds from Bugis street and its close to shops backs onto a mall with entrances to the subway only a few dollars US by taxi to clarke key and 12 US to Santosa. Thought the price was a bit steep ive stayed in flasher in singapore for the same price but i think the location will make up for that.
Hotel was good but had to get extra towels and tea coffee as they set the room for three and provided for two. Location was central to everything very easy to get around.
Stayed there for a total of 6 nights, nothing to complain about.
had a pleasant stay. was upgraded for the nite. thank u. but the bathroom could do better.

The stay was good as we picked this hotel to be near (walking distance) from our Singapore Marathon Starting Line. The room was clean, however, it has cigarette smell even though it is a non-smoking room. We made a complaint and they promised to send an ionizer to the room but they never turn up.It should be noted that they stated that they will impose a fine of SGD250 for smoking in the room.
The location was fabulous and easy access. The check in was quick. The rooms however were old and could do with some renovation. The size of the room was great.

The check-in experience was not particularly welcoming as the front desk clerk was a bit rude and on the phone talking to someone throughout our check-in process. The breakfast buffet was nice, with Indian, Asian, and Western offerings but is quite expensive, about $90 SGD for two. It's a very busy hotel and almost always had buses full of tourists and crowds in the lobby.
great location for a business or pleasure stay would highly recommend and stay here again

It has been several times for me and my family to stay there. The bed is very comfortable. The room is spacious. The bathroom is clean and big too. The hotel location is only 200 metres walk to Cityhall mrt. And close to Raffless mall. I also used to eat at the building behind the hotel. At the foodcourt of the Funan Digital Mall, i always eat the soup Budha jump over the wall. Overall, the hotel is very recommended.
The hotel is located near City Hall MRT Station. It took less than 5 min walk from the station exit. Opposite the hotel is the famous Funam Digital Mall.
Orchard Parade is on orchard Road which makes shopping very easy. The rooms are well designed and is quite thoughtfully laid out.
Great Location and Friendly Staffs......Attentive Staff, Good Restaurants and Good for Family...
Great Location and Friendly Staffs......Attentive Staff, Good Restaurants and Good for Family...
It was an overall great stay. The location of the hotel was convenient. I would certainly recommend my co-workers to stay there, as the rates were very affordable too.
Resorts World Sentosa is very near many attractions, and isa good hotel to sta at for easy access to Sentosa. Good room, great location.

Really great location and fantastic hotel, but there are hidden charges. For instance the rate for a double room only includes one breakfast and the second breakfast costs 25% of the room rate! Also tax and a service charge add 17% to the bill. So not quite the bargain it seems.
Great location and suitable for family with young children. Easy to find local food near surrounding area.
It is quite difficult to get a taxi from the hotel in the morning
No views at this hotel but great location just a stones throw from public transport with excellent access to the whole of Singapore. Decent but not amazing. Quite standard and no real design
No views at this hotel but great location just a stones throw from public transport with excellent access to the whole of Singapore. Decent but not amazing. Quite standard and no real design
The hotel is located in a nice location and very near to the MRT station and supermarket. The restaurant food is good and they have a nice pool.
My stay at the York Hotel was good. Room was not only spacious but comfortable. The hotel is near Orchard; a place of GREAT shopping.

We love the location of the hotel, just 5 minutes walk from the nearest MRT station (Little India) and lots of shops around. Fast checkin and checkout procedure. Fast internet access. The room is a bit small with few spaces left when you have huge luggages with you. Bathroom needs a shower curtain at least. Complimentary coffee daily is perfect.

I always stay at this hotel for every Singapore trip. The hotel located in the great location and very convenience for travelling around the city. The shopping mall are in walking distance. The MRT station are just on the front of hotel. There's food court and convenience store at the next corner.

Beds were very comfy, clean rooms with new towels replaced daily. They have set up extra bed before us checking in, without us requesting upon booking a room for 2 adults and 1 kid. Great service from staffs. Speedy check in and check out, a plus for us.

The entrance is under renovation during our stay. It was not very impressive when you entered into the hotel. The furnitures inside the room are very old and need to be upgraded. Luckily, the hotel staff in the concierge area, especially Fara and Zainal, are very professional and friendly that made things better.
Acceptable 3.5 star hotel.. Overall quite satisfy but then should have more privilege for returning customer.
Great location, easy to get public transport, near to shopping centre and restaurants
Great location, easy to get public transport, near to shopping centre, restaurants and pubs
Great location, easy to get public transport, near to shopping centre, restaurants and Pubs
Staff was very accommodating to my request for proxy check in. Overall, love the location and ambience of the hotel.

We were there for the F1 Grand Prix, the hotel is extremely close to the event venue and subway stations. The location is excellent and easy to get taxi. The room is clean and large. Staff is very friendly and helpful.
Good, ideally located for transport etc. Room sizes ok. Would stay there again

I was stay with my family and my older son..They really enjoy to stay at Village Hotel Bugis, because it's easy access to public transport, shopping ( electronic & gadget ) area, and they really excited to walk around Arab Street..
Average, I expected much more because the deal is not really good especially after seeing the rates posted now :(

Like many hotels in Singapore, really high room quality, absolutely clean, great housekeeping staff. Because its centrally located , you have easy access to big malls. Orchard road is just 5 minutes walking away.

I was looking forward to my first stay at the PARKROYAL on Kitchener Road as it was close to many good Indian restaurants and the swimming pool looked nice and large. Also I had opted to pay extra for Orchid Club so had Hugh expectations. Checking in took quite a while but we were offered a King bed as requested and I also stipulated Non Smoking. When we arrived at the room I was surprised how small it was, with only one small window in a corner. It wasn't until the next day that I realised we had been given a Smoking room, hence the obvious smell of smoke and the ashtray with matches on the coffee table. Our room was in a corner of the building and only had one small window whereas the majority of room, as seen from the pool area, had three big windows in a row. I mentioned to Reception that we had been put in a Smoking room and they offered to move us but we were checking out at 11:00pm that night for a 02:10am flight home. We were just a bit unlucky with our check in and room allocation. Orchid Club facilities were nice, however, in the special cocktail bar area.

My self and my 19 year's old Daughter stayed on 3 day 2 Night Multi Attraction Package. We were given two tickets each to the Universal studios, S.E.A. Auarium and Adventure Cove Waterpark worth over 150 $. and including breakfast. It was a very good offer. The Hotel was very Comfortable room. We paid only s$ 32 from Airport to The Hotel by taxi and same to the Airport. Hotel Also provide us free unlimited travel from Senthosa to Vivo City by Monorail, where we could catch the MRT to Other places in Singapore

I used to live in Singapore and know it well. This hotel is a good compromise for tourists or business people who have a limited budget and want somewhere comfortable and quiet to sleep in a good areas in terms of atmosphere and airport accessibility with the benefit of friendly staff. However, this is not a luxury hotel in any any sense. The beds are good but the rooms are small and the floors are tiled and the furniture uninspiring. Fit for purpose.

Good for weekend staycation and shopping around the city. We were given a comfortably sized room with comfy bed and big screen tv, which made the staycation enjoyable and relaxing. Staff were also kind enough to give us a little bit more time to check-out the next day. Would come back again.
Great location, in the heart of Singapore shopping district, however currently under renovation
the room is clean and comfortable. Location is the main advantage for this hotel. You can go shopping at Orchard Road easily.
Eventhough it is not written in the voucher but we get free mini bar for as long as we stay there which is wonderful. The staff were friendly & eager to help.
Eventhough it is not written in the voucher but we get free mini bar for as long as we stay there which is wonderful. The staff were friendly & eager to help.

Staying at the Mandarin Orchard is always a pleasant as it is centrally located, unfortunately check in time is very late, we have to wait until past 2 o'clock to get our room while check out should be not later than 12. It will be nice if the lobby is accommodated with proper sofas matching with the lobby theme so that the elderly can sit while waiting for the check in which normally takes some time, especially during peak season
My stay was comfortable. As always, I checked in for a few days to do my routine medical check up at Mt Elizabeth Hospital which is just across the street.

Nice room, EZasy to walk to go to shopping centre, orcahard road,,easy to fin night life. And especially they have smooking room. Only paid 20sing taxi from airport to York Hotel. Close to Vivo city..You should visit to Marina Bay only 10 Sing by Taxi

The stay was great! The hotel is in the heart of Orchard Road! We could crossed the roads and there are shopping malls like Paragon and Ngee Anh City. If you want to shop, this is a great hotel to stay. There is a suggestion for the hotel is to include Breakfast option on the booking choice.

We always stay in Little India for short trips to Singapore, but not usually in as nice a hotel as this. It was a real treat, and we will return in the future. It was nothing super special, but a nice hotel for a decent price. You get what you pay for in this case, and I would recommend it.

Very good location, near to shopping centres (novena square). Supermart and shoppings are at the shopping centre. It is very near MRT station (Novena) which leads to other mrt station. It is just 2 stations away from Orchard. Otherwise, Orchard Road is just 5 minutes bus ride away. Swimming pool is big and rooms are decent. Kids love the swimming pool. Staff at Oasia Hotel are very friendly and helpful.

Overall is ok, except a few things to mentioned. Complimentary wifi is slow, have to pay for faster speed. Pillow too soft. Have to wait for long time for taxi due to the difficult to notice main entrance.
Ibis is always a safe choice and even more in Singapore. good location, nice staff and well equiped room. Would recommend any short stay travellers on budget.

the location is great, being near the central business district. Chinatown is a short bus ride away, and Clarke Quay is pretty near too. several food options near the hotel, but i would recommend walking to amoy food centre or tanjong pagar food centre for the local fare.

The hotel is in a great location. The receptionist desk was helpful and friendly. The room was clean and looked like the bathrooms were recently remodeled. The was a slight odor and a little disrepair on the 10th floor. The bell hp that helps us when we arrived was awesome but ever since then they just seemed to ignore us. It is two blocks from the MRT and less than a block from some great food on Arab st.

Since we've been coming back here for about 2yrs now, this is the only time we've stayed that we had a problem with the club lounge. There wasn't WATER or drinks available when you come in and the attendant would Say they don't have it. We book the club lounge for the perks. If they're going to take it away, we should probably just book an ordinary room instead. Plus one staff was rude. If you're having a bad day you should even show that to club members/people who stay there. It's just inappropriate and rude.
Great location, excellent room service - overall it's a well-run hotel.
Fantastic hotel in a great location.

Not a cheap room, but you save by not paying for extra beds and the kids had lots of room to play! The room is just comfortable for 2 adults with 1 child. The bathroom is clean and the bed is cosy. It has safe and quiet environment with friendly staff.

Not a cheap room, but you save by not paying for extra beds and the kids had lots of room to play! The room is just comfortable for 2 adults with 1 child. The bathroom is clean and the bed is cosy. It has safe and quiet environment with friendly staff.
Friendly and approachable staffs, comfy room and large bathroom and city area location with quiet surroundings.
friendly and approachable staffs, clean room and nice bathroom, city area location with nearby shooping malls.
Its good to more than enough. nice room, service, food. perfect for business trip.

Only 2 bad things about the hotel, 1. On the floors there were obviously smoking rooms that filtered around the rooms, was charged $40 for 1 wine glass that was smashed in the room. Apart from that cant fault it.
It was pretty good and the staff were friendly and helpful
A great place to stay, will stay there again.You will not be disappointed.
A simple thing missing from the room, slippers. The bathroom floor is very cold, and there are no slippers provided.
Near to Bugis Junction, mae shopping very comfortable

Really enjoyed my stay. Location is great and room has every thing except maybe good wifi. Good restaurants and shopping centers nearby. Hindu temple and Chinese temple also near by. A bit far from mrt but taxis are more comfortable a nod cheap.

It was great and the room is comfortable. The Filipino staff at front desk were very obliging and helpful. Can't say the same for local Singaporean chinese staff (lady) who was on duty at the front desk on the night of the 9th July. She made faces and looked irritated when we had questions. Should have gotten her name. Other then this, everyone else was great.
Great location, right about shopping center and City Hall MRT. Price is quite steep but well worth it.
Great Location with Friendly and Attentive Staffs, Spa and Rooms......Me and my family always prefer to stay at this hotel whenever we travel to Singapore for Business or Personal visit.......
Stay was good. Location is convenient, Hotel is comfortable and pleasent. Nice area and easy access everywhere.
great location near to shopping and easy to find local food. Hotel room is large, clean and comfort but the wifi excess is not really good.
Very comfortable and clean room but in room wifi should be provided free of charge.
It was a very pleasant stay. Comfortable and clean.

the location is really really great, go to everywhere is very easy, the hotel is very clean. the room is really small, not as big as "peninsula standard". The most bothered things are the key card, you need to refresh them everytime once you close the door, it can open the elevator to your floor, but it cannot open your door, so you need to go down to the ground to refresh again, really annoying.
Even though the hotel located at the end of Orchard Rd., it still considers to be very close the the shopping area. MRT is only a short walk away. Highly recommended.
Fine stay however short. The staff was great with any request, I was out most of the time but did have a few drinks at the bar. Knowledgeable bar tender, close to shopping and outside dining.

Great, reception staff upgraded our room. Room came with a free to use mobile 'handy' which we can use to call & go online for free. We can even bring the handy out from the hotel to use. This made our stay in Singapore very convenient with the free 3G service.

Hotel was (as usual) great and I have only one complaint. Having arrived at the hotel at around 3 pm after a long international flight, I was told at the check in counter that my room was not ready, was was being cleaned (presumably the previous guest was a late check out)and would be ready within 30 minutes. I was tired, needed to shower and change for a meeting at 5.30pm that had been pre-arranged but to my disappointment it was not until almost 4.30 that the room became available for me to check in. Given that the room was pre-booked & should have been available from 2pm onwards, I found it very frustrating that that I had to wait over an hour as it was nearly 4.30pm before I was able to access my room. On checking out I left my written observations about this with a senior manager but interestingly I have not received any response from the hotel management.

The staff were very friendly and accommodating. The room was too small, even for one person. But it was supposed to be for two. The bathroom was modern, but intruded into the room, separated only by glass walls. I would not stay here again with another person, although it would be fine for a single.

Great city hotel with good attentive staffs. Centrally located for business meetings and shopping. Easy to get taxis to go all over the island. There are plenty of food joints outside the hotel. The hotel is adjecant to a mall and one can get snack and meals without going too far. There are 24 hours mini marts opposite the hotel. The swimming pool and tennis court is on level 6th. Great facilities.
Hotel Staffs are friendly, Room was clean and comfortable

The hotel rooms are very well designed. We had a great time staying at the hotel. It was easily accessible from the airport and we did not have any trouble getting to the city area as well as there are many public transportation that bring us to Orchard Road and Shenton Way. We are glad that we chose the hotel as the rooms were very clean and well-maintained. The staff are also friendly.

Great Location, Nice big clean rooms, Marvelous breakfast, Friendly staff, we were upgraded from deluxe to a premier Room, free in room internet thanks to the assistant front desk manager (Joana) Who took Care of our welfare, highly recommended will be Back For sure, thanks F&J Lakmas Sydney, Australia

We were given free early check in and free upgrade by the V Hotel Lavender. The check in was fast, the staff were very friendly and nice customer service. The two things i love about this hotel, is the location, 1 minute walk from the MTR and, the room size for this hotel, is considered pretty big compared to other hotels in singapore.
Excellent and relaxing stay -- away from the bustle of a big city.
Comfort stay, will stay again here if I go to singapore
Great location, easy access to MRT and large room with comfortable bed
Very great location, friendly staff, 5 minutes to City Hall MTR which is the interchange station. So, it's easy to go anywhere. There are a lot of convenient stores around the hotel.

I have stayed in many hotels in Singapore, but the InterContinental is in my top2 of hotels I stayed so far. The area around the hotel is perfect to soak up the city life, and there are many restaurants in all price ranges nearby. What stood out for me was the exceptionally friendly staff. They made my stay very enjoyable. Thank you and hope to be back soon.
Thoroughly enjoyed our time there and would recommend the Swisshotel The Stamford to anyone going to Singapore …

We chose Goodwood Park Hotel for our wedding reception (at Min Jiang Restaurant), primarily due to the quality of food and nice al fresco ambience. We booked a number of poolside suite rooms for friends and family, and the rooms were just across the restaurant, which was perfect! Staff were very attentive and accommodating, and overall, provided a high and consistent level of service. Goodwood Park Hotel was a perfect choice for the occasion, also because of its central location and was easy for many of our overseas guests to access. Although being right smack in the city, the hotel is perched on a small hill/slope and hence provided a very nice environment to relax in... you hardly feel that you are in the city! The heritage features of the hotel are beautiful and gives it a unique feel, unlike other sleek city hotels. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!! One area to improve cld be the access to wifi (I kept losing connection...).
Great location close to clarke quay and dining at a reasonable price.
wonderful, the kids were very happy stay in this hotel. it had largee room, near to arab street where we can found halal restaurant
Great hotel, we will come back again to stay this hotel.

We stayed at the Oasia for the big family holiday. Although we made the booking separately, when we arrived the front deck did an excellent job by getting our 4 room on the same floor, right next & opposite of each other! Good service by friendly staff. Room was spacious & very clean, free fast internet. Location is just great, access to MRT station from the elevator. Excellent value for money (still cheaper compare to 5 star hotel in Orchard but older & smaller room), I strongly recommend Oasia hotel.

I am surprised to find this hotel. It is a jewel in the hay stack. Superb location as it is near to Bugis MRT station. Lots of shopping areas around the MRT station. However, the hotel surrounding is quiet and serene. The price is pretty decent for a Singapore hotel in a good area.

The bed and pillow are amazing, bathroom fantastic, friendly staff and the idea of the handy phone is great. Just the music from the big billboard and from the paragon shopping mall from 10 am - 10 pm the same music, I can hear it till my room. Keep it my head for 1 week. A bit difficult to rest with those music keep going on.
the design is nice and very Japanese, the room is consider small, and all the room including club room is basically the same room, club room is only come with the club benefit

i had an enjoyable stay at the hotel. The room was clean and spacious. had a great view of the Adventure Cove theme park. there is shuttle service provided to get to the nearby hotels and Resort World. at RWS, there are plenty of choices for food amd also access to Universal Studio, and the casino.
This is a really good hotel for those who can pay a good amount for every night. The location is excellent as it is near to MRT, Mustafa centre and city square mall.

Enjoyed the stay but the bed was as hard as a rock - never in my life have I stayed in a bed that was like sleeping on concrete - the pillows however were brilliant! I loved the fact that you also people with disabilities and life challenges working at your establishment - that to me was just brilliant.
I really like this hotel because of the location. It is very accessible to almost needs of one tourist. With their fast internet services. I also love the food at Spice Bar.

Great we had a lovely time we were there for the F1 so not much time spent in the hotel but it was a great refreshing break in between the race days and sightseeing. Very comfortable beds and a great shower in the refurbished club rooms.
albeit a one night stay, it was ok. the rooms were small with no-where to put your luggage other than on the ground. had to reach across double bed to open window blinds.
this is business trip in sentosa singapore. we had very happy night in this hotel.

we stayed for 6 nights in september, hotel location is perfect with the mrt connection underneath the hotel which is great. hotel very clean, staff greet you with a smile, very friendly and helpful. would highly recommend this hotel to anyone and would definitely stay again.
Great location, very small clean room. Nice design
Great location and easy access to shopping centre, MRT and taxi
Great attentive staff.great rooms. Next to a mall with supermarkets n few f&b outlets
the room weren't clean. The "butler" was rude. But the internet was fast.

i always choose to stay in Rendezvouz hotel because of the location and affordable. Easy to go around for shopping, it's in the city and only few stations away from Orchard Road. Great staff and clean.

We tried very hard to like this hotel. But in the end, it has a great location and that's about it. Based on reviews here, we opted for a Flash Deal on a Premier Club room with benefits. If that's the best they have to offer, then we feel sorry for those who stayed in the budget rooms. Club staff were nice but not very well trained. Lifts are slow and always crowded. Room was so-so and the actual structure tired with paint peeling and patched carpeting. We had a maid's row outside our door which management finally curtailed, but we got a Couples of slammed doors for complaining. In the end, if you aren't going to be in the room that much and want to see museums, the river attractions, etc., you'll be fine as the location is exceptional. If you want a great room experience, keep looking.

I was first provided a room close to the construction site (opposite the hotel). I'm sensitive to noise and thus requested to change to a quieter room. The manager who assisted me in getting this all done was very professional and sincere in making our stays at the Manadarin Orchard Hotel a good one. Also the little effort for the staffs to greet us by our last name (at the club lounge)made us feel welcomed.
No complaint... stay was pleasant and most enjoyable

The rooms are very very large and so are the bathrooms. Great Location.. just behind Shangrila and very near Orchard. Breakfast was fair I would say. Great value for money. No Room service though. Great for families or groups as the rooms are large.

been staying in this hotel many times. and still satisfied with it. great location. close to mount elizabeth hospital. also close to shopping areas because located in the orchard area. which becomes very convenient. overall I'm very satisfied with this hotel. looking forward to staying here again
friendly staff, beautiful place with lots of entertainment.
Near to town, clean n big room. Near to cinema. I like the staycation. Big clean and fantastic
nice room nice pool , close to town , close to cbd area for business meeting and shopping area
reasonable overnight stay, close to everything but no complimentary wifi in the room
Great Location , Very near to Mustafa Centre , Good for Indian traveller ,Friendly staff , good for business & conference , great option for Indian food.
Excellent experience. The halal restaurant allowed for gathering including my Muslim friends and the selections both at breakfast and at dinner were amazing
great location, value for money and friendly staff... keep it up

Had a very enjoyable stay at this hotel. Staff were very friendly and rooms were well kept. Room came inclusive of buffet breakfast which was satisfactory and had enough variety to keep us interested through 3 days of our stay.
the bathroom was a bit rundown.. overall the room was very comfortable
the place was nice and the people and staff were friendly. very accommodating and for sure i will come back.
one word excellent. located at the center of the city n easy access to public transport

Wonderful !! Will be my first choice for my next holiday stay. Friendly and attentive staff is one of the most important thing to me, in all areas including check in, restaurant, bar as well as pool areas. One thing can be improve is the buffet breakfast choice.
Good place to stay n best located near bug is junction
Great. Will be back again. Service are good and no waste of time.
Was a good weekend getaway for me. The location is fantastic! Restaurants, mrt, shopping, everything within reach.
Its a day business trip. Had a great comfortable room for me to relax.

The rooms should be more sound proof. My stay was marred by the inconsiderate behaviour of a family staying next door - the kids were playing with the doorbell & running noisily up & down the corridor early in the morning with the father yelling his head off. This happened for 2 consecutive mornings!
Very good compared to other hotel experience. Just need to boost up customer service.

My family and I, love this Hotel very much, this is our second time staying in this Hotel and we will defenatly will be back. Thanks to Orchad parade who gave us the same room that we stayed before on the 6th floor, same floor with the Swimmingpool and the kids are so Happy they just need to jump from the room to go to Swimmingpool.
it was a pleasant stay, i can easily find any restaurants, shopping center, drug store.

The stay was a very good experience. The check in was expeditious and the staff at the front desk were very accommodating. Easy to get around as the hotel is walking distance to 3 different mrt stations. The restaurant inside the hotel serves the best Laksa noodle soup dish. A must try for tourist who enjoys local cuisine.
Everything was great Except for the AC. Beds were large and centrally located right in downtown. Great place to stay for business travellers and price was decent.

It was great! staff were really friendly, rooms clean, location awesome. However,although it was stated as a no-smoking hotel, the lift wreaked of cigarette smell, and the corridors as well. While this is due to non-abiding guests, it might help if more attention is given to 'deodorize' the smell more frequently.
this resort is well located at the heart of Sentosa. the hotel is new and has surprisingly big rooms in a nice design. the restaurants serve super food. great stay.

This is an excellent hotel where paying the tarrif for the club room was well worthwhile. The staff were just amazing and the quality of the food and beverage service in the club lounge was excellent. My wife and I greatly appreciated being given access to the lounge after checkout and before we headed to the airport. I guess these actions are those that separate the top hotels from the average ones. Our room was very well appointed with all the 5 star touches one expects from such a hotel. During this trip to Singapore we stayed in 3 different hotels in 3 different parts of the city. Whilst this was the most expensive because we had chosen club lounge access, it was also very clearly the best. We will stay here in a club room again on our next stay in Singapore

This is an excellent hotel where paying the tarrif for the club room was well worthwhile. The staff were just amazing and the quality of the food and beverage service in the club lounge was excellent. My wife and I greatly appreciated being given access to the lounge after checkout and before we headed to the airport. I guess these actions are those that separate the top hotels from the average ones. Our room was very well appointed with all the 5 star touches one expects from such a hotel. During this trip to Singapore we stayed in 3 different hotels in 3 different parts of the city. Whilst this was the most expensive because we had chosen club lounge access, it was also very clearly the best. We will stay here in a club room again on our next stay in Singapore
