Our stay in Parc Soverign was very interesting. A great experience in overall considering with the amount we paid. Nice location in Bugis area. Easy to find great foods. Mostly good manner & polite people stayed at that time. Room was comfy. Staff was very attentive. Very good. Will back with this hotel again soon.

The Swissotel has a very good location in the harbor area, so when you book the harbor view room you'll be very glad you did. I know I did, my wife's jaw dropped when she saw the view of the harbor. You can see the Esplanade, Gardens By The Bay, Marina Bay Sands and the sky line. Awesome view!! The room is clean and I have no problem letting my 9-month old baby to crawl on the carpeted floor. We had fun in the swimming pool, it could get crowded at times. Overall, our stay in the hotel is a very relaxing one, our stay in the hotel is a staycation for my wife's birthday and the hotel lived up to our expectations. The hotel even gave my wife a very nice birthday cake! We'll surely be coming back.
Generally is good. Good for business traveller as it is within CBD area. Hotel café and restaurant are generally good. Room is clean and bed is comfortable.

I pre-booked the hotel through Agoda. I arrived late at night and was able to complete check-in very quickly. The room was very nice. I liked the TV armchair. Breakfast was the regular buffet with many options. A cook was cooking eggs per order. Check-out was as comfortable.

Enjoy a relaxing stay with a Villa unit, very attentive staff, polite and effective. Beautiful design interms of landscape, room as well as villa , swimming pool. Great place for honeymoon and wedding.
it was comfortable and very big room , very comfortable bed i very like it will come again.

A very great experience that I won't be forget, the first thing I stepped myself into this hotel is totally blew my mind off. I really love the hotel services, room are the best and addiction to that part is the 57th floor pool which is the main feature of this hotel. It was my first time in here and sure I will come back soon for another visit. The stay worth every money I spend but the experience at Marina Bays is priceless.

It was pleasure and wonderful. The staff were helpful. Even though the shuttle of the hotels only run from 10am to 10pm, the staff would drive us around in buggy. alternatively, there are plenty free shuttle buses around Sentosa.
Best value for money Hotel, central to most areas for touring around the city, clean and fresh staterooms, friendly staff.
Great room services and friendly staff. Great room services and friendly staff.

A little disappointed with the length of time it took to check in. With so many people constantly checking in & out, there are just not enough staff. Great location. We had a corner room with 2 balconies, which gave us a great view of Marina Bay and along the river.

This is my second stay at this hotel . The deluxe room is very big like suite room , high ceiling , nice harbour view with balcony made me very relax. Staffs are attentive & friendly. Only one thing should be improved is transfer. Shuttle bus to be provided every 15 min is too long time & inconvenience. Overall I'd like to recommend this hotel & definitely come back to stay again.
It was really comfortable. It was a very relaxing and enjoyable getaway!

services is great, professional and helpful. the personal assistance team had helps me to arrange my marriage proposal in room. overall stay is great, room feature is more than what we expected. the only thing that not that good is the limited choice at the knoll's buffet breakfast. environment is very good, green area, privacy, peaceful night etc. good recommended for Couples, will try their villa room if i had chance to travel again with family.
This hotel is very near to dhoby ghaut mrt and plaza singapura for shopping. As dhoby ghaut is an interchange mrt, you can go anywhere you like easily from this hotel.

Overall our stay was very good. The rooms were quite large and very comfortable. The RELC is walking distance to a large shopping area and MRT station. Major Singapore attractions are all some distance away but taxis are easily accessible from the hotel lobby.
My stay was great as always, and I will usually choose this hotel for a short staycation
Excellent, except small and old bath tub. Water temperature can be unstable. But lovevthe powerful hairdryer
I enjoyed my stay. The bed was comfortable, the room was very clean and the staff were friendly.
Generally, everything is great in the villa except for some minor things to improve. 1) the kettle is too big for basin to fill up the water 2) should provide iphone dock instead of ipod dock.
even though I messed up my booking, they still found me a great room and were nothing but helpful breakfast was only so so, i'd eat somewhere tasty!!
Overall, My client is satisfied with the service provided by V Hotel. Keep it up the good effort.

I had a very pleasant stay at Orchard Parade, although I can't speak to the dining and swimming facilities because with a one night stay, there was not much time to explore. Upon checking in we were informed that we had been given a free upgrade to a premium room, and furthermore we were presented with $80 of vouchers for Orchard Central shopping mall! The gift and the upgraded room really made our stay very happy and pleasant. The bed was comfortable and the room was clean, and while other hotels are closer to the shopping malls, this hotel is just a 5 minute walk away. The location is great for the value. Service was very friendly and helpful; when we were having trouble connecting to internet they helped us right away. I would stay here again primarily because of the

Staff took care of everything right from the moment we got down the cab. They even presented us with a delightful cake in the room, upon learning that it's my partner's birthday. Decor and ambiance of the room makes it a very relaxing place to spend the weekend with your other half. Soothing music was played right when we entered the room. Well-furnished and comes with more than sufficient amenities.

Got upgraded again to better room....much appreciated! However, toilet bowl in bathroom was leaking...told housekeeping but leak not repaired during my 4 day stay. Also, no porter service again upon arrival to help carry luggage...any 4 star hotel should have porter service to help guests load luggage upon arrival!
the stay was good for a short business trip as i spent most of my day in the office.

This hotel is centrally located; within walking distance to Arab street, Little India, Bugis Center and MRT. The staff is great! We travel a lot and this is one of the most friendly and attentive staff we have encountered in on our travels. The tea time is spectacular, serve in a very traditionally yet with a modern twist. We love having access to the executive lounge which included personalized/private check in/out, tea time and happy hour. Overall we are very satisfied with this hotel and we recommend it.

The stay was OK. We had a Superior room. Good lacation.. and the staff was excellent. However, the room was very small for two people. This "4 star hotel" is not comparable to a 4 star hotel listing in the States or Europe. The size and space is suitable for one person, but very tight for two. Even the bed is a small double. Finally, there was no shower door or curtain, so the bathroom got very wet and we had staff replace all the towels everyday so we could wipe it all up. A simple curtain could remedy this for the hotel. If you can handle a small space, and a $10 S breakfast, than the hotel will be suitable for two.
I had a good stay. The hotel is located at the start of Orchard Road which is quiet. The staff were very attentive and very friendly.

Great stay, location was superb. Walking distance to Orchard shopping area. Comfortable stay as we took the Premiere Room for the 4 of us. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful. Truly surpassed our expectations and we decided if we are back in Singapore, this is the hotel for us.
Great overnight stay, super centrally located on Orchard Road, right smack across the road from Ngee Ann City.
Great stay. The package is really value for money. We enjoyed the hotel and all the attractions. Very handy and cloae to everything
It's my 9th time staying in that hotel so I guess I don't need to say much
Been there for 7times already great hotel good place to stay

The staff was very friendly and accommodating. We had asked for a crib and a king size bed, and the hotel had both prepared for us when we arrived. The room was average size, but there was a lot of close/drawer space. From what I researched, it seems that most hotel rooms in Singapore are quite small, so this one seemed big for Singapore. The hotel and room were very clean. One of the best things about this hotel was that there was a small shopping center in the building which included eateries, different shops and a supermarket. There were some local restaurants within walking distance; some were cheap and some not. I researched many hotels, and the price for Ramada was average. I feel that it was a good value for Singapore.
I had requested for free upgrading but they didn't provide me.
Great stay .. centrally located to all great places in Singapore. Easy access to MRT. very helpful staff

hotel is located very centrally in the middle of orchard road where all the shopping area is, abundant of food choices available within the hotel and also in the nearby malls. rooms were huge and clean and comfortable. overall a very satisfactory stay.

Best Place if your south asian and need to be next to mustafa center! The city mall is also across. I ahve stayed here may times! But this time the bed was absoultely bad. one of the most unfconfortable things i have slept in my life! i complained house keeping, the put another mattress cover which didnt really help. other than that, great location as usual.

Great stay at Amara Hotel. Comfortable and nice room. Nice toilet. I had a fast Check-In, but Check-Out was an unplesent one, SLOW. But overall the Amara hotel was in a nice surrounding. There's a lot of local fast-food restaurant around, even a supermarket downstairs. It's a great location to stay in.
Just a great stay at a wonderful place. Highlighted by the super friendly staff (especially at reception and spa area) and great food. what ele can you ask for??

Enjoyed our stay with the hotel. Breakfast was nice, use of Club F&B was a great bonus. The room had fast internet and very spacious for our use. The bathroom is also great with branded amenities ( shampoo & bath foam ). The use of mini-bar is FOC while is another plus point. I love the gym while the pool is not bad too. The staff were great especially when using the F&B on the Club Floor. Just had one issue with the queue system ( or the lack of it )at the reception. There does not exist a queue system and when there is a heavy crowd build-up, anyone can just go forward to deal with the counter and the first person ( who are more polite ) will continue to be left standing and waiting !

Enjoyed our stay with the hotel. Breakfast was nice, use of Club F&B was a great bonus. The room had fast internet and very spacious for our use. The bathroom is also great with branded amenities ( shampoo & bath foam ). The use of mini-bar is FOC while is another plus point. I love the gym while the pool is not bad too. The staff were great especially when using the F&B on the Club Floor. Just had one issue with the queue system ( or the lack of it )at the reception. There does not exist a queue system and when there is a heavy crowd build-up, anyone can just go forward to deal with the counter and the first person ( who are more polite ) will continue to be left standing and waiting !

The hotel rooms are very well designed. It was a very comfortable stay at the hotel. It was easily accessible from the airport and we did not have any trouble getting to the city area as well as there are many public transportation that bring us to Orchard Road and Shenton Way. We are glad that we chose the hotel as the rooms were very clean and well-maintained. The staff are also friendly.

i stayed on 14-15th nov .first i booked for the standard room but i got upgrade for my room .i don't know which room but i got 2 queen size bed and really large room . it takes 10 minutes walk to orchard road (tang plaza) an it costs about SG$7-9 from orchard to hotel . the room is very clean. easy and fast check in also chek out .breakfast not to good .you have to check your watch since 15 minutes @10 a.m it closed already, you still can come and eat but what left is what you get
The stay was great. The room are clean, spacious and comforatble.
Great stay my mum liked it definetly recommend to my friends

The room was clean and had all that I needed to make my stay comfortable. The hotel was conveniently located that I could walk to all my destinations, but if I needed to grab a taxi the ride was no longer than 10 minutes away. The staff were friendly and courteous. I would have no hesitation in staying there again, only this time I will go for a bigger room with the family in tow.
The room is clean, nice & comfortable. The staff is friendly
Great stay ill stay here again when going back to singapore.
It was a pleasant stay, best part is the fast internet
It was a pleasant stay, best part is the fast internet

The stay at the hotel was great as it is very close to the attractions at Sentosa island. The nice layout of the room with table and a few chairs makes it easy for us to pack food back to the hotel as we have young children and is easier to eat in.

Enjoyed my stay at Orchard Parade. It was near everywhere I wanted to go. Check-in was fast and easy and my room was great for the price. Wonderful view of the pool from the 12th floor. The only thing that was disappointing was that the in-room wifi wasn't working. I had a hard time connecting from my phone and laptop. Other than that, had a great stay.
A pleasant stay. Friendly and great service staff. Clean and Comfortable room and bed. Walking distance to local food and shopping mall

Great stay away from the city. The hotel is at a secluded location perfect for those who prefer privacy, and relaxation. Staff are friendly and fast in service. We love the villa with the private pool and other amenities like a outdoor hot tub and bath area. However, will recommended guests to drive in or take a taxi in as the distance of the hotel from the sky train station is pretty far off. Will come back to experience the other rooms.

Stay was perfect. I arrived already at 915 am and not only did they give me a room, they even upgraded it free to a junior suite. Quite a comparison with the Castiglione Hotel in Paris, where, arriving at 1030 am and being told the room was ready they wanted to charge a 50% early check-in supplement. The Goodwood Park earned my respect for behaving as a well run hotel should treat their guests.

The family room was big enough for 4 adult, the staff was very nice and generous about the internet. breakfast wasn't so good and it's quite difficult to get taxi from the hotel, you have to call for taxi if you are in hurry or wait by the road outside hotel.

It was a great stay in a very clean and comfortable room. The hotel staff are friendly. Close to Bugis area which offers lots of attraction, foods and shopping centres. The room comes with a Nexus tablet which gives handy internet connection. The TV programme is great with free demand movies as well. All and all it was great stay.

I love staying at the Orchard Parade Hotel! This is my second time coming back and I will make it a point to stay in this hotel whenever I can. Location, cleanliness, free Wifi, airport shuttle are some of the perks. My only constraint is on the budget part as the price can be slightly steep if compared to hotels slightly further away from Orchard.
The best thing about this hotel is very fast internet
The best thing about this hotel is very fast internet
It was a great stay. Nice and clean room comes with Nexus tablet and on demand movie. Comfortable bed but hope to have fridge in the room. Overall it was a good stay and worth for money paid.
it was a great experience. the hotel room is big, clean and with a nice view. very good service. the only down side is you need to pay extra for the wifi.
It was great. The Hotel was easy to find and located in the Central Business District. Good distance from clubs and places to eat.

I had a great stay and would stay again if the same executive deal were available. The location was good near restaurants and shopping. The breakfast buffet was not very good. The food didn't seem fresh and it was too crowded with too little food.

Overall great, though the location is a bit far from RSW main attraction spots such as the USS, SEA aquarium and restaurants. Information such as direction to hotel and mode of services provided (e.g. shuttle bus) would be great if it is make available easily - either on website or brochure. Hotel facilities should be proudly display to all who would like to enjoy it. Thanks and hope to stay at Equirius again.
Great stay within the city and was close to the park. Room service was great.

My stay at V Hotel Lavender was nice. I chose this hotel in the first place due to its link to the MRT station. Super super convenient for those who will travel around singapore by MRT, As MRT station is located just next to the hotel. As for the room itself i think is quite nice, price for the room is fair as well compare to VALUE Hotel. Overall my stay was great and i am satisfy with the hotel.
Close to major shopping areas especially the much acclaimed Orchard Road. Public amenities are within reach. Restaurants, shops, MRT are all within walking distance.
Close to major shopping areas especially the much acclaimed Orchard Road. Public amenities are within reach. Restaurants, shops, MRT are all within walking distance.

Hotel is centrally located with close access to malls. Short walk to the mrt station and bus stops. Room in good size. Comfortable bed, with a good view of the pool and trees. Room . I think, was newly refurbished. Generally good hotel ambiance. Hotel staff- from front desk, room attendant, Restaurant and concierge were all helpful and frienldly.
Brand New hotel, great location, friendly staff. Small but confortable rooms.
Brand New hotel, great location, friendly staff. Small but confortable rooms.

OK stay, choose the room with view, it's worth it. Cleanliness is an issue, nut the housekeeping staff is quick responding our call and very attentive to our needs, need some improvement on breakfast menu, and bathroom supplies... Be patient during check in, dont ruin your own mood, just imagine the infinity pool, but dont come on the peak season, you cant enjoy , crowded pool
Excellent Stay, with very cosy and clean room. Would recommend my friends and family to stay when they here in Singapore.
great stay, will keep coming back to this hotelm comfortable bed, nice city view, shopping life
It was a good stay for our family because it is close to a mall and a public train.

we actually woke up late for check out time but reception was kind enough to allow this delay. Room is nice and cozy with comfy bed and also... it was just a 5 mins walk to Tanjong Pagar MRT. It eas very convinient. If you need any food or drinks in the night, there is a 24 hours super market opposite the hotel. Every is so great. A good stay...
The stay was pleasant. Best part was its Jacuzzi by the pool. Room was fantastic.
Great staycation. Overall a good experience with m hotel.

I'd booked a Sun/Mon weekend stay. It is very crowded, so expect to receive your room after 3pm (I'd got mine at 4pm). If you checked in early, you may use the pool facility while waiting for the rooms. We spend much of our time in the pool during the stay.
Great as it includes tickets to USS & SEA aquarium. However beds were too soft therefore not very comfortable.

First, the hotel lobby reminded me standing in the nature, the waterfall scene on the screen makes me relaxed. Staff was very attentive. Even thought it was busy time for Check-in at 2.10 pm, she kept smiling and helped check-in for us. The room was amazing with beautiful city view at night! Amenities was well equiped and the Oil from its own spa makes us feel more relaxed and comfortable. We enjoyed a lot here,
Very unforgatable moments, we really enjoyed our stay.
The stay is great. Only reason to stay in this hotel is the access to its pool at the top floor.
Feel Comfortable, near to Mount E, good food, Nice Staff, close to shopping area, Big room.

Overall was fun and satisfactory. This was my 2nd visit to hard rock hotel. Not sure due to what reason the check in time always delayed. The recent trip my check in time was 6pm. When we reached Waited almost 4 hrs. However the manager in return allow us to check out late and did explain and apologize to us which we think was acceptable. Overall the kids enjoyed the activities the food especially the swimming pool. Most important our families have fun and was a relaxing trip.

Great time we have and actually this our second time to stay in this hotel, because they give us good service, we come again and this time we bring another family with, and they are satisfy with RELC, we will recommend this Hotel to our friends and relatives
will be back again, the hotel is nice, reasonble price...near shopping mall and greenery park

The room is huge! I was holding a xmas eve party with about 15pax and there was more than enough space for every to move about. Even have space to play twister. The location is good as it near orchard. About 15mins walk from orchard tower. However its difficult to wait for cab at the hotel, have to walk further down the road to hail a cab. The building is rather old so the facilities are so so.. the soundproof is really bad. Was rudely woken by the the banging of the doors in the morning. It was that bad the decos I place up fall off from the wall. Overall good stay, recommend if you cant get a chalet,you can consider this hotel.

We enjoyed it much. The staff, including the security guard (who speaks few Tagalog words), are very friendly, welcoming, and helpful. The internet connection is very reliable. The location is strategic as it is near everything you wanted to see and go to in Singapore. Thank you for serving us.
Comfortable and easy. Food options were good. Staff is efficient and attentive.
Very good service, friendly staff, really large rooms and 15 minute walk to Orchard Road shopping and night life.
It was fine. No major complains. Great for a convenient hotel to get to places but not for any sort of romance for a Couples

We really enjoyed our stay at BIG hotel. The rooms are small but they are clean, modern and comfortable. There are heaps of shops, markets and hawker-centers nearby and the nearest train station is about a 5 minute walk away. The staff were really friendly and efficient - we had some ants in our room when we first arrived (nothing major) and they moved us straight away. We also got caught in the rain one night and had our clothes awkwardly strung up around the room to dry so room service left a big pile of coat-hangers on the bed for us the next day. We stayed for 6 nights and loved it - amazing value for money in a city like Singapore!
Moderately satisfied. Conveniently located. Easy access to shopping centres. Good food. Clean and comfortable room.
Very good, confortable and the staff (front desk are very friendly)

My stay at Oasia was very pleasant. The hotel was centrally located with easy access to public transport and major shopping areas. Staff were very proactive and provided excellent and timely service. Great value for money with Agoda discount as well.
Room service menu could be better but not detracting from overall satisfaction of room enjoyment.
Was ok. Need to work on TV reception that was awful and accepted by staff as fine. Please lower your food and drink prices. Highest in surrounding area. We ate all meals somewhere else.
Really enjoyable. Did what I needed and was good value.

Great! It is our new favourit hotel in Singapore. The total value was great! Much cheaper comparing to others in the same level. The unlimited free local & international call were unbelievable! It was very comfortable and economic to have local smart phone with you while going outside the hotel.
We had a really nice time here, and the hotel was great value. The gymnasium is well equipped and the pool is lovely.
This is the 5th time I have stayed here, and will continue to book this hotel when visiting Singapore.
It was good and comfortable
great value for a design hotel, free wifi, taxi was predominant form of transportation to get to/from hotel

This hotel isn't for everyone. The public areas are a little run down and it doesn't have any of the trappings of a fancy hotel. But it's such a great value - every other hotel is about twice the cost - and offered everything I needed, so I was very happy. Bathroom was new, room was large, bed was firm, great city views from my high floor. The lighting was ok, not great, and free wifi was convenient but not that fast. Breakfast room lacked atmosphere but the selection was decent for a small operation (noodles, fried eggs, salad, dim sum, cereal, pastries, etc). The location is ok - close to orchard, perfect if you're using taxis, but you might do a little better if you want to rely on the MRT. If you are looking for great value and don't need fancy, this is the place.
The pool view over Marina Bay is spectaculous.Best view you can get in Singapore. Right above MRT station, easily accessible.
Request for a high floor room to have a great city view. Reception was superb. Room looks run down.
Stay was good. Was being upgraded to M Club. Had a taste of the M Club/Lounge. Was super good. Excellent service and attentive staff. Great breakfast and dinner.

Great hotel experience, room was very comfortable, staff was friendly and helpful. The Pool is wonderful with a great view of the city. Shopping around the hotel is convenient. Waterfront light show was wonderful with beautiful lights and music.
It was a great stay! Lovely, will visit again if there's another opportunity!
Nice to go back to a very confortable bed after a tiring day.
Nice to go back to a very confortable bed after a tiring day.
one the best hotels in singapore, good location, just in the dorsteps of universal studios, can'y wait to come back and stay longer.
I like my say in this hotel, so recommend this hotel
Fantastic, but no bathrobe or mineral water provided. Lack in that aspect, else the bed is very comfy.
Great hotel with nice spacious room. MRT is just around the corner, located in a nice neighborhood

Im very pleasure the Rendezvous Grand Hotel Singapore. The room are nice and space. The staff so friendly, easy to access the MRT. Next time, if i have a trip in Singapore, I will stay at Rendezvous hotel

This was my first stay at Parkroyal and the hotel lived up to my expectations. It has a great location in the heart of little India. I had just come from a tour of other Asean countries and it is simply great to be in a great hotel with so many resturants and shopping centres within walking distance of the hotel. My experience in this hotel simply beats my stay at the other hotels in the other countries I have visited. I will definitely stay here again.
Great. in room dining was too long, wanted to order some more food however decided not to as it was too long Toilet cleanliness below expectation Construction noises can be heard
We were pleased to receive a complimentary birthday cake to celebrate my Son birthday in the hotel. We overall had a very pleasant stay in the hotel.
Considering we were expecting a luxury hotel, but in essence this hotel is past its use by date. Bathroom musty smelling, shower water ran all over the floor, walls badly in need of attention.
I having a great and enjoyable stay at this hotel because the staff is helpful food is good and the best part is the room is clean and tidy.

I must commend the hotel personnel, especially Elaine of the concierge. Very articulate and solicitous. My only concern is the absence of wifi spots within the hotel. I hope you can at least give 3 hours of free internet use in the room free of charge. The attending guy for our luggage were also very helpful,however the petite guy who is fair-skinned is not so friendly. Room and bathroom are clean thought the mosaic tiles of the shower room is faded and rough. I like the ice maker at the hotel lobby of our floor.
The is a nice hotel with very new and nice decoration. The room size is acceptable, but no free Wi-Fi provided. Very good environment, close to casinos and entertainment.
It was a pleasant and fun stay. Hard rock pool is much better though and it is a distance to walk from Michael to the hrc pool
Had a great stay at the hotel, The only compliant are the door knob are rusty and bathroom are kinda small. Other then that its a great hotel.

Queen sized bed not available for superior rooms, staff was really thoughtful and sweet, and upgraded us to M club suite. Room is big even through toilet is a bit small. Nice hotel in good city centered location. Hotel a little bit old, would be much better with some upgrading

Upgraded to deluxe room Staff were all friendly and very helpful (including the fantastic cleaning ladies what a great job they do) Buffet breakfast was great but a bit expensive so if you don't book breakfast with your room expect to pay nearly $40 per person for breakfast. Same quality buffet breakfast had in a budget hotel down the road for $20 per person. Overall a great hotel. Would stay there again.

I very much enjoyed the stay at Goodwood Park. The facilities are what you'd expect at a 5 star hotel, nice design, clean, comfortable and fully equipped. But the service really sets this hotel apart, they make you feel right at home. I'll be back (again) for sure.
no issues had a lovely stay. orchid room very roomy and the benefits were a big bonus.

The hotel lived up to the expectations of a 5 star rating including the price of the breakfasts which were not included in the room rate. |Service and facilities were good. The second swimming pool was peaceful and shaded.
everything is good especially the good quality of the restaurant and café.
The best part of the stay is swimming pool. Kids love the pool and spent most of the time there
good well maintained fine clean comfortable perfect location
Happy stay
Price is very reasonable for a central location ,it very convenient near to shopping malls,food outlet and night life is just 10minutes away, Airport is within 20minutes drive.

the show we stayed at the resort world sentosa hotel michael entry to casino, and play at the universal studios , entry to the SEA Aquarium , shopping, etc, although the hotel even provides several activities such as casino, universal studios, stores , sea aquarium, entertainment all around but the hotel room away from the noise, I enjoyed the stay in quiet, cozy, comfortable bed

Happy, exciting and very comfortable. I can use the swimming pool and gym anytime. Most of the staffs are very friendly and helpful. And the bed and pillows, OMG, I LOVE THEM!! Plus, the FREE MINIBAR which has been refilled everyday. They even provide a coffee machine with the selection of taste. My goodness, what else would you ask for? Not forgetting, the starbuck is just around the corner if you want to hangout at night.
It's a wonderful trip in Stamford hotel, the room is amazing just opposite to the marina bay.

the design of swimming pool is great, especially for children. room and bed is big and comfortable. location is good which is easy to approach the Casino, food and train in Sentosa. room service is good but the check in process takes long waiting time.

I love the Hard Rock Hotel which it convenience for me and family to have fun at Universal Studio, but one thing i very dissapointed is the room which i mean the toilet dont have any ventilation, and i feel it's not that proper due to it open space.

This hotel is one of the regular hotels I stay when I go to Singapore. The best thing is the hotel is located in the orchard road which is lively and lots of shopping options available. The staff are very friendly and attentive. I would definitely stay here again.
i really love this hotel because of its location. Very accessible to high end stores. The rooms are large and clean. The staffs are very. And experience great breakfast in the spice restaurant.

I had a comfortable stay in Carlton Hotel. The staff were friendly and housekeeping responded to our needs so efficiently. The cleanliness is what I value best in this hotel. At least the beds and curtains were very clean. I like how the design is simple and elegant. I had a problem with the shower though. The heater would switch from hot to cold on its own during the bath. The water was not too strong. But all in all im happy. Just not what I expected for this level of hotel.
Price is very competitive. We did not use the facilities but they seem ok. Room was spacious and well equipped. Staff is efficient. Location couold not been better in Little India.
Centrally located, ample shopping and food selections within vicinity and hotel staff are friendly and helpful.

Both the check-in and check-out process were efficient but the hotel is short of supporting staff like house keeping and conciege. It took 45mins and 3 follow-up phone calls for the house keeping staff to get us two extra bathing towels on the first night of our stay!On the departure day, we had to look for conciege staff to help storing our luagages and it took us 15mins to wait for someone to show up at the counter! Likewise at the time when we tried to take our luagages from the store room to the cab, nobody was there and we had to run up and down to get someone to help!

When you come to Singapore often, everything becomes standard fare except for the hotel you check into. You will like the best your money can buy with no surprises waiting for you in the bedroom or bathroom, check-in within 5 to 10 minutes and a breakfast that would do justice to the trappings of the hotel. For me, that Grand Park City Hall Hotel is a surprising tick to all the things I have come to expect for a first class hotel and they can add one more tick to my plan to re-visit it.

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay in Peninsula Excelsior. It was great that it is very close to the MRT station. Also, if you have time, visit the Funan digital life mall for all the electronic gadgets at low price.

No problems but would like to make one comment. The room I booked was the "Premier: plus internet", which was 32sqm compared to 29sqm for the Deluxe room. On check in, I was told that my room was upgraded to a Premier Club room, but would not be entitled to the club facilities. I thought that this was a bit petty. Furthermore, for a club room, the room was pretty compact, especially if you have 2 suitcases plus a Couples of hand carry bags. The bathroom was also quite compact.
I like this hotel because the location and the property have character - it is in Little India which is always buzzy and interesting and the club floor is nicely appointed with good attentive staff.

5 star hotel but without the service of a 5 star. the swimming pool is great on the rooftop but only 1.2 m deep and not allowed for kids. the breakfeast are very expensive for a buffet breafeast (39SGD exclude service and GST), but have to stay there for the unique experience off the biggest highest swimming pool in the world.

A very good hotel to stay. Easy access to shopping center, food markets, and others. Safe and sound street to walk. Within few minutes walk to Bras Basah and Bugis MRT station, hence this will be an extended journey for those who seeks for adventure. Very like the wood flooring inside the room too.
I will always book this hotel coz of the good service and nice room.

The concierge is really kind to provide us directions and advice to travel to city center to buy things we would like to find. However, there were still several things that disappointed me. 1. the room air conditioning is rather humid even though I tried setting to dry mode. It may not be suitable for middle aged people who are prone to arthritis to stay in the room. 2. The staff who worked in the breakfast area seemed not to welcome people eat there. With bland look on her face without asking permission, a middle aged woman actually pulled our plates away just right after we finished our meals, implying her anxious level to get us move out. We stayed two nights, so the next morning we decided to find breakfast outside of hotel. 3. After the room makeup, all towels in the room were simply removed without providing us new ones. I had to call the reception to make requests. It makes no sense to say that she may have forgotten. This is her day to day ritual. all in all, we were made to feel unwelcome with the series of disappointing manners. Only the Indian concierge man was the one who genuinely cares about guests.
Overall an excellent stay as near Orchard area and yet not crowded with the shoppers.

The spa is really good. Need to book early as therapists are limited. The food is so-so, it depends on whether you like exotic European food or not. It is more of a food-experience, than the taste of it.

A very friendly greeting at the door and prompt luggage processing set a high standard of staff performance that was maintained throughout our stay. We were lucky to get a room upgrade that was a treat too. The bed was extremely comfortable which helped us get a quick recovery after our air journey. We will use this hotel for future stays in Singapore.
Good stay for business but the local surroundings are not inspiring. A huge hospital and a medium mall. No easy (walking) access to tourist or entertainment areas.

We stayed over the weekend for our birthday celebration. I have lots to comment but first let me begin with a good note. I really appreciate the thoughtful gesture of a service staff at the reception. She kindly sent a cheese platter and wine to our room after hearing our horrifying experience at the cliff restaurant. I am sorry that we did not get your name. Hope you see this message, thank you once again. Now about the hotel itself. The architecture is no doubt a beautiful piece of art, marrying old and new perfectly. We stayed in a sea view room and the view is simply stunning. However the room is already showing signs of fatigue. Surprising considering this is a luxury 5 stars hotel and only 4 years old? The hotel is a lot more crowded than I expected as well. There were a few big groups and families, making the pools, Knolls and Library rather rowdy at times. At breakfast, we, and quite a number of hotel guests, had to wait quite awhile for a table. I understand the hotel is fully booked and this is not uncommon for other hotels but again I expect more from Capella considering their claim to be "One of the best Singapore hotel experiences". Service was pleasant but did not hit the right spot. We were warmly welcomed at the lobby and was very excited when we knew we have a personal assistant attending to our needs during our stay. But sadly, besides explaining the facilities and showing us to our room, we did not see much of her later. I had high expectation after hearing so many good reviews. I really wanted to love the experience and thought I would for, among the many luxury hotels in Singapore, I have chosen Capella to celebrate our birthdays. However, though not unpleasant, I did not walk away thinking that we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves and would return again. It was alright but one would think Capella is more than just "alright", isn't it?

We stayed here for four nights in August this year. We got a taxi direct from Changi Airport and our luggage was immediately unloaded from the Taxi by a friendly concierge. A comfortable room with a view to the Hotel Swimming Pool…and the beds were soooo comfortable…..and designed for sleeping!!! The Bathroom is spacious and there’s a reasonable sized bath and roomy shower compartment. Breakfast is downstairs and there’s plenty of space…even though the Hotel was full there was not the feeling of being crowded. We walked several times to the busy Bugis Mall and tried out the food court which has some delicious choices. And there’s an enclosed Mall adjoining this Hotel which is well worth a visit.
Had we know that we can collect tickets a day before check in, we would have done so. We end up not having enough time to cover all the three attractions that were included in the hotel package.

Knowing that it was my bf birthday, the staff had delivered a slice of cake and even allowed us to have a slightly late checkout at 2pm. The hotel is situated in very good location, close to major shopping areas and attractions. The rooms were recently refurbished and was clean and comfortable. What impressed me most was the friendliness of the staff; they were very attentive to details and always bring a smile to them. Highly recommend to anyone who wish to stay at city area.

This hotel location is fantastic. You can go for prayer at the Sultan Mosque, just crossing the road. There are a lot of Muslim stalls & restaurants. It also houses shopping malls, where you can find good clothes and groceries from the mini markets.
hm good good
pleasent stay. indians must not think of any other hotel during their stay in singapore
I just love the hotel, it's located in the IT place of Singapore, the Orchard Road, of course. It is near to everything and the staff are friendly and helpful.
I just love the hotel, it's located in the IT place of Singapore, the Orchard Road, of course. It is near to everything and the staff are friendly and helpful.
nice hotel within the city area. building is traditional but modern with big hotel ground. like living in a country side but you are within 10 mins walk to orchard road shopping belt.

This hotel is under the same management wth other RWS hotel. Quite dissapointing with the toiletries! Price is higher than other RWS casinos hotel, but staff, toiletries, minibar counter all are the same! Quite dissapointing.
The stay itself was ok but there are few thing that are not up to a standard of a 5 star hotel. No customer service..
Surprised they are renovating the outlook, they should probably concentrate on the rooms rather than outlook. Near shopping areas, easy access from this hotel. food can be found everywhere.
Surprised they are renovating the outlook, they should probably concentrate on the rooms rather than outlook. Near shopping areas, easy access from this hotel. food can be found everywhere.

The stay was as great as expected as it was chosen because of its great location. The room is a bit small, but unless you will spend alot of time in the room, it doesnt really matter. It is 2 MRT stops from Orchard, so it's pretty much in the city but without the crazy traffic and noise.

mine was ok but there has been some error that my friend could not check in even if pre booked the room .We had to rush for meeting and came back in the later part of afternoon and still could not check in. Had to ask our contact to call the hotel in order to check in. I think the staff with is incompetent or their computer system is not working
good but the staff needs to be more competent or hotel systems
Movie channels were not free. Internet was not free. Room's was very big and had comfort stayed.
Location was good . Everything was easily accessible.
My stay was comfortable as it is convenient and I can move around freely. Also there are many shops around

It wasn't bad but ithink the room and bathroom is very small, i'm not a big person, so if you think that you're always having problem with space then don't go to this hotel. It's clean and central to mrt, walking distance to bugis market and orchard rd. Taxi is cheap in singapore anyway, so nothing to worry about.

Very centrally located, have mustafa nearby and a lot of food in the night time. 5 mins walk from a big shopping mall - City Square more There is a nice buffet restaurant in the hotel with a affordable price and staffs here are polite and nice
Hotel good factor is the location near to shopping malls,the famous Bugis market & restaurants, food stalls like hawker center) But Definitely overrated for a 4 star hotel.
hotel is in center of orchard road, near thai embassy
Great, easy access to every where. Easy access a public transportation. Near to local tradisional food. All staff really help full.
Hotel location is good, very near to the bugis street. However, the price is expensive with the level of the hotel, but since the hotel is clean and good location, we may still choose it next time

Nice small hotel with a great location in Bugis area. Easy access to public transportation. Local restaurants & electronic shops within walking distance. Art school just besides the hotel. Friendly staff.
Will definitely return to M Hotel for value for money and good location

Generally a value for money hotel (under promotion). Very accessible to theme parks and casino. Unfortunately, check in time is fairly late at 3pm and pool/gym is relatively small. gym and swimming pool do not open late.
The room is clean and large a enough. The lobby very nice and huge. The hotel near rchard road where is central business and shopping area.

a reasonable hotel that offers a full club package, however i think the package is let down by a pretty standard room,certainly not a 5* room, a very central location and the staff are quite efficient
Not too bad, it just that there is not much restaurants with afforadable price around

this is the second time I stayed at Parc Sovereign hotel. and the second impression is that, i just notified the location is quite near to MRT station, Little India approx. 10-15minutes by walking. it's just that you need to exit the correct way upon arriving at the station, and go back to hotel.
it was very great as usual. The hotel is located in the center of shopping area.
Concierge were great in giving our Bridge & Groom a free room upgrading to a Suite.

The hotel is filled with tourists from India coming through a travel agent. Not the best place to stay in if you are doing the bookings on your own as the whole staff is tuned to a specific kind of tourists. They expect the visitors to use the room primarily for sleeping and taking breaks in between tourist activities. The facilities in the room and the service left a lot to be desired.
Overall, it was good. Staff could improve on their service and efficiency

My stay was good the only areas that I would suggest improvements on is the beds, every time I have stayed at Goodwood Park I have had a very hard bed which causes me back pain the next day. On the first night we waited for 40 minutes for someone to serve us for drinks and they only came when we walked around twice to call them.
Rooms are a bit old, gym a bit old, bathrooms very small. Still location excellent.

The hotel is conveniently located near the Orchard road, it has big terrace but there's no place to sit. Internet is very slow. Other than these, there's nothing to complain about this hotel. The room is spacious, bed's comfortable but only have 1 pillow to a bed.

It was 6 of us travelling (4 adults and 2 kids) and we didn't wanna be staying in separate rooms so we looked for one room which could occupy all of us. RELC was very suitable yet location was not ideal. However, just right behind the hotel there's a bus stop which takes us to orchard road and come back. Walking was a bit far for our 7 & 9 year old boys but we had fun walking anyway because the scenery was great (the hotel was surrounded by nice housing compounds with nice air too).
My stay at Parc Sovereign was okay, quick check-in and fuss-free. Room was clean even though a little small. Hotel is situated in a prominent location with many eatries around as well.

It is our second time there and we really liked the cleanliness and convenience of the hotel. the new bras basah MRT station adds to the already well connected transport network that bring you anywhere.

the service of the staff is impeccable. booked the garden villa for my wedding proposal and had them arrange for in-room romantic dining. the hotel's preparation was seamless and they even gave me a complimentary tattinger champagne. my fiancee loved the spa treatments at auriga spa!
No problem. Would stay here again for my next visit

Staying in the hotel is great. good location and near to almost all big shopping centre and mall. Also near to orchard mrt station. Very happenning surrounding at night. clean hotel with friendly staff. nice swimming pool. large bed provided in the room. The free wifi given also at high speed. Overall, we have pleasant stay at the hotel.
This is old hotel under new management and give a new look to their room. Not bad breakfast menu and it is perfect place for holiday.
Excellent. Love the big room and it's close to eating places and public transport. Friendly staff who has good customer service.

My family and I, love this Hotel very much, this is our second time staying in this Hotel and we will definitely will be back. Thanks to Orchad parade who gave us the same room that we stayed before on the 6th floor, same floor with the Swimming pool and the kids are so happy they just need to jump from the room to go to Swimming pool.

I bought the 3D2N package. Bathroom is huge, nice balcony with a water park view. However, it is not close to the major attractions. The shuttle is every 15 mins from Hard Rock Hotel and the last one is 11pm. It takes me around 15-20 mins to walk to Casino. Only the great thing is you can ask the staff open the gate for you at the lobby (2 mins to the waterpark).
Good, room comes with a big balcony. Breakfast spread is reasonable.

I've stayed for 7 nights during my training in Singapore. I've also bring my wife & 1 yo baby during the weekend. My parents also booked separated room. So, below is my review : Location This hotel located right beside Shangrila Hotel. 5 mins walk to the nearest bus station. 15 mins walk to Orchard MRT (every morning, I walk to Marriot hotel on foot for the training, it takes approx 15 mins). Room This is the great point for the hotel. I booked for Deluxe Room and I got a HUGE room (It is difficult to find a huge room like this in Singapore). It about 50 sqm. My baby loved crawling over the carpeted room. I got King Size Bed. They also provided double queen size bed for the twin deluxe room. You also can have microwave in the room (plus point). The bathroom is quite big with bathtub and shower. They also have connected room between king size & double queen room. Breakfast Decent breakfast with limited menu (maybe because I order via Travel Agent, I got different breakfast than others) :( Service The service is very good. At the first, I got dissapointed because they give double queen room instead of king room. It takes about 15 mins to change the card key. But the bell boy was very friendly & cheerful to make me more patient. I also enjoy the hospitality of the room service aunty on the 11th floor. She always smiled in the morning when take my laundry bag. And the most important thing, the recepsionist manager upgraded my parents room from superior to double queen size room. So, we have side by side room. We really grateful. Thank you sir! Overall, I recommended this hotel for your stay in Singapore. For a 3 star hotel, it is very worthy. Actually, this hotel is a language training center. So you can find a lot of students in this hotel. But it is not an annoyance at all.

It was over the weekend and the CBD area was empty, which I LOVED. The hotel is nicely decorated and the room is huge for a hotel in Singapore. For the amount paid, it was worth every penny. With the awesome ocean view, a bathtub, hot tub and swimming pool, my day was kept busy. I would definitely return again soon.
great huge room and balcony . huge bathroom and great relaxing place
It is situated in the central business area. Its very near to Marina Bay Sands and airport.

Good , lots of night clubs bars pubs nearby we had fun as a Couples met some nice girls from Venezuela try brix nightclub under Hyatt grand we may stay there next time or marina bay sands . Either way it was fun

location is acceptable. bathroom and room is a bit small. the carpets at corridor and within room is so dirty... water was dripping from the ceiling of the corridor when we arrived and the carpet in the corridor got wet, but i the water dripping was attended by technicians 3 days after our stay. the swimming pool is ok but the sunbath area can seldom get sunshine. the jacucci was good but only worked on first day of our stay. towels seem dirty too. i will not stay in the hotel again.

I always stay in Swissotel Stamford, this time I was disappointed in seeing the four tiles around toilet flush valve were lose and about to fall out. The other thing I was suppised to see the tub was cracked around the drain. neither of these effected my stay. I still think your Internet is to much per day.
I chose York Hotel because this hotel is very close to Mount Elisabeth Hospital. This hotel also near to Orchard shopping center.
Business success as the customer also stay at the same hotel. Good that I chose to stay here as everything comfortable. Thank you all staff and Agoda
We always enjoy our stay at the Ibis Bencoolen every time we visit Singapore
I did many activities in the hotel and outside the hotel, I felt and my family very comfortable.
I am very happy staying at RELC hotel. I will be staying again if I visit Singapore.
very good though it was a short stay i really enjoyed

As said above the location of this hotel is great. But other than that i find this hotel is not really a five stars hotel. In addition the staffs (front desk & bell desk) are not friendly. I am very disappointed with their attitude. This damage the picture of the hospitality of Asian country such as Singapore.
I feel it compact and not comfortable. For the room conditional is neither clean or dirty. The bath room water might split out, cause it was so swallow. I would not choose this hotel again.

I enjoyed my stay in this hotel. I was hesitant to book after reading the reviews but went ahead to book as I like the location. I am very pleased with this hotel upon checking it. It is spacious, clean and with free in room wifi. The bed is also very comfy. I will stay in this hotel again.

It was good, as we would expect of a hotel of this standard. We stayed at an extremely busy time (over the Christmas holiday period), so the counters tended to be a little crowded. Nevertheless, as we had two young children with us, we had numerous requests to the hotel and they accommodated us each time, for which we are grateful.
It was a great stay. I had a chance to have breakfast in its restaurant which offer Halal food. Great shopping - next door is the DFS.

I booked a Club room with Club benefits. I love the infinity pool and enjoying the free cocktails that came with the Club room. Staff were nice and polite. I have enjoyed my stay very much. The only bad point was that the room that I had, does not have the city view. It is facing a condominium.

Stayed on the 28th floor at tower 1 with ocean view. We can see the Gardens by the bay clearly and at night, the lights were beautiful. Nice sunset and sunrise view. Booked on a Monday which is cheaper. Nice toilet but flushing button located at back of t

I have a good memorable stay experience in Equarius Hotel. I love this hotel and is the BEST hotel I ever stay in Singapore. As I am a regular hotel visitors in Singapore and I will definitely recommend my friends to this wonder hotel.
Good. I like it. Only the check in and out need improvement. Waited too long.

I like staying at this hotel! The view from the 51th floor is really beautiful! The room is big and clean. The swimming pool is kids friendly. The pool bar is good. The staff are friendly. The breakfast buffet menu offers a lot of variety & the food taste good! Their restaurant on the top of their highest floor has amazing view and atmosphere. Will surely come back to this hotel again.
the hotel was over rated and too expensive. The room is too small was well for a twin bedroom.
I loved this hotel because there was a lot of nearby shopping areas like bugis street and it was clean
I am regular guest in Park Royal! It is nice if the staff does not change too often - so it is like coming home!

i was warmly welcomed by the staff and they have the record in the system that i have been to the hotel before and they actually automatically upgraded me to the club room. i was so happy becos i did not expect that. club room has a better city view but the room was quite small. i feel that oasia hotel is value for money becos of the location and the service. have you been to their gym and swimming pool, warmed jacuzzi, sauna and steam room??? me and husband totally love it... i was having fever but i still jumped into the pool haha.. couldn't resist. i really liked their service and facilities, excellent location and you will never go hungry.
as i need to go to raffles hospital it really near by.
My stay was very good and I will continue tostay again.
It was really great to experience staying at Swissotel the Stamford, I hope to have chance to stay again at this hotel

I really enjoy staying at this hotel. It is right in the heart of things but just far away to make it peaceful. I love the old architecture design of the hotel and the public areas, particularly the gardens and pools are lovely. I can never complain about the service
My stay was ok, some staff seem to be somewhere else, and had to ask many times to have things done. Other staff were great

Comfortable, nicely customer sevices in front area. Very kindship cause i spend night with my family actually my little child, so i need clean area, also for the people around.thank u so much for ibis bencoolen hotel. Next time will be able to spend my sleep time on there. Lol..

I staycation around Singapore hotel every weekend and was pretty surprise that Village Hotel Bugis was beyond my expectation. Front desk staff was really smiley and helpful. The next day I woke up late as the bed was really very comfortable, compatible to 5stars hotel's bed. I called front desk wanting to request for a later check-out at 12.30pm, the staff cheerfully said "dun worry ms tan you can take ur time, i will extend your room till 3pm." i was impress by the initiative.
Singapore Friend Suggested this Amara Hotel, and internet search.
I enjoyed my stayed. The area around the hotel is renovating but it does not affect my stay.
Very nice..the kids enjoyed our stay at this hotel, the staffs are friendly..
I had a great time at rendez vous. Wifi very fast.I want to go back there

The hotel is great. It is new and the room is clean and comfortable. It is situated directly above Novena Station with a subway connecting the train station to the hotel. Very convenient and easy commute. Only about 15 - 20 minutes travel to any tourist attraction in Singapore. It has a big shopping mall next to it which can be accessed through the subway, with restaurants, supermarkets and shops. The only bad thing is the TV transmission and the cleaning staff. The TV will freeze sometimes due to slow transmission of signal. And the cleaning staff will not provide new set of clean cups, glass and spoons and cotton buds after we used it.And the air condition is a bit too cold. The wifi is good and it has a nice swimming pool and gym. The Novena area is nice and we went for a walk around the hotel at night which was relaxing.
Staying at this hotel is nice and comfortable. The receptionist is very friendly and polite. But the room services is very slow. The hotel need more improvement hotel room services.

Strategically located in the main shopping belt of Singapore, Orchard Road. This hotel is old but very well maintained, nice architecture amid lush greenery. Orchard Road is right beside the hotel, literally few steps away. The rooms are large and clean. Many choices of rooms available too, including poolside. Goodwood Park is well-known for good service and good food.

My stay at the Hotel was great. The hotel met my expectations. Room was large and clean. Bed was comfortable and with more than enough pillows. The location is just a 5 to 10 mins walk to Orchard MRT Station and ION Orchard - which is one of the newest and biggest mall in Singapore with plenty of shops and a haven for luxury goods. Breakfast at the hotel was normal. I had expected more chinese fare from Tung Lok - which is the restaurant serving breakfast.
Clean rooms and confortable beds, close to public transportation, budget friendly hotel in central location, close to Arab Street area.

First time I visit MBS, I doubt that this Pretty big hotel is very complicated. But My doubt was just gone. When check in, very kind and speedy to check-in even if I arrived in early than normal check in time, 3PM. Housekeeping was also very fast. Fantastic view, Infinity pool you must try was really good. My kids enjoyed happily and they hoped to stay longer. Try city view!

There is 2 building operated by peninsula (Peninsula,excelsior).The hotel located at the centre of everything. The building a bit old we booked this hotel because it's on discounted and next to clack Que also there is a nice swimming pool(try it)
All staff were friendly, close to transport, markets and excellent for budget stay. Rooms not large but certainly comfortable.
Because it is good that is why most of the time we stay there.
This hotel is comfort, clean room with fast wifi internet. but brekafast is to poor.

This is my second staycation with capella.The hotel is located within walking distance from the beach. The hotel staff took initiative to accompany us to the beach as we did not know the way.The service staff were very friendly and efficent when attending our requests. Extremely service orientated.

Your staff from front office to F&B right down to concierge have changed my views about hospitality/ service in Singapore! For that, I must thank you. Encik Arshad was awesome!. It was already midnight when I finished making an online booking for Universal Studios; only to discover that I needed to print out the tickets. Your business centre was obviously closed. I called reception to ask for the opening hours of your centre. Encik Arshad asked whether he could be of service. I was delighted as I have to leave the hotel early the next morning! I have actually avoided visiting Singapore for the last 13 years. I've travelled to many parts of the world and by far the worst service/experience I've encountered was in Singapore and Paris. Though the Parisians have improved throughout the years, I was still sceptical about Singapore. Mandarin Orchard and Hilton@Orchard are two hotels that I will not patronised ever!. Thank you for a wonderful stay! You'll definitely be seeing more of us.

We stayed in a very beautiful harbour view room. We did not eat in any of its restaurants so I could not say but we had breakfast in one of the restaurants in raffles city and a 24 hr mcdo beside the lobby and the most crowded starbucks i have ever seen. You can have free internet if you become a member of swissotel you can do this online free of charge. We had a late flight so we had to leave our baggage and they later let us use their hospitality room which was really helpful.

I was glad to have been advised to upgrade my room if I have not forgotten his name he is Faiz. The upgrade cost me money but I believe it was worth while. The bed was a super King size which fitted my family nicely. We were frequently attended by this guy Syed. Friendly and hospitable. Sadly I didn't leave a complimentary slip to inform the management that their staffs did well to assist me and my family as I was a little tight handed and in a hurry. None the less over my short stay I surely felt very welcome.
The hotel is too big,not very personable,food overpriced
This is one of my favorite hotel. Overall services & facilities are very good . Nice&friendly staffs , Great rooms : very big space , light & nice decoration ,good view.

Stayed for business trip. Located in CBD and walking distance to Shenton Way, Marina Bay, Raffles Place. It was very convenient. Not only for business travellers, as Chinatown is also nearby. The room was clean and bright, WiFi worked very well. Buffet breakfast has limited food choice though.
the hotel is large but the room is not very fantastic, location is excellent, very near to orchard road the japanese restaurant is good
very nice staff in the frontdesk but the staff in restaurant is not good, not service oriented at all, react so slow and not helpful
The hotel is excellent.A good place to relax and enjoy your stay. It is strategically located and easy access to shopping and travel.

In which language will you be sharing your thoughtsIn which language will you be sharing your thoughtsIn which language will you be sharing your thoughtsIn which language will you be sharing your thoughts
So far so good,except not include breakfast.I have children which is enjoy playing in the swimming pool.So we spend alot of time in the pool.
the hotel is really "BIG" as the hotel logo "BIG" in reserve. Now i get the meaning of the logo why it is reserve. Apart from that, the room is clean, and the air-condition is cool.

My stay Swissotel The Stamford Hotel would have been had the services provided been prompt and very forthcoming. To begin from the check in counter, at the counter could not clearly tell what documents she required. She said she wanted the credit card used, so I gave her my partner`s card although the booking was made under my name. After a good ten minutes, she said that she could not retrieve the booking and asked me for the booking ID. I gave her that and even then she could not retrieve the booking made. Finally she called another colleague , to speak to us. The male colleague then clearly asked me whose name the booking was under. I handed him my identity card and then with my last name , he retrieve my booking . For a well known hotel like Swissotel , it is such a surprise this has occurred. I was taken aback when the manager told us that there is no complementary parking as well.
It is good but the room is so pretty small even the name of the hotel is "BIG". They call it as a minamalist concept where everything is compact but elegant.
It was great! just that location is quite some distance from the main activities area.

it was a great weekends escapade with my girlfriend. being centrally located it allows easy accessibility, getting around singapore looks more easier. the area where the delicious food stores are also located.the facilities like the swimming pool looks good too. overall, it is a great weekends escapade with your loved ones.

We had a pleasant stay in this hotel. The staff is amazing. We got a complementary upgrade and a late check-out. It is situated just perfectly with lush greens, the pools were very nice and it was clean.

It is quite convenience and it is walking distance to MRT station which can be connected to every shopping and sightseeing places. The room is quite big in size and comfortable bed with reasonable room rate.
It was nice, there was ice cream shop which is sugar free so my mother can eat it
It is nice experience. Staff recommended for room upgrading, in fact it is really a nice room, suitable for our family. Will definitely come back again during next visit to Singapore.
The bath room does not have good ventilation, it is a older hotel, many details not attended well, Like curtain is not hanging straight, caulking around shower, room does not smell fresh!!

We enjoyed most of our time there in the hotel room. It is located in the centre of the town where there are many things, in which we plan to visit. In all it is very good for our family because I can do my business and the family can enjoyed their stay in Singapore. I will be continue to choose this hotel for my next stay.

as soon as i arrive there i ask to some taxi drivers. it seemes they don't know much about orchard parade hotel. Even the locals didn't know where it is. It seems it isn't popular. But i'm glad i could find the hotel. It is really nice to take rest there after going around singapore.
the hotel locate next to a beautiful park which is nice view when wake up and have a walk
i really ove to stay in this hotel. This hotel is centraly located easy acess to all shoping malls as well as to business district.
overall, it is good, even though it is not extraordinary.
it was my pleasure to stay in hotel Ramada, Nice hotel,nice design, centrally located near to shopping area, good staff.
Very relaxing, peaceful, great customer service by all staff. It was great overall.
It is a good choice because it is very nice place to stay. The room is very big and clean . And it is very easy to go shopping n Orchard road .
Great hotel, centrally located and commute was easy. It is right smack at the start of Singapore's central shopping belt just right opposite the newest attraction Ion
Great hotel, centrally located and commute was easy. It is right smack at the start of Singapore's central shopping belt just right opposite the newest attraction Ion

Very satisfactorily. No fuss & I like the location for my purpose. It was easy to get to away from the congested areas. The room size is adequate with good service. I particularly liked that a Nepresso coffee machine was in the room. I asked for extra coffee pods & there was no hesitation in providing extras.
We really enjoyed and satisfied with the stayed, very friendly staff really have fun with them and the room services really good. Hope someday we will stay in this hotel again. Thanks a lots.
We really enjoyed and satisfied with the stayed, very friendly staff really have fun with them and the room services really good. Hope someday we will stay in this hotel again. Thanks a lots.
average. the front counter staff were totally confused when they could not find my booking even after I gave my confirmation copy. It took more than 30 minutes to get checked in. totally unacceptable
It was a good stay. Very comfortable and non intrusive. The staff was friendly and helpful. And most importantly, the location was great.
Pretty good. No complaints. Did not use hotel facilities much other than bed as family was out the whole day.
The best thing that I can say about this hotel is that it is located near to the MRT and shopping mall.

It was a good stay. There are a lot of good food around that area. It is also near to IT center Sim Lim Plaza. It is really a hotel with the right facilities and right pricing for business traveler like me to consider.

its was a good stay and value for money. room was big and comfortable to stay in. breakfast served was international and staff were good. managed to get information about things to do and they helped me with taxi and bag services. location was great and easy for me to move about and also not far from airport. over all enjoyed my stay there.

It was a good stay at the hotel, the staff were all very friendly.. I enjoyed my stay at the hotel very much. The price of the hotel is very reasonable.. The food at the hotel very great.. There are many good food around the hotel. To sum up my stay at the hotel is it is very pleasant. The staff of the hotel are very professional.

Staffs are very friendly and helpful. Overall an alright experience despite several shortcomings which is not critical. Food was ok but would suggest more variety as experience almost similar food over 3 days.
overall my friends from taiwan has very good impression on the hotel for its cleanliness and friendly staff.
It was grate & every member of my family had a great fun
It was great staying at this hotel.. and definitely pay another visit next time
It was great staying at this hotel.. and definitely pay another visit next time
It was great, I enjoyed the stay very much. Everything was very good.

staff doesn't seem to be smiling much, the reception that check me in was good to up-grade our room, it make our stay really good. the door men was not doing his job at all, when i arrive at the hotel with a huge luggage, with 3 of my young boys (7, 6 and 3 year old) and my finger was injure with huge bandage, he saw us coming in but stand till without coming forward to assist and worse pretend he didn't see it. Such service is really bad, hotel guest don't at any assistance at all even when they have nothing to do
I love my stay there and will back to this hotel again.
It was a comfortable stay at the luxury hotel. Nice design. Comfortable room. Access to casino, restaurants and Universal Studios.
It was a nice hotel, for family, business because centrally located, comfortable room, easy access tp public transport and surrounded by shopping centre just walked.

Experience was nice and pleasant. As it is centrally located, all the places of interest are close by including restaurants, local transport and shopping. Rooms are clean and big considering singapore standards.,

I liked the convenience of this hotel, right next to the Mustafa Centre which is open 24 hours and close to all the great restaurants and shops. The rooms weren't so bad. For the price you pay I dont really think its worth it. Employees of the hotel are downright unfriendly and rude and customer service is very slow. It is a bit noisy and you can hear people talking in the next room. We had been travelling around so much and were at that stage that we didnt care so much anymore, we were glad to be just heading back home and looking forward to our own home and bed.
It was brief but it was pleasant. I did not have the time during this trip to explore all of the hotel offerings. However, the front of house attentiveness will never be forgotten.

I was celebrating my boyfriend's birthday and I was very happy to be upgraded to the deluxe suite. The suite was superb with a big living area, cosy bed and huge bathroom with bathtub n tv. It was a very pleasant stay with Hotel Michael. Would love to visit it again.
It was a pleasant stay. The room was clean and the staff were friendly. however, there were not many choices for food around the area.

The room was spacious and the king size bed is great. The minus thing on our stay is the breakfast is so poor in food choice and taste. It's so recommended to bring food from a bakery or outside the hotel. Our stay is internet inclusive, and the internet is fast.
Pleasant stay, no major complaints ... a bit pricey thought.

The hotel turned out to exceed our expectation. The interior is beautifully designed, rooms are relatively large and cozy. Location of the hotel is very accessible, very close to airport, easy access to public transportation (bus stop in front of the hotel, 2 MRT stations back to back @Dhoby Ghoult and Bras Basah). Plenty of nearby eateries: Kopi Tiam, Coffee Bean, etc........Front desk staff is very efficient, our (early) checking in and (late) checking out was handled in timely manner. Housekeeping also very attentive/helpful in providing additional amenities. Our kids can go to join tour to Universal Studios by buying tickets via a travel rep desk at the hotel and go with the hotel shuttle.
I was not sure whether I was upgraded to the premier room since i was not listed on the premier lounge. But the floor was supposedly for premier rooms.
Enjoyable and meaningful.we will be planning to come back again to enjoy the pool and its emvironmentenvironment.
Overall is good. Some room for improvements would be on speed of staff service and not many taxi driver knows the hotel name. They know the place with the old name

We were pleasantly surprised to have our hotel room upgraded from classic to executive. The room was spacious and the bedding was sufficient for our family with kids. The pillows were extremely soft and comfortable. Swissotel is also easily accessible as it's centrally located. A lot of restaurants and the convenience of shopping which made us choose this hotel.
It was an excellent stay and I would highly recommend staying there for value of your travel dollars.
It was an unforgettable holiday I ever had. The hotel was great.
It was great staying in a nice room and comfortable bed, ate at the buffet resto, will visit again soon...
It was great. Free upgrade to the suite. The room was huge, everything was perfect except the TV has some problem, but was promptly solved.

It was super awesome. Free upgrade from Superior Room to Deluxe Room, because our room is not ready yet. Thanks for that! Great and friendly staff. Great breakfast but too bad it's not halal so we just ate bread, cereals and fruits. Overall it was a pleasant stay over the weekend. =)
Exceptional customer service.. can't say enough how attentive the staff were.
It was pleasant once I was moved to a room away from the construction that was occurring next to it.

The bed was really comfortable. Swimming pool was quite small but I didn't mind. They provide bathrobes and the bathtub was relaxing. However, they close their kitchen at night, so there were no options for room service to get food. No open restaurants near by after 11pm and very inconvenient location for food in the middle of the night since the hotel doesn't provide. All in all, friendly staff, comfortable stay and fast check-in.

The hotel was great! It is a very comfortable place to stay since it strategically located in the middle of just everything you need. You can have the variety of affordable foods to extravagant restaurants. Everything is just walking distance to shopping centers and every place you pass by is just a variety of excellent shops but most of all the hotel room is huge. It may not look like a very new hotel but it was properly maintained.
it was comfortable. Excellent and knowledgeable staff. They helped a lot with our trip.

The staffs are friendly, provided a clear information. I was very enjoy with my wife with the room facility. unfortunately, I didn't have time to enjoy the swimming pool but for sure next time I will.
It was great. We always stay there whenver we go to Singapore.

We would stay at the grand park again when we come back to singapore. The location was near the mrt which made it great to access the exciting things in Singapore. The room was really nice and modern, bathrooms were a bit small bit still really nice. The pool was great and never busy and the jacuzzi was a nice way to relax after a busy shopping trip!
it was fantastic.swimming pool . clean room. friendly staff
It is definitely nice hotel to stay and relax! But the price was too high. Will come back again with friends
it was good but not excellent. I have stayed in almost all 5 star hotel in that area. if I compare the price to quality, I wouldn't rate this hotel very good.

Thanks so much for your service during time I spent in Singapore. The hotel has a great team of service from reception till cleaner maids. Thanks so much for your kindly support, and understandble tourist situation. I'll come back it again.
Good but needs to clean the rooms properly. There were ants all over the place.
it was clean room but a very small room and dont have any closet
