it was fine and i really enjoyed it. i had no problems with my stay at goodwood park
Great, each time we visit Singapore we stay at the York.
Great hotel to stay in if you want to be in the middle of Singapore

I booked the hotel from Agoda with request for Large bed, but on the day i arrived, i was informed that the room only available for twin bed which not acceptable for us. We requested to have the large bed and said it won't be available on the non smoking floor. If we would like to have the large bed and non smoking floor we were requested to upgrade the room. As for me, this actually not really good, but since we're here for our short break, we agreed to upgrade to crystal club for additional around 80SGD. The lucky thing was only the breakfast was superb, as for the room is the same size like deluxe room that i booked previously. Overall stay, it still nice and quite happy with the room.
it was nice staying full of activities and adventures
It was very relaxing and comfortable. The friendly and helpful staff, the comfortable room and the wide spread of food at the buffet breakfast made our stay an enjoyable one.

My stay at the Oasia Hotel was great especially I really satisfied with the room, the location and the staffs. The room was so big with big windows and electric curtains, big TV , big bathroom, super comfy and big bed and everything in it was so perfect ^^ So i felt really hommy and comfort during the stay. The staffs were very friendly too and very helpful. And they are good in English so I didnt have any communication problem. The location is just so perfect it is perfectly located above Novena MRT. You can just go down from the lift to B3 and its connected to the Novena MRT. You dont have to go outside ^^ But, I got 2 problems in my room. The first one was the electric socket. It didnt work so I called the receptionist and they sent the engineer to held the problem. It was quick, I didnt have to wait for long. The second one was the TV. it didnt work and couldnt display the programs, so again I called the receptionist and they sent the engineer to held the problem. It took quite longer then the first one, but finally the TV worked again. Overall it was a really nice stay especially really satisfied with the room ^^ I strongly recommend this hotel for family / business trip since it has easy access to MRT station.
Relax and comfortable. Very near to the shopping areas which my wife and daughter enjoyed a lot. Clean and very convenient especially for oldies like me.

Little slow in room service but overall enjoyable. I would recommend more food menu including of all restaurant menu into it as customers might want to try out other food from other resturants (Like coffe lounge)

When checked in, the light above the luggage area was dangling from the ceiling and bulb had burned out, air con was very warm. After complaining about air con, technician came and fixed it, he agreed that it was just blowing air and changed a spare part. Light was not fixed till few days later when I specifically complained, how that was missed I don't know. The air con is definitely the big issue here, stayed for ten days, developed cough which went away everytime I left the room. Have your aircon serviced and cleaned please. Room was expensive for what it was, but then it's bloody Singapore. Staff was mixed, most were friendly. The doormen/porters were excellent, always friendly, helpful and welcoming. Reception staff could be warmer, friendlier. Checkout was quick but devoid of smile or friendliness and rather curt. Cleaning staff, mixed. On Saturday was practically shooed out of the room because was told most staff was off, and if I wanted my room cleaned I had to leave NOW, else he will move on upstairs and won't be able to come down to clean my room later. Had to call practically everyday to have room made up because I would leave for three hours or so and come back and room was still not made up unless I made a call before I left. That irritated me. Would I stay here again? No.
The room is large and comfortable. But i hate that there is no jet washer in the toilet.
As this is the first time we come across a toilet bowl with dryer :-) but overall the room was big n clean. Worth to give it a try :-)
The location was not very strategic. The fact that it was a one way road and its actually on arab st not victoria so confusing for taxis.
I wish they had free WIFi for the hotel stayers. Breakfast was quite nice
The hotel is a bit old. But overall it was ok. Good deal.for a last minute booking.
it was okay room was comfort but, in singapore, you can find other hotel that is cheaper but with same services
It was not bad at all except they charged their wifi ridiculously expensive
Rooms were clean. But the breakfast menu can be better with a little variety as it was almost the same menu every morning.

It was overall a pleasant experience and rooms were nice and big. However, check in was a slow process and the hotel staff seemed to be overwhelmed despite us checking in late that day. Otherwise, it was generally okay and I am likely to go back again
It was great. Nearby were a Couples of shopping malls where you could get quite a variety of food. Transport was great as it was right at the doorstep.
Overall it was ok. My children enjoyed the view(we were facing the dolphin lagoon[adventure cove]). They definitely love splashing in the bathtub even after swimming whole day at the waterpark.
One of the best hotel I've stayed so far in Singapore. The upgrade to Deluxe Suite was derfinitely a value for money. Looking forward to stay in this hotel again on my next trip.
it was awesome but maybe itll be better if there werre regukar changing of towels and kineb
Good location to shopping and heading to mrt was very near and it was all connected so I was very satified with all the location and services
perfect stay, good atmosphere , nice views, modern style and attractive design of the hotel , friendly stuff!
I really like the room because it was very big. Bathroom was big as well... and also a small desk is available where in you can sit down and do your your job.... Thanks!
I really like the room because it was very big. Bathroom was big as well... and also a small desk is available where in you can sit down and do your your job.... Thanks!
It was so disappointing. It certainly wasn't 5 star kind of hotel. Rooms were so poor and bad. Walls were peelings off. Room was incredibly smelly. It's a 3 star hotel for sure.

It was fun, it made me forget the burden of work left back home for a moment and brought back the child in me. It is strategically located near a lot of things such as theme parks (universal studios), food, chocolate stores, and a lot more.
Overall it was very good. Only issue was they did not clean/made room on the last day even after reminding them.

i did nt enjoy m,y stay in amara as the staff was not at all courteous .they did not provide any facility apart from room , even the switch point for the laptop charges were not provided when asked .no one ever picked up the call when i tried calling at the reception.

Except for some pounding noise coming from a nearby road construction which is only temporary, I am satisfied with the quality and service of the hotel. The size of the room is average but clean and well organized. There is a big traditional hawker center just a few minutes' walk from the hotel.
It was great , worth staying at the hotel and also it has a perfect location for shopping and food
The best feature is the fast internet, also location.
The best feature is the fast internet, also location.
After the upgrade to our room, most enjoyable. The club facilities are very good.

Even as RWS Hard Rock Hotel was fully booked on my day of check out, they still allowed me and my partner to be able to have the late check out of 230pm at no extra charges. We could safely leave our bags at the concierge and just head to the casino till late. we got back to claim our belongings at an unearthly hour. The pools were done up so well, that it could put certain hotels' pools to shame.
It would be perfect if there is in-room Wifi given free of charge to the hotel guests.

it is not the first stay over at carlton hotel Singapore. A enjoyable night with your loved ones and able to spend a quiet night in the room. the location is good and ideal where able to access to the most part of singapore looking for great food. the location is also accessible for people to move around singapore for shopping or leisure walk. overall, it is a great stay during the weekends

staying in RELC hotel, give us no regret. Located in Orchard, altough bit far, absolutely best location for public transportation. Look , Half hour by walk to orchard MRT but when you walk you will pass shopping malls. Just 1minutes walk to bus station. Surrounding with condo and very quite area so you can relax staying here. Cant say great breakfast because option is common and within 4days spend breakfast here, you probably get boring. But i'd like to comeback soon.
Very flattered experience. Nice room, nice bathroom, breakfast is good, staff is nice. Thank you
I was very enjoy my stay there and would recommend my family and friends to stay there.
I will just say in one word: it is comfortable, because the hotel is clean, and located near city center, very close to a Kopitiam, an eating place that opens twenty four hours.

My room was not clean. I can see food stains on the wall in my toilet and hair in my bathtub. Staff assigned a double-bed room for me, but she promised me a twin-bed room when I check in. It took me another thirty minutes to wait for the change. However, the staffs are very friendly there.
The only problem that i've got during my stays is the very poor wi-fi connection in my room.
This is my 2nd stay in Village Hotel Bugis. Take the same room (Deluxe Room) with Parquete Floor, Large & Comfy Bed, Large Window & Bathroom. Nothing to complain about. The contra: Outdated Lobby.

We're arrive late at night but still get a warm welcome greetings from the staff. The room was spacious and the king size bed is great. The minus thing on our stay is the breakfast is so poor in food choice and taste. It's so recommended to bring food from a bakery or outside the hotel. Our stay is internet inclusive, and the internet is fast.
i stay copule days in here and i was very enjoy with the hospitality. the room was so clean and the hotel locations is very strategic

The hotel is great, we chose the 3D/2N multi-attraction package and were not disappointed. The staff were friendly and gave us no hassle, even we came several hours before checking-in time. The room, its design are great and the twin-bed were comfortable for the three of us. The breakfast was also great, not only for Asians but also for many Westerners among the guests. It will be much much perfect if the room also comes with bathtub and free Internet. Overall, it's a pleasant stay and will definitely come back.

The hotel is definitely not cheap, but the room can actually accommodate 4 people as they have a sofa double bed in addition to the king size bed. The city view from the room is amazing, and the infinity pool on rooftop is a must-go place and only the hotel guests can access.

It's nice. When arrived, the staff quickly served us. He upgrade our room from superior to deluxe for free. And when checked out, I asked for an extra time because we're afraid not ready on time, and the staff gave us one hour extra time :).
It's fantastic and will be coming back here again for stay when we come to Singapore
The water temperature can't be adjusted when you take shower, only hot and hot water coming from the tap even you turn to the cold water side.
The hotel is at a cross for Orchard Street ( shopping ), Little India ( eating ) and Raffles Hotel ( drinking ).
the hotel was excellent , good staffs , it's easy to go shopping and attend business matters
It was good stay there.. good hotel, I stayed there Couples of time and most perfect this is centrally located with all business places around
pleasant.. great hotel with good quality restaurant..
it's o.k, nice hotel but small room, walk to MRT cuz near Bugis, Bugis Junction and many place shopping.
I am quite satisfied given the hotel is centrally located and meet my expectation. The mini bar was included and they have nespresso coffee machine in each room
I am quite satisfied given the hotel is centrally located and meet my expectation. The mini bar was included and they have nespresso coffee machine in each room

The view was really bad, and the room was so small, the wall was very dirty, even the bath tub is not working!Left the water which my family taken bath in there!!! how to let the other people to wash after that..due to had someone slept already, so we didn't ask for change the room, but it was very bad experience for my family. Should it need to double check with every treatment in the room before the guest check in?

Overall, the Superior Room of this hotel can be recommended. The room has a lovely view of the city, it is basic but comfortable, and the wi-fi signal is strong. The hotel has smoking rooms. The hotel is well-located within walking distance of the metro/underground, malls, and there is a 7-11 and restaurants across the road. The staff were reasonably friendly. On the downside, the whole hotel and the rooms are in desperate need of an update and the general feeling is one of neglect and indifference. It lacks warmth. The windows in the room are sealed which is somewhat claustrophobic. The breakfast is very expensive and the rooms are smaller and much less elegant-looking than shown in the promotional photos.

Was there to celebrate me and my bf anniversary.. But... It was very disappointing. Its rated a five star hotel but i feel it should be only 3-4. 1) checked in time suppose to be at 2pm. I reach there at 4pm and yet i still got to wait and was only given a room after 30mins at least. 2) the room looks old to me. Bed was not comfy. 3) And also the corridor was not sound proof. Could hear people walking, laughing and closing/opening of doors. 4) 10+ am the next day. The staff jus open our room door with their staff key not knowing we had not checked out. Also didnt give us time to react as he jus press our door bell and open straight when we're still slping. Bad experience. Will nv be back.

Every thing is nice but they should entertain early check in and late check out if available. They should not be too much commercial . Other then business they should consider its a service to humanity.
My family will consider staying there again if we go back to Singapore. It's value for money.
Great!!! It's good place to wander around at the heart of shopping place in singapore.
Its generally very good. The room is quite small but just enough for two persons. Fast internet.
Not to bad. nothing much happen at the hotel. great location its near orchard and bugis.

Good location if you are in Singapore to shop, and eat, around Orchard Road. This hotel is close by the underground walkway so in case it's pouring rain this hotel is quite convenient. I was at this hotel in January 2013, and just again in August 2013...the front of the hotel is still being renovated (extremely slow, especially for Singapore standards). I'll be back in Singapore in November 2013 so we'll see how things are going with these renovations. Besides that, the rooms are big and roomy. The cleanliness / room-servicing is between poor and average. I had a one night stay in August 2013. It was noted that I had a king size bed but actually it was two single beds placed together with sheets placed tightly on top of them (by morning you could clearly see the middle lining appear). Another small and funny thing which happened...the tissue box in the bathroom in which the tissue was folded nicely in a triangular shape...after I had pulled out 2 tissues...the tissue box was empty. I connected my Blackberry phone to the internet but my emails were not able to be pushed through though web browsing was fine. Cleainess...look carefully and you'll know what I mean.

Pleasant though my check in time for 1 of the room (I had booked 3 rooms in total) was only available at 5pm. The following day when I request for late checkout at 3pm for the late check in room, my request were denied initially & I had to demand which subsequently was granted. I am surprise the hotel display no initiative for the inconvenience caused to the guest
A clean place for staying. It's in Bugis area which downtown place in Singapore. So it's very convenient for shopping and dining.
all in all i cant complain its in a good spot it does the job and its safe.
Checked in at 3, but only one staff working, many guests were waiting. Food is not bad, got few restaurants to choose!
Hotel lobby is newly renovated, but the room is not in a very good condition, just good. refrigerator is too old.
Overall it is good but not really that great as the TV Channels are so few. You don't have much choice to watch during your stay.
Our stay were pleasant . Location of the hotel is great. Staff were friendly. No issue during my stay. Room were clean . It would be better if breakfast were included for all the hotel guest.
Nothing special just a normal stay but would not hurt to come back again tho
Everything was OK, but sweat odor from BED LINEN. Though free WIFI, the signal was intermittent in 7th floor.

Ok but the noise especially at night from the room above was really irritating and bad! I am really disappointed with the very thin walls - it was so easy to hear people talking outside the door and vise versa! Sound-proofing the door would really be a big help and boost for the hotel!

Swimming Pools: Indulge in a lazy day on the sun lounge at The Falls at Peninsula Tower or Stillwater at Excelsior Tower and delight in pure relaxation. Alternatively, plunge into the cool, inviting waters for an invigorating swim. Gym: There's nothing like a great workout to rejuvenate the body and mind. A fully-equipped gym with a wide range of exercise equipment caters to all fitness levels.

The hotel is centrally located and not so far from shopping centers. Breakfast is not nice but not big issue. Bed is not comfortable for sleeping. Other than these items of comments, everything is just fine.
Internet free wifi is really hard to access. Every single morning I had to call to reception to get free access because of it was connected to charging admission.

Booked for a club room, checking in privately at club floor. Room was big enough, bathroom with tub is very nice. Spent some time in club lounge at 19th floor, nice free flow beverages and snacks. Definitely would come back to stay.
always stay here as its been consistent in quality, shower was a little small in this room I stayed in, staff helped me out with a over booking without even asking
this hotel is just in the right place and within easy walking distance to the major attractions, ION shopping centre is huge only just down the road.
Easy to get to hotel from airport and hotel is near to MRT then can easy to get for eating shopping nightlife
Ok.. I had only 2d1n not much to comment. The taxi drivers are good & friendly

The aircon of the triple room provided to us is not working so we complain about it and they gave us another room which is just good for 2 persons, they just add an extra bed. The hotel staff is not so friendly, no one even help us to carry our luggages.
The overall was good except the walkway to our room has some unpleasant smell
ok it was a trip of 2 days only so location ok but expensive for this size of room
Agoda misrepresent this hotel by saying that this is a 4 star hotel .there were no such a 4 star this was a 1 may be 2 star hotel.

I booked this hotel 30 Days in advanced, and had 30% off discount, overall, very good experience. The Staff were very helpfull and nice. I can have an early check in, that was so considerate The room is clean, the location is near MRT station, and a lot eating places near the hotel.

Room were large & clean, far away from attraction but they provide shuttle bus every 15mins. no problem with check in, but for check out, I went to the open counter , the staff call me to Q for the check out counter & when I was Q-ing for abt 15mins, my husband told me u can just drop the key card into the express check out box, the staff did not tell me that I can drop the key at the express check out box as I overlook the box too. wasted 15mins for Q-ing up. Staff were not helpful enough!
it is great. i would definitely come back here next time.

My conneting room is twin bed but for my parent there feeling not happy, because i'm requested for queen bed or large bed for them.and my parent room air-con system spoil till they can't control to adjusted the air-con, so 2 night they switch off air-con to sleep at night.

i love staying in this hotel, maybe the building is a bit old but the room is nice. One thing i like about this hotel is the large-sized-bed. the room is very clean, the bathroom is also nice, but i can not find any jet shower or smart shower on the closet. It made me a little bit not comfortable because i'm indonesian and i am used to use jet shower after using the closet.
Our stay in York Hotel is comfortable. The room is clean and large. Shopping centre is within walking distance.
It was hassel-free. However, the doors are thin and activities outside can be heard easily. The house-keeping of the corridor should not be done at 9am on a Sunday morning!
Everything is good except for fouled smell in toilet bowl room. Hotel should provide more car park coupon instead of only 1.

The check in was fast and the room was large and spacious. The bed was comfortable and sheets were clean. The standing shower was a bit small, but overall a well maintained hotel. The only downside was the limited breakfast selection and quality of food. Overall a good business hotel to stay in Shenton Way.
It was a pleasant stay at York hotel. Highly recommended staying at Premier Room if you travel with group of 4 or 5 persons.

The rooms is so spacious, comfortable and nice bed. Location is superb for young Couples who love to hang around the area. Nice shopping place, cheap items at bugis street, near to public transport, easily access hotel. Don't need to worry abt halal food for muslims. Delicious food is just a few steps away. Fast check in, friendly and helpful staff. Nice view from the room.
I was surprise to see such a nice/big room for the kind of price i paid. That is ready worth it.
great experience to stay here. large bed is comfortable.
For the conference is ok, but for family vacation, the location is too far. It's hard to find a taxi.
Overall a pleasant stay, would return. Room was comfortable, service was fast.
Was impressed with the room, comfortable however the Malay guest officer 2 showing attitude when we check in. Very rude. Very bad on service level. But the rest of the staff friendly and helpful.

The hotel have a very large room, balcony, quiet surroundings. But it does not provide bath slippers, bath robes, or toothbrushes and toothpaste. The breakfast is also very limited in variety. The hotel is close to Orchard road, where there are a lot of fantastic shops, but there is no public transport to the hotel.
nice room, nice location, friendly staff,large room

If you wanted an average hotel, located near Orchard Road, with a reasonable price and spacious rooms good for family, RELC should be one of the best choice. It is about 1km away from the Orchard MRT. This is the only hotel offering a family type room with 2 queen size beds, thus could fit 4 person very well.
pleasant stay and will definitely return back for more.

Lovely quiet hotel, with really large rooms. The sea view rooms are the best. The pool is not well suited for children, though you have access to the Hard Rock Hotel pool, which is excellent and only a short walk from the hotel.
Check in was smooth and fast. Loved the large rooms and bathrooms. Tv entertainment wise.. not a lot of interesting tv channels. Friendly staff.
Uneventful, lots of good food in nearby locations, especially indian food, and traditional chinese food.

The room was big and spacious, a rarity in Singapore. Free fast wifi connection. It is quite a walk to orchard or to the nearest MRT and can be difficult to get a taxi. I will recommend this Hotel to friends and relatives.
the bed was not comfortable at all. the layout of the room although is large with a balcony, but the dÃ©cor was very very very simple
Pleasant, enjoyable and quick access to public transport. Central location which is a selling point.

Overall, the stay was excellent. The room was neat, clean and spacious for the Singapore's standard hotel room. The hotel is centrally located, easy access to public transport and food. I Definitely would recommend this hotel to relatives.
No problems and staff are courteous and friendly. Some years since I last stayed there but would stay again.

When I booked this hotel, I've already read some comments according Big Hotel, mostly the complained about the room is too small. But based on the reviews, makes me less expectation and less disappointed.. And I agreed the room is small but perfectly efficient for short trips.. I don't have a problem in check in and check out time, I managed this location is great.. you can walk to Bugis Junction or you can walk to Bras Basah.. The Aircon is super cool.. sometimes I need to hide myself under the blanket.. I love the bed, comfy and nice. Internet is fast ! love it.... So its was a perfect stay...

it was a less than average experience. The hotel needs to be renovated. Room maintenance is not fantastic and run down. Got free upgrade to club room and was happy but when i saw the room condition, i was like..oh dear...can't imagine what will be the condition of original booking for deluxe room.
The hotel was close to shopping centre bugis steet, close to little india MRT, easy to find restaurant..
Generally O.K, but the place is old, outdated and in need of refurbishment. Needs updating for a hotel in such a prime location
it was very good. friendly staff and comfortable surrounding. the design was very historical too... i love it!

Staff was unattentive when I checked in. My hotel voucher had already stated large bed and non-smoking room. I even indicated this is for my honeymoon staycation since I got married a few days ago. But check-in staff still ask me if I wanted smoking or non-smoking room and whether I wanted large bed or twin bed. Breakfast variety is limited.
Have a pleasant stay in this hotel, will be back again.

Stayed at M hotel over the weekend and found it a improvement over the previous stay. They provided welcome drink voucher and helped to arrange late checkout till 3pm. As rooms are available, they also provided a free room upgrade to a deluxe room just below the executive level. Overall the staff are friendly and room was clean and comfortable. For those who are driving, they have a staff issuing out parking vouchers 24hrs from the valet counter.
good in hotel interior, clean, and large size, the room services also very nice, but the reception got little unfriendly
It was a good experience. Large and clean room. Friendly staff. Facing orchard street.
I have stayed several times at Amara Hotel. Staff are friendly and helpful. Definitely will coming back for my next business trip to Singapore
Room are too small and the price is high than other country a lot
The location is close to orchard areas which is a shopping district. A nice and comfy room with reasonable size of room in orchard areas.
convenient location next to the mall and walking distance to the MRT station. many food options around the place and a 24 hr supermarket is just opposite the hotel.
it was great to me. i felt like i stayed at my home. the location is good.

We have swapped to Oasia Hotel by Far East Hospitality since there is over booking of Village Hotel due to system error by the hotel. We have requested 2 twin rooms with extra bed for each. Agoda had confirmed me this request has been addressed to the hotel. However, when we arrived to Oasia Hotel, the staff seems not know about such request or even look at my reservation confirmation issued by Agoda. Since there is only one room available, we have just checked in the first room and left our luggage in the room. We saw there is no extra bed and supplies and have then gone to the reception to remind them to arrange. At the same time, we have requested them to ensure the other room should have the extra bed and supplies as well. However, when we back for the night and checked in the second room, there is no extra bed and supplies. The phone is always busy either to the cleaning or reception. I need to go down to the reception to request for the extra bed and supplies. We are so tired after spending the day out and want to take the shower immediately. But the extra bed was not arrived until an hour later after a follow up call. I think the hotel should ensure to fulfill customer's request when they original booked (especially the need for the change of hotel is caused by the hotel error) and also follow up the requests when the customer had raised.

Stay was excellent in the very spacious grand room which can easily accommodate 6 person with extra beds.. Room was on a higher floor facing Marina Bay which means at night excellent view of the bay area. At the lower ground floor of the adjacent Raffles City Mall there are countless fantastic restaurants of all kinds.

Stay was excellent as usual with everything within walking distance.. Nightlife around the area is really happening and there are loads and loads of different food to suit your taste buds and budget. There's even a 24 hours Indian restaurant should you ever feel hungry even in the middle of the night

Stay in this hotel for a night for attending friends's wedding in Mariana Bay Sands Hotel. The hotel is centrally located in city hall town, 10 mins walking to City Hall MRT Station which is 2 station away from Mariana Bay Sands Hotel. Hotel near to shopping center and convenient store. Hotel have a small entrance but a nice Lobby. Reception staff was attentive, check in 3pm but room is not ready. Walk for about 10 mins, the reception offered to upgrade us the room to the club floor and can check check in immediately. The room was ok, but washroom is slightly small and compact with bathtub but is clean with all the toiletries ready. The bed is comfort, the view is overlooking Mariana Bay Sands Hotel. Check out was fast and easy. Overall is a good stay with the value of money.
it was very comfy to stay at relc..just 15min walk to orchard..very big room and clean
Staff quiet nice but breakfast & location not good.

Nice experience to enjoy auto upgraded to Club Room. However, the club room is not value for money with low ceiling and dusty working desk. Dark lighting ambience and the baby cot provided was horrible , with one leg broken ! not safe for infant.

The hotel is situated less than 2 minutes away from the Bugis MRT station. The hotel appears to be recently renovated. My advice is not to take the professional pics too seriously (espcially the pool shot). The lobby is filled w/ some sort of fragance. Karaoke in the establishment if you are up for it. The beds in the room are ok. Wifi didn't work simply because we couldn't be connected.

The hotel staff in particular house keeping were extremely rude. The room was not ready for us at 6 pm when we checked in. The staff cleaning the room were simply hanging about and spent almost an hour to get the third room to us. The room wasnt cleaned for 2 of the days of our stay. The bed were not comfortable and the pillow were huge. Overall, if the location of the hotel wasnt good, I would have not stayed there.
It was great until we checked out and realized the price we had paid was not the one we had gotten on Agoda. Wrote back to the hotel - it's been 3 days and no response. Not impressed.
Good, served its purpose as a centrally located accommodation
My stay was comfortable. Hotel is at good location. I only book if there is promotion or I book early.
My stay was comfortable. Hotel is at good location. I only book if there is promotion or I book early.
Not quite good as last time as the HOTEL is trying to put me in a lower value room while I have paid for the full deluxe room. Wish they can improve in the future.
the location is verh nice. walking distance to orchard. free wifi, nespresso machine in each room. will definitely go back.
the location is verh nice. walking distance to orchard. free wifi, nespresso machine in each room. will definitely go back.
Hotel is centrally located to major attractions and shopping areas. Staff were very friendly and the bed was very comfortable. Recommended hotel and grt stay!

Our stay was lovely. The two balconies gave great views of both city and harbour. Spacious room, and well equipped bathroom. Don't believe there would be a more conveniently located hotel than this. Would certainly recommend it, and look forward to our next visit.

Centrally located and near to medical facilities. Ideal for medical tourism or for travellers heading there for a quick medical checkup. Strategically situated behind 2 shopping centres and above the MRT. Just 2 stops from major shopping mecca of Orchard Road.
near a shopping mall, easy to eat around there, near tanjong pagar mrt which makes traveling around easier.

Overall, my stay went well and I had a good time in Singapore. Next time if I travel to Singapore, I will book a delux room instead of superior because apparent the delux option offers rooms that have been renovated very recently and can make a stay even more pleasant. Highly recommend the Hotel for their room size and supportive staff.

RELC is not as accessible as other hotels in Orchard but it was good for us to do the walks whenever we'd eat a lot in the hawker areas. It was just comfortable and very nice to stay there with a friend.
Room is spacious and clean. The hotel is very close to the bus stop and Bras Basah MRT station is only about 2-3 minutes walk. The service is also very impressive.
Lovely hotel, quiet location, spacious rooms. Very friendly staff.

Took me 25 min to check in, even with all the necessary documents made ready for them. On average it took 10 - 15 min for each customer. The lift is not well designed or programmed. Small sized lift and took at least 3 - 7 min for a lift to arrive. The room is clean. No mini fridge. Great choice of movies / channels. THE BIGGEST SCREW UP IS THE BREAKFAST. Waited for 53 minutes after placing order. Opted for western breakfast which includes croissant, hashbrown, egg, bacon, sausage. Only deliver hashbrown, egg & sausage after the LOOOOONG wait. When i ask if something is missing, they replied "Yes"... full stop. After prompting further, they replied, you have been given additional hashbrown. THE HASHBROWN IS AS HARD AS GRANITE. The sausages are torn, the appearances are disgusting. I strongly advice you to spent additional 20 - 40 bucks and seek for other better hotels.
Love everything about it. I will surely come back. The best of the RWS chain, excluding the villas. Good location

The hotel is centrally located and has a subway located nearby. There is even a bus-stop located near the hotel. Hence getting around via public transport was easy. I stayed at the Club Rooms and enjoyed the service. The staff were attentive and could remember my name. Refreshments were available throughout the day. All was well, including the buffet breakfast. The spread was really good!
Near mosque, great pools, local restaurants.
i love this hotel , being stay here with great staff, free wifi and nice pool
My stay was fabulous! It was so nice that I don't want to go home! Too comfortable in the bed, and the tub!
we love our stay and we look forward for our next stay at IBIS. hope this hotel have more good promotion price
waiting time to check-in and out are long. love the over-sized room and bathroom
Firstly I loved that hotel premiere wing and great view to. ity hall & marina bay sand!! Will be stat in the future trip!
It was great. The staff were very good. 2 thumbs up. Great location. Will comeback fo sho
The best thing about this hotel is it's location. Right at Orchard Road and close to the MRT, there's no reason to actually spend much time in the hotel itself!
The staff was more than helpful and accomodating with our requests, we will stay there again without a doubt!
Hotel staff are attentive to detail, gracious, and accommodating.
it was a great experince, one i hope to have again.

My wife and I spent one night at Capella to celebrate our 2nd wedding anniversary. The service teams at the spa and the hotel were meticulous in providing the extra little special touches to enhance our experience. The Auriga spa is one of the best spas I have been to. Their attention to details added a lot of value to the experience. Just a casual conversation that I enjoy strong massages delivered a very satisfactory spa experience. The relaxation pool, the herbal steam bath and the cool mist shower are excellent at complimenting and delivering the full suite of spa experience. Perhaps it was a weekend, I can sense the hotel was almost at full capacity. The reception counter was just a little slow in handling check-ins and check-outs. But it is all right. I want to return to Capella regularly. That's how much I love it!
Fantastic :) so thank you very much!! I would definitely come and stay here again.
The staff is super helpfull and nice and elegance. We come back here again

my stay at capella was splendid. the rooms were tidy and had a nice scent to it. very much similar to the advertisement online. very spacious and service rendered were most warmt. i liked the automated concept of the room windows and blinds. interior decor was new edge and thrilling. defenitely a will stay again for me.
Hotel upgrade our room nut the internet reception was very bad
hotel has very comfirtable room with quiet relaxing environment. good for holidays.

I booked the Superior room for two days but was given a complimentary upgrade to Deluxe room which was great. The room size is just right with a comfortable bed. The bathroom only has standing shower. The wi-fi speed is quite good. The room has choose does not come with breakfast but there are plenty of choices available outside the Hotel.

I stayed in Amara for the third and still opt for the Executive room which comes with free Wi-Fi and mini bar. The Mini bar basically has just one can of Tiger beer, two soft drinks and two fruit juice. The room design is nice as was the bed which is comfortable. There is free newspaper and green apple early in the morning. There is no breakfast for my booking, so can't comment on that but there is plenty of eateries for breakfast nearby. A good stay.

For spend 2 days off just for relaxation, Capella was very much fit. Location is good for view and walk around Sentosa Beach. Facility are also excellent clean and sophisticated such as touch panel control for lights and curtain.

Really love the room and the small touches that the Capella had for their guests. They make an effort to make you feel comfortable and even the turndown service has such nice bags of cookies as a snack. Love their library as well! Would definitely pay that extra amount for the comfort and service that we can get!
welcome fruit, friendly smile from all the staff, nice swimming pool and excellent sea view, perfect library, etc. all make me unforgettable..

We stayed in the vila with garden view and the stay was very enjoyable. We were able to relax at the villa private pool with lots of privacy. Room service was good as we asked for buckets of ice and they came in a very short while. Villa size was also good, with living room, bedroom, toilet, outdoor shower and bathtub, and private pool with sun decking sofas.

My first interaction / impression of the hotel was scarred by a very unprofessional and unpleasant experience at check-in. There was basically a slight error in the hotel booking which accidentally had my uncles name instead of mine even though it was my own booking. I tried to explain the situation and even offered to show her proof of my payment and details but she was initially unable to get her head around the simple circumstances and not willing to let me check in, keeping me waiting as she tapped behind her computer for a long time without explaining what was going on. she was incompetent and rude to the point that when I was trying to reach out for my phone from her, she yanked her hand away from me and finally dropped my phone down on the counter instead of handing it back to me as she was unhappy with the situation I am guessing. Finally she asked if I wanted twin beds or a double bed, even though I was clearly staying with my other half and had stated on my agoda booking that I wanted a double bed. She then asked me if I wanted a smoking or non smoking room, again something which I had already stated in my booking - non smoking. She finally gave us a room and when we entered there was a strong stale smell of cigarette smoke and an ashtray. I immediately called front desk to clarify this and found out that the fifth floor was only very recently changed to "non smoking" but as it had always been a "smoking" level previously, the smell of cigarette smoke was inevitable. I enquired if the hotel was fully booked hence the last resort of this room and they said no, they had several other rooms and offered to change this for me immediately. Although rest of my stay was pleasant, this first impression and hassle got it off to a bad start. For a luxury hotel and such high pricing, I am surprised by the level of service by this particular staff. Her service not ony reflects badly on the rest of the team but also caused the hotel to look bad as well.

Very pleasant but a few things need looking at. King Size bed is just two single beds pushed together so very uncomfortable with split down the middle. Old, high bath difficult to climb into to then take a very average shower while trying to manage a shower curtain! very 70's. And some parts of the walls and corridors need a spruce up, looking quite tired. Having said that, though, I would retun if the rate was right as the location is priceless.

The services were great from the moment we arrived. Although the rooms were some distance away from the reception and function areas, it did provide a sense of privacy the way the hotel was designed and wonderfully landscaped. The hotel rooms were magnificent, relaxing and conveniently managed by a central control system. We only had a short stay as we were there to attend a wedding, but will definitely go back again.

It was a really great experience staying in the hotel as the staff was really friendly and helpful. When I first stepped into the room, I was really impress by the view, the furnishings, really just about everything. The stay was really enjoyable and it was tranquil, a good break from city life.
we love the relaxing and romantic ambience of the hotel surrounding. rooms are very comfortable and equipped with a lot of amendities. worth value

The hotel was lovely decorated, the rooms are spacious and clean. The location of the hotel is very convenient as it is located near to many halal restaurants. Besides that, the hotel is also located to Sultan Mosque, which is very convenient for Muslims to perform their prayers. HOWEVER, we have to keep entering the wifi password for every time we need to go online which is very troublesome.
beautifull service, the rooms view in awesome. if given a chance would stay at the hotel longer. a little to pricy
Only 2 things that weren't pleasant: long wait to check in. Breakfast was manic and not a comfortable or pleasant atmosphere.. Far too busy, long wait to sit.
Very nice. The hotel lobby opens to shopping, lots of food choices, subway station. The location was great and the views were stunning
Nice room nice place , close to nice food . Big place

this was our return visit to celebrate our anniversary and the hotel did not disappoint. upon arrival, we were pleasantly surprised with an upgrade to a sentosa suite overlooking the sea. the room was very well-appointed with quality furnishings and the most comfortable bed we have ever encountered. other nice touches by the staff include a handwritten card, chocolate strawberries and fruit basket. it is quite possibly the best destination in singapore for a romantic getaway.
Very nice romantic place suitable for Couples whom are planning a romantic staycation
The stay was great! The bed was super comfy, the hotel is centrally located and accessible. Carousel is lovely as always!

Off the beaten track on Sentosa the hotel nestles behind an old British colonial building. The villa's are good sized with a large living area, a good sized bedroom and bathroom. They also come with a nice outside "terrace" with a decent sized plunge pool The outside shower ( to complement the in bathroom ones) are well set and romantic! A perfect stay for a Couples wanting privacy and a romantic setting
Fantastic location is a major plus. Bed was kinda high but comfy. Love the heated toilet sead and bidet. We will return again.
It was great! Enjoyed it very much and it accomplished my goal for relaxing staycation.

The weather was not the best but I still loved the stay at MBS, since the room and especially the bed was soo cozy and nice, that I never wanted to get up again. The view was amazing, the food and the room service was great!It es also very convenient that there are many shops/malls around and many restaurants.

I was pleasent stay in hotel, feel relax and comfortable.staff is very good and very fast in process. Ambient is also very fine for family. International standard hotel to stay and acessible from MRT station.

We received a free upgrade to a suite which made our stay even more comfortable then expected. The staff is very service minded. Easy location from which to explore the city and neighborhood. Perfect located in a charming colonial style building. Good value for good price! We enjoyed it!
However, they gave complimentary upgrade to a much bigger room. Great customer service experience and the room was very comfortable.
Splendid stay; hotel have a very spacious hall and the buffet restaurant caters very good food. The room is a bit cramp, but is very comfortable.

Great room, amazing sky garden and infinity pool. Wish the access was bit more easier.. changing few MRT Couples of times to get the central isn't nice especially in busy rush hours. Service wasn't that great, I'm afraid.. signs were't clear around the front reception (or register desk, you may call?), the front staff didn't give me enough access card for pool area so I had to go back to the front and ask it again. Front staff also didn't really explain about how we can do with breakfast, how we use the lift etc etc... I thought those were very very basic must know information you'd tell to all guests at the reception. When we check out, a staff asked me the room number and name, and told me that the check-out has done. I even haven't received any receipt how much we've been charged or successfully checked-out which made me worry... I really strongly hope they re-consider the level of service as the hotel facilities itself were in fact exclusive but I felt the service of the staff let the hotel down.
Nothing to complain . Comfortable , great hotel , spacious and centrally located

awesome rooms and nice balcony. the room was spacious and everything was kept pristine. the tv has got good channel listings, with the options to connect your own portable device through hdmi or other av component ports. a pity it is the furthest away from the happenings eg, RWS convention center, casino, shopping area, USS and the aquarium. but it has a shuttle bus every 15 minute operating till 10pm daily. can be a bit confusing to locate the hotel if you are driving or walking from RWS main area. overall. a very nice experience.

The room is larger than other RWS hotels (Festive & HardRock) we have stayed. Regular feeder bus, hence getting around wasn't an issue. Less crowded at lobby if compared to other RWS hotel lobby. We were upgraded to a suite, hope we will get such treatment again as we are planning to return in March.

Everything was perfect. The room was exactly as beautiful as showed on the site. When I turned up at 10am they let me checkin, I checked out at 3pm with no questions asked. The cascading pools were beautiful. The Spa was so relaxing. Just a few minutes walk to Joel Robucheron's Restaurant. A few steps through the lovely grounds to the beach. Went to the SkyLine Luge and the WaveHouse. Did not have time to do the Indoor Skydiving, but that looked awesome. Staff were so sweet and helpful. Loved it. Could have stayed forever.
Celebrated our wedding anniversary at this hotel. very nice turndown surprise - rose petals on bed and in the bath tub etc. Staff were very attentive. Room was amazing. Overall, a lovely stay.
this hotel is a casino hotel with all superb facilities including shopping centers and dining.

The check in experience were nice. I was welcomed by a knowledgeable Korean lady. She given me good recommendation and advise. I enjoy the ocean view, TV channel (though MIO TV & some channels are suffering from bad reception), Skypark pool and the bed (really comfortable). However I have bad experience while claiming my CP fee. The service is lousy and didn't match the prestige of the hotel. The staff sounds like the hotel only able to fund $6 and you are on your own.
Very pleasant. East to walk to subway. nice area for restaurants and within walking distance of many sights.
Stay at hotel was pleasant and rejuvenating. Only downside is the breakfast, as service was slow, limited choices from buffet and staff did not share about menu that we can order until we asked.

Very pleased with the stay given the hotels good location and wide open space in a crowded city. Parking is very convenient and so is public transport. Lots of shopping and restaurants within walking distance ranging from food courts to fine dining. highly recommend this hotel
My stay was great. Totally enjoy ourselves. Only holdup was the check-in and check-out. Waited for about half an hour due to the long queue.

Having stayed here several times it's always a pleasure to come back to the familiar surroundings. Located in Bugis area there is a great mall attached to the hotel (which has just been extended) not to mention it's close proximity to Orchard or the Quays...

Goodwood hotel offers traditional looks with modern amenities. It is steps away from the shopping district of Orchard Road and has excellent restaurants. If you can get an Agoda discount it also offers exceptional value for a 5 star hotel in Singapore

Enjoyable stay at this lovely hotel. Staff are very obliging and pleasant. Surroundings are immaculate. We would have liked to have been advised of a bit more information like how the internet options worked - purchased 4 hours thinking I would use an hour for each of the four days we were there not knowing that you can't log off it is four continuous hours only.. Only used for ten minutes the first day so lost the rest of the time. Also wasn't, advised that breakfast was included so only had breakfast one morning.
it was very good stay, the check in staff gave upgraded room as complimentary because we stay with our baby.. also the facilities of sands skypark was very fabulous... we enjoy it very much…

This hotel stay is definitely the BEST hotel stay I've ever had. There's excellent service from every member of the staff, from the porter to the cleaning staff, to the managers.They noticed our shoe sizes and got correctly sized bathroom slippers and flip flops for my family. They left little treats for my son and it was a truly impeccable stay. Highly recommended for its rooms and service.
Overall its ok for spend a night at the hotel, but to far from local restaurant instead it locate in china town and badluck for us they give the under contruction building for our windows view
Great location but the maintenance was terrible in the bathroom. Wood falling off the walls. Tv in bedroom is terrible location.
Wonderful and realaxing
centrally located, shopping and restaurant around hotel. easy transport.
i like this hotel very much. definitely a good place to stay.
Stay was ok but they should not offer breakfast as it is below anything acceptable.
Memorable and accommodating hotel. We have a enjoyable celebration on our 2nd wedding anniversary. And possibility to repeat it again.
it was great staying on Hotel Michael as its very near universal studios. Sentosa its a very beautiful place, we wish to have more time and explore the whole area.

Great service! Brithday cake was tasty and the hotel staff was very cooperative. He sang along with us the birthday song for my friend. Good that the hotel absorbs carpark charges for those who wish to park their car during staycation. Nonetheless, I am hoping that there'll be halal restaurant in the hotel so that it is much easier for us to dine. Similar to that of Furama, kintamani restaurant. Perhaps, the tv channels can be increased...or improved...more entertainment channels.
It was a pleasant stay for me which the staff are friendly and our room was clean
I had a free upgrade on our deluxe room to a premier room as I had our wedding at the Grand Ballroom at the same time last year, Overall 10/10 for the location, 10/10 for the staffs.
celebrated my boyfriend's birthday, they ran out of cake, but they delivered a bottle of red wine!
It was a nice environment to stay for staycation where we can have fun at Dolphin island and back to room and rest.

It was a nice stay in Capella villa but the pool was too small . However, we book Capella is because is a Pet Friendly Hotel n we met a few hotel guest n they were surprise that Singapore has this concept n feel happy for it n said is a right & good decision. The only disappointed thing is our pets can't have meal with us, not even an outdoor bar, I think they should make it more flexible!
It is a good hotel to stay as it is closed to Bugis Market and Bugis Junction Mall
Good, just the bfast is not very good. Quite poor for the bfast. The other is good.

Its was a wonderful experienced stay in this hotel. With friendly staff and fast service, trust me, you will definitely enjoy your stay with them. Location wise you will have to take the shuttle bus to and fro, other than that everything was perfect!! Well done Hotel Equarius's staff, appreciated! :)
Not comfortable the bedsheets do not have the feeling of cleanness, the room to noisy due to the room above activities.
It was a nice hotel, clean, and easy access to public transport

Booked the room with club benefits, worth it if you can make full use of the lounge and pool/jacuzzi etc. Staff at the club lounge is really friendly, a little crowded during breakfast. If you wake up a bit late like 9-10am may not have too much choice of where to sit. Just one weird thing about the room, there's no kettle which is pretty much the standard in any hotel. We thought ours were missing but figured there isn't really a space for a kettle in the room. Even though you get free drinks at the lounge but a kettle is still a necessity for a room.
Excellent room overlooking main swimming pool. Prompt and friendly service. Delicious tomato/ onion soup and satay sauce.
WE WERE GREET BY FRIENDLY STAFFS, FAST CHECKING AND OUT. THE ROOM WAS REASONABLE SIZE AND CLEAN. DEFINITELY COME BACK AGAIN.

Pleasant stay, extremely comfortable beds with modern and hi-tech fittings. Enjoyed the room design too. However, coffee machine and master switch in the room was slightly faulty. Would be flawless if the housekeeping could make sure everything is in perfect condition before guest arrival.
A very satisfactory stay. I will definitely recommend this hotel to all Couples who need a romantic stay.
It was only an overnight stay but it met my every needs. Would recommend it to anyone who is looking for an inexpensive room that boasts the comfort and cleanliness of 5 Star hotels.
i had an amazin stay in this hotel, and thanks to Ms. Ebel Teo who was kind enough to give us early check in which was such a relief after our long flight.

Check in & out was fast & smooth, Location is superb for food & entertainment, Being located on Orchard Road puts you in easy reach of all the major shopping malls and offices, Public transport is at the doorstep, Rooms are big & comfortable, Staff are friendly,

Great stay, conveniently located in quiet area with not many tourist groups making all the noises. Directly connected to Novena MRT via an underpass from the hotel basement which was quite a life-saver when it's raining.
I had a wonderful experience. A Couples of my dreams came true in Singapore. I highly recommend the Orchard Hotel. The staff were amazing.

Everything are fine and very comfortable ! Fitness centre is big and fully equipped! The location is convenience and right in the center of the city with easy access to other area via the nearest mrt (Cityhall) . The food served in the restaurant are delicious too. Room are in reasonable size and clean with all necessary stuffs. Shopping surrounded the hotel are international standard inclusive the restaurant ! I would stay again in the this hotel coming future !

York was an old hotel and should charge a lower price. I got a room with a pool view but it was an old pool so my view wasn't that fantastic. The stay supposed to be a comfortable one, unfortunately my room and the entire second floor smell like cigarette and the bathroom make you feel like you are using a toilet in an old hospital. The room itself is quiet gloomy and I think they need a new carpet to replace the one they currently using. All in all, they need to renovate this hotel
It was satisfying because i went there just to relax. the room that i got was beautiful and it really made my stay enjoyable despite staying there and hit the pool and gym only.
It was an amusing stay. Clean large rooms, quiet and comfortable. Loved every minute of it!

Stay was for 1 night, staycation kind of thing. Was given an free upgrade to their deluxe suite room upon checking in early around 12/1 pm. Staff help to keep our bags since the room wasn't ready. The room was given to us once we came back from adventure cove :) suite room was big and clean ! Facing the adventure cove and city view was awesome! To sum up my stay there was short but sweet!
My stay at Parc Sovereign was great. The service was fast and efficient. The rooms are generally clean and in good condition.
i was so happy that i choose this hotel.Staff speak so well.The thing that i love u have to wipe yourcard to get into your room.This is safe. Will stay there again
The service of the hotel is very bad. The reception is not helpful and inconsiderate. The price of the hotel is high while the service and room does not worth that high cost.
The lcoation of the hotel is convenience. The room is large and clean but a bit smelly. We will not stay in this hotel again
Good. Nice Mamak, Near Bugis, near bus station, Clean Room, Acer Tab in the room
Comfort, silent and easy access to destination. It is near by metro and just few minutes to the dinning area and shopping area. It's good to stay there after 3 days back from Sentosa
All is good, we booked 3 rooms. The only little issue is one my my rooms is not ready until quite late, I think over than 15:00, they said the previous guest had checked out late.
Very old decoration, small bath with stain The reception staff is not helpful. We kept waiting for check-in at reception but staff ignored us. Price is too high for such quality.

Near Mustafa and many Indian food restaurants. Rooms are clean easy access to MRT (Ferrer Park). Friendly staff. Value for money. Local tour agents are available at lobby, they do offer good package. If you don't have time to explore yourself use these packaged tours.
The room is quite small if you travel with your family. But if you like to explore singapore more , it is located near MRT station and bus stop. It also near cineplex cathay and plaza singapore

Room is large well maintained and clean, easy access to shopping malls, wifi not available in the room only available at public lobby. Hotel staffs are attentive and friendly. Hotel is very economical for the newness and location. Room is small as same as Japanese hotels. Breakfast is good. One issue I had was for every 1 nite had have to deposit S$50. If u lose the reciept they cannot refund u the cash. Location is good but front desk is small with only 2 check in staff available so sometimes have to wait a longtime to check in. There is a lot high quality hotel in Singapore but relatively expensive especially for solo traveller who has to paid for the whole room. Budget hotels are frequently in dirty / old surrounding except this hotel which is close to city.

Located at the end of orchard road which is peaceful and not overcrowded. Just a few mins walk to restaurants and shopping centre. The room was recently refurbished so it still new and cosy. The only disadvantages are the free wireless internet in the room is at very slow speed and the breakfast was horrendous; limited variety and the food and utensils tray were always empty, it seems like the workers too busy with other issues and many guests need to wait for food to be refilled.

The room was new but the wall has problem, we can hear noise from guest next room whole night till we have to knock our wall to gv signal to indian guest nx room how noisy they are whole night. They keep speak indian in very loud voices whole night, as they hav no need to sleep. The hotel wall really has problem. Shd be sound proof.

This was my umpteen time staying at Village Hotel Bugis. However, this time its not as good as previous. The bed remains comfortable. I booked a deluxe room but the room they gave are smaller that look like superior. The reception confirmed its the deluxe room when I rang them. The wi-fi was not working during my stay. Also, they put me in the 7th floor which is where the gym is located. However, smell of cooking curry would somehow come into the room around 6am each day. There happens to be an Indian curry restaurant located in the 5th floor and that shows the hotel ventitilation needs an upgrade. The breakfast was just fine as it was simply crowded on early Sunday morning. Overall, its not so good as the previous stay.

I enjoyed staying at the Village Hotel Bugis but most taxi driver didn't know it unless you tell them Golden Landmark Shopping Complex. They only remembered the old hotel name and blamed the Singapore Hotel why keep on changing name and made them confused. It is within walking distance to Bugis Junction as well as nearby hawker stall. But most of the shops are operated by Indian or Arabian so not much choice for Chinese food. As for Western food, Domino's Pizza is just opposite the hotel.

we had a good stay in the Hard Rock Hotel. the room is big with 2 super single bed. we (include 2 young children) enjoyed our stay very much. Will definitely come back again.

Ramada Singapore at Zhongshan Park is situated within the central district of Novena and is the only four stars international chain hotel in the area. The hotel is surrounded by many pubs, local and western cuisine establishments and is a mere five minutes’ drive away from the Velocity and United Square shopping malls and Office Towers. The orchard road shopping belt, Little India and Marina Bay Financial center can be easily accessed by taxi within 15 minutes from the hotel while Resort World Sentosa, Universal Studios, and Changi International airport are a half an hour taxi ride away. There are 384 well-furnished guest rooms with premium Serta mattress and high speed internet access.
It is very comfortable stay at the hotel with nice decorations and great food. Overall I am satisfied.
It is very comfortable stay at the hotel with nice decorations and great food. Overall I am satisfied.

I would love to return to this hotel for weekend staycation. It has a nice and quite surrounding. I can also roam around to source for local food besides eating at the nearby restaurants.

Ideal location, near Orchard Road shopping centre. Nice & clean environment. House many good food outlets. Convenient, staff friendly & helpful. Room got upgraded!

it was fit to our budge, large room, nice view, good location, comfortable bed. the staff are very friendly too.

This is probably the umpteen time I stayed at M Hotel though not so frequent in recent years. M Hotel is a business Hotel that is pretty quiet during the weekend. The room size is just right and with a comfortable bed. Sadly Wi-fi access is chargeable. There are plenty of eateries and groceries shop nearby for your breakfast and other meals. Overall I'm pleased with the stay.

Having booked a junior suite we were somewhat disappointed to have a dark room with no views. The staff were great and even made a courtesy room (which was much nicer than our room) available for us to shower in after checkout and prior to leaving for the airport. It has a nice old world feeling about it and happy staff many of whom have been there for a long time

The Hotel it self looked Great, the pool area layout was fantastic, the Staff were very pleasant and helpful, the only problem I had was you have to PAY for internet in the Hotel ($5 per hour) which is free at many other hotels in the world.

This Hotel is quite good. It is very suitable for people who want to go to casino, or family who bring their children. Because it is very near to Universal Studio Singapore, SEA Aquarium, and many others in Sentosa Island. However, it is very far from Orchard and other shopping centres. So, if you are planning to go for shopping, it is not suitable for you to stay here. Since you have to walk quite far.

When we checked in a Couples the staff gave us an incentive if we would prefer a bigger room but that would mean two single bed rather than a double bed, but as we entered our room with two single beds the room was also small, only good thing is its pool accessible but not required for is as we wouldn't swim anyway. I wonder if the double bedroom were actually small or just simply been occupied. The room only has one universal plug socket and the hotel doesn't have an extra adaptor provided, so I could only charge my phones and ipad one at a time which is a bit annoying.

Nice stay here overall, but a bit overpriced for what you got. Pros: - Quietish (in terms of other people using it) pool area with spa and gym (except for the construction noise - see below). A pool is really important in such a humid, hot climate. - A newspaper was left outside the door each day. - Fast lifts. - Great location at the end of Orchard Road, close to Bras Basah as well as Dhoby Ghaut stations (Dhoby Ghaut has 3 lines coming off it). One of Singapore's many great (cheap!) food courts, Kopitiam, is right around the corner and it's open 24 hours and air conditioned. Also the City Sightseeing bus stops right outside the hotel. - A special request for a big bed via agoda.com was met with no problem. - Super early checkout (at around 6am due to an early flight) was also no issue. Cons: - The room smelled a bit musty and the bedlinen felt slightly damp from the airconditioning. - There were lots of construction works going on around the hotel (I think building a new MRT station, with an estimated completion date of 2017), so there was a fair amount of noise til fairly late at night. - There was nowhere to plug in a hair straightener near a mirror (really annoying! #firstworldproblems) - Very limited number of TV channels available, mostly news channels. - On check in they ask for a credit card, which is normal, but for me with only a debit card I had to give S$100 in cash for security. No problem getting this back when I left, but now I have to change this money back into something I can use at home. I would recommend this hotel overall for its central location. It feels like it's in the centre of all the action. Also love the cheap eating options nearby. However I think if this had Marina Bay Sands' pool it would be THE place to stay in Singapore!

Overall, the hotel is quite nice and we’d give it a good rating close to a perfect 5 star in terms of building/facilities/room/interior/cleanliness etc. But really there is no surprise there since it’s a new building and all new hotels in Singapore has a top class interior and ambiance. The overall experience turns out to be disappointing and we quickly got the impression that all the additional service we get for the Club membership was nothing more than a package put together by the marketing team to boost the hotel ratings, rather than a genuine effort to make travellers feel at home. Quality of breakfast meal was sub standard and we ended up trying to find a local restaurant outside to get breakfast. The Club lounge supposedly offers free drinks but I discovered that free drinks are only available around 6-8pm. If you’re on vacation in Singapore, who stays at the hotel at 6-8pm? This is not a resort hotel we’re talking about. The Club-only area on the 20th floor sounds great at first, but it was simply a replacement for a lobby area that Oasia doesn’t have. And they made you pay to have access for that “lobby” area. $20 to play one movie at the hotel room? What a joke. Overall we didn’t feel that the staff made a real effort to be hospitable and helpful in a genuine way. They were always smiling, but when we asked them if they could help us get a carton box for packing our stuff, the answer was a quick no. Also when I went to the Concierge to get a package that has been left there by a friend, he was unable to find the package and instead tried to put the burden of proof on me -- the guest -- to proof to him that someone really did leave a package for me. We were also trying to pack stuff into a box and not only was there no offer to help, but every request for a packing tape was responded in with a forced attitude. I’ve stayed at backpackers hotels that offer more help and hospitality than the staff at this supposedly “great service” hotel.
Our transit was only for transit. It was quiet, yet too far from the hustling and bustling of orchard road. Overall, it was OK
close to shopping centre and mrt,,nice design,,close casino and restauran

Great central location, easy access to public transport, shops and restaurants. The pool area is green and peaceful. Beware that breakfast is NOT included with Agoda books and costs $35 per person a day! But it is spectacular. Rooms and hallways need updating fast as it all seems a little dates now. The beds are comfortable and the rooms are a good size. Not sure I'd stay again for value for money.

I love the rooms which are larger than normal hotel size and a large bathroom as well. You need to take a shuttle bus to get from the hotel to the main Universal Studios/ and Hard Rock swimming pool. Nice, Clean, price reasonable & good location Nice, Clean, price reasonable & good location Nice, Clean, price reasonable & good location Nice, Clean, price reasonable & good location Nice, Clean, price reasonable & good location

Nice room Nice hotel but NOT nice lingering smell in room until aircon is on

Staff were slow to attend to customers waiting to check-in as they did their own stuff despite seeing the queue. Free upgrade to a suite so I guess that makes the 15 minute wait worth something. Walking distance to multiple restaurants and the theme parks.

It's a good stay. The room is comfortable, eventhough it's a bit small for a family with a baby. I like the location, because it's near the shopping center and many good restaurant and stall. But for it price, I think next time we will search for another hotel with bigger room.
fantastic view and location, friendly staff and lovely environment

This is a nice centrally located hotel with nice restaurants close by and also the nightlife is around in this area. Staff is friendly and the room was clean and big enough for a business trip. breakfast is average but nothing special.
It was great. The room, the location and very helpful staff. Overall satisfying.
The hotel was great, but the checking in was a little slow. A little too pricey as well
It was great, Clean and decent room, near mrt stations, near to Bugis Street and friend staff
Good stay at the Amara Singapore and the rooms are very clean and spacious. Bathtub is a bit small and shallow.

I when with my husband and I like the hotel room as it is very comfortable and nice decorated. I would recommend this hotel for adventure travellers as Sentosa is more to sightseeing place. Overall I think the hotel is very good and they have a friendly staff.
Satisfying. Room is big, large clean bathroom. I really enjoy the free minibar and free room upgrade for hotel member. The swimming pool is too small.
Satisfying. Room is big, large clean bathroom. I really enjoy the free minibar and free room upgrade for hotel member. The swimming pool is too small.
Very nice but the bathroom rather smelly, I think the exhaust fan didn't work very well
great holiday because surrounded by many place to visit for play
Nice hotel close to Orchard, easy to transport, nice room.
it was nice staying special hotel close to adventure cove, universal studio and shopping

I found that the price of hospitality is quite expensive. This hotel is clean, comfort and easy to access to MRT. And, there are plaza next to the hotel with large shopping space. And, the food shop are around the plaza. I highly recommend the hotel if budget limited in the trip.

the stay was awesome as the room is spacious and big.. except that the check in time take longer compare to other hotel like Hard Rock.. Aircon was not cold enough even its been change to the lowest temperature.. we have to wake up Couples of time at night while slping..

Only stay for one day, and maybe because of this, the staff arrange a room at garden side, room size is quite small, not so good soundproof, and the freeze actually broken, not that I need to use the freeze, bt this is not a good impression for a Four Star Hotel. Yet overall, is still a nice hotel because it hv clean n comfy bed.
very good experience staying in this hotel, although only stay one night. hotel is located at the city centre, transportation is very easy to get, close to MRT as well. good foods around

It is within 5 minutes walk to Bugis Mrt. It is at the outskirts of the major shopping area, orchard. Around bugis there are quite a number of good eats at low prices. Good place for a family stay. The room is quite spacious. The room air-condition is a little hard to control, you cant turn it off if the temperature gets too cold.
It was great - bed a bit saggy though! A large hotel so they know how to do everything properly.
Hotel Michael near to all resort world sentosa attraction: USS, SEA aquarium, and adventure cove waterpark Hotel room is very clean and have great room design
It is really great to stay in that hotel. Very near to everywhere and easy to go there.. Big cinema is closed to hotel also.
very good hotel . it was le meridian before ? and centrally located . if you like a night life / disco etc you will like it . however for good sleep try to choose higher floor
The room with 2 queen beds is good for family, especially those with young children. not many of this kind are available in Singapore, so that this RELC is probably one providing
Overall the stay was good. However, the breakfast is marginal and your better off choosing options outside the hotel rather than incur the extra cost of the room.

We are very enjoy staying at Amara. The staff upgraded our rooms to the club rooms. What a nice surprise. This hotel has a quite big swimming pool, nice garden, and also a lot of helpful staffs. We will back to Amara again on the next visit.

i enjoys my stay in goodwood hotel with my wife. i like the pool suite room as well, the room facing pool was very nice and relaxing indeed. but i do not like the toilet space, which to small and facilities was very old and i suggest for a upgrading. breakfast was not up to satisfaction during my 5 days stay in goodwood hotel, breakfast food are boring! food remains the same in every breakfast, i suggest goodwood hotel could spent sometime to upgrade the breakfast (such as nonya and asian food etc). the reasons i like staying st. regis was food and room. i like breakfast in st. regis osaka. breakfast was very creative and unique, nice breakfast setting and good chefs. room facilities in st. regis ( all regis hotels even in singapore) was comfortable and luxury. but will still go back to stay goodwood hotel again, hopefully the hotel directors will considerate all my suggestion of improvements! goodwood was a good hotel indeed. thank u for all servicing staffs during my stays in goodwood hotel. thank u.

Nice hotel and nothing to complain. The Hotel is situated in city center with hawker stands, shops and department stores closeby. You are able to explore the city within walking distance. The staff is helpful though a bit slow in responding but still nothing to complain. The room is in a comfortable size, nice bed and basic amenities. Will I recommend to a friend, yes.

another lovely stay at the parkroyal,they have a truly amazing location,close to shopping ,public transport,and great restarants,they have continually improved this hotel,which incidentally is the premium hotel of the area,my room was adequite and comfortable but the bathrooms are showing their age, with showers over the the bath, and maybe a little mould on a Couples of the surfaces

Location is great, close to China town. 25 minute taxi ride to the airport. Easy access to tourist sites by MRT. Design and interior are OK. Hotel staffs are attentive and speak good English. It's a quiet street in front of the hotel. Room is nice, and clean. The bed and pillows were OK. There are a few restaurants nearby the hotel. The hotel is close to a MRT station. Overall, it was a pleasant stay. I may stay at the hotel again for my next trip to Singapore.

I didn't experience any problems during my stay at this hotel. Centrally located and easily accessible it allowed me to have a very good impression of the city. The only thing i would like to change is the variety of the breakfast as after some days it can get really very monotonous. Apart from that i really enjoyed my stay at the hotel and would gladly stay again

Always a good option for the bugis area. The rooms are small but I personally didn't mind that. If you are looking for a large room I would look elsewhere. The staff are friendly and the check out is easy.
no wifi provided, staff told me that it was not included ... disappointed

This hotel is situated in a very good location. Mustafa, city square mall is at a stone throw distances. Lots of restaurants are all around the hotel. This is really nice hotel to stay in Little India.
Nice hotel in Sentosa, high stander service, Value for Money
The hotel is ok overall but the staff is not really helpful and nice. The room is also a bit small but it is reasonably priced. The VOD system and TV is well designed and very easy to use.
Nice experience; quiet environmen; Spacious room; not too far from shopping belt but abt 20minutes walk
