The hotel is nicely located in the middle of the city near Orchard rd, which means it is some steps away to shopping malls or arcades. It is not as close as I had hoped to MRT stations, especially with a newborn son and two aging parents, but taxi is readily available and easy to get. Cheap food can be had near the hotels as well, and free wifi always helps!

The hotel is nicely located in the middle of the city near Orchard rd, which means it is some steps away to shopping malls or arcades. It is not as close as I had hoped to MRT stations, especially with a newborn son and two aging parents, but taxi is readily available and easy to get. Cheap food can be had near the hotels as well, and free wifi always helps!
Nice hotel, big room and clean room, the staff is smart and helpfull.
Our stay at the Orchard Parade Hotel by Far East Hospitality was great. The location was nice as it was near the shopping malls and MRT. The staff were also very nice and friendly.

rude malaysian staff at lounge, we are paying to be on the club floor and she can't even assist us on drinks and stuff. very rude towards talking to clients too. Thinking about changing my hotel on my next visit.
It was nice hotel, clean and we got surprise thanks for Agoda and Michael Hotel cause we got free upgrade room from deluxe to suit room.
Nice hotel closed to mustafa center walking distance only And near mall. Easy to find foods
This was my 5th time to stay in this hotel. And would love to stay here next time.
I stay this hotel near on orchard road, the place in central busines and shop. The room is large and clean and have bathup...the hotel have nice lobby and cozy lounge
OK business hotel for short stay, near to shopping areas and very conveniently located.
Its was a wonderful stay. Will stay in this hotel again in future with family.

Their staff are friendly, the check in and check out is quite fast, Hotel is just beside Zhongshan Park, so the surroundings environment and views is really nice. and it is near Balestier, there is a lot of nice local food along the street.
It was ok. For the price paid through agoda, it was value for money.

Overall average standard. Was upgraded to deluxe room for free but there wasnt any view from the room and the balcony is combined with all the rooms on the same level. No privacy as the people staying next door can simply walk pass your room.

They did not have the room for us upon check in but requested us to pay extra in order to get an upgraded room which is immediately available. We thought that they should have waived it for us since they did not have the room for us.
Nice with an upgrade to a suite. In-room dining is great, staff are friendly and helpful.
Nice hotel that I will definitely come again, close to nightlife activities and pubs.
We enjoy our stay in the hotel and would stay here again for our next visit to Singapore

We enjoy our stay at the hotel for three nights with the family of two younger kids. As it's closed to MRT station so it is easy to go any places in Singapore. It's quite surroundings and close to Singapore biggest Mosque. If you want to spend your time at Bugis Market, this hotel is one of the best option.
Nice city view at night. Very accessible. MRT station is very near the hotel. Shopping malls are accessible too. Big, clean and comfy rooms. Great value-for-money hotel.
Nice hotel which is centrally located next to Orchard Road - great for shopping
Absolutely a good choice for family and someone who like to travel with MRT.
Bed is comfortable, swimming pool is small but very clean, staff is helpful
An excellent stay with nice bathroom good swimming pool and valet services
it is good and nice hotel to stay, and strategic area in Orchard Road.

Big room, big bathroom, nice view to swimming pool and adventure cove, easy access to adventure cove as the hotel has its own access to adventure cove, and value for money if you bought the package with attraction tickets. It would be nice if the attraction tickets validity can be on open dated tickets rather than tie into the period of stay.

nice location near mrt, local restaurant, shopping mall, supermarket 24 hours, nice swimming pools but no child swimming pool, my cousin can't swim, the room is big with comfortable bed and quiet, easy access to city.

Overall my stay at the Royal Plaza on Scotts Hotel was good. We were greeted by friendly staffs. The hotel itself located in central of shopping malls, very recommended for those who like shopping and entertainment.
it was good and I keep coming back a its close to my regional office.
overal is a nice hotel, friendly staff, small room but very comfort,very clean, good breakfast menus, close to shopping area, fair price but Internet speed very low

I have stayed at the Amara a few times now. Each visit has been nice - with no problems. I like the large rooms with reliable internet. I actually ate at the mini cafe on the first level this time - it was standard cafe fare. In short, a pleasant visit with everything one would expect from the Amara Hotel.
overall quite a nice and new hotel, would come back

I actually requested a large bed in Agoda booking, but during check in, it was unavailable at first, but after some time, the staff managed to get a room for me. But the room is just next to the lift and is a bit noisy with the lift sound.
Clean and large room, great and friendly staff. Strategic location, easily to find and convenient to reach MRT station.

I'm having a wonderful day staying at Orchard Parade. One thing that a little bit concern, i booked a double bed (king size or queen size), but what i get is 2 single bed joined(2 bed puts side by side). There is a gap between two bed. Because i travel with baby, i worry that my baby will fell into the gap.

Whilst some features were good, the staff that we interacted with were rude, dismissive and unhelpful. This was during check in and throughout the stay, including a manager of the hotel who I distinctly saw make eye contact with me before hurry on off to avoid me after failing to help previously. The hotel does not provide free Internet which is surprising and disappointing, instead charging $4 for 30 minutes on a mostly nonfunctional desktop computer, or $10 for 24 hours wifi, while most other hotels provide it free. Rooms were clean and serviced daily, but lacking in some features such as hand towels. Air con was very dry and your on option for air as the windows do not open. There is a small gym and a pool provided which were nice.
Would like to see them in Bangkok, Melbourne and Kuala Lumpur soon
My short stay was ok. Nothing special. Hotel has perfect location on Orchard Road. The maid was slow in getting my room cleaned. Will stay again.
I'm really enjoy my stay at this hotel. My room was upgraded from superior to suite room. Staff was very helpful.

The stay was fun and really relaxing from check-in to check-out. We stayed under the royal club and the perks were really nice. I especially like the club lounge and the staff were really attentive and friendly.

I stayed here for only one night on a stopover. Was quite impressed. The room was very small but the size of the room is clearly stated at the point of booking so I cannot complain. Room was clean, comfortable bed, great shower and fast WiFi. Check-in and check-out was efficient. Only small criticism is that the taxi drop-off area is not so easy to find, the entrance is behind the building and then you have to drive up to level 2 of the building and take the lift down to the reception area. I had quite a lot of luggage and had to load it onto a trolley, then check-in and go to my room with no assistance. Minor grip really, I would still stay here again as it is good value for money when compared to other hotels in the area in the same price range.
Overall, a very pleasant stay. Brand new hotel, rooms were very clean, friendly staff, complimentary wi-fi and shuttle bus to Novena MRT station
great hotel, comfortable rooms and friendly and helpful staff. location is great too

The hotel upgrade us to premier room as they know we are celebrating wedding anniversary there. They decorate the room also. Besides, they provide me the baby bath tub and baby cot as per my request. The staffs there are very friendly. The dinner buffet is value for money.

The hotel upgrade us to premier room as they know we are celebrating wedding anniversary there. They decorate the room also. Besides, they provide me the baby bath tub and baby cot as per my request. The staffs there are very friendly. The dinner buffet is value for money.
nicr hotel.but abit overvalue. room abit small and abit dusty
I had a great stay in Big Hotel. The hotel design is nice. Room is small but practical. Big Hotel is quite impress me and my darling~ ^^
Good. room was clean and big. Location is an important factor.
The hotel was OK.. Nice n very friendly staf.. The room itself very big n comfortable but the bathroom a little bit smelly.... But overall ok

The rooms are really nicely done and very large up to standard for a five star hotel. Interior deco and bed comfort is excellent. But unfortunately i dont understand why does a 5 star hotel does not have a dvd player in-room and charge $60 for rental! Also there a service charge of $5 to for asking ice to be sent to the room Also this hotel is popular with tourists during check in and check out with the max of 4 counters open took quite alot of time to process. Lobby is small and crowded However the important bit is the rooms. The sheets & bed are high quality and comfortable, aircon is very strong desite being in singapore hot weather

The first impression was the nice lobby. However the service reception is very slow. I noticed the hotel employs a lot of malay staff at the reception. I am not against it but please work faster when at the reception as guests are checking in. Otherwise they are all very polite. Location is very good. Lobby and room is very nice.
it was quite good .. the room is clean n very near to mt.elizabeth hospital if u planning on visiting someone
quite good .. its near mount elizabeth which is good if u want to visit someone

we were celebrating our wedding anniversary and were with our kids. due to short notice, the hotel staff was not able to decorate our room but we were given complimentary wine which we thought was very nice of them. we were given extra bed without extra charge. the room was spacious with king size bed but the toilet was abit small. we ate breakfast at the indian muslim restaurant. the buffet was not that good as there was not much choices and some food was cold. location of hotel is good as train station, shopping malls and restaurants are all in walking distance. overall stay at hotel was very good. Customer service was excellent, it was Ms Flora who serve us if not mistaken.
It was fine, but my room had a musty smell, so I think that can be improved
very nice the room is clean & comportable location of the hotel is center of the city
room are a little bit old, but great location, near shopping malls, lot of foods nearby.

The hotel definitetly met the basic criteria of good location and much more. The rooms were large when compared to other Singapore hotels, the service was very good about being flexible with our late check-in, our request for early check-out, etc. The only major issue with the hotel I had was that the taxi situation can be somewhat confusing during busy hours (rain, friday night, etc) but we got it sorted out. Just be aggressive about talking to the staff outside about being a hotel guest and you should get through the queue faster. I would definitely say this is one of the best located hotels in Singapore for tourists and for business people due to access to public transit and location near tourist sites. I also think you get value for money here compared to other Orchard Rd locations.
The hotel is in the middle of shopping center area. Room is clean and comfortable.

The room was clean and big enough for two people. It was about 5 min walk from the MRT station. Club room we stayed at was a connect room and we could easily hear people in the next room. To make things worse, our neighbors were too loud so we were not able to sleep on our first night there. The shower/bathroom was modern looking but not very functional. Shower pressure is way too weak and the area was covered only half way so water gets everywhere. It can be very messy and dengerous. Other family members stayed at a delux room for less, but seems like there was no difference in terms of the room and amenities. Only difference was if it comes with breakfast and drinks at the lounge. If you dont mind going out for breakfast,which I think is very easy since there are a lot of places to eat at near the hotel, I recommend staying at a delax room for less$.

Location is nice Near to the shopping mall and hospital Usually staying here for regular check up at nearby hospital Room is comfort but kinda of too small Breakfast is ok, nothing special Close to mrt station as well
good stay, nice location, close to mustafa which open 24 hours
Enjoy my stay in the hotel and would recommend my friend to stay on their next visit to Singapore. Clean room with shopping complex near by. Small but nice swimming pool with car park.
Our stay is fantastic. The best thing is the hotel near the casino
It was quite okay . You can walk to nearest mall in 3 mins and also Starbucks .
The water in the bathroom shower is very soft. Front counter staff (The guy) is not very friendly.
Value for money, near bugis center and bugis junction so easy for shopping and got pasar malam
yes it was good at the heart of city where people can shop a lot from mustafa and other places, nice restaurants beside the hotel.
Nice view, clean room, breakfast also good. near MRT Bras Basah only 100 M.
Nice place, centrally located, easy to find food and the room service is not bad

I m a frequent business traveller. Parkroyal meets the standard criteria for normal business travelers. On top of that, it is located near Mustafa which is great for shopping and lots of amazing Indian eateries nearby.

1. Large toilet but have a bad stench throughout the 3 days . 2. Requested for extra towels, turn down services and to check on stench in toilet on first evening at 6 30 pm . Then I went dinner with family . Came back at 930 pm and nothing was done yet . The reason given to me was " communication break down " 3. Requested for 1 baby cot when booking with Agoda and reminded hotel front desk upon check in at 3 pm . But still no cot by 930 pm . 4. First day of breakfast : we were informed that Forrest restaurant was too packed and if we wish , the hotel can send us to hard rock hotel for breakfast instead . It was raining and I had kids in tow so I told them , I would prefer to dine at the hotel itself which is promised in my hotel package . In the end , waited almost 1 hour for a table . Just to have my supposed " free breakfast ".

We had a great stay at Rendezvous Grand Hotel. The hotel room is clean and comfortable, the staffs were friendly and helpful. The location is superb, right next to Bras Basah MRT, very convenient to travel around the city and to Changi Airport. Just 5 minutes walk to Art Museum, Esplanade Theatre, Raffle City shopping mall.
Very convenient location with a pleasant clean, friendly no-nonsense modern feeling and general attitude. I will come back and can recommend this hotel to any visitor to Singapore
nthe hotel is nice and i will recoomend to any travellers..the staffs arefriendly too.the location is just perfect for me
No complaint at all, and looking forward to coming back to this hotel. Zhongshan Mall is attached. Nothing much, but good enough for a frequent travellers. Nice restaurants and a supermarket.

Village Hotel Bugis was formerly the Landmark Village Hotel and was rebranded with upgrading of their rooms. Their deluxe room has a good design albeit without any drawers. There is only standing shower with designer look. The wi fi speed is quite good though could be erratic at times. There is a choice of either chinese or indian style for breakfast. Located along Bugis and Arab St, there is plenty of shopping and restaurants.
Good location, strong wifi at clean room. A lot of Restaurants and local market near hotel.

The hotel was as I expected which is right at Orchard Road, not too expensive compared to other hotels in Orchard and fast internet. One thing that I didn't like too much was that we had to enter hotel via Shopping Mall which was old fashioned.
Nice hotel. But no bathroom kits for kids, would need to prepare by yorself.
Comfortable bed makes us have a good rest after a whole day walking
GREAT! had a fun time at the Universal studio and SEA Aquarium.
A nice place to stay for the night but staying is quite boring. Room has got no good view, but food nearby hotel is fantastic
I sleep well, the bed was cozy and the room is simple
Overall it was good.
good place to stay, nice for local restaurants, and Quiet surroundings
good
it was good, room is cosy, nice bed, city view, i'd come back there
Good location, but not clean hotel with bad smell room bad servies , self laggege carry , i check in 1,30 pm i have to wait untile 5.30pm to get the room

Our stay was pleasant in a central yet quiet surroundings. The hotel was within walking distance to Orchard Road. The hotel staff were efficient and courteous. Check in and check out was handled speedily without much fuss.
Good experience, nice & relaxing pool view. Friendly staff but the room is a bit small.

Stayed on the 28th floor at tower 1 with ocean view. We can see the Gardens by the bay clearly and at night, the lights were beautiful. Nice sunset and sunrise view. Booked on a Monday which is cheaper. Nice toilet but flushing button located at back of toilet seat which was very inconvenient. Wifi was free. Did the express checkout by filling in the form and didn't have to join the queue. Had breakfast, lunch and dinner at Rasapura at The Shoppes at Marina Bay Sands, lots of choices, can access via Tower 2. MRT is near at Tower 3. The arts and Science museum was holding the Egyptian tomb exhibition, that was very impressive.
I was upgrade to triple room on the courtesy of the Hotel staff seeing I have 2 young children and the hotel rooms is not that full. Housekeeping ladies are great.
Nice hotel, near MRT,, convenient for shopping ,mood for holiday and biussiness

i book 2 room and were inter-connecting room very clean, big and comfortable for my children and big family for visit. The hotel had gave me a very nice view room which can see the marina bay sand very clearly i really likes the view and had been take alot of photo. It was need to cityhall mrt. the only problem was when i wanted to check out i called for the bellboy to collect my things it take 20-25 min for waiting.
the dining in level 22 is definitely a best place to hang out and rest. the cocktail buffet is also one of the best thing i ever experienced. the room condition is such a great place to rest.

Great room. Got upgraded to Harbour View Room. Nice scenery. Room was spacious. Nice and clean bathroom. The only downside is check-in rate. It took quite a while to check in. Seems like they should allow more check-in counters and earlier check-in time.

overall the stay was good, even though it was extremely noisy. The whole area around the hotel is undergoing complete renovation and even the hotel itself is under work (the room next to mine was undergoing complete renovation and the corridor wasn't complete). I was upgraded to swimming pool room, but in the end, this was an uncomfortable thing: the room is located right alongside the swimmning, the window was not even 2 meters away from the pool and wasn't soundproof enough. So you hear all the people shouting at the pool, all the water sounds and you cannot even open the big curtains because there aren't any other so people can see directly into your room from their sunchairs.

The friendly hotel staff gave us a complimentary room upgrade to deluxe room. The room is beautiful and spacious. The bathroom is big too with separate bath tub and shower. The lobby is spacious with elegant design. The internet speed is fast and the room has got a writing table with internet cables for laptops. The room comes with a comfy couch. I really enjoyed the weekend stay and will most probably be visiting again soon.
Near shopping area, nice and clean room, centrally located, t
Near shopping area, nice and clean room, centrally located, t

During check-in, the staff at the reception was rude to us. It was our first time there but she said that we had a previous no-show so she couldn't check us in. Before we could even reply to her, she turned and walk into to the office. This put a dampener on our Xmas mood. We like the design of the room. The Nexus tablet was touted as a feature of the hotel but it wasn't in the room and upon calling the front desk, it took more than 45 mins for it to be delivered to us. We were very disappointed with the breakfast at the hotel. We waited for more than an hour for the food to be served to us. The breakfast consist of food like scrambled eggs, sausages, bacon, ham, porridge, dim sum, all of which could be served buffet style to shorten the waiting time. The restaurant space could also be cleared out faster if people do not have to wait so long for the food.
Overall my stayed in Concorde Hotel Singapore was very great. I have a nice vacation!!!!
got put in a new wing, best room i have ever stayed in,
Nice hotel. satisfied. Near shops and some main interest attraction in SG such as esplanade, Merlion, Helix Bridge, Garden at the bay, Nice infinity pool.
The room was nice but the guest service could have been better. Regardless, I enjoyed my stay there - but for drivers, do take note - no complimentary parking even for guests.

I like the room in general. comes with a refrigerator too. the only thing they dont have is a bathtub. staying here in this hotel means u can share the rest of the hotel in the same strip their facilities. u can walk to hard rock hotel to use their swimming pool too. just show your room card. apart from that, u can travel to town (orchard road) for free with their free shuttle every half an hour. just show your room card as well. the only thing i m not happy about is, the place does not provide free internet access. it's very expensive too. nearest is hard rock cafe (the only free wifi).
BIG ROOM SPACE BUT A BIT OLD DESIGN AND VALUE FOR MONEY WHEN AGODA GIVEN 50% DISCOUNT TIME
Nice I stayed here 5-6 times. I will come back again.

We were upgraded to a Club room having booked a superior due to availability. Asked for twin beds got a king. Asked for non smoking, only smoking was available. Apart from those two minor issues, overall the room was impressive. Very large. Bed was comfy. Reception was very busy on arrival and were kind of left to our own devices without really knowing what to do. I guess this is to be expected a little in Singapore. I think this hotel was great value for money having got a deal on the price.
I liked the room in terms of cleanliness and comfort. The only down side was the bed was right up against the window and it had no room at the end of the bed as it was up against the wall.....
It was a good staycation, with all the major shopping malls nearby
quite interesting walk around the hotel. Electronic Sim Lim Centre just across the street. Further down you can find a favorite Budhist Temple, Bugis shopping area etc.

I must say I'm very impressed by ESPA, had a very relaxing wonderful weekend, just a small problem, hotel staff in Equaris was not very familiar with the spa package, and the room housekeeping was not doing a great job as they never replenish the toilet amenities.
Fun,but its far from mrt station,but still can walk to orchard mrt. I feel comfort at this hotel.

Nice place to stay if you going to travel everywhere on the MRT. Its close to the City Hall station which serves 2 MRT lines. I was able to get to the Hotel from the airport via the MRT very quickly and efficiently. Rooms where adequately cleaned and designed well to take advantage of the space. With all the other great places to eat I did not have the opportunity to try any of the restaurants in the hotel.

All in all nice, I'll come back. Unfortunately I had no time to use the swimming pool/spa and gym. For sure this hotel is worth to be recommended to business associates. At the end, I had to rate the food which I never took, here the field n.a. should be added.
Generally stay in the hotel was nice. Large and clean room suitable the whole family.

Room itself lovely, but hotel reception is like being back in an airport, devoid of any close personal interaction.... way too big and many people passing through. Restaurants way overpriced, but nice food court near the Museum. Wi-Fi very fast.
It was a good stay as usual. Staff is very friendly and efficient check in and check out. Recommend upgrading to club level that includes happy hour and breakfast. I will stay again upon my return!

Bugis Village is one of my regular hotel during my stay in Singapore. So far it has been good. The Hotel undergone some renovation last year and the room has a new look. The bed is comfortable. The Wi-Fi speed is acceptable though it can lag whenever too many access. I did not have breakfast at the Hotel but there are plenty of places to eat. Overall a pleasant stay.

The stay was quite nice. We were at a conference, and stayed at the conference hotel, V Hotel Lavendar, and that hotel was gross. Intercontinental was clean and had a better standard. What they could do is refurnish the wallpaper.
Not bad, won't mind coming here again if the price isnt so bad.

1st day i arrived .the receptionist told me that the hotel got the problem with their pipe which made all rooms in 2 of their hotel floors cant use to stay . the gave me option to move the other hotel or waiting for room with no sure time when will i get the room .because im in a hurry i choosed the 1st option to stay to other hotel ,in my opinion they will give me at least same quality hotel ,but.. the reality...that exchange hotel have such a tiny room !! not too clean .our 1st day is such a nightmare 2nd day i moved back to the parc hotel .the room is very clean ,not to big room but enough for me .good located hotel .5-10 minutes walk to bugis village . easy to find delicious food around the hotel 2nd day - 4th day is very nice stay . im sure i will get back to the hotel next time but.. i hope there is no problem anymore like my 1st day stay .
I stayed one night here. Paid for new upgraded room. It is very closed to bugis market, bugis junction, and bugis plus. The swimming pool is very huge and nice. There is karaoke down at the hotel.
great hotel! would definitely come back..staff was friendly and attentive..rooms were clean and spacious
centrally located, good for business or traveller. Affordable price with good services. Clean and comfortable bed. nice stay
Good. Enjoyed the flexibility of early check in and late check out
it was good
very nice stay, Singapore is very wonderfull country i like it

Stay for a day. Everything is perfect as you can expect from five stars Hotel. However, 30 minutes right after check in to the room, out of the blue, someone just knock on the door and said Room Service. No one asked for it and the room was just received 30 min ago. One (1) minute later, they used Master Key and opened the door. Very disappointing moment of the stay. Informed front desk, but no reply nor clarification was given by Hotel.
Stayed at the Royal Plaza on Scotts for the second time. Great stay. The hotel provides excellent service. The pool and gym are well appointed. The minibar and the wifi are free which is great.

Wonderful hotel, very beautiful , clean, spacious. some employees were really helpful but some other not at all I asked Rachel wang to give me breathing masks ( there was a pollution peak) she refused Room service provided them for me. the tea buffet is excellent. We thought there would be one swimming pools, there was 2 ! we really enjoyed the stay there

It was nice to stay at here V Hotel, because it close to MRT, very convenience for travel within the city and the room's design was nice but also have too much dust on the bed, pillow within the room that make our group allergy. The wireless should be free of cost, i think.
Not value for money, but a five star hotel with all amenities in the room..late check out was refused
Not value for money, but a five star hotel with all amenities in the room..late check out was refused
I'll definitely consider going back. It was close to everything you need such as the train station, shopping mall and the nightlife places.
This is my second stay. The spacious room, large bathroom & comfortable bed is the reason I came back. But this time, the WIFI failed me. No WIFI connect?? Overall, it's still a nice stay.
nice stay,great location..near to shopping center,and near to MRT station.
nice stay,great location..near to shopping center,and near to MRT station.
They free upgrade my room to family room which with three single bed. Room was big n comfort.
very good price together with the large room provided.
the front was under renovation, but other than that.. the hotel was the best.
the front was under renovation, but other than that.. the hotel was the best.
Not bad, able to change room from one w/o bath tub to one with. New renovated rooms no bath tub. Should indicate in the room info as the info given is with tub
Worth to pay for room fee. Easy to access to shopping centres, night life and mrt station.

It was nice staying in a hotel in a different location. Room was good, but lifts could use some upgrading; allocating your floor did not always work as expected. Also kudos to Agoda Customer Service and the hotel booking department for allowing me to change from one week to another after having booked wrongly the first time.

Nice swimming pool - Have spent two days in the pool area to the nice view of Singapore Comfortable hotel room - With upgrade to the Tower 1 room, can observe the view of the city from the window in the room High speed internet - Both upload and download speed are fast for photos sharing

Nice design like ship at Marina bay sands with a lot intensional band shops , nearby SMRT , if using Taxi also easy to sentosa universal studio . The staff name Mr Allan got plan birthday cake to me , very warm our heart . Nice and beautiful view from 41 floor , and very like all the place is no smoking , this we strongly support .
the fantastic and facinating environment make me comfortable with my family and also will be the best for business.
This hotel room is nice - comfortable for bussiness trip and holiday trip

I really enjoyed the service I have from the staff. from the min you step into the hotel to the room service, top notch all the way. kudos guys. the villa was nice, but a little expensive for the size. there were some stains on the sofa and carpet, so not up to the standards that I will expect capella to have.

The hotel is very near CBD area and thus over the weekend, it's really quiet and nice to walk around. Not much crowd and close to the train station. Very convenient with a 24 hour macdonalds within walking distance of 5 mins.
overall everything is ok. nothing bad about it. new and clean.
It was a pleasant hotel. Situated in the shopping belts of the famous orchard road. Many restaurants & food courts serving local delights. Mrt station is within walking distance. Very convenience

Very nice hotels with good breakfast buffet, Rooms are very large (as compared to other hotel in singapore) Bed, sheets, and pillow are clean and cosy. Hotel is right on Orchard road. We will definitely stay there again if we go to singapore.
V Hotel is very near to Lavender MRT and near Kopi Tiam food court that open 24 hours
This is a very new, clean, and grand hotel.. Staff are very nice and helpful. Location nearby city..Swimming pool is large and clean.
had a wonderful stay. it has a quiet surrounding and the rooms are large and clean.
It was a pleasant experience with a beautiful design hotel, clean rooms and friendly staff. However, the charges for wifi was very high and there was a long waiting time for checkout.
Nice hotel in a quiet surrounding. good for escape from th city but yet near to many attractions to occupy yourself.

Receptionist said we booked 3 twin rooms while our confirmation stated clearly we actually need 3 rooms with single king beds. Upon check out, we were asked to pay for the hotel breakfast which should be included at the time of booking. These were all cleared at the end but it seemed the staff were careless and if the travellers were not sure of what they had paid for, they might have been over-charged.
The price is too high, we stay there is because its pool. Nice view and cool hot-tub.
Located next to bugis mrt and the shopping centre, very convenient getting to the city. Rooms are spacious and comfortable.
Good but the colour should be more bright for more areas.
Friendly staff...love the overall experience & stay.
its in the middle of singapore i think, easy access to mrt, other mall by walking. 15 minutes walk to clake quay... but internet often changes code... but overall its okay

It was nice with a great city view, however the room's design was not as modern as I imagined, it was really comfortable regardless with great customer service. The infinity pool was a little disappointing personally speaking, it was nice, but not great, you could have seen the city view somewhere else but need not spending double the price to stay the night and get access to the pool. Yet it is still a great hotel with a lot of amenities around, from shopping to restaurants to the casino, pool, bars, "the Garden", and close to MRT as well.

Its quite ok. they have convinience store, supermarket, and surrounding by lots of restaurant. Room is good good. However, far from city, hard to find transportation. they have shuttle bus however, i still find it trouble. Hard to find a taxi.
Satisfied with my stay there. Big room with good service.
We stayed here during "GRAND PRIX" weekend, so it was rather expensive. But, is a great location for GP, and everything else Singapore has to offer.
It was a really short stay. reached there late at night and left early in the morning. pleasant surrounding, near orchard road.
satisfy and i will be recommended to my family,friend and others.convient for dinning,shopping,fun,affortdable and good location
Satisfy!! Anyway, our room is behind elevator, so the room size is nquite small

it was just so-so... did not leave up to the Name of Hard Rock Hotel. could not get the rooms until like 4 pm local time. nothing to brag about. quite a walk to Universal Studio. Worst of it all is that you have to pay for internet excess. Its Ridiculous... would not stay here anymore.
no comment no comment not available not available no comment no comment not available not available
Ok, but I wouldn't book it again. The room was very small and the setting quite old.
The hotel is tourist standard, nothing more nothing less. Very standard and, for the price you are really paying for the location only. No view, breakfast is mediocre. Great access to Orchard and MRT
The hotel is tourist standard, nothing more nothing less. Very standard and, for the price you are really paying for the location only. No view, breakfast is mediocre. Great access to Orchard and MRT
Not so goods, i drive there but the valet not allow us to park in front of the lobby should allow for customer to park less than 1 hr and the atitidute not so good.

Basic needs of travelers are addressed. Nothing spectacular. Great for practical people on a budget. The building in front of the hotel was being renovated during my stay. There's a Fair Price grocery store one block away.
Good, the location is near to most other hotels, convenient, safe & good choice of restaurants around

It was relatively easy and fuss free. Check in was a breeze, checkout even faster. Room is very clean and I loved the signature scent once you enter the hotel lobby. It was refreshing. It's a little out of the way so don't expect to be near any of the malls. No nightlife as well. Bus rides are tricky because they don't pass directly near hotel premises. So we took cabs all the time. Big bonus is the mini-mall connected to the hotel where a few restos and shops could be found. All in all a good stay. Quieter than most hotels that are near the shopping district. This area is mostly for schools, condos, and offices.
Very nice staff, clean and helpful when we needed directions everywhere.
the first night stay was not very satisfied due to no air cond for almost 4hrs, however its was notified in memo.
It was sufficient enough just for sleep and rest after hectic day at the hospital
Good value for money, small but clean and comfortable rooms, location is good, no problems

Overall is good such as ease public transport & food. But for rates per night seem like keep on growing & growing. There a similar hotel like V Lavender but the rates is lower than. Suggest to compare the rates before proceed.

The hotel is centrally located, near Hjh Maimunah restaurant and KG Glam Cafe.. Easy access to public transport. My wife with the kids can go shopping to the various fabric shop at Arab Street while I attending the conference in Novena. The room is very comfortable and clean. The hotel rate is affordable and economical as well. I would suggest to my friends to stay here.
Very good , but reception did not give me invoice as I made my payments on line. they did not give me a solution too.

Never feel secure at all - 1. My room door was not properly close after the housekeeper had done their cleaning, luckily my neighbours was honest guess, else all my stuffs including my laptop and bags will be gone. 2. Do not disturb sign was switch on and I went for my dinner, once I return, there was a room service plate inside my room because they had sent wrongly. With the Do not disturb sign ON, the room service guy still have the right to break into my room with his master key, how can I feel safe. And when he come back to collect the plate, he knock the door once and press the door bell once and just before I could reach the door, he already starts to use his master key trying to open my door. Never can wait. 3. Internet service for my account was cut off on my last day of stay and couldn't get connect back again, what a stupid service. Never stay in a unsecure hotel and terrible services hotel again.
Comfortable room, beautiful staff, no smoking area, good dining
Comfortable room, beautiful staff, no smoking area, good dining

They charged us 20 dollars for checking in early at 10am even though we also leaving at 5 in the morning the next day. It was ok but it feels like they don't have any consideration. No restaurant. Very small bathroom.
This time was still a pleasant trip, no major issue

The hotel was fine, I didn't eat there, as I preferred to explore other opinions. Unfortunately there was building construction going on next door, the nose went on into the night, I had a change rooms. You could relax by the pool either because of the nose this was also disappointing.

non event, I was out of the hotel at most times. The breakfast needs to be improved. The place was a restaurant layout, not conducive for a buffet breakfast. This needs to be improved. The food served were way below my expectation.
Pool was great, room was used by a smoker. Friendly staff. It's the pool that is the attraction.

The stay was non significant. Room comfort and amenities were good. Two things were below expections: 1. The rooms were rather dusty, I could see dust flying around. 2. The bathroom curtain had a foul smell.

THE TOILET FLUSH IS HOPELESS WE HAVE TO PRESS/BANG HARD BEFORE THE WATER COMES OUT . TECHNICIAN CAME N REPAIR N AFTER 1 FLUSH THE SAME OLD STORY. EVERYTIME U FLUSH U HAVE TO PRESS/BANG HARD. CARPET IN THE ROOM WORN OUT TIME THE HOTEL SHLD CHANGE IT.
location of hotel is good, room is clean.check in and out is fast.

1. Light bulb on ceiling not working-would expect House keeping to pick this fault.Still not working at time of check out. 2. Shower came out in burst of hot then cold water. Reported to House keeping BUT not fixed. 3. For a 5 star hotel, TV reception is extremely poor on every channel.

I must say that I was disappointed in this hotel. Pool area was boring, could not find any publi restrooms in connection to it, there were only 8 available sun beds and staff were non existent. room service was not available? at least no menu were to find in in the room and it was not possible to get connected using the button on the telephone. Breakfast buffe was expensive SD 35++ but had not much too choose from. Only good thing abt this hotel is that it is close to Orchard road shopping area.
Not a bad choice, will consider it on my next visit.
As expected, not bad, not exceptional either. Check-in for my colleagues took a bit longer than expected, I had a booking without Skylounge access, but no problems accessing it as a guest.
This customer has only rated this hotel and has not submitted any comments.

Not a good experience. Checking in and checking out are big hassles. The front desk people do not care about guests. I have been a regular guest. Now it looks like we have to look for another hotel. The hotel is in good location. But the very attitude of the reception people needs to be improved. First experience is very poor during checking in. I am sure the management can change the attitude of the staff; they need to understand the need of the guests.

Not coming back hopefully, was given 1 breakfast only, didnt see it in the fine print, not flexible because cant change it, i said i only eat for 1 day but for 2 persons instead of 2 days for 1 person. Keep asking me to pay more. Gave me a room so far in the basement and need to walk far and in open area which was raining and slippery for my dad who are old and sick, finally they change my room.

Rooms are bad and requested to change room 3 times. (1) Being arranged to smoking floor despite non-smoking room request (2)Room with bad odour (3)Told to accept room with double bed despite rooms with twin bed are available (4) Toilet too old and gives bad smell despite thorough cleaning.
Room is quite small .. but clean and comfortable .. will sure to visit again

I changed the room type from deluxe room to premiere room and have to pay with higher price. The reason was the premiere room larger (30 m2) than deluxe room (24 m2) . But actually, the room size is same. it is not different. So, why I should pay more for the same room with same facility?

I stupidly chose this hotel by comparing other 4 stars hotel around Singapore with similar price and have room with bathtub. And Village was the cheapest. So i went for it. And when i checked in THEY DON'T HAVE A BATHTUB for deluxe room. The room is really drained, cheap, and old. described the room was 32m2?? Well it's not at all, the room was too small. I'm not sure whether i'm in bad luck they gave me their worst room, or ...? I did complain to reservation staff, they only offered me to be moved to another room with bathtub but in smoking room. I bring my infant child, it's not acceptable at all. They don't even try to offer me upgraded room I complained again, after that they just offered it. Seems Agoda has a lot of bargain :) GOOD JOB FOR AGODA But i was too disappointed with the Hotel, even the family room was also disappointing. Not 4 stars at all. I asked Agoda to refund my 2nd and 3rd nights, Thank God they approved. Early morning next day i moved to another Hotel.. Feels like release from some kind of a nightmare
it was ok. we required urgent assistance and no one came to help. that was poor of them.

the room was small for a superior room.. i expect the room to be quite big for a superior room and at the rate per night... the bath room is small too even for Asian size people. i asked for a twin double .. it was just twin beds.. i have two grown up children.. and it was very cramped and sleep was not a good one. internet was provided free but quite slow connection unlike some of the hotel i stayed at previously. it has a small swimming pool..
Only self service laundry is available and you have to go out of room to another level.. Call for towels and water takes 45 minutes to be delivered.
not as much good as before, the rooms having rust but still it is a good hotel in singapore

Eventually the hotel not what i expected to be from the images show at agoda. the hotel quite far from sentosa world eventually. But the hotel atmosphere is nice, room too small. but worth in price though
not available for this stay .. no comment for this hotel
Brilliant ... Very near to shopping center. Best place to stay for shopping.
Room is quite nice .. very near to shopping mall .. easy to travel
The refrigerator in the room is out of order so that any drink could not cool. The price is high but service is bad.
Big and clean room, near orchard road, however the twin bed size r very small, only 80cm. It's not really comfortable. Anws, it's a suitable choice for family holiday.
overal is okay, the room is pretty big, wifi is fast and the location is okay too. But the staff could be more friendly and breakfast could be improved, and provide more choices
Not bad, book earlier to get a good deal! Overall not too bad

Not bad, the best thing about this hotel is it's location. The monorail is just outside. Just a tip: if you wanna save a few bucks, grab breakfast at McDonalds or hop on the monorail and go to Vivo for breakfast. Then, ask for the set lunch menu at Hard Rock Cafe or Chili's Monday thru Friday from 12:00 - 3:00. It's pretty good. Otherwise, food can get little pricey on Sentosa. Astons isn't bad for the price at dinner time. It's kinda hit and miss sometimes though. Late at night Ruyi and McDonalds are the only options. Anyway, get off Sentosa and explore! The MRT is pretty easy.
Location is excellent but cleanliness and food are poor . Also the hotel is quite old .

There was reconstruction at the front of the hotel created Loud Noise. Our room's view was blocked by other building's wall. We went to the cafe on 2nd floor, we felt the music and its atmosphere so weird. It doesn't suit to the hotel's main function which is for business.

There was reconstruction at the front of the hotel created Loud Noise. Our room's view was blocked by other building's wall. We went to the cafe on 2nd floor, we felt the music and its atmosphere so weird. It doesn't suit to the hotel's main function which is for business.
Location not really walkable to Orchard Rd. Forget about the breakfast - not even worth it. This should be more of a 3 stars hotel.

Had to change rooms twice as the first two ones definitively smelled like fungi. The receptionist was very! arrogant and made bad jokes about it. The whole hotel atmosphere is more like a hostel not hotel.
There is not much for me to say.! I guess that type of Hotel is not for some people like me. I wonder what they had in mind when they called it. " THE BIG HOTEL."

not good at all over priced and not four star as stated, talked to the manager before we left and he did reply to my note I left but over all not a good stay. staff need more training in international guest relations breakfast that was not cheap was cold and not good at all
Unpleasant experience, hote staff un-coperative rather I would like to say not professional. Not ready to assist for inconvieince experienced by the guest.
Room way too small. Bed hard. All else good. Great staff.
Internet was slow. Room bathrooms need upgrading. Rooms had a soft refurb despite being 20 + years old. Hence 4 star at best.

Not very satisfied with this hotel. As shown in detail from the website, the club room should be equipped with bath tub, the room that was given to me though has no such facility. I'm disappointed that the hotel has failed to deliver such promise.

checking in was prety easy everything was good at the lobby till we went into the room swimming pool was abit dirty and after a long day we took a nap.. to my horro i woke up half naked to 2 indian workers looking into my roo, like as if they do not know if anyone is staying in the house !! i was really pissed off. but htey did offer a late check out till 6 for us
Not really happy with unfriendly receptionist when we're checking in, Wi Fi only in lobby hotel only.

5 stars rated hotel but service standard not up to 5 stars. Check in takes ages to complete, in-room tv system is lousy, call for technician for help but the technician took more than 30 mins to come. Swimming pool is super small, towels took long to be replenished.
the hotels seems a bit old. even though its re furbrished, it doesnt justify the rates. have stayed in better hotels of the same class and rates.
Just for the experience of the pool

* staff at the counter & concierge were friendly * room was clean & spacious. Booked a deluxe room * was upgraded to pool view * bed was comfortable * weird bathroom though, shower & toilet is separate with its own door (no lock) inside one huge bathroom, no door found in the main entrance * fridge was not working but they had it changed right away * we asked for extra glasses from house keeping, was told they will check first. We never received a call back
room is so small, its not worth for my money, plus i can hear noice coming from the hallway.
stay was ok. nothing great. food was very bad. very tight restaurant. not so many food choices. food presentation not enticing.
So so

Checking-In takes me around 15minutes, longer than any normal normal check-in time. When I arrive the room, the window blinds is not working as it is designed, sunlight can still go in even the blinds are close. I called the hotel to change into a different room but they don't allow - i don't know if it is because I booked from agoda or whatever reason. I ended up calling their maintenance and ask for help to fixed the blinds. They send someone to fix it but still it wasn't fix. Definitely not a hotel if you want to relax during the day.

This Parkroyal is a bit outdated and needs some renovation. The room we stayed in was ok but the bathroom was outdated and some things were broken. The hairdryer wasn't working, the airco was malfunctioning and drinking glasses were really dirty. The hotel is not really centrally located but is really close to an MRT station as well as several local restaurants and a shopping mall.
The room is very small otherwise it's okay if it is just to get a good night sleep
Simple hotel with not much expectation. Really nothing fancy about the hotel. Will get bored easily.

I was surprised for using internet at business center in the lobby i have been asked to put 1 dollar coin in d box every after 15 minutes. In the night i did not have the coin neither they had some how i managed but i was booking a hotel and i was under so much pressure for lime limit i booked wrong date it was non refundable.

Room was big but the breakfast arrangement is bad. Small restaurant with heavy number of peoples. Some cant even get a place to seat. Quite a distance walking to Orchard Rd. Shuttle bus only available certain timing in Shragrila Hotel where is 5-10min walks.

one of the staff not friendly when we request for toiletries in the middle of night. We have no choice to call them in the middle of night to send the item to us because we just back from our safari trip. We asking the staff where to get the water for consumption. He just raise up the voice and tell us get the water from tap. =.=!
big room , but the room was just empty and no sofa in it, the bed is uncomfortable.
Average. It's very shocking !!! I will never ever stay in this hotel again

Was given a small angle room, maybe due to the cheap special rate that i got. Room service was not 24 hours and i was told that any request must be before 10pm. Overall not happy compares with the last stay i have last year.

Based on it's price and standard it is NOT 4 star, and the reviews - pictures do NOT reflect the standard of hotel. There are much better located, similar priced 4 star hotels around rather than this one.

The room was not luxurious compare to the money I paid for. Most importantly the swimming pool that this hotel is overpriced for was disappointing on the condition of the water quality. There were many people inside and the water was not clean. You can find floating hair, sweaty water quality. I didn't even immerse my head into the water.
room is big. aircondition very cold. breakfast not good. quiite expensive room.
Very small room. The room is easily get dirty. The shower screen in bathroom is not good. The water will pour out when bathing. The room really not worth in money value.
Not worth the amount that I paid for Orchid Club as the staff were looking down on me, adhesive that I was not rich enough to stay in the Orchid Club
Old room, very expensive compare to the room condition. Not worth for the money at all. Its a very good location though.

Honestly speaking, if i have a choice of a free stay in this hotel, i might not even want to take it up. Not because the service was bad -- pretty good actually -- or that the rooms was horrid -- v clean, decently luxurious -- or that the location was bad -- very centrally located -- but it was because this hotel represents the worst value in terms of money spent of all the hotels in singapore. for the price i paid, i expected a lot more luxuries like bigger bathroom, bigger bed, bigger tv, better carpeting, etc. but everything was just, well, decently good. And i wasnt even given breakfast as well. For the price i paid for a normal room here, i could have gotten a club room with breakfast just a few blocks down. The only redeeming factor here for travelers is the high floors, which offers a unrivaled view of the city landscape, as this hotel is the tallest that we have here. but ask me to pay premium price for a norm room with a view, and i would gladly say no, and hop onto the next room that offers me more bang for my buck

Room was normal and very far from front desk. Disappointed that tv is not positioned in front of bed. Thus you can't watch tv in bed. Very weird. Called them to rectify problem. Took 3 calls and 30mins before technician came to move tv cabinet slightly to angle to the bed. This expose all wires behind tv. Not nice! Open my door in the morning and saw pails and plastic bags left in corridor by cleaning staff. Not a pleasant sight. Buffet breakfast was limited. Lack variety. Upon check out, staff insist we pay for the breakfast. I told her its included in room price already. She merely rectified it with no apologies. They sent a small cake to our room as its our wedding anniversary which was nice but thats about it. Disappointing stay.
Next to paragon mall, near Mount Elizabeth hospital. Love to stay here. Everytime I I pass by the ambreimce lovely smells.

room was clean but very small. lack of amenities; no fridge. lack of walking space, very cramped. no complimentary parking. we had to pay $12 for the parking. breakfast sucks. was not a buffet, lack of choices and food tasted very bland, no effort.
The bed was too damn stiff. Nice hotel with a cheap mattress. They cut corners to save a few bucks so they loose my future business. I would rather stay in a poorer hotel with a comfy mattress?

Not very good actually. First there was no hot water then we asked for them to repair it. They came promptly and provided hot water to come through the tap but then there was no cold water. Electrical outlet was not working so asked them to fix it and they did come and fix it but then my Ipad charger blew up and so did the ipad port for charging......so over all not very good. The staff were cold and not very welcoming.
quiet and comfort hotel. Good hotel for family and children for holiday.
Nothing much to share as the place is housing neighbourhood. No mrt serving this hotel and eating is a problem as you need to walk and choices limited.
I am not too happy since i could hear people talking outside my room n frequently open close rooms that waking me up cos i could hear it very loud. I dont think I will be back.
Everything was good, but just good. nothing's special. somehow i feel this hotel was overpriced. The swiming pool not good at all. old and rusty. But nice for sleep and rest.
The stay was ok. Except that I should not be made to wait for 15 mins for my room, considering its a 5 stars hotel and my late check-in at about 4pm. There wasn't even a breakfast.
No complaints so far so good. Just abit noisy along corridor
Check in took over 20 minutes Room was noisy:- neighbouring room, hallway and outside (beside Universal studio theme park Room not made up one day (out of 3)

We loved this hotel. Have stayed at the Marina Sands but much prefer the personal and attentive, friendly service at the Oasia. The staff are fantastive, without exception. Club room extras including breakfast and cocktails each night really made our stay fun and relaxing. This hotel has really got its service right and it makes for a relaxing and friendly atmosphere. We never felt uncomfortable or afraid to ask for anything. The staff on the Club floor really do their job in a very unobtrusive and sincere way. Cannot say anything bad about this hotel. On top of a MRT station and easy to get everywhere. Try the Oasia - you won't be disappointed
tall hotel but room was quite old. overall stay ok
ok I arrived with big tour group and the front desk is quite helpful but the room is bit too small for 2 people
Very average. Dust your rooms every day and have consistency in cleaning rooms. Sentosa resorts in general ok.
It is a great location, a bit of walk to shopping area. Also after renovation, a lot cleaner than before. However, the room is still very dark, not too good when I need to read document.

The check in and check out was quick, and the staff were friendly. The hotel is in a central location, with easy access to buses and MRT. It's also a short walking distance to shops in Bugis, and to Arab St. The room was big enough, though the hotel is really old. The room was well lit, but it smells old and damp. It's clean enough, but improvements need to be made for a really good stay. Good thing there was a promotion of 80SGD voucher.

Bathroom not clean during my 3 nights stay and no replacement of toiletries. Unpleasant urine ordour at my side of the bed. The location of this hotel is good, easy access to Singapore's attractions via rail or taxi.
good and refreshing experience with a nice boutique theme designed hotel in the itaewon area and very near to seoul station.
good service , free upgrade and free internet as i was millenium member
feeling free n fresh clean environment of the hotel; maybe can make more improvement for the room clean!
Comfortable enough, executive room was upgraded to a club room due to availability. Nice view of sunset.

The room was clean and spacious but the bathroom was not what I expected. Design is modern but shower pressure was too weak and the shower area was covered only half way so water gets everywhere. It is messy after taking a shower and wet floor made me almost slip and fell a Couples of times and dengerous. I would not recommend this hotel because of it especially if you are traveling with small children or if you put some weight on having a fanctional bathroom. There was no bath tub. I think the hotel is pretty old but the room was renovated and looked new. Some parts (such as a door nob) were still old and broken. Good thing about this hotel is its location. It was about 5 minutes walk from Bugis MRT station.

The hotel was ok but I did not appreciate the confusing two/three floor check in entrance/exit thing always having to go up n down in the elevators to get bags/leave bags by yourself etc. No bellboys on hand and not good staff on the counters some could not communicate well and lloked very undertrained.
Ok hotel in the heart of Little India. Nothing fancy but decent price for SG.
Consider ok but looks old, a goog things is they are close to food center
quite small room for 2 people. a bit pricey.
the room was a standard room with no furniture and small bed. OK nothing exciting
Consider ok but looks old, a goog things is they are close to food center
Good. But the Pool Villas have no TV in the bedroom but only in the living area. Breakfast is relatively poor and the restaurant need refurbishment.

Booking request was for 3 non-smoking rooms but was allocated 3 smoking rooms with an overpowering odour as non-smoking rooms were not available. Although our rooms were on the 'club' floor access to the club amenities was at a further charge - never experienced this before.

I liked the convenience of this hotel, right next to the Mustafa Centre which is open 24 hours and close to all the great restaurants and shops. The rooms werent so bad, For the price you pay I dont really think its worth it. Employees of the hotel are downright unfriendly and rude and customer service is very slow. It is a bit noisy and you can hear people talking in the next room. We had been travelling around so much and were at that stage that we didnt care so much anymore, we were glad to be just heading back home and looking forward to our own home and bed. I will however not stay there again if I go.
little bit expensive but have to stay as close to friends, hotel are ok clean but small room
Unfriendly staff, bad breakfast, but cleaning personel frienly and thorough

OK. But service has slacked. I requested at check in for the newspaper the next morning to be sent to the room. However, when I checked out the next day at 8.30am nothing was sent to me yet. When i asked, the counter staff just said that they have keyed into the system. But unfortunately the customer who is ME, did not receive anything. I think when we talk about service, the minor details of a customer's request being handled in a proper and efficient manner is what counts. Customers like their request to be clock-work. Especially the for busy and time-starved guests.
The stay was good.. but morning complimentary breakfast was too delayed and short of staff...
Comforatble, food is ook but need more menu of asian food such as: Korean food, Vietnam Food, Japanese food. and have more seat for breakfast.
Okay hotel with a good location but not really value for your money......old hotel with show check in and old rooms.
Below expectation.
Hotel is under renovation but hotel front desk and staff try their best to maintain 5-star service. Room is okay, but needs major overhaul.
Good place to stay and was an okay room. I had a good experience after we changed our room.

the hotel location is perfect. the room was big but the bathroom was a bit outdated and the air conditioning was poor. it did not get cold as i wanted. but it may have just been my room. i have stayed here many times i before...and probably should have asked to change rooms...but i was already unpacked no by the time i realized it wasn't gonna get cooler. the front desk could be a little friendlier. since this isn't my first stay...i know they're at least consistent with that. i like staying here because of the location. otherwise i would go somewhere else.

Our room smelt like mildew and the next morning I had told the staff and they laughted and said they will get the cleaners to spray some air freshener! The carpet was dirty and the vents for the A/C was full of dust and dirt. Being an asthmatic it didn't make my stay very comfortable.
Old building Bad service Furniture Old
It's ok, suitable for people who like night life. However, the hotel is old.

this is my third time staying here. I feel so lucky because i could get 80 sgd voucher, which make this hotel have a high value of money since it is located in orhcard area. It's large-sized-bed makes my family happy staying here. This hotel is also have a nice chinese restaurant.
its a nice hotel but needs refurbishment. the pools are amazing though.

Im staying for 4 days n we are getting a connecting room so it was nice to have all family connected in the hotel The hotel is clean and has easy access to bus stop and mrt so its very easy to go around and orchad road is just minute walk

The hotel was linked to a old shopping centre, and the interior of the hotel was quite old, with a smell. We upgraded the room from standard to deluxe at a cost of SGD20++ per room. The deluxe room was better because it had been recently newly renovated. The breakfast was included, but not good. Very few choices.
Concierge staff firendly. Front staff not so friendly

Just like staying in another 3 stars standard hotel. Very old concept interior as it is an old hotel. Room lighting is dark or dim. Bathroom is extremely small. Sound proof on neighboring room is very poor until we can even hear the sound of our neighboring room's Couples having/making their "pleasure moment" sound in the middle of the night. Quite a distance walking to the nearest MRT station. Nevertheless, staffs are attentive, speedy and friendly.

I was hosting an event by the poolside, a surprise 50th birthday party for my mother. I had booked two rooms, one for the party prep team to get ready in and another as a present for my mom. The F&B captain in charge of my party has been working there for 40 over years which amazed me and he was very professional. The food was amazing as well. The deluxe room was old but the size was a lot bigger than other rooms I have stayed in around the world. We had 8 girls in the room and there was still alot of space to walk around and get ourselves ready with regards to our hair and make-up. I ordered 8 room service dishes, the goodwood park burger was one of the best i have had from room service. All in all, a great hotel.

This is my favourite hotel in Singapore. I always stay there and I have been there many times. I happened to have my birthday during my stay and I was presented with a very nice and delicious birthday cake by the hotel. A very nice gesture. We had dinner on that day in the Gordon Grill with top food and wine. A memorable stay.
Very good location. Close to Orchard Road shopping district. Same distance to Orchard MRT and Tourist Day pass counter.

I would certainly use this service again. Agodas price could not be matched by the hotel, so it represented good competitive value. It was a charming hotel, with character. Close to Orchard Rd. staff were all attentive.

Booked 3 nights for a stopover in Singapore. Location is fantastic and easy to get to from Changi via the MRT. Everything you would want to see is either a short MRT ride away or within walking distance. Intercontinental is attached to Bugis Junction shopping centre so retail therapy is not far away, but the crown in the jewel is Bugis Street markets which lies across the road. Don't forget to haggle! Staff are very friendly and check-in was quick and hassle free. The concierge were very helpful in liasing with a luggage repair company who had to take in my partner's suitcase which was damaged on the flight. Would definitely stay here again!
Shopping Tip: Bugis Street is a welcome change from the usual brands and shops. There are alot of bargains to be had here and you will definitely want to haggle!
We were very happy with everything. Loved the Old building in the center of the city and all its facilities. Staff was very good.
good, short stay. will always stay here if the plan is to shop.
Overall, the experience was on poor side because we had one sleepless night because there were a lot of bed bugs which we bought to the attention to the Housekeeping department of the hotel.

Good and friendly hotel to relax and rest during my hectic stay in Singapore. Great locations and clean room and bathroom as well. Would definitely recommend this hotel. Great value for your money as well. Yes, they are renovating, but aside from a bit messy entrance, everything else is top notch.

Good and friendly hotel to relax and rest during my hectic stay in Singapore. Great locations and clean room and bathroom as well. Would definitely recommend this hotel. Great value for your money as well. Yes, they are renovating, but aside from a bit messy entrance, everything else is top notch.

The hotel was nice but they do not provide minimum amenities in the Bathroom (Tooth brush, Razor, Cotton buds etc) Free internet in rooms needs better bandwidth. Other than that the Hotel stay was quite good and located right in the heart of Little India, Singapore.
Its a nice place to stay in an ideal spot, location location loaction and the some, either way you ealk you find action

I have been to various business & family hotels in Singapore, and Intercontinental happens to be one of the best. Though, I was there for one night, stay was pretty impressive. Location is great with MRT access & if you don't mind the congestion. The architecture is old colonial style. Check-in was smooth and efficient. I was hoping for an upgrade but unfortunately I didn't get it. The room was very size. Selection of room amenities was very good, bed was excellent. Although improvement can be made with the coffee / tea selection. I would expect better quality from Intercontinental. Staff was very helpful & deserves a 5 star rating!
One of the best resort/hotel in Singapore! Service is tip top Hotel amenities and service provide is worth every cent that you paid for
The room was so comfortable and more importantly, so spacious! The warmth of the staff was also something that every traveller should look forward to. One word, "Amazing!"
Mandarin Orchard Hotel is Superb but hoping that the price could be less..

Great hotel to stay especially with young children and elderly. It is one of the best hotel with large room and bathroom. Love the soft but firm bed, even my 2 years old baby prefered to stay in the room rather to go shopping.

My husband and I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights, 3 days. Our flight was from Europe which was about 12 hours to Singapore. We arrived in the hotel at around 9:00 am, and the receptionist was nice and accommodating. She even granted our request for an early check in, which made us really happy. Other staffs of this hotel are helpful and courteous. Location is along Orchard Road, and MTR is a mere 3-minute walk. There's also a free shuttle service to Sentosa across the hotel which runs every 30 minutes. We had a pleasant stay and will definitely use this hotel in the future.
It was excellent. The staff were all very helpful and professional. Location was very strategic and ease of access to airport via shuttle. I will definitely return to stay at this hotel!
A very nice hotel to stay. Near to the heart of Orchard road, easy access to the MRT station. Staffs are very friendly and the room is very clean and comfortable.
the staff is attentive. nice room and club. great view on top. lots of great establishment in the shopping area. also has world renowned restaurants. all in all it was worth it.
we are very comfortable staying at this hotel. everything is within our reach. save money and time on transportation.

Arrived at 3pm on a Wednesday, in time for check-in and the queue wasn't that long. Booked deluxe room for 2 pax and was upgraded to premium suite. It was a very pleasant surprise for us. The staff was really friendly. So check-in was really fast and sweet, similarly to check-out the following day. The room is elegantly designed, and very clean. Beds are super comfy. The bathroom is huge, half the size of the room. Overall very satisfied with my stay there and would definitely come again for another staycation.

My stay was at the RWS Equarius Hotel was great. My family loved it - especially the kids. They loved the spacious bathroom, the tub especially. The glass window between the bathroom and room was a nice touch. Breakfast spread was average though. My only gripe was that the pool on the ground floor is only for guests that booked the rooms on the ground floor instead - we had to use the nearby 'shared' pool.
A relaxing pleasure... I would like to choose again this hotel when back in Singapore
very bad, the room was very dirty
It was quite pleasant, and the hotel was centrally located.
There is no point in staying at Orchard Parade Hotel if we were not satisfied with our first stay. There is no regret we did it the second time.

very convenience hotel who centrally located in singapore and very close to shopping areas and close to major attraction like singapore flyer, duck tour and the icon of singapore, merlion. missing this hotel
As always a comfortable stay in this hotel, but this time there were renovation going on at the front, so it was a bit messy to get in.
Was a pleasant night stay over. Bed was comfortable and centrally located. 5 mins walk from Little India.

We stayed one night at the hotel,first impression that the hotel is clean,modern and quiet.staff check in only 1 person and the service is very slow.check in time at 3 pm,we came too early, so we decided to come back again at 3 pm.when we want to take our hotel key at 3 pm there is a long queque at check-in counter, we had to wait 30 minutes plus.once we get our key,we rushed into the room to rest,someone ring our doorbell,turned out to be a technician, says will go in and want to check some of the lights are dead.Please Equarius hotel,you have 5 star,but cannot manage your housekeeping and technician to check our room before our check in time?we feel disturbed.I think thats not professional for 5 class hotel.i never want stay there again.ever.
Cannot fault it!! Brilliant city for culture and shopping. Very friendly and helpful locals.

my first time booking and staying in a huge suite villa(garden villa)via agoda. everything was top notch. there was a touch screen control panel next to my bed to control lighting mood, curtain/blinds, aircon and privacy settings etc. spacious bathroom with separate man/woman wash basins and walk-in closets and also shower and cistern cubicles. there is also a outdoor shower area with a comfortable bathtub to soak in. a private plunge pool to relax outside the villa under the moonlight in total privacy! excellent for Couples if you ask me!

Excellent as per previous visits. Jonathon had moved on but Apple was equally focused on making sure the experience was excellent. Great location and terrific value for central 4 star. Always go club room and use the free bar/ food on offer between 6 and 7pm
A convenient located hotel near the MRT station with friendly staff and good service

The Hotel and the room which I stayed are not appropriate to be called 5 star Hotel if its not going under renovation anytime soon. Some items in the room such as closet, main room door, flat screen were quite already damaged before check in, and lobby carpet is quite untidy and leaved many stain spots. I would consider come back after the renovation.

relatively good and comfortable but security wise not that ideal as anyone would be able to go up to the guest room floors. the room was only set up for 1 person but housekeeping was prompt when i requested for extra ammenities . counter staff slightly inexperienced but overall pleasant stay at Grand Park

Only disappointment was lack of pool towels and though staff promised to send up, we were made to wait in the cold for 45 mins (it was drizzling) and in the end gave up and walked back to our rooms wet.
overall great. love the pool but the hotel seem a bit worn down.

The room is clean, but the staffs provide the same room for m and other Korean Couples(which checked in before me), just wonder what will happen if they are un-dress or just half way doing some adult thing, guess this should not happen, for safety / security or whatever reason, and I just thought all rooms and key are control electronically. Sad that this happen. The signboard is not very clear, and the staff show me the direction seem we will know where to find our way from hotel looby to take the mono rail. Hard way.
It was pleasant. We were given a free upgrade to deluxe suite cos the rooms we booked were fully occupied! We enjoyed our stay very much with the friendly n helpful staff.
overall is good except that standard room has no bath tub.
Awesome stay!I'll definitely be back.Great location indeed.

My family like this hotel very much...breakfast is very nice ..but every day is same thing, if can change is better....Swinming pool is nice my son love it so much...location is good .... will come back again..
It a wonderful stay there both me and my wife love it alot

Every user please read so everyone can take note. Booked through Agoda on a second stay here. Check in & check out was no hassle. Smooth & efficient. However, it was not what I expected in regards of the room. Since advance booking was made 14 days prior to the date, I believe a simple request of just a king/large bed could be met. But I was told that there are only twin bed room available. This is not a last minute thing, why can't I get the bed I wanted? My first visit wasn't a problem. Or is this just bias just because I'm a local? When ask if I insist on a room with king bed, was told that it's a smoking room which I really don't mind but I need to wait. Please take this matter seriously as I believe as a guest with a simple request, there should be no problem, furthermore I've made payments just like any other guest. And please fix the tv, channels are not clear. Toilet door can't be close fully. Maintenance please. Don't spoil another guest's stay like this. Do take note about this matter seriously. Your co-operation is very much appreciated Thank you
good that it is near the train station and food courts, but toilet was too small.
it was an overall ok hotel with good nearby amenities, but the toilet was too small for the quality of the hotel. has a direct train of about 30mins to the airport.

The hotel was overall good - it fits certain travellers I guess but took a bit of getting used to in my case. I booked an executive room - which was still small and without basic facilities. The first issues was no fridge (I mean just a simple cooling device for drinks in room)which caused an issue, made it a bit uncomfortable. This was not explained in Room Info. Lifts were extremely slow, always (except for 2 occasions) at the wrong end. Even though I asked for high floor, despite that I had to ask to change the room. The worst issue was that I had asked and arranged before arrival and at check-in time for late checkout and to pay half-day charge. However, despite prior arrangements, on the day of checking out, I was charged half-day as "walk-in rate" which ended up to be as much as the rate for one night extra. So, better off just to have paid an extra night and have more flexibility. It is unlikely I would use this hotel in the future, other hotels offers a better overall arrangement it is just an older hotel.
Bad customer service when i request for them to replenish the towels at the swimming pool. extremely small pool..
bigger room compared to other hotel at similar rate
Ventilation at club lounge is bad as well as meeting room. Hard working mgr to promote the hotel but all other stuff needs to work together too.
It was a good experience, walking distance to major shopping malls
