This is the second time booking this hotel. The pool view room was nice. The swimming pool is great and the kids like it enjoy it very much. Had dinner in the restaurant, the price is on the hihger end but the taste is real good. The design of the room is modern and the size is good.

we expected alot more in the lobby sitting area, bed confort and bathroom amenities. it pay off once we were at the pool, the easy access to the bay, the garden, the mall and MRT. it was great and we had a great time
ALTHOUGH ONLY THERE FOR ONE NIGHT WE REALLY ENJOYED THE SIZE AND COMFORT OF THE ROOM AS WELL AS THE BREAKFAST WHICH WAS INCLUSIVE.
complimentary shampoo, shower gel and hand wash smells funny and looks cheap. few lights in the room not working as well. i find myself in a 3 star hotel priced at 5 star rates.

Checking in to Grand Park City Hall was a disappointment. The main entrance is located in an alley. Check in was fast, but the front office staff are not very friendly. The hotel is supposed to be a 5-star facility, but I would give it 3-stars. Everything about the hotel is old, and it smells old. Our room was supposed to be a "Newly Refurbished Room", but it was also old. The bathtub finish was damaged. If the hotel was rated as 3-stars, we would probably have accepted that it was at such a low standard, but the whole experience there was a big disappointment.

Overall an okay stay. The smell of rubbish at the hotel lift area (lobby and 5th floor, where I'm staying) is a little unbearable. Cute room. $5 to deliver a wine glass to my room was actually quite funny.

The lobby was located up the 4th floor accessible by elevator. Interior of the hotel had a dark, artificial atmosphere. Woke up every morning wondering why bedroom wall at bedboard had painting of a woman with flowing dress. Breakfast buffet was the wide-choiced standard to most most 3-4 star hotels. Front corner of the hotel building had a large active billboard. Windows were the old steel glass windows of the old hotel before it was acquired and refurbished. The only advantages the hotel had was its near the major shopping malls and of course, the friendly staff at the front desk and the restaurants. Still, the hotel is very overrated, hotel room price too high.

When i checked in i was served by this rather plump trainee receptionist. She gave me the key to a room on the 6h floor. Luckily it was my habit to knock on the door before opening. Because as i was opening the door a half naked man wrapped in a towel was behind opening the door too! I was given the keys to a room that was already occupied with people bonking inside. Furious i went back to the reception to explain the situation. This trainee nonchalantly told me she would change a room for me and proceeded to blame the computer. Yea right. So i went to the new room and was very disappointed with the condition. The lobby might look 4 star but the room is 2 star. I felt very uncomfortable so i went back to the reception and they asked me to to upgrade to the "best" room. Oh well. I didnt want to ruin my day any further. Anyway the "best" room still has cheap plastic toilet doors your would find in a motel not a hotel.
Staff was always cold. Service was extremely poor that I decided to move oout for another hotel

I must commend Parkroyal for a pleasant 3-day stay. The ONLY one thing I find unpleasant is the room somehow is filled with "a sharp odour that resembles indian powder". I think the smell is imbued in the bedsheet, blankets and pillow cases. So the hotel should look into this matter more seriously.

i will absolutely recommend my families and friends to stay in your hotel because of your friendly and accommodating services, especially when i got your complimentary bday chocolates on my birthday. Thank you so much!
relaxing, secured and highly recommended for Couples or family travellers

This hotel is very near to the train station so it's really very convenient and there's 7-eleven and 24 hours mcdonalds nearby to guarantee you won't go hungry without fast food. Nice large rooms with soft beds that can make you fall asleep very easily.

A quite retreat after spending time at Waterworld and Universal Studios. We took a package that included admission tickets to some of the attractions and it was worth it. If you prefer to be more central to the action, then choose the Hard Rock of Michel hotel.
It was a lovely stay, the room was bigger than we thought and extremely spacious. It had very quiet and peaceful surroundings, a breather from the fast pace of the city's hustle and bustle.

Had a great stay at this hotel on the club floor, quiet away from the crowds. Evening canapés were not abundant but good quality, staff were attentive friendly. Room was very quiet for in the city. Shopping mall connected right next door and MRT underneath, very convenient. Also best thing was walking distance from Novena Church so possible to go to mass in morning and evening. Great location, service n quality altogether.
Was a great service n clean room with a best location
Perfect in every way. Met old friends, made new friends. Enjoyed the lounge and food
A lot of shopping malls, a lot of restaurants. Clean room, Quiet environment.
The hotel was in a good location close to bugis junction. I usually stay on Orchard so this made a nice change to stay in a different area of Singapore

as opposed to name BIG hotel, the room is actually very small. i think it's one of the hotel room i've ever stayed at. other than that, everything is perfect! cozy room, nicely designed, lobby are is very welcoming, nice bar.

It is located at the tip of Orchard Rd, with easy access & exit into the busiest part of the city. The hotel is within walking distance to the best shopping centres. Good quality eateries are everywhere and open til late. If you're a coffee addict, both Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf and Starbucks are either nextdoor or accross the road; plus many more other cafes to choose from. You won't have a problem finding breakfast if you happen to choose a room booking without breakfast included. The hotel's TV channel has an intro video that can give you tips on the best places in the viccinity to checkout, which is great if you have limited time on your hands, yet would still like to explore & enjoy the city.
We had a wonderful and relaxing time. The hotel is an oasis in the middle of the city.
Great, near resturant, shopping center, and public transport so you can go anywhere to singapore

The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The location of the hotel is perfect if you are a shopaholic and the place is extremely convenient to any other Singapore attraction!!. Since we had a two year old with us, extra care was taken if we needed early check in and late check out. Overall a pleasant experience. Would definitely go back.

Before I stayed at this hotel, I had low expectations as my friends has been telling me this hotel is bad from the rooms to customer service. Check in was great, good customer service, however check out was a bit disappointing.

We love this hotel especially when we've arrive and check-in. Front office staff upgrade our room because we should early check out for another trip Bellboy very helpful near shopping center it is a walk-in distance Concierge help us to booked a taxi at 7.30 a.m Overall we very love this hotel
I received an upgrade at check-in, have to admit this room was really nice. Big bathroom and enough place :) Will for sure come back!

I found this hotel from agoda, i just search the orchard area, and this hotel is the cheapest, but i was surprised that this is a good hotel with perfect location, just several minutes walk, we arrive orchard mrt through Wheelock and ION basement. More surprise, i got Sin 80 voucher to shop at Central Orchard mall ! Thanks to Agoda and Orchard Parade Hotel. I will recommend this to all my friend if they will stay at Orchard area. God bless
It was lovely. Highly recommended. Gordon's Grill serves a good steak. Lovely ambience.

This is my second time back at Equarius hotel. Compared with other Resort World Sentosa's hotels, this is slightly further away, but you get the quiet and privacy. The pool here is awesome but not crowded. The room is also significantly bigger. Absolutely love the balcony that overlooks the forest. Ask for one in the higher floor.
Perfect stay, staff were nice and friendly, got my room upgraded for free , can't ask for more

Spent 3 nights in the Family Room. Room and bathroom were spacious and the beds were really comfy. The shower was superb, good for sore muscles after a whole day of shopping. We went here for my sister's birthday and the hotel management provided a yummy cake, FOC. That was a nice gesture. Only gripe was the super slow wifi in the room. We had to lounge at the corridors to access the net.
Overall its nice,,, i recommend to those who still not try stay over nights @ this hotel,,,
I enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Clean and big and a very nice room.

The rooms are old, run down, the aircon is noisy, the towels old and thin and the telly didn't work properly. It is a cheaper option than a lot of Singaporean hotels though. Better than Geyland by a country mile. So if you want to stay central and you can overlook these things, then stay at the carlton. Noticed a lot of ladies of the night out front on Friday. Would be good to move them on.
This hotel is fine for a few days but does seem to be busy and undergoing some renovations. Pool is fine, it is near an MTR so can travel easily.

This hotel is out of this world. Staff amazing. Standard rooms brilliant. Pools and architecture (Foster + Partners) with cascading rice paddy effect terraces in and out of this world lush tropical haven just moments from the CBD but in a private island paradise and perfect blend of modern and colonial buildings. The hotel could feature in a James Bond film. It was a bit empty (who know's why?) but we preferred that with small children. Comes highly recommended.
Stay was fine in general ... hotel served the purpose for comfortable sleeping, bathing, and storage of our luggage while we were out most of the 2 full days we stayed in the city.
It was alright for short stay. Good location with food and transport nearby.

Stay in Hard Rock Hotel was pleasant, both of my kids feel comfortable to stay there for 2 nights.The pool is the best of the hotel that my elder kid was very much enjoy.Staff were friendly and helpful.
Mostly good, just that the air condition was a little problematic.

This is my second time in Parc Sovereign and we had a 1 night stay. The location is good with many good food around, not to mention the proximity to Bugis area, which I've always loved. The room is clean albeit a little small. But for the price we paid, it's all worth it.

Enjoyable 3 nights with good room service. The location was perfect as I can get to major roads in only about 5 minutes. A good area with quiet neighborhood. Taxis are easily available and concierge was very helpful for directions and advise. Is also a convenient location for those who wish to do shopping and is just minutes away from the malls. Overall a good location for a hotel for people who likes to do some walking.

Very pleasant staying at v hotel lavender,the bed is very comfortable,clean with very nice interior decor. Located very near lavender mrt station (no need to cross street & just one stop from bugis junction). For information the check out time is 11am

Stay was good as usual. Housekeeping was consistently very efficient and clean. A wide variety of food was available within walking distance from the hotel. Taxis were abundant in the vicinity and not forgetting the nightlife too. Big hotel will definitely be my hotel of choice for my staff whenever they need to be in Singapore.
My stay at Parc Sovereign was great. It's my 2nd time visiting this hotel. The rooms are clean and comfortable.
Even though i stayed for a night, it is a pleasant night. Friendly staff. I got an upgrade to a club room. And was happy about it. :)
As I was on business trip, I only went back to hotel to rest and was out early in the morning. But overall, it was satisfactory.

The staffs are friendly and cheerful.but too bad did not have shower gel and shampoo for guests only hand wash lotion. Some of the drawers in the room are a bit torn off as got difficult time to close back . The room door also got a bit difficult to open need a little more strength to push open . Check out and check in are fast moving and the reception staffs are very friendly and attentive . Gym room are ok but swimming pool area is a little small .
As usual, the location is just fantastic. Lots of great local food and shopping just outside the hotel with the metro line a stong throw away.

The only good thing is the spacious room and comfortable beds. The hotel is a bit far from orchard Road but reachable by walking if the weather permits, otherwise taxi is readily available. The breakfast is ordinary, lack of variety with limited choices, same food every morning.

Overall, I had a pleasant stay at Ibis and would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who does not mind a bit of walking (5-10 min) to the nearest MRT station. Room was small but clean and service was superb (I arrived at 12 and my room was ready). There is a food court across the street from the hotel and Bugis Junction mall is a 5-mins walk away.

Only travel to meeting & conference. Convenient with Little India MRT a block away. Also many Indian restaurants nearby that operates 24 hrs! Mustafa super art is just next road down and many 24 hour convenient stores for the night owls!

It was a pleasant stay. Was upgraded to the Club floor and the room was great; spacious with a comfortable bed. Would be perfect if wifi was included without an extra fee. We didn't get to try the restaurant buffets but looking at the crowd and the food they're having, looked like we missed out.
Great. A pleasant stay. The room is clean and comfortable. Like to feedback the internet is slow

Staff were friendly but hotel seems abit crowded. The way to carpark from your hotel is quite a distance. Great shopping and food choice. The pool is great but always crowded. The view from the roof deck is superb.

Hard Rock Hotel is a good hotel for family stay for relaxing. The not so good thing about the hotel is that there are no free wifi service and there are no discount on the breakfast for additional family guest.
it was pleasant, the amenities were great, staff was polite and , the queue was long and frustrating though, but overall, casino ,pool were great.....
Great enjoy pleasant and co operative staff . Centrally located

impressed to find the hotel with good facilities and near major shopping areas and night lifes. also has numbrous of good eating places within walking distances. easily get to many places around singapore from this location
Good, but the check out process of clunky and it took too long because not enough staff working the front desk.

We have stayed at this hotel before and were impressed with the facilities and the helpfulness of the staff. If you arrive early or are leaving late they will store your luggage for free and even allow you to use the bathroom facilities at the pool to take a shower and change. We find this hotel to be excellent value for money and is great when travelling as a family as you can get interconnecting rooms.
The staff lost the breakfast card so I got nothing to eat

Room was clean and the decorations and furniture were relatively new and well-maintained. Great location as it is within Resort World Singapore and close to Universal Studio and S.E.A.A.! Comfort level inside the room was definitely high. However, lobby of the hotel seem small and wonder how will it be like to check in and check out during peak period. Service counter staff is polite and helpful but not very friendly (do not make you feel very welcomed or at home). They are great but not perfect. Overall, the experiences is pleasant :)
Heritage package was not given because our stay was booked to agoda
Overall was fine. However, the shower area and vanity water outlet flow is slow.
Very pleased with the service and attentive of staffs.
I had a pleasant stay at this hotel. Booked a parklane suite to spend the night with my boyfriend on my birthday. The bathroom was so beautiful and the room was cosy. The aircon was leaking though.

It was great. No issue at all. Should have free Wifi throughout the hotel rather than in the lobby/public area only. As a result, the couches in the lobby are always occupied by hotel guests using the free Wifi.

Somewhat slow check-in and keys didn't work immediately, all fixed promptly. Rooms somewhat small and dark-grey, most rooms face other buildings around. But clean and comfortable for short stay. Breakfast not interesting, but many bakeries and eateries around.
No comment.

Overall it was a nice stay. We've spent most of the time out with kids, sightseeing and all. It was very nice to return back to a hotel and get good sleep in a very comfortable bed. Travelling with 3 small kids is rather challenging in terms of finding a large room with two large beds for decent price. Free WiFi was appreciated.

its was pleasant as i arrive the hotel in the morning at 9am......(check in time should be 12pm or 2pm) but the staff allow me to check in early (10am) as they knew im a regualr guest after checking their records.

I like very much the big room size, the fact that it had a bath tube and a seperate shower. Very good pillows and a very good breafast with western and asian food. Umbrellas were available. The hotel is also located very close to the MRT station and the Maxwell food corner.
We like its close proximity to the shopping malls, local eateries along Queen St. The room is spacious and clean, and the hotel interior is pleasant- doesn't feel like too old.
it was centrally located so it was easy to go araound.. Rooms are too small for the price..overall it was not a bad stay..
I really enjoyed my stay, but the internet access in the room was poor - most time no connection and if so, only poor speed.
Really nice hotel but the only problem was that i had gotten a view of the parking lot due to unavailability.
Pleasantly surprise that the pool was big. As well as the room's bathroom. Room was of a comfortable size.
it was alright as we were not always in the room. bed is comfy, room is clean. but toilet is small.
waited bit too long for taxi. overall hotel staff were friendly n approachable. nice ambience for family, near shopping centres. bathroom is clean.
It was very pleasent an I enjoyed it thorougly. Convenient location, good for shopping, centrally located, well connected, near to orchard and somerset mrt

Nestled amongst shopping centres, restaurants and cafes. Great location, but check in and out times were not so flexible like the other hotels. Other than that the room and the service was good, I had a pleasant stay at this premise.
It was great, even though we have to walk about 10 minutes to the shopping areas, considering the price I think it's value for money
My stay here was very pleasant, i enjoyed it very much. would come to this hotel again sometimes

I'm very happy with the room, free internet in the room. Easy access in transportation, close MRT, bus station just right in front of the hotel. Shopping places are everywhere especially if you like to hang out in Orchard area.
Overall experience and stay was ok. The hotel is super centrally located and is clean. I really recommend this hotel :)

the hotel gives a warm feeling like home and the service there is great. we are greeted with smile everywhere we go and the staff are efficient to attend to our needs too. beds are comfortable and bathroom very well equip with all necessities.
Nice hotel - nothing very special but staff helpful and location is excellent
Love its location, parked right where all the new attractions such as universal studio, aquarium are. Convenient for me as everything is within walkable distance.

I had a pleasant stay at intercontinental. As a woman with long hair, I m very impressed with the kind of professional hairdryer provided. Which is very rare in hotel. It's powerful and help me set my curles. The bathtub was a bit disappointing as it is very small but it is deep enough to have a good soak. The amenities are nice with verbena fragrance. I tried the Japanese restauarant downstairs and it is really, really good. But very expensive. Think I ended up with a 300 SG dollar bill. But worth it. The hotel complimentory WiFi is slow but acceptable.

It has always been a pleasant stay at Orchard parade. This is my second time booking the hotel and once again it never fails to meet my expectation. Good rooms, excellent location and great services. A bonus when I book thru agoda and got early bird discounts. Highly recommended for a good night rest and perfect shopping location. A short distance walk from mrt makes it easy to travel to places and a taxi stand down the road helps.

Hotel is older but recently updated, so the room was fresh and clean. Air conditioning was easily controlled in the room. Staff were pleasant and helpful, the hotel is very close to downtown and easy access to transportation. My only complaint was a periodic musty odor coming from the air conditioner.
It was a pleasant stay for us at York Hotel, Location is very close to Mount Elizabeth Hospital and also close to shopping centres. Highly recommended to stay at Premier Room.

Should be informed about the construction area next to the hotel on the webpage. Reception line was slow during check-in and the Internet connectivity is horribly slow. However, room interior is nice and comfy with big plasma TV mounted on the wall. Easy access to orchard road shopping district and MRT station.
Pleasant stay, but during check in time, the room was not ready yet. The service staffs needs to improve on their customer service skills.
Hotel Car Park available and FOC. Room very clean but too small. Strategic location near to mrt. Clean & quite surroundings.

We have stayed at Ibis several times and are satisfied with it. It's not so expensive compared to other hotel, the room is very clean and it's very close to local eateries and Bugis shopping complexes.
This was our second time at Big. we were given a much smaller room this time even though it was in the same category.
We have nice stay. It has a swimming pool and just stone throw away to major shopping centres in town. Also, it is very close to MRT, just 10min walking distance.
The stay is generally pleasant and hotel staff are helpful.
It was a great stay in Parc Sovereign Hotel. As it was Christmas season, the staff was very nice to up grade our room to a bigger room with free WIFI. The checking out was fast too. Overall was good.
Generally pleasant and staff was helpful. However, room smells of cigarette.

Although the room was a bit small, it was clean and comfortable. It was within 5-10 minutes to Bras Basah and Bugis MRT stations and thus very convenient to get around the city and main tourist attractions. There are many restaurants nearby and a convenient store just at the corner of the hotel. The staff was nice and friendly.
Good location, near bugis area. Within walking distance to MRT. The room is nice and clean. I plan to stay in this hotel again when I go to Singapore next time.

Spacious room. Very nice room service. When i walked in there was smoke smell (though this is non smoking hotel) and the cleaning ladies took care of the smell. It was gone for a while but it came back but it didn't bother me that much. There was construction nearby (as of 8-10 Jun 13) and it can be noisy until 10 PM. Despite all the annoyance, i enjoyed the staff hospitality and the location was great.
fin, but i think the rooms need to be renovated as the cabinet is old toliet shower water is slow and dripping

We went for a business trip for 1 night stay at RELC. The beds are too old n hard. Pillows are useless. For the price I paid I won't return. The comfort of sleeping is not up to par. Rooms are large and clean and Internet is free which is good. But if they upgrade their beds - would be great! Also very far from the nearest MRT so be prepare to either cab it or walk to Orchard road.

It's been pleasant. The staff was attentive to our request for late check out, getting iron and iron board. Fast check in and check out. The room was cleaned and tidied often. The bed was comfortable. The room location was quite confusing but the staff showed us the way to our room after the check in.
Check in was fast and good. Our special request were well taken care. Smiley staff and very polite and reasonable. I will come back and stay again.

The hotel is centrally located near to orchard road, easily accessible via taxi. Highly recommended for families of 3-4person, as they offered double queen beds. However, there are limited choice of food for breakfast in the cafe.
My stay was great, ive booked this hotel multiple times and never failed to satisfy me. Near to the Gleaneagles hospital place where my brother hospitalized so it was cpmfortable for me.
Stay was pleasant, location is good, close to malls and restaurants. Staff were pretty attentive.
so far is ok, staff quite friendly, just the room is a bit small, out of our expectation
Good day stay in the hotel, very helpful staff, clean room.unfortunately the hotel is under renovation, security need to be improve for the safety of customer.
An old hotel, refurbished. Still, this is a nice hotel. I had a pleasant stay...

It was a pleasant stay. Took about 10mins to do the check in even though im the only one at the counter. Checked into the room and found used bottle, tissue on the bed and in the toilet. Called for help to clean up the room and the cleaner was nice enough to explain why the room was in its state. Overall, its still a good stay and will return for more stay in future.
It was wonderful. I will continue to select Grand Park City Hall because of their location, easy access to public transport and comfortable room.

my stay was fantastic its centrally located, near orchard area. Room is big and modern. great for business traveller and family. breakfast was so so but u can get better breakfast outside near the area

our stay was splendid and not at all what we expected it to be. It was better than some of the reviews we`ve read prior to this. We stayed on the 14th floor and yes, there were issues with the lift expecially in the mornings as thats the peak time where checkouts happens. the hotel had 21 floors so it is only natural for the lift to get hogged up during peak times. Other tan that, no compliants. Local Indian and chinese food can be found at every loop and corner of the vicinity. The shopping centre right opposite has a really nice food court with local chinese hawker food if you ever get to bored of the Indian menus around.

A group of us really enjoyed our stay at MBS. Is just a pity only 4 people can access to the swimming pool. But is fine we rotate turn. We are happy for the staff service. Very friendly and attentive. Room service as good as well. Is a nice and luxury hotel.
Overall a good stay, would go there again. Room was satisfactory, location was good.

They upgraded our room to a club suite, as the hotel was operating on a full house that day and we got our room only at 6pm plus. The room was nice, with a very large bathroom. Hotel is located about 5mins walk away from the main Orchard Road, very convenient.
the room is big and nice with a marvellouvs city view. swimming pool is definitely the attraction of this hotel.

Overall stay was pleasant... Reception Kristine was really patient and answered all my queries (Not so good luck with another checking-in guest as the receptionist was a big rude in my opinion). Was Abit annoyed as 20 mins after I checked into the room, one pest control guy came and followed by someone who came to check mini-bar. I wouldn't really give "staff performance" a "4" if its not because of my pleasant experience upon arrival.

The hotel was very pleasant alternative to hotels in Orchard Road yet still very accessible due to proximity of the MRT and shopping malls which are linked to the hotel. Breakfast fare could use more variety but this is a minor consideration. In-room internet connection is limited to one-device use at any given point which can be inconvenient.

it was pleasant, my second stay there. Rooms are huge and clean. Staffs are friendly and attentive. Not very far from Orchard road (two bus stops away). Entrance a little hard to access if you're going back to the hotel very late at night, back entrance might be locked already (if you take a bus to this hotel, the bus stop's located at the back, and it's very far from the front, you have to make a complete turn)

it was pleasant stay. The room is spacious for Standard type, location-wise is nice and accessible for various kinds of transportation: taxi, MRT, bus. Near to MRT Bugis (300 meters only), near Bugis Junction and Bugis Village so it's easy to find dinner, lunch or even Subway outlet near Rafles Hospital for simple breakfast.Price is value for money.

the stay was very pleasant. toilet was sufficient enough. however, the toilet could be installed with a partition to prevent water from spilling out of the shower area, making the entire wet everytime we take a shower
Quite pleasant. Got an upgrade, which is always nice. Had to call room service though for some basic amenities that were lacking.

First the good things: Quite and clean hotel with very large and comfortable bathroom. Each room comes with a large balcony with a view of the cable car, rides and pools. The 2 restaurants namely Forest and Tangerine provide excellent food although quite expensive. The negative thing: Only 2 check-in counters and guests have to stand and queue just to check-in without proper queuing system.
It was a good first hotel for our trip in singapore. only stayed there for one night, it had everything we needed. easy to get to from the airport only a short 5-10 min drive.

it was nice, the bed and linen were very comfortable. but the room size was small, and there was no refrigerator. Breakfast was kind of bad. we chose the dimsum set, and it was full of dry looking fried dumplings. The congee was plain. Luckily the location was good, and the Fortune Shopping Centre across the street had a lot of vegetarian restaurants, while China town was nearby.
pleasant hotel, great location. The restaurant available serve good quality food. very good location with great shopping and dining choices..
Nice hotel, had a pleasant stay there. However should have a pool for kids made available. My daughter was disappointed that she can't go for swim as the pool was too deep for her.

We celebrated our 20th wedding anniversary at the hotel. Everything was fine except for a few minor 'shortcomings'for a 5-star hotel. There was no morning newspaper provided and the free wifi was very slow. Overall, we had a memorable stay.

Overraul it was good. Will come back again. The staff were very friendly and helpful. Nice clean and large room. Customer service in Singapore needs improvement. There is so much of infrastucture construction going on. One has to marvel at the pace of development in Singapore.
Good clean rooms. The shower in the bathtub was slightly narrow though, even for an Asian. But would definitely stay here again.
The only thing is there is no babouches in the room.
Thanky ou for make our stay pleasurable and really great staff..!!

Average Stay, not much to fancy on. Centralized location near to Orchard Area for shopping and food. Quite an old hotel as compared to the others in that area. a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a a
Pleasure to stay in this hotel, the hotel centrally located, comfy and clean
It was ok, the only drawback was that the hot water turned cold while showering, and found a few fruit flies in the shower, which we thought was very weird.
It was ok, the only drawback was that the hot water turned cold while showering, and found a few fruit flies in the shower, which we thought was very weird.

Not good choice to stayed at this hotel, the staf really have poor attitude and the breakfast is not serve well, The only good thing about this hotel is the NOVENA MRT Station is only on the basement of the hotel.

I had a horrible time at the RELC. I saw a lot of tiny bugs flying in the room. I believed there were bed bugs on the beds, since my body was itchy all over. Very limited choice of breakfast. No complete toiletries, and NO face tissue. I had to ask for extra toilet papers everyday, since they did not stock any.

My baby gal has a medical conditions and I need to put emergency medication in a cool place. When I open the mini "fridge", to my horror, I found food left over from the previous guest. How poor is the hygiene standard? I called the house keeping and they came to remove the stale food but did not clean the fridge until I asked them to wipe it down. Good thing the medication is in sealed back. I also found that the fridge was only slightly cooler then the room. Not much help if you wanted to cool drink. There were many other things wrong with the room the TV remote, the sliding doors to the toilet, the broken furniture. Overall the hotel felt old and rundown. Breakfast was not better, the food was horrible. The eggs no matter fried, scrabbled or omelet where pre cook and let in buffet trays. you could almost drink the scrabbled eggs. If not for RWS and Universal I think the staycation would have been a bust.

room itself is all right. worst customer service from the front desk and housekeeping. during check-in, has highlight on 2 nights stay, next day morning called my room at 12noon asking if we are checking out or extending. it's like wasted my beadth telling them on the 2 nights stay upon check-in, and they are working like the hourly budget hotel. went shopping and when we are back to room, the housekeeping people has tidy up our room. there sis signage in the room provided, and we did not hook the signage of making up the room at the door. the housekeeping did not get our agreement to come into our room. imaging all personnel belongings are in the room and a stranger comes into the room!! where is the security of the room? called the front desk immediately. was told that it is their policy. if it is the hotel policy, why having the signage in the room for making up. is it the hotel policy to let to come into their guest room? from the front desk which answered my call asked me to check my belongings and if any lost items, inform them. my foot! luckily of them nothing is lost, if not i will go straight to the police. how can a hotel be having this kind of service and security of room? as rated as 4 star hotel, i think it is not better than 3 star.

Great location in Bugis and room is clean and very well-maintained. However we were very disappointed with the service provided. Front office staff handled requests with very low efficiency and were unfriendly and rude. Room rates were usually steep at this hotel and it is highly unlikely we will return again.

Lobby staff service was excellent. RWS Invites card is not applicable for this hotel, hence no free upgrade. 5th floor(same level as the monorail) room view facing the merlion was block. Housekeeping staff did a poor job. Room was not properly cleaned and had no towels and bath robe. Swimming pool area has no staff attending to guests. When we requested for towels, staff actually asked us to use the phone and call for reception.(more than one staff told us to use the phone instead of getting towels for us) Probably hotel michael need to hire more staff rather that putting a telephone to attend to guests's needs. Room had beautiful design but poor service, hence i would not recommend this hotel.
I had in-room breakfast two days. Each time they omitted essential ingredients from tray and were very slow to return with them (while the meal became cold).

Greeted by poorly trained staff, we booked a king bed Club Suite, to start with the bed was a queen size and very hard. The room described as luxuriously appointed 110sqm Suite. The suite was very poorly furnished, small hard bed, lots of carpet with a Couples of chairs and tiny side tables, most disappointed and uncomfortable. The Club Lounge food was stale combined with poor service and worn out furnishings. Certainly not deserving a five star rating.
service is poor, calling for house keeping service, in the end , not done. no view. view is blocked by another tall building. price is the only competitive factor

Good first impression, noticeably clean and new, even the car park area. Despite its location and hotel category, they offer above average guests facilities, eg: swimming pool, gym, children playground. However, did find my room very tight (as such, room category not suitable for families, i guess). Need to look into the car park machine too, not consistent and had to call for assistance a Couples of times.

The carpark is not compremantary to hotel guest. The waiting time for the hotel breakfast is too long for those who opt for western or local food. I am unable to link my ipad to the tv, the inbuilt tv software override the tv functions. Thus i am unable to work on my ipad or laptop using the tv screen

it was pleasant, our rooms were upgraded to a club room. however i was pretty surprise that a club room is still using bath tub in the bathroom instead of the normal standing shower. and the bathtub wasnt that fancy

Everything was great, other than the hotel been pretty old. But for this historical hotel, it has kept it pretty well. Hotel was clean and tidy. All of us had a great stay. Would booked again if the deal comes back up again.

We stayed for the f1 gp weekend. The hotel is centrally located near public transports and handy to the f1 entrance gates. The room itself is nice and modern however the bathroom is odd and looks like it hasn't been updated in 10 years. The bathroom also doesn't look very clean. The wifi included is rather slow and service is intermittent. However, the nice bed, the free daily bottled water and proximity to the f1 gates made up for the bathroom conditions.
it was a pleasuravble stay at relc since its cheap but there are no convenience stores nearby

The bed is too soft and it is kind of dusty. It is also hard to get taxi unless you call cab. It is difficult to walk if it is raining as it is quite a distance to walk. Not recommended for family. If you want to save money and coming with group of friends , it is quite suitable.
Staff were friendly and helpful. I enjoyed my stay with large comfy bed after a tiring day.
Very comfortable stay and nice rooms. Close to public transport, restaurants and shopping.
We are satisfy about this hotel, very prime location and close with many shopping mall
pleasant staff, good room, catering to all types of patrons
We got upgraded to a suite for free, not sure why but the room was huge! Equipped with a kitchenette as well. Extremely pleasant stay :)
Our stay continues to be very pleasant. Staff is friendly and helpful especially when we have to store materials in Concierge. Service is satisfactory and room is comfortable for medium to long stay.
An excellent hotel for business people and holiday makers

Very good. We had no problems.The room was clean, spacious as was the bathroom. There is basic restaurant with good very affordable meals and quick service. Transport is just outside the door shopping just around the corner.This is not a budget hotel but yet is very reasonbly priced.We certainly recommend the Ibis on Bencoolen

All in all this was pretty standard fare for a business hotel. Brought my girlfriend along, who can be picky, and neither had any complaints. The local restaurant is outrageous in price, more so than I would expect from a hotel. But there is a mall next to the hotel and some great street food. Ate one breakfast at the hotel, all other meals on the street. Quick walk to City Center or Clark Quay. Love the location. No complaints on the size and they kept the room clean.
For business trip, a hotel with clean rooms, friendly staff, and affordable rate will suffice. It's a no-nonsense hotel!
Glad I only stayed one night. Their value for money rating is poor and I found this property to be well below the standards of other ParkRoyal properties I've stayed in.
Good hotel with plenty of public transport hubs nearby.
Very good in general. Friendly atmosphere for international guest. But a bit expensive for 4 stars.
quick check in and check out, clean and big room.helpful staff
quick check in and out, room is clean and location is central.
quick check in and out, room is clean and location is central.
Price wise not worth it. very basic for lot of money

We were able to hear the children running along the corridor & the chambermaids going about their business in the mornings. But at night it was very quiet & peaceful. The gym & pool was filled with people when we wanted to use the them. There were 24-hrs convenience store just opposite the hotel. Overall the experience was great.

The staff was alert and courteous when we arrived. Not only were we allowed an early check in (we arrived at 1pm), we were also upgraded to a room with direct access to the pool. The room itself was spacious, though a bit dated. Nonetheless, it was quite suitable for our needs. The fact that there were only 2 floors in the hotel and we stayed on the first level was actually good as it allowed us very easy ingress and egress. The breakfast buffet spread was also adequate. The staff service was excellent as we were always greeted by someone whenever we pass by anyone of them in the hallways, entrance, etc. Location of the hotel is superb if you want to be near Orchard, but not too near. This allows you some peace and quiet, a little bit away from the bustling crowd along Orchard Rd. Overall, I would rate the stay as very good.
Came here for health check-up. Great for medical-tourists since the hotel is located very closed to the world-class hospital and also near to shopping areas and fine dining establishments.

I enjoyed my stay at the Grand Park Orchard and would definitely stay there again. The check-in was smooth and easy. The bar was extremely well run by Errol and his team - very professional. I used the gym and went for daily runs and found the gym extremely well appointed, clean and easy to use. The location of the hotel is excellent - opposite a coffee shop which makes breakfast outside the hotel an easy option. The daily papers were delivered early and I found it easy to catch taxis, shop, walk around and experience a lot of Orchard area by foot.

Staying in the club room allow us to have access to the club facilities. The hot water jacuzzi pool was good as we don't feel cold even if we were swimming at night. Quiet with night scenery which overlook the city. The gym though small but was fully equipped with many sports machines and even steam bath and sauna. The bed was comfy and the room was clean, neat but a little small to be considered a club room. Overall the experience was great. We're sure to visit it again. :)
It was perfect! Receptionist is very accommodating most especially that we are Filipinos. A lot of Filipinos working in the hotel industry of singapore so expect a very warm ACCOMODATION.
The check in was simple n fast. Although exterior looks old but room all in great condition
Polite staff, near mrt , food court and bakery , pedicure and fast food downstairs, food not very nice
Overall good. Large room and bathroom. Shuttle bus to rws and Rest of sentosa

very nice room, too much business to enjoy the beautiful pools, Chinese restaurant was terrific, staff friendly,,,,agoda rate was terrific. So close to the Orchard Street shopping yet a quiet haven.... the spa is really next door, so access is more limited than the materials suggest. The Sunday tea seems to be quite the event!

so far been staying in this hotel almost every month of my trip. basically everything is ok, but due to it is a english sch for student. sometimes it is pretty noisy when have children playing at night. even in the middle of the night, we have make a complain to make them stop. Other then that breakfast is a bit weird, it is very plain n not many choices to choose. A bit tough to get cab around 3-4 pm.

A good hotel for a weekend staycation. Being located in the business district means it's typically quite quiet on the weekends. However, the buffet spread available at the hotel itself is decent. It is also a Couples of minutes away from Vivocity, and the rest of Singapore, since Singapore is really small. Nice swimming pool. Gives you the spa resort feel even though you're in the middle of sky scrapers.

Fast checked in n checked out. I enjoy the club rooms bec I can hav a quiet breakfast in the lounge. Lounge serves tea time, cocktails n breakfast where I could enjoy it leisurely at my own speed n not crowded. Club rooms offers late checkout 3pm. The rooms are spacious and I m a smoker, thus even the room is non smoking, I have a balcony with open air to smoke

The hotel is quite a distance to the Universal Studios and S.E.A. Aquarium. Fortunately, there is shuttle bus to ferry you around at a 15-min interval. However, the Adventure Cove is just beside the hotel. You can buy admission ticket from hotel and hotel staff can open the back gate for entry and can also return to hotel from back gate.
its in singapore but you dont feel like it. the ambience and surounding make you feel in the jungle of the island. quite romantic also

the check-in and check-out was very fast and efficient. the staff was very personable and helpful. the rooms are very comfortable, clean and nice. everything was in working condition. the selection from the mini bar was great and all included in the room rate. the bath tub was very spacious and faced the nature/sea, the bed also had the same facing. loved the view. it has been a wonderful stay and i would definitely come back again

Hotel is newly re-furnish, clean and the room is very well decorated. The room is having city view. All the basic hotel facility is there and the bed design is a bit high for Asian, probably it is design for Europe visitors. Didn't try the hotel food as not cover in the Agoda booking.

not much staff being seen in this hotel. not easy to get a taxi, saw a lots of guest walk out to the small road behind to get a taxi or ask the taxi to come in to pick up the rest. I was waiting for taxi with children's and bag, not convenient to walk out, therefore a lots of other guests get ahead of me. No indication for taxi to turn into hotel at all, nobody assist to help flag a taxi, have to ask hotel staff to on-call a taxi for me in the end. I was late for my children class

good, far from shooping area, but a quiet area, good, far from shooping area, but a quiet area, good, far from shooping area, but a quiet area, good, far from shooping area, but a quiet area, good, far from shooping area, but a quiet area,
Stayed here as I had business right across teh road, older style hotel although going through upgrades and for price to be located right on Orchard Road you really couldnt complain.
Good first time for me and will most likely go there again. good position in a good part of town.
Great exprience, mainly by software i.e. great staff. Smiles are everywhere.
A very nice staying experience, the room was okay and the location is very strategic.
Good. Comfy beds, close to Mustafas and food courts and shopping areas.
Good stay, city area but quite quiet, friendly waiter and waitress, near Funan digital mall

Things were nice until the 2nd night where the maintenance crew sprayed some paint to the aircon tunnel which pollute our room with the chemical smell. The staff knew about it and didn't have the initiative to move us to another room. We couldn't stand the smell and request for a room change. Other than this incident, every thing was fine as expected.

not worth the money that i paid for this hotel. it is currently undergoing some way overdue renovation/refurbishments. my room was simply not up to scratch for it to be considered a 5 star hotel. CONS :dirty bed and toilet, stained mirrors. the room just looks and feels way too old for it to be considered a comfortable stay for me. PRO: very helpful and friendly staff, convenient location, pretty decent breakfast would not recommend anyone to stay here until the renovation/refurbishments are done. there are plenty of other 5 star hotels around the area that offer much better value for money imho. overall, quite disappointed and never going back

not worth the money that i paid for this hotel. it is currently undergoing some way overdue renovation/refurbishments. my room was simply not up to scratch for it to be considered a 5 star hotel. CONS :dirty bed and toilet, stained mirrors. the room just looks and feels way too old for it to be considered a comfortable stay for me. PRO: very helpful and friendly staff, convenient location, pretty decent breakfast would not recommend anyone to stay here until the renovation/refurbishments are done. there are plenty of other 5 star hotels around the area that offer much better value for money imho. overall, quite disappointed and never going back

actually it's good but i'm a bit disappointed about this time i stay cause i got an old room. the room is not the same as last time i were here. i got room on 18th floor and it is very old room and not the good one. last time i were here the room is very nice same as in the picture has shown in the website but this time is different. so i'm a bit disappoint.
Room design was nice. Double room is spacious and amenities were good. Staff very helpful and friendly... Good location in shopping district. A lot of things to do around hotel.

the bed is large but the mrt is a bit far. clean. staff attidue fair. good for shopping as it's located at the most famous shopping distrcit - orchid. however, the hotel is at the end of the district so you get prepared to walk a bit.
quite good but hotel should provide wifi free.why should the hotel guest hv to pay xtra charge for wifi?
Lovely stay, green oasis in Singapore. - In room shower cabin had constantly smell of urine (Villa 15). Had to take outdoor shower, that's a bit weird when its dark.
overall, Parc Sovereign is good place to stay. Instead my next-door room's guests are very noisy, and i don't know why I easily can hear other door open and close, or people walk in the alley.
I was told by the reception staff that there were no rooms available. I then booked a room at the hotel on the internet at reception! Very disappointing service…
Quite ok and value for money compare to other hotels around this area. Since its near to city center quite accessible.
My stay at York was ok, reasonable price for reasonable room condition, the only minus is that there is no wifi and no internet access point anywhere in the hotel
Something wrong with lift during peak hour when we try to get to our room.
location poor, rate too high and without breakfast, restaurant in lobby bad food, no close by places to walk and eat. should be apartments, not hotel
The bathroom was rather small for a club room. Service was friendly and efficient. Great tasting food.

This Hotel is Really Worth With Heritage Package SGD80 Voucher for free at orchard central, location near bugis mrt ust 5minutes from door step, room is little old, but need improvement and a little renovation maybe good

My first time in this hotel. I love the restaurants around the hotel, which you have many choices of restaurants within 15 mins walking distance. If you like Indian food, this is a paradise to you. However, the room is a little bit small which is the similar problem of many hotels in Singapore, probably due to the high property cost.

good but room can be improved judging from the numerous 5-star hotel i've stayed in before. apart from the good view from high floors, there wasn't much to say about it. staff members were great though. i checked in within 5 minutes. checking out was hassle-free too. best thing about the hotel is the location; very well located with various restaurants of several cuisines. airport is 20min away. recommended but not highly.

We are just disappointed that there is no bathtub in the toilet though upon checking in the website it stated that every room there is bathtub available! Me & children are so used to bubble bath wherever we travel or staycation.

We are just disappointed that there is no bathtub in the toilet though upon checking in the website it stated that every room there is bathtub available! Me & children are so used to bubble bath wherever we travel or staycation.

excelent service ,when we arrive they upgrade us to a family suite on the 11th floor,the two badroom suite was great ,clean and well design.fast elevators and close to all universal studio attractions...
REALLY ENJOYED. WILL MUST LIKELY REPEAT MY STAY WHEN NEXT I VISIT SINGAPORE

The hotel actually not to close to mrt station. Need to cross street from underground e few time to reach the hotel from mrt station.The hotel was nice and big. The bath room also big with shower and bathtub separately.The swimming pool was awesome

most amazing experience I have had as a guest of a hotel yet. The pool is amazing, the view is amazing, the options for casino, bars or restaurants is amazing. I recommend to see the Gardens by the bay and get pics of the hotel from there at night. Well worth the money spent on the room for the experience of staying in an architectural marvel !
- Centrally located - Close to Restaurants - Close to nightlife - Reasonable 4 star value for money in otherwise overpriced Singapore hotel scene
It was a reasonable room with price that is quite cheap. The hotel was located at a convenient spot and so it d easy.
Good, reasonable prices and good transportation. Close proximity to Orchard Road.
Very friendly staff and without incident. However very expensive room service and drinks but expected in Singapore.

I was upgraded to a better room which was nice, it is centrally located next to MRT bras brasah station. The stay was very pleasant with free wifi. however be aware that the road next to the hotel is under renovation and hence can be noisy from 830am onwards. The free upgrade made up for this which includes free newspaper and complimentary mineral water. Even though I didn't have breakfast included, I went for a buffet dinner meal in the straits which has superb seafood buffet including oysters, prawns and local delights.
Overall our stay was pleasant and all had enjoyed the hotel a lot. Love the pool and we can use the pool at Hard Rock Hotel. We enjoyed the food choices and the shops.

Check in was pleasant. I was early and they rushed up to provide the room. When i entered the room, it was very clean and nice. Bed was comfortable and shower was good. Location was also very good. Walking distance to hawkers and shopping malls. MRT station is less than 10 minutes away. Overall experience is good and the stay was value for money.

This is my second stay, and it was just as pleasant as the first. Like my room, so quiet, with great comfortable bed, fast internet and clean bathroom. Really felt safe and relaxed whenever inside the room. It was amazingly quiet at most time, able to have peaceful long sleep every night. The location is so close to Orchard road shopping area. It is however being renovated at the moment, so the driveway can be a bit messy. Other than that, everything remains efficient. For breakfast, unless included, it is not worth paying so much for it. When walk across the road is the Far east center, there are plenty of good eateries that provide sumptuous breakfast at about SGD5 to 7. The internet speed is very fast and reliable, which is one of the many pluses for this hotel. Free mini bar and daily top ups, plus Nespresso coffee machine in room are some of the fine touches.

This is my second stay, and it was just as pleasant as the first. Like my room, so quiet, with great comfortable bed, fast internet and clean bathroom. Really felt safe and relaxed whenever inside the room. It was amazingly quiet at most time, able to have peaceful long sleep every night. The location is so close to Orchard road shopping area. It is however being renovated at the moment, so the driveway can be a bit messy. Other than that, everything remains efficient. For breakfast, unless included, it is not worth paying so much for it. When walk across the road is the Far east center, there are plenty of good eateries that provide sumptuous breakfast at about SGD5 to 7. The internet speed is very fast and reliable, which is one of the many pluses for this hotel. Free mini bar and daily top ups, plus Nespresso coffee machine in room are some of the fine touches.
It was a pleasant stay. One of the cheaper 4-5 stars hotel in Singapore. Overall I was pleased with this hotel. Stayed twice already.

I was a bit nervous as I read many negative comments about the hotel. I booked the room because it offered special superior promotion price.The fact are we were welcomed by warm staff, quick check in, our room was upgraded for free since we took our young son, the room was not so big but reasonable for the price, clean room and new building I guess. The hotel itself was centrally located, only 10 minutes walk from Bugis MRT, 5 minutes walk to several food courts, shopping center and also Bugis street. They also have luggage room to keep your luggage if you need to check out but have late night flight. I would recommend this hotel for affordable price and reasonable services in Singapore.
awesome experience when stay at this hotel, friendly staff and value for money

This week for a tough and hectic one for me and my stay at BIG hotel helped me to get pass without much discomfort. The rooms are clean and I liked the design. Everything compact and within your reach. Great for a week or two stay for business. The in-house Internet TV was great and the bed was super comfortable. Loved the idea of a common water cooler outside each floor. The staff was attentive and friendly. The location is 5 min walk from Bugis main shopping area.

It was a pleasant stay with plenty of good night rest after a long day of shopping trip at the nearby precinct (i.e. Orchard Road, Bugis, Dhouby Ghaut)The hotel staffs were always courteous and helpful. We were given a free upgrade of room too. Overall, a very good and pleasant stay.
It was OK, the Pool is quite small, easy access to Universal. Expected better rooms.
a comfortable & quite hotel to rest. Housekeeper also done their work very well.
Pro: Room is spacious. Hotel is children friendly. Staff is helpful. Cons: Room is cold at night. We switched off the air-con but is still cold.
Room not that fantastic as it should be. Nothing special on the bathroom as what hardrock described.
Toilet don't have any water-tap to wash foot, need wash at bath tub there

Great location and friendly staff, comfortable room but the bed is not big enough as expected. We faced problem with the fridge when we checked in because the fridge is spoilt. Easy to access to most of the shopping mall in Orchard Road and with reasonable price.
Very pleasant indeed. The check in takes a long time due to the long Q
Ive been staying many many times in this Hotel. Being a cosy, relax, centrally located, near chinatown and even up with new 100am mall which is even convenient for us

Overall excellent. Restaurants a little pricey. If you are looking for a hotel with all mod cons and looking sparkling new, you may be a little disappointed, but if you want a more traditional style hotel you will love it.
We are a regular of this hotel whenever they have a promo rate, the staff here are always friendly and approachable

Booked a weekend staycation for my husband birthday. Reach the hotel about 2.30pm but was told that the room is not ready. The check-in staff suggest we go walk around and will call my mobile when room is ready. However we waited till almost 4pm but yet no call from them. Went back to the hotel and saw long queue for checking in. After much waiting, we only got the room around 4.30pm. Other than this, the room was great! Big room, big bathroom with big bath tub, comfortable bed! Will visit again if the check-in has been improved.

Very satisfied. Will go back for staycation again. My husband and I love the fantastic surrounding as it was totally away from the city area. Is very relaxing. Is the best hotel we ever stay. The staffs are very friendly and helpful.
Good, close to Bugis Junction and Arab Street. Also near to Rocher Bus Station.
Convinience location with affortable room rate. Just aliitle bit difficult for peak hour to get the taxi. Sometime, in the morning, we need to wait for nearly one hour.

During our stay, they were trying a 'Handy' proj where they provide a Google Nexus Hp for customers to make complimentary local & international calls. You can even carry the phone around. It was downloaded w tourist-friendly apps. This is a great trial! Other than that, the service were good, i managed to delay the checkout(to 2pm) without any fuss.

A comfortable hotel which is located in the city.Its accessible to public transport either MRT, taxi or bus. The hotel has an award winning Chinese restaurant. Room is clean with comfortable beds. Its free Wifi service is available at the lobby. It has a nice bar too.
it was very good, but this was the first hotel I stayed without wifi in the room

Check i queue in quite long, check in officer is friendly and taught us the way going to restaurants in the Shoppes at Marina Bay. The only trouble we had was about the room key card, it's always not working and it's such a hassle.
Great staff t the hotel
It was really relaxing and I never had problems sleeping. The room is very clean with great comfort and design making it a worthwhile place to stay in.

I was pleased with the room size & the bathroom. The view of the city skyline was great even though I was on the sixth floor. The wifi was fast & efficient, it came free with the deal. However, I noticed after booking on Agoda, if I had booked directly on the hotel's website, for the same price I paid, complimentary breakfast was included and late check out is guaranteed at 3pm. The hotel did not accept my debit cards for guarantee even though payment was already done through this site. I find that strange.
It was a perfect getaway just lounging by the pool and the club lounge which is available 24/7.

I love it very much I will return. Hard Rock Hotel is a nice family orientated place. Safe to stay here. We enjoy the sand at the pool. However, must have uniformity at the towel counter by the pool. Some people are given rights to bring the bath towel to their rooms whereas I was told firmly to return the towels to the counter. My husband was touching the 2 pieces of towels at the counter top and your staff quickly retrieve it and commented that " the towels are not self-service" I find this statement quite curt. ANd why the double standard of returning the towels?????
the room is spacious and nicely decorated. The staff are friendly and helpful. The location is convenient and close to monorail. It only takes minutes to get there.
overall it was good and relaxing no hassle in checking in and out. but maybe the breakfast could be better?
Great, when I visit Singapore I only stay at the Goodwood Hotel.

The service were excellent while the room are generally ok in size. Location wise, it's strategic as it's just a 10 minutes walk to the Orchard road shopping area. as for the MRT, you may walk either way for 5 minutes and you may find the colour line that will bring you to your destination. There is also a 'kopitiam' by the corner next block of the hotel.

I was surprised about how nice the rooms were on the 18th level and that it was so nice and quiet that despite my hectic schedule I was able to escape into the hotel room and find time to relax and enjoy the comfort of the room.
wonderful stay in the hotel. I am very satisfied at this affordable price.

Our stay was overall comfortable and relaxing. No noise even though the hotel is located right at the main busy street and with ongoing renovation. Logistically great with easy access to public transport and complimentary shuttle service to Universal Studio Singapore. Near to 24 hours eateries and lots of places to shop nearby!

The rooms were really spacious and clean but I wished they had single rooms for solo travelers. The hotel is relaxing and nice to come back to at the end of a busy (sightseeing) day. The location is great if you enjoy walking to Orchard Road for about 10 minutes. But I learned from the staff that how to catch the local bus from the back entrance of the hotel so it made moving around easier. Children running around, screaming and slamming doors in the hallway was a problem during the day when I had to rest due to a headache. But overall I had a pleasant stay and would like to stay there again.
Peaceful and quiet. I was just wondering why there was no body lotion and cotton buds as part of the bathroom kit.
a very relaxing stay with quiet environment which i need the most.

The staff were friendly and tried to help us in every way. The greatest feature is of course the swimming pool. It's a great fun for all families. The location is also great as it is near the RWS which has a lot of entertainment and food places. Will go back. The staff were friendly and tried to help us in every way. The greatest feature is of course the swimming pool. It's a great fun for all families. The location is also great as it is near the RWS which has a lot of entertainment and food places. Will go back.
This is a nice hotel, which includes everything we need. For business, relaxing, near to local restaurant and also has many helpful staffs. Very recommended.
The stay was excellent and great especially with it being centrally located.

THE STAFF WERE VERY ACCOMODATING AND MADE YOU FEEL WELCOME.Ismail (on front desk) had me booked into my room in a quick time, (after a long flight) Overall, my stay was eccelent and I will stay again in this hotel. The pool and gym were also great and the room service also.very clean.

I requested for twin beds but got a queen bed. Expected wifi in the room but only available in the lobby. Overall everything else was good. Its across raffles city which is convenient to shop and eat. The view was perfect. Windows made the space look wider. Housekeeping was accommodating and gave our requests right away. Id stay here again. Thank you.

Love the swimming pool could not get enough of the nice view especially of the beach villas. Hotel is distanced from the main rws area but makes up for it with a nice shuttle service that is timed at a 15 minutes frequency. Hotel is really near/connected to the SEA Adventure Cove Waterpark. Hotel guests can exit from the waterpark directly to the hotel once you're checked in. Beautiful and peaceful surroundings. Ordered the continental breakfast and spread for breakfast in bed was definitely of a 5 star hotel standard. Definitely had a nice relaxing stay.
Wonderful stay which our darling pet also enjoyed!

Nice room with comfortable bed and full range of toiletries. Located just next to shopping mall and MRT station. Nearby has a few hospital too. Nice pool with great view. However the pool water at the club level 22 is very cold which make it hard or even possible to swim. Overall, not a bad stay.

The only downside is the queue during the check-in, other than that, everything was fine. Great garden balcony which has a fantastic view on the harbour and the adventure cove. Large bedroom and bathroom.
Relaxing and peaceful weekend by the pool But the jacuzzi NOT working Just wondering why NO breakfast whilst some SMALLER hotel HALF the price provide breakfast lol

We really enjoyed our stay at the Goodwood Park Hotel and would definitely stay there next time we are in Singapore. We knew Singapore about 30 years ago and the Goodwood Park Hotel has retained that 'old Singapore' style of comfort and pampering that we were looking for.
I have always stayed at Orchard Parade hotel for my wkend getaways. love the balcony as I could smoke

Located nearby Little India and within walking distance to Bugis and Dhoby Ghaut, easy access to these parts in town for eating and shopping were a breeze. The hotel also has all the basic necessities sufficient for a proper night's stay. Small swimming pool and gym which were more than pleasant given that it's a pretty average hotel.

Located approximately in the midpoint of the Orchard Rd shopping thoroughfare, the Mandarin Orchard gives its guests plenty of choices within minutes of walking out its doors. It is a busy area, but if you were going to be anywhere close and convenient, the Mandarin Orchard is also a quiet refuge from the buzz, once you're in the upper floors. The staff is extremely attentive, yet unobtrusive. They are helpful while not being imposing. The famous Chatterbox Restaurant serves up some of the best delicacies in air conditioned comfort (yes, there are street stalls that are arguably better and cheaper, but I didn't travel all this way to constantly perspire and worry about my deodorant). The room, like most in this part of town, isn't large but it is very comfortable and well appointed. The view is very nice, and the room service is prompt. I've been to a few hotels up and down the Orchard Rd strip and the Orchard Mandarin has slowly but surely become my favorite.
I have stayed in this hotel twice, going to stay for the 3rd time. Well located with car park lot available. Very clean room and the room service was good
It was a memorable experience for me. The room was clean and spacious. View was stunning. I would love to stay here again.
Good. The stay was so much relaxing and had a good sound sleep.
The corner room has nice windows overlooking the city. Design of the room is simple yet attractive. Clean bathroom. Big LCD TV with decent channels. Pool was nice and check in was smooth

Service was above my expectations. I had a very pleasant and enjoyable stay. I booked it at super deal promo price and I feel that it was very much worth it. The surroundings were very much peaceful and relaxing, which was exactly what I wanted for my stay cation. The rooms were nicely decorated and furnished. It was adequately spaced out.
This customer has only rated this hotel and has not submitted any comments.
Easy Check in and Checkout. No Problem to get a late Check-out. The Room was very large and comfortable.
the stay is perfect. the staff is polite and attentive. will recommend to friend visiting singapore.
room service a bit slow

I have stayed here multiple times. I want to commend the management for now installing smart phones in all the rooms. The phones come with internet and ability to make free local and overseas calls. This is really a great innovation. Otherwise, the standard Ibis Singapore features.... fast internet, strong shower and a comfy bed remains their hallmark to me.
The hotel is clean and tidy, though the room is a bit small but the price is still very reasonable. With convenience store and bus stop to various tourist location just next to the doorstep

capella is one of the best hotel resorts if that is your cup of tea, its located in a secluded spot in sentosa and getting in and out can be difficult. however, if you just want to get away from the hustle and bustle of city this is one great hotel to be in.

My stay in the hotel is unsatisfactory. The door lock was broken and we complained more than six times but they didn't repair it. We could not get out of the guestroom and could not lock the door properly. We had to spend time to open and close the door. In addition, the housekeeper put amenities to a dirty, broken box when they sent the stuff to us. We put the box (because the box was too big, we had to put it beside the trash box) next to the trash bin, but they didn't remove it the next day. The bricks and tiles of the bathroom kept on falling down. We told the housekeepers, front desk, concierge and duty managers a few times, but they didn't do anything to help. There were brown bits and mud on the tables, drawers and wardrobe of the room. No free WIFI was provided even in the hotel lobby. The resort provided shuttle bus to other hotels in the same areas. We lined up golf car but a guy jumped the queue and got onto the queue. We told the hotel staff/bell boys but they just laughed and drove the guy away without making any apology. The English standard of the staff is bad and they cannot communicate with the guests effectively. They cannot speak other languages like Mandarin.
Grate stay. No disturbances for our purpose it was the closes hotel with respect.
Relaxing weekend by the pool Good gym and steam room Just wondering why NO breakfast whilst some SMALLER hotel HALF the price provide breakfast lol
The staff is kind enough to upgrade the room to Club Floor and we had our Christmas Dinner at Café 2000 which is not bad
I would place the hotel as a good 4 t0 4.5 star hotel - honest value and pleasant and helpful staff despite trying times with package tour and budget guests.

The location was good. I booked the last room available at a good price. The air conditioning was unstable and loud. The pillows were too thin. I wanted a double bed, but received twin beds. No bathroom amenities provided. The 2/F Chinese Restaurant overcharged me. Check-in was fast, check-out was slow. Too many noisy students. Buffet breakfast was very disappointing, although complimentary.
right next to universal studio only min walk. extremely expensive food. checkin time took almost 20 min and had to wait room was not ready
romantic and big room .i like this hotel room very much and it will be back soon
Our stay was one of love and romance and i will never forget it because We got engaged on our Singapore trip.
My wife simply loves the hotel. Excellent services from the front desk to room. Thumb up for it and we will come back again..!

Secluded from the main area. Great for spending quiet romantic moments. Side gate (near the pool area) lead to the beach area. Lovely room with a resort feel. Opted for the sea view which has an amazing view of the sea. Limited parking lots. When I was staying there, they have wedding dinner/ events going on. Hence we had difficulty finding a parking lot, waited close to 30 mins.
Although the room and toilet are big, the bed isn't comfy. Didn't really sleep well for the 2 nights.
room big and comfortable, staff are helpful, good location

Room design is old and it can be upgrade or renovation. I was expecting a comforting bed but was disappointed even the hotel upgraded me to executive club floor when i checked in during late night. Overall room is clean but customer service just average. The only best thing i felt is the location of the hotel is easy access to Mrt/bus and the food of the restaurant is great. In conclusion, i will not choose this hotel again for next stay but surely i will come for the food restaurant.

The room is just as you seen at internet, they are clean and the linen was very soft. I ordered twin bed, and the size is bigger than usual. Its very comfortable. The concierge was very helpful. The next day we moved to Hardrock hotel, they help us to deliver all our baggage. Unfortunately they are doing renovation at lobby side but it was not mention in our booking and the bathroom curtain have a bad smell.The pool is quite small.

The stay in general is nice. However, the reception area needs to have more staff as there is always a queue. I reached the hotel around 4pm yet i have to wait a further 1 hour before the room is ready.

Certainly enjoyed my stay at Equarius Hotel. Staff is polite and helpful and Hotel room is clean and huge. Shuttle service is available every 15 minutes. Will definitely recommend this hotel to local and overseas friends. Thumbs Up. The downside is probably the room rate, considered pricey if there's no promo rate.
the stay is good, but the design of the lobby of the hotel and the car park is some distant away. there is also no shelter from the lobby to car park.

Had a comfortable stay at the hotel. Bed/pillow were very comfortable. Had a good night sleep. Buffet breakfast spread was good. Easy access to public transport, shopping malls are literally opposite the hotel.

Had a comfortable trip during my 3 days/2 nights stay at Royal Plaza On Scotts Hotel. Public transport is easily accessible, taxi, bus or metro is literally right at the door step. The metro is about 5 mins walk away. Shopping malls are nearby, so are restaurants.

Had a comfortable trip during my 3 days/2 nights stay at Royal Plaza On Scotts Hotel. Public transport is easily accessible, taxi, bus or metro is literally right at the door step. The metro is about 5 mins walk away. Shopping malls are nearby, so are restaurants.
The room is BIG but the bed is not comfortable. The hotel looks empty as the space is not fully utilised. Lift is slow and always packed with people. Partly because it is also a language centre.
room is small but clean, check in and out is fast
Good location but a bit far away from mrt station, food count around hotel... The BBQ pork is very nice, shopping mall near hotel
Staff is nice and friendly, area is clean. Staff is nice and friendly, area is clean.
I booked bigger room than last booking for my friend, but look like it is smaller than last booking, pls check and let me know, thanks

I have read so many reviews about most Singaporean hotels' small room size. But BIG Hotel's superior room was designed in such a way that you wouldn't feel claustrophobic inside your own room. Contrary to other reviews, there is a considerable distance between the door and the bed. Those reviews that say otherwise almost made me look for other, more expensive rooms. My only complaint would have to be the layout and design of the bathroom. The sink is outside the bathroom, and the bathroom floor is the same level as that of the interior. But all in all, it was a good stay. The front desk officers are friendly and helpful, and the design of the lobby is one of a kind.

We had a one day stay only but i will not come back anymore. They had given me wrong info, upon checking in deducted $100 for my credit card as card verification and told me after checking out it will be returned. The time comes to check out they said that the $100 will be returned after 7 working days. Verify the card in what reason.i had fully paid the amt.before i check in. The policy sucks.
Nice we enjoyed it very much great location for shopping and orchard road to see the Christmas displays.

Nothing special, but a bit disappointing. From the picture of the room show in Agoda, the room looked very nice, but when i checked in the room, it is different story and the room design was very outdated. This is my personal opinion because i don't prefer classic design.

Overall, the environment was clean and tidy. However,the rooms smells bad with cigaratte smells despite we were staying in an non-smoking floor room. Very dissapointed with the smells as this has trigger asthma problem to my family member.
when we checked in, the staff saw that we had booked via Agoda and insist that they only had twin beds. The rooms were pretty simple and some designs/furniture seems impractical to the over room.
