Since we pre booked prior to arriving we were stuck. The Hotel is modern and clean but is like staying in an a IKEA. Everything is super thin, cheap, and small. One night a neighbor decided to smoke cigarettes in his room and may as well have been smoking in ours. The next night we were put into a "free upgrade" room and it had a adjoining door to another room. It was about as sound proof and a slice of cardboard. All in all, we would not stay here again unless they dropped their rates.
A pleasant stay in this hotel whereby we 2 adults + 3 kids can sleep comfortably in the 2 queen beds. Spacious room with adequate lightings and comes with large window.
With my sis 7months old baby, he love the place, the bed and the pool..
With my sis 7months old baby, he love the place, the bed and the pool..

Staff were always rushed and at times not attentive. Bars, restaurants were overflowing and noisy and breakfast was like a free for all - quite poor actually. Except for location, will not be staying here again for business or pleasure.

Everything was great and awesome. The only thing that shocked me was the toilet in my room. It smelt like someone pee all over the toilet bowl area and nobody cleaned it for quite some time. The stink of stale pee in the toilet is horrendous. Did not like how the toilet was designed too. The toilet bowl was at a corner behind the door, leaving poor ventilation for the area and i reckon this was also a reason for the stench.
Over all good experience. But they need to improve attitude of the front desk / reception staff
semua ok

The hotel was very ordinary. If it were not for he amazing location I would have hated it. The mini bar was warm and when I asked about it I was told "It's not the kind of fridge that keeps things cold. If you have milk you need to give it the concierge." This is probably the single stupidest thing I have ever heard. There was one non aromatic tea bag and I had to pay for the Internet. The toilet only flushed sometimes and the remote for the TV didn't work and when I asked about that, a man came to the room, told us we were not using the remote correctly and it still didn't work after he left. I believe a good hotel has been built in an amazing location, but the hotel is run by clowns.

We have a leisure trip to Singapore staying at Royal Plaza On Scotts Hotel and highly appreciate the location of hotel. It is near o ION Orchard Shopping Mall and 10 minutes walk to Orchard MRT station. Regret that the hotel is under renovation now so its main entrance is too narrow and sometimes not convenient for standing to wait for taxi.

We have a leisure trip to Singapore staying at Royal Plaza On Scotts Hotel and highly appreciate the location of hotel. It is near o ION Orchard Shopping Mall and 10 minutes walk to Orchard MRT station. Regret that the hotel is under renovation now so its main entrance is too narrow and sometimes not convenient for standing to wait for taxi.
Slow check-in, it took about half an hour. Worse, we got our room at 630pm.

I ask the front office staff for a king size bed and she did not bother to check and immediately and conveniently tell me none. I asked the bellhop if there is any umbrella that I could borrow and he can't be bother to look at me and reply that the hotel has ran out of umbrella.

The hotel is located near super market, MRT and other central places. The staff is very helpful and friendly. The bathroom is however a bit old as the tile has some stain. The room is generally comfortable. I will be coming back next time. The price should be more reasonable as it is pretty high currently
location accomodation service location accomodation service location accomodation service
We were delighted to stay at Mandarin Orchard, clean room, great room service
Good,excelent nice hotel Comfortable and friendly staff , located in strategies position and very close to mrt and shopping place
I would say it is very satisfied for us to syat at Premier Room at York Hotel. The room is super large for us family of 4. Two thumbs up

check-in queue take about half an hour but given us a 9th storey lower floor. reception told us the king size room was run out, she only can give is only this room. Bathroom was very big, good room service. Best shopping location.
All went well though the hotel shd provide extra facilities for guests with infants. Organise free pick-up from airport or main public transport station & vice-versa

Overall very good and nothing to complain. The only thing is that the entrance to hotel is a little dark and quiet especially when i came back at night. Singapore is no doubt a safe place but it is still a regret giving this unsecured feeling for guests.

it was my second stay at IBIS Bencoolen, always will be my first choice for every business trip,due to is strategic location, surroding by shopping area and foods haven. Easy to get public transport and room is very comfortable.
Very Satisfy with Comfortable Bed, Clean and Large rooms. next time will stay this hotel.

I feel satisfy to choose this hotel as my place to stay at Singapore because it has good location which near Bugis MRT, Causeway Link bus station (to go to Johor), Bugis market, littel india, etc. My kids also happy because our room directly connect to swimming pool. Actually the queen bed was too small for my family (2 adults and 2 children), but everything still can be managed because we only use the room for sleep late at night after our outdoor activities a whole day. Overall, I recommend this hotel to stay..
Stay was quite good, Rooms are very spacious and location is in the heart of city. few mins walk from the main Orchard road and in a very calm location.
Satisfying. Definitely going to stay at this hotel again!

It was wonderful!! Pool was crowded as it is shared with three other hotels (Hard Rock, Festive and Equarius). Nevertheless, kids really enjoyed themselves at the pool. Such a pity that the pool closed early (8pm) and children could not have enough of the pool.
The hotel room was great, well maintained and clean. The staff were friendly and quick to please. Would highly recommend this hotel for small families and Couples

For our first stay in Singapore, we decided to book an "affordable" five star hotel . We were not dissapointed at all. The room, a simple deluxe room (2 kingsize beds), is not very spacious, but large enough to accomodate the 3 of us (3 year old daughter sleeping in a sleeping tent). The staff is so helpfull, especialy Alice, the lady from housekeeping (thanks again for the teddybear!!!). Check in and out went very smoothly. The outside renovation works on the building are still in progress, as well as in the rest of the street, access to the hotel doesnt suffer too much... Not to miss is breakfast!!! Quite expensive , but one of the best we ever had. If you decide to take the breakfast during your whole stay, I think there is a discount possible Breakfast is from 06.00 till 10.00, but be prepare to queu for 5 or 10 minutes... One of the great things is the location of this hotel: 100 m from Orchard, THE shopping paradise and very near to the subway (MRT)."

For our first stay in Singapore, we decided to book an "affordable" five star hotel . We were not dissapointed at all. The room, a simple deluxe room (2 kingsize beds), is not very spacious, but large enough to accomodate the 3 of us (3 year old daughter sleeping in a sleeping tent). The staff is so helpfull, especialy Alice, the lady from housekeeping (thanks again for the teddybear!!!). Check in and out went very smoothly. The outside renovation works on the building are still in progress, as well as in the rest of the street, access to the hotel doesnt suffer too much... Not to miss is breakfast!!! Quite expensive , but one of the best we ever had. If you decide to take the breakfast during your whole stay, I think there is a discount possible Breakfast is from 06.00 till 10.00, but be prepare to queu for 5 or 10 minutes... One of the great things is the location of this hotel: 100 m from Orchard, THE shopping paradise and very near to the subway (MRT)."
Very pleased with the standard of service and hotel environment. Especially satisfied with the location of the hotel with shopping mall at door step and other shopping and eating places so near by.

We stayed at the hotel in late June/early July for 3 nights and loved it. Thus when we needed to go back to Singapore we decided to stay here again. We decided to spoil ourselves and upgrade our room category but were in fact disappointed and preferred the more spacious room we stayed in on our earlier visit. We had a cockroach on our balcony for the whole duration of our stay and the chamber man was not interested on the day when we returned late in the afternoon and he was in the process of "doing" our room. He was on a mobile call, didn't ring off to speak to us and generally was unable to communicate. We had been out early in the morning so were shocked to return late in the afternoon to discover our room still unmade. I had a severe problem one day when there was terrible rain - I waited for 45 minutes and they were still unable to get me a taxi. In the end they resorted to getting me a premium taxi but the charge from the hotel to the British Club of 50 SIN$ was I am told by locals extortionate. We would go back but we would stay in the cheaper room.

Resorts World is generally expensive but only "alright." For 5 stars I frankly expected in-room internet included instead of buy-by-the hour. No other sources of internet, including Starbucks. I expected a tub instead of only a shower. Whirlpool was not heated. I see this often in Asia and wonder if it is intentional. Wonder why they don't have transportation from airport to Sentosa except by subway (change 3 times) or cab ($50). Hotel Michael is fine but frankly not something to be excited about. Something less than a Hilton.
Room service food abit unreasonably priced though. otherwise love it.

had a wonderful break from the hustle of city life. peaceful and conducive environment for family boanding. fantastic customer service. Restaurant Tip: try joel robuchon @ rws and the cliff @ sentosa resort
the stay at the hotel would have been better if there were no construction noises next to our room.
Really not satisfied the stay.. 1) Limited parking coupon given as restrain using car 2) Unbelieveable Internet needed to pay????

if u wan to relax, calm your mind, recharge yourself this is the place to be. it doesnt feel like being in a hotel but rather private home environment with great food, view, sound, service. this is what a great stay should be. make use of all facilities like pool, spa, dining, library. although the gym is a little bit off, it needs a revamp in its machines and space.

the location for the hotel is good, easy to get the transports, the staff friendly. the facilities for the hotel also very good. the room is big and the breakfast acceptable. if next time i come to singapore again i will stay at this hotel again.
The hotel is near Orchard Road which surrounding all the shopping centres.
Pleasant but the rainy weather made it difficult to access some shopping areas. Would have preferred a covered walkway from the hotel to the main shopping areas.

really overrated. the photos are deceiving. they make the place look much more 'grand' and larger than it actually is. It's more like a high level motel trying really hard and failing to make itself look like a luxurious hotel. Not really value for money at all. You're not going to get a good view regardless of what room you get just because of the way and where the building is designed/rooms are placed. Also, our tables were infested with little ants. Hotel management didn't (couldn't?) resolve the problem because it still persisted even after mentioning it to the front desk people.
It was good. Have good security system, the lift can only be access by room key. Very easy to find food. Near to MRT too.
Enjoyable except the flash deal we got came with a room without supplying mineral water. This should be supplied as basic needs of every guests, which we do get in almost all hotels these days.

There was a mixup with our friends booking and when they checked in, the hotel wrongly informed them that we had checked out. In fact we were in the restaurant having breakfast. Then when we checked on which room our friends were in, the hotel told us they were checking in the next day when they had already called to say they were in the hotel. How can the hotel guest information be so inaccurate about who was or wasnt checked in to their hotel?? The upgrade to include breakfast was also a waste of time in our opinion. The breakfast wasn't great- the eggs were undercooked and the tea very stewed and undrinkable. For the few drinks and nibbles available on floor 22, we would probably have been happy to just have room service or go to a nearby cafe.

really conveniently located. bus stop is just right at the entrance of hotel. room is clean and tidy, well equipped as well. restaurants, cafes, bars are within walking distance. shopping malls are easily access to either by walking or by public transport. there are karaoke and games cafes for family or friends to gather for. overall, very enjoyable stay due to many convenience.

My stay with Grand Park City Hall Hotel was mainly because i have a function near the hotel. It is quiet well located plus the rate is reasonable. But, the hotel is old and facilities is due for upgrade.
The stay was enjoyable, i have easy access to the public transport and it's near the shopping areas.
Enjoyable. Close to subway. Rooms were fairly modern style.
It was great awesome and homely. The room upgrade was unexpected. But good service for the staff. Loves the outlook and interior look of the hotel. (: will patronise again.

We were a little disappointed as the superior rooms we had were on the old wing. Also the inconvenience of using the wifi only at the lobby area. Would have been great to have the access in the rooms as other similar priced hotels do provide this facility. Overall is satisfactory and will come back again on our next trip when we can get a good deal. Thank you.

I've been to Singapore a Couples of times previously and this hotel was as good if not better than the other hotels which I had stayed in. It is very well located with very easy access to various shopping stores as it's at the very beginning of Tanglin Rd which turns into Orchard rd. The staff were very friendly with fast check in/out. Room service was good with a large selection. The room was quite large and bed was comfortable with the only gripe I would have the hand basin plug was broken but was repaired promptly once I had called reception. Unfortunately my stay was only for the one night but overall my stay was very pleasant and I would recommend staying here to my friends.
very good stay with easy access to shopping centre, good Muslim food and public transport.

I generally liked my stay at the MBS. Check in was very fast. The pool was to die for, only if you get there early in the morning and avoid the crowds. You'll never run of things to do there with shops, museums and the Gardens by the Bay just nearby.

i like the place due to proximity to public transport, shopping centres and entertainment. The restaurant served halal food and has wide variety of buffet. book early to avoid dissappointment. The staff was quick to respond to you call. the front facade under renovation hence the lobby area where people move in and out is a little crowded

i like the place due to proximity to public transport, shopping centres and entertainment. The restaurant served halal food and has wide variety of buffet. book early to avoid dissappointment. The staff was quick to respond to you call. the front facade under renovation hence the lobby area where people move in and out is a little crowded
The room was great, very big rooms and huge bath tub. Free shuttle service to attractions within Sentosa Island.

We had a pleasant stay despite the fact that they had some renovation works going on at the lobby. The Royal Club Lounge services were good, they even offered late check-out without being asked. The room was clean, bed very comfortable, the kids thoroughly enjoyed the bathtub, oh, and the mini bar in the room is all free of charge! Thumbs up!

We titled this "short but sweet," as we stayed only one night to take care of business. We chose the V Lavender because we had stayed for a period of almost 3 weeks 2 months ago. Some staff recognized us and greeted us cordially, which was a fine surprise. The room was typically small for Singapore yet quite adequate. MRT next to hotel a huge plus. Breakfast buffet for S$14 quite nice; otherwise there is a large food court next door. "Fairprice" market one block away. We will stay again.

1. Rooms are small but for a single traveller , it is oK ! 2. WIFI is available FOC but for connectibility on smart phones suffers constant disconnection. 3. Very close to Bugis St , so shopping and food is easily available.

The stay was short, the road next to the hotel is torn up and will not be finished until 2016 so you might look for another place to stay until then. The hotel was nice but the Buffet was absoutely ABSURDLY Overpriced and Not worth it at all. Too bad if it was more reasonable they would ahve more business.
The hotel is having a renovation at the hotel lobby so it is a bit messy and noisy

It was a pleaseant experience during my stay in Hotel Michael. The hotel is easily accessed from the train station and it is also located near food courts, restaurants and the theme park. The only down side is the hotel does not provide any free Wi-Fi
Enjoyable but transportation around the resort & island was not very ideal.

Generally just a very short stay for us to celebrate Xmas. Short walk to Clark Quay where we had dinner at the Riverfront and spent time at Suntec City, Orchard and Raffles City. Room is okay and I think is worth the room rate. Lobby is too small and crowded maybe it's because of the coffee house placing all the dining tables occupying a portion of the lobby to cater to the Xmas crowd. Manage to sneak a look at the Xmas Buffet Lunch spread and the food varieties looks really great ....May try this next year for Xmas....

Chose this hotel as there was a promotion going on. I must say that this hotel is not value for money. Beside room being large, there is nothing special about the room. Bed was huge and comfortable. No bathtub, but rain shower was good. Not many facilities in the hotel. I would expect more from a RWS hotel.

Upon knowing that we are here to celebrate our honeymoon, they send a cake to our room as a form of celebration / gift to us! Awesome feeling. Though pool and gym is quite small, the room with high bed can make up to it. :)

Was quite good. However, had a small issue with the room service wasn't done when I put the sign outside quite disappointed coz I was out for quite a long time for the day and no one bothered to do it for me despite it being a 5 star hotel
The room is small. The view are all the office windows. The service is poor. They gave rotten oranges.
The hotel was execellent. We were satisfied with this hotel. The location is quite good.

The location is quite a nice thing for this hotel, just beside an art school, one regrets is only the hotel condition, old. Maybe they could probably upgrade the hotel in certain way, design matter a lot. Overall, a nice stay, sound proof system poor, bathroom poor, room size small. But singapore is a good place especially the nice street with trees and greenery, there's also many small restaurant surround, required one to discover them. Probably i will stay at this hotel again and hopefully they going to have some improvement, but the price for staying is quite reasonable for it's service.
the stay was ok, just wanted something easy access and simple as it is just quick turn over night stay before we head out to Yangon so being central located is great for us

Great and pleasurable for any weekend getaway ... great rooms and comfortable beds ... near to all restaurants at your conveniences ... centrally located with free shuttle bus to the city or the nearest mrt station ... helpful staff throughout the stay

Nice stayed at the hotel with my friend. Room is small but clean and modern design, feels comfortable. Easy access to the MRT station, except if you come back after 10pm the access to the hotel connecting the MRT station is closed, have to find some other route. Shopping mall connected to the hotel, easy to go around look for breakfast.
all good stay again when pricing is good

I have been back to Ibis for quite a few times. I have always been very satisfied with them. They have very clean big rooms at quite a reasonable price. I will definitely recommend any business travellers who are looking for a cheap central place to stay.
i found the crocroach in my room on the first night and the room is smell quite bad on the carpet and the curtain.
nice location to stay. and its a new hotel which u dont find many hotel with this kind of unique interior.

Good. Walking distance to nearby shopping malls and City hall MRT station. lobby staff are friendly and helpful. My aircon was making some noise, Maintenance staff are prompt to service the aircon and ensure that it does not happen. Getting a taxi is also fast and good! Furnishings is abit old, and that's why I upgrade to a better room, I was so shy to tell the lobby staff.
it was a nice experience to stay in Concorde. very close to shops and food centre is located under the hotel building. there's shuttle service from the sentosa island to the hotel back and forth.

very close to major shopping place. if you are looking for brands name such as Hermes, louis Vuitton, Chanel and many more but do not want to spend to much on the hotel fee, concorde is the right place to stay. very close to somerset MRT. highly recommended.
I think they told me there is a nonsmoking room, but it's full of the smoking smell around all the room, I think it's not right.
Ok, nothing special just simple with good location
The location is great for shopping with easy access to other areas in the city. The Staff were friendly and courteous and the facilities clean and well maintained.

Got an upgrade to a Junior Suite room from a Deluxe room in this lovely classic hotel complete with friendly staff, which is really nice. Design of room is just standard though. Easy access to outside through the back door from where my room is located, which saves time without going through the lobby each time we head out. Thumbs up for having 2 pools, the indoor swimming pool offers a lot more privacy rather than the main pool at the cafe.
it was awesome. i stayed at MBS with my boyfriend for our anniversary and invited a few friends over. response to room service was quick.

The hotel is nicely located in the heart of Sentosa. It is surrounded by trees and the pools are part of nature setting. There are 5 heritage trees in Capella (more than 100 years old) towering more than 5 storeys. My room view directly oversees the tress and the South China Sea. The bathroom was spacious and the elongated sofa can sleep two young children.
Have stayed here during the past few trips to Singapore. Its like my bedroom, cosy and comfortable.
no problem at all,the receptionist is nice,as well as the housekeeper and the hotel is comfortable

Hotel is situated on Orchard Road where it is close to shopping areas, restaurants and entertainment places. Room is clean and good. Comfortable beds, clean toilet. All in all, very happy with the hotel. Hotel staff is friendly as well.
It served its purpose perfectly. I was there for a Couples of days to relax and shop. The hotel was very comfortable and clean.
i always enjoy myself while im staying at this hotel

The Single Superior Room has the toilet in the same alcove as the shower like the cheaper Hong Kong hotels, so you have to protect the toilet roll before showering and mop up afterwards. There is nowhere to store clothes except a tiny cupboard under the hand basin or keeping them in your suitcase. There is only a hook with hangers for jackets and trousers on the wall. I prefer fresh milk in my early morning hot drink so I bought small cartons of milk from the 7-11 Shop across the road and kept them cool overnight with ice in the supplied ice bucket. I selected this hotel for its single room at a cheaper price than a double, but you have to adapt to the lack of a fridge and a cupboard.

My stay at Park royal was ok, because I didn't enjoy the breakfast well. Nothing was new everyday same food and some foods were not even well cooked. Chefs are moody while making eggs they doonot listen if you ordered them to add some salt on egg unless they ordered me to add salt over the egg :( I was thinking for few minutes what kind of behaviour is that. Staffs are very very commercial they don't even extend 2 hours for you while checking out. I stay in this hotel only because this is beside Mustafa shopping centre and some good restaurants.

The stay was completely alright and enjoyable but was rather disappointed with the breakfast and the service during the breakfast session. I got my breakfast voucher tix numbered 178 and it was not serve after waiting for more than half an hour feel rather frustrating when the waitress served other tables which came in later. My breakfast was served after calling in number 196. Food was either tasteless for the porridge or too salty for the western classic and the egg for the nasi lemak.
It's slightly above our expectation. The room size is ok. Clean. Staff is friendly. Walking distance to shopping, hospital, and foods. Nice stay.

The staff was not helpful or friendly. I put in my special request when booking that I wanted non-smoking room with 1 double bed. During check-in, I was told that this was just a request. I have to fight very hard, and finalyy managed to get a non-smoking single room. colleague who checked in same time but was behind me got a non-smoking double room - this just shows you the level of "service" - the staff did not give the customer what they requested. The carpet of the hotel looked very old
Overall the experience is good except that the internet connection is a bit too slow. Friendly staffs and the room is spacious.
Long delays to check in. Reception kept asking me to come back 5 mins to check if room is ready. And there were long queues at front desk.
I thought the roomand bed is gonna be bigger, because they are 5 stars hotel. But it is the same with other 3 stars hotel in spore with small bed and small room

Was Ok. Staff didnt serve fom the heart. This kinda thing u just easily can tell. most of the time, they answer me with a very plain no expression and cold answer, no smile whatsoever.Inserted my room keycard for a short leave just so my room would be cold the moment i came back, but once i came back they took it off.
it was good. just that the room a bit small. but it was comfortable. just for 2 pax
Rooms are modern and clean. Although small, it is still well equipped. Beds are comfortable and the tv has preloaded movies for your entertainment. All in all, value for money.

trendy hotel with the great location, just a few step to bras basah mrt station and bugis station. not very happy with the staff when checking-in and out. the room are small but it s good enough to have a good sleep. the bed is super comfy. overall i had a great stay in this hotel and would come back again.

The rooms are very small, but are well designed with nice interiors. The room we got was the smallest we've ever experienced, but as we only were going to sleep there for one night and not spend much time Indoors in the hotel, it served its purpose well as it was well thought through and very clean.
The only bad thing about this hotel is the elevator. When the hotel is full, you have to wait up to 5 minutes to be able to go up or down. That is, if the elevator isn't already full :)
staff was so good, they were trying arrange for early check in and keep bag after check out. Attitude of staff was really good!

overall a good stay, quick check in and hotel room is clean with basic amenities. the room is small and compact but is ok for solo traveller. the hotel got an easy acceess via taxi and MRT. food is not a major issue as convenient shop is just a min away and the hotel is near to Bugis shopping mall.
It was great. I love the design although the room is small. I like the fact that they provide free movies on tv as well as radio channels on tv.
Room size was very small. Bathroom was small too.
The room is extremely small, compared to the photo being posted online.
Apart from the fact that the room was quite small,i have nothing negative to say about the hotel. I would gladly stay again...
Basically very small room, but quite near to mrt just 10 min walk to litle india mrt

Quite nice, but the first night when we were arrived, almost finished dissapointed because they said the hotel was over booking, and going to transfer us to other hotel. After an argument, at last they said they will give us a room. Is it a 4 stars hotel management ? The only best point is the MRT station nearby.
Very comfortable, quite fast check in and check out

I think this hotel is more near by nightlife rather than shopping area, because orchard street have to walk about 15 minutes, just few restaurant around the hotel.But if you like nightlife there is a lot of bar around such as hard rock and blowfish.taxi access is quite easy and takes 30-45 minutes if not traffic jam.MRT stations about 15 minutes walk.room and bathroom are very small but quite clean.
see above under summary room/bathroom very cramped

it was noisy outside the corridor.toilets were small and had no bathtub. the service at the reception can be improved. the room was very basic and for the same price,there are better hotels in town. hotel and its surroundings had some sort of major construction going on as well.

it was noisy outside the corridor.toilets were small and had no bathtub. the service at the reception can be improved. the room was very basic and for the same price,there are better hotels in town. hotel and its surroundings had some sort of major construction going on as well.
good experience since it was our 1st visit to singapore.
Unforgetable moment to stay, Nice and very friendly staff, Good Food and superb serice and trully..... I Will come back again :)
An average hotel for the price. Location is great. Check-in took 25 mins despite pre-paying. Hallways and rooms stink of stale tobacco. Rooms are acceptable but not worth $200+.
staff very smile and friendly, nice design, close to shopping area
first time i stay in concorde,its a recomended hotel
everything on right. Just a poor breakfast. McD taste better :)
The room not macth with our requested (no extra bed).

I super love our deluxe room. It so big with two queen size bed. The bathroom has its own TV and it is so big. I also love the pantry. So many complimentary stuff like TWG teas. 6 capsule coffee of course with the brewer. I highly recommend this hotel if you want to be in heart of every activity. walking distance to Universal Studio. So I suggest you get the 2 day pass. The SEA Aquarium is really nice. The train and buses will get you anywhere in sentosa for free. Hopefully I can visit again soon.

To my very surprises the hotel did not provide free wifi to the guest. It is rare today that exclusive hotel like Stamford did not provide it free to the staff & caused an inconveniences as well. Will not recommend to stay. I am staying there just because of Vertical Marathon.
No mineral water provided. The room is big but normal.
The bed is VERY VERY stiff for a hotel standard. And the single bed seems smaller than the usual single bed in other hotels.

Overall my stay at the Resort World Sentosa Hotel Michael was so so. My request to early check in wasn't helpful, I still had to wait until 3pm to get the room and rested :( Not to mention the not so friendly staffs.
The carpet was damp, i'm wearing sandal in room all the time, toilettries very limited

Fine. Friendly staff, the services was great, the apartment is recomended for young families with 2 kids like us, the price also the location was great, unfortunately the room is old, air conditioner was damaged, also the microwave is not working.
The Club upgrade meant checkin at the Club level on the top floor, snacks and drinks, breakfast in the club, and free Internet. Comfortable beds and a nice bathroom.

Many small things irritated: - At the room chair & legs don't fit under the table. Forget working for any longer period at the hotel room. - It took delivery boy to explain how to put on the light for the working table lamp ("nobody finds it on their own" said the delivery boy") - Very limit value little value for executive club extra; useless free minibar (who drinks 10 cans of sugary soda per day?) - Small, oddly located with difficult to operate equipment at the gym Good looking design, great staff but the hotel management sucks on making the details work. I will not go there again.
Enjoy the free minibar, generally very nice except the room is little bit small
Enjoy the free minibar, generally very nice except the room is little bit small
It was great! The spacious room was really comfortable. Would be even better if free WIFI was provided.

I was upgraded to a bigger room, so my husband and I shared 1 king and 1 single bed, the room was clean and spacious, you can see the pool of next building from window, and the equipment and furniture in the room was nice and functional. Great location and worth for money. The only bad thing were small sized TV, that you can't see much details if you watch it in bed, and a not so comfortable mattress and pillow, that we both suffered from back pain the other day.

The stay was great, room is big and spacious. This was actually my second stay here, the first time I stayed there was really great, left me with a lot of nice and beautiful memories. The stay this time was also great, just that this time round, the toilet seems to let off a pungent smell and there is no way of getting rid of the smell. Overall, it was still a great experience.
The room is spacious. Cleanliness can be better, especially bathroom and bathtub.

very nice hotel with kind and friendly staff. It seems like they provide house keeping service twice a day. (When we came back to our room at night, things were rearranged.)It is connected to the shopping mall and easy access from MRT Bugis station.
Pleasant, however, noise from adjacent room was audible. That was probably because the room I was staying in was a linked room.
It was a pleasant stay. The roow was big has 2 queen bed.quite far to the city by walking distance

Not really a pleasant stay. No free wifi, too far away from the heart of Sentosa, need to wait for shuttle bus to go out, only 1 restaurant available in the hotel, the carpet in the room is very dusty, tv in the room was out of order. Will not stay for second time.

Firstly i loved the spacious room, not many hotels provide that kind of space in that kind of price although they really need to sacrifice there breakfast i completely disliked the breakfast it was untasteful compact room sharing tables with other people not enough variety of food. Food is always cold and they only provide breakfast until 10 which is outrages. They are usually filled with other people so some of us need to wait, thus wasting alot of time in the process, i would comeb back to relc international again if the food was better.
Overall was okay.Rooms are spacious and comfortable.staff are friendly
After we go fun outside and back to the hotel and we found the clean room and comfortable beds, nice bathroom, enjoyable and recommend for group or family.
Fast checking in & out, attentive staff, large space in room
It is a nice stay and i will come again in the future

The few good things about this hotel is - It really has a big room (perfect for families with children) and it is surprisingly very clean. Mineral water bottles are provided, with a kettle and some instant coffee and tea packets. The beds were comfortable enough especially after a tiring day. Bathroom was spacious enough. Mini fridge, air-conditioning and the water heater shower was great. However, there were a few bad things about it. We were greeted by impolite staff when we first checked in. Not a very impressive lobby as it is more of a conference/convention/learning center rather than a hotel . The pillows were too 'thin' or flat. The location was not perfect. As mentioned by other travelers, all shopping malls/shops are not within walking distance. But if you don't mind walking or taking the public transportation, it is still consider nearby to the central shopping district. Overall, still a comfortable stay as long as you are well prepared before coming for a holiday with the family.
Our room ,although big ,had a smell and no internet.

It was an extremely good hassle-free stay. The hotel was perfect not only for the older children but for my senior citizen mother as well. It was very accessible to all points of interest. Taking the MRT was a breeze for the kids, and so were all the taxi rides for the seniors. The staff was friendly and accommodating, and the concierge and the doorman were especially helpful.
They have nice staff and good service. A very peacufl hotel where in you can really relax on their lounge.. I am definetly coming back and will recommend this to my friends and relatives...

I have stayed at several hotels in Singapore for family trips, and so far, this is the most exceptional one. The room is large, the staff is friendly and attentive, and the room service is fast. The hotel has a very good location, too. It is pretty close to Orchard shopping area, but it is also far enough for a quiet rest.
It was just amazing! I wanted a staycation and I had an awesome one! Would definitely come back here again!

The stayed was good. Services from staff was good and attentive. The rooms were comfortable and clean with very good view of the Marina Bay Sand Hotel, etc. I love it because it is near to the Shopping Mall. However, my sister's room has electrical problem like the aircond & lights was not workable in the middle of the night that causes her to be frust & enable to sleep. Must ensure that the electrical, cabling or the console is workable.
Hotel needs to pay attention to housekeeping - the two glasses in the bathroom had toothpaste on the inside of the glasses.
Hotel needs to pay attention to housekeeping - the two glasses in the bathroom had toothpaste on the inside of the glasses.

the attitude of the staff was very bad, i arrived the hotel at 2:00 pm and i was not able to check in till 3:30 pm, their normal check-in time is 3:00pm. My friends were all waiting for me at the universal studio and the staff couldnt provide me a room till 3:30pm. The queue is so long waiting for check- in.

It was absolutely fine. The room was clean and in fair order. The hotel is perhaps in need of a little refresh but as far as business stay is concerned it was fine. This is not the smartest place in the world but service was acceptable.

I had a relatively pleasant stay here during a recent business trip. The hotel is quite old but well maintained and the reason for choosing it was because I had a conference at a nearby 5 star hotel. The icing on the cake was attentive and friendly staff who spoke my language after knowing where I came from. Checking in and out was a breeze too.
cost performance is not good, reception is busy, quite natural room, with alarm worked in the early morning, without any announcement after.

Terrible we had midnite check in so only stayed 11 hrs asked if we could extend but staff were uncompromising.We asked for NON SMOKING ROOM but it STANK as did the hallways.Would not recomend this place.

Our stay at the Orchard Hotel was very pleasant. The hotel had newly renovated rooms and was nicely designed. It is also located right on Orchard St. which makes it a quick 5 minute walk to the Ion Centre and other shopping centres along Orchard Rd. The front desk staff were really friendly and even provided a free upgraded room at check-in. The WIFI is also really strong.
I made a mistake with my booking. The DM handled the situation perfectly. Helps me ease my stay. The room is clean and spacious.
Stay was great. Staff was friendly. Gym and pool is easily assessed. Room is clean and spacious.
This hotel will not be my first choice to stay , rate is reasonable, have to improve service and food choices at breakfast
Was upgraded to presidential suite and the room is very big and comfortable. staffs were very helpful and attentive to all needs and quick check in and out. Breakfast was nice.
Ok ok hotel not worth the money rooms very small.
The room was small but it's ok, cause we only need to sleep for a night,comfy bed and clean room, overall it was good
No complaints. I like it else I won't come back to stay so often. I like the Location and large room. It's well furnished
We had a great experience in this hotel, we enjoyed our 1 night stay though it was quite short. This is the best place for quality time with family.
Car park access via another lift which can be bothersome - All rooms are non-smoking
Overall,staff was friendly and quick to respond to requests. Room was comfortable.

I had booked the hotel for my mum's birthday for a weekend staycation. Upon arriving, the staff were very friendly to show me to the check in counter and the lift to proceed up to the room. Fast check in and in a breeze, I was up on the 26th floor for the awesome weekend ahead. Clean bathroom and spacious bedroom. Comfortable bed and pillows accompanied with a cosy corner for relaxing. Travelling to town area was made easy with the bus stop location directly outside the hotel. After a good night's sleep, we ordered for room service for breakfast. Quality of food was not too bad and the service was fast. If I were to point out the bad stuffs, it would have to be the dirty coasters and mugs in the room (guess the housekeeping forgot to change a new set) and for having to pay additional charges for using their wifi(so I just used my own line in the end).
had free upgrade to the club room. able to find hair on the bathtub and the shampoo was not replenish.
It was a enjoyable one. Celebrating one of my friends birthday. Staff was helpful too.

I have stayed here many times and it never disappoints, the location is really good and the rooms are of a good size and well appointed. Breakfast and bar are good but have never dined there as there are so many places around. would come back.
Overall, we are satisfied with our stay in this hotel and the good services in general.
Only pity was that we were unable to taste the durian puffs because they were sold in boxes of 48 which is too much for 2 people.
I have stayed at this hotel so many times and feel so comfortable, especially for the location and the internet speed.
I have stayed at this hotel so many times and feel so comfortable, especially for the location and the internet speed.

Stay at hotel was good, only a stopover on my way from Johor Malaysia to catch a flight from Changi Airport the next day. It was good to spend the night in Singapore and catch the vibrancy of Orchard Road with the Christmas lights and street performers. The hotel was clean and tidy, some redevelopment work ongoing to the front of the hotel but this did not detract from the stay. The internal appearance of the hotel was a very pleasant surprise when you consider that externally it looked a little tired. The staff were very efficient and extremely friendly. Would certainly consider staying there again...

With the recent promotion for the Grand room it was certainly value for money.. Room was big enough to fit 6 person and there's lots of dining options on the lower ground of the Raffles City Mall adjacent to the hotel. Furthermore, the MRT station is just right below which can get you to any part of the island.
The staff were very professional in their conduct.
I always choose this hotel due to its extremely strategic location. It is centrally located in Orchard, hence it made us easy to go shopping around and do hospital visits.
The stay was very good as the access to public transport is very good. There is a direct bus to marina bay sand and some other place of interst.
the hotel located at the center of city, the well trained staff provided fast checkin ,closed to Bugis shopping area and heaps of restaurant . highly recommeded for Couples or family stay.

i stayed in the hotel for one night. had a good sleep as the room was clean and cosy, bedding was clean and crisp that prepared me for the day ahead. the the only thing that was not up to the marque was the recalcitrant remote control for the tv. never could understand how it worked or was it working at all.
My only complaint is that the room light is not bright enough
Our stay was satisfactory, the room very comfortable but the hotel definitely needs some renovation. The bathroom was quite old and for a superior room it was small as well.

I WAS CONVINCED THAT PARC SOVEREIGN HOTEL IS A GREAT PLACE TO STAY WHEN VISITING SINGAPORE. UNLIKE OTHER HOTELS I HAD STAYED IN BEFORE, IT HAS A GOOD AMBIANCE FOR RELAXATION, EQUIPPED WITH SWIMMING POOL AND GYM.THE ROOM IS FAIR ENOUGH FOR A SOLO TRAVELER LIKE ME (THOUGH IT CAN FIT IN ANOTHER PERSON IF YOU'LL BE TRAVELING WITH A COMPANION BUT TOO SMALL FOR 3 PERSON). BATHROOM IS GOOD SIZE & I UNDERSTAND WHY OTHERS MAY COMPLAIN ABOUT IT BUT ITS TOLERABLE, NOTHING TO WORRY REALLY. I WILL DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS HOTEL TO MY FAMILY AND FRIENDS AND I WILL BOOK THIS HOTEL AGAIN.

The hotel location was good, close to all main shopping malls and have variety of restaurants and food for selections. It is also easy access to the MRT, 5mins by walking distance. The only problem was the room have smoked smell at the blanket which caused very uncomfortable sleeps. Other than that, gd hotel with location and pool and helpful staff.

i have not received service like capella's service anywhere outside of 5-star establishments in japan. the staff never hover but provide for your every need a split second before you yourself realised you have such a need. for example, after a quick dip in the pool an ice-cold bucket filled with bottled water is effortless set down for your consumption. when you take a romantic stroll with your birthday-boy husband, magically the hotel is aware of this brief window and cease upon it to freshen the room. great hotel.

I had a really nice stay at the Oasia Hotel. The room rate was very reasonable for a hotel of this quality and the room was very stylish with nice fixtures and a good size. Check in and check out was very easy and the staff friendly and attentive.
Room is clean and comfortable. At B3 level have a underpass direct through to MRT and shopping centres. The nearest shopping centres have many choices of local food, also have supermarket and cafe.
Only stayed one night and the Orchard Parade Hotel provided everything I expected an required for the short visit. The reception impressed me with their welcome and service during the stay.
pleasant, competitive room rates in Singapore However, staff could be more attentive to guest's needs

Typical box room with the large comfy bed taking up most of the space. Room cleanliness was acceptable but location of room was undesirable. Ground floor, next to the rear entrance and one door away from the main lobby. Noisy!
Suitable for business trip as close to our Singapore office.
Very enjoyable. It is not fair to demand that I write at least 50 characters.
Comfortable and good location. Easy access to shopping mall and mrt just next to the hotel. Convenient to go any destination as this is interchange station

Check-in was very slow. Of all 7 (3 to 5 star) hotels I've been to this year, both locally and overseas, this check-in has got to be the slowest. I have experienced slower ones before, up in the highlands north of Singapore, but that was expected. I did not expect this at all from a 5 star hotel. Waited in the queue for approximately 20 minutes and when it was my turn at 4 p.m., was told there were no non-smoking rooms available, which is something I have requested when I booked with Agoda in advance. Was recommended to either take the room on the smoking floor, or wait in line, which has around 60! people in the queue, for a different room. Was then advised that the smoke odor is generally not strong, and the hotel can provide a air ionizer in the room if needed. So not wanting to wait, we accepted it. On a more positive note, there was indeed no smoke odor detected in our room, but the corridors were not spared. Which was alright. The room was clean and spacious. Nicely decorated and neat. Some toilet fittings were loose and wobbly though. Overall the room was acceptable, but the hotel operations need improvement.
Superb!!! I would love to come again for shopping near Orchard Road. I save time and energy because it's near to shopping heaven.

The stay was enjoyable with attentive staff. Nice surroundings. Quiet. Room was comfortable. Well-equipped. Guests feel safe staying there with all security measures in place, despite hotel being in a busy, shopping area. Would return.

The stay at Rendezvous is a superb and relaxing one. The staff were friendly, the surroundings are quiet and the hotel offers large beds in rooms. The shower amenities are relatively new and the location is quite convenient for all access.

Beyond my expectation. So convenient location to major places and easy to get public transport. The staff, especially every concierge staff are so friendly & efficient. Super fast internet in lobby and in room, the bed is very comfortable.

Beyond my expectation. So convenient location to major places and easy to get public transport. The staff, especially every concierge staff are so friendly & efficient. Super fast internet in lobby and in room, the bed is very comfortable.

Extremely in love for the attentive & friendly staff. The bathroom need more maintenance,we have difficulty to shower as my situation is this: when I pull the diverter button and activate the shower, a fair amount of water continues to flow from the tub spout, and as a result the shower is weaker than it should be. Hope the management could look into this matter. Overall i have a pleasant stay in the hotel. Thank you for the extended check out time to 2pm.

i was lucky to offered free upgrade to suite from my deluxe room due to room unavailable during check in. big room & big bathroom. clean too.near to water park and universal studio world and beach and sun. and amny other attraction you can find in sentosa.
We had excellent stay. Will definitely return when we viait singapore again
my next trip to singapore will definitely be booked with marina bay sands. clean, convenient, and friendly staff.

Very nice. Staff was helpful and efficient the hotel is 2 minute walk from Bugis and 2 shopping malls. There is a nice market at bugis village. Bus stop is right in front of the hotel and you can get to Orchard road in a 10 -15min walk. Very safe area

This was not our first time stayed in Royal Plaza, but we came back because of great experience of the previous stays. It turned out it got better. We booked the promotional upgraded room from superior to deluxe, and when we checked in, the friendly front desk staff upgraded our room to Premier (better grade room) to our surprise. Undoubtely one of best value hotel in Singapore, especially if you're planning to spent most of your time wandering orchard area. Definetly will come back for another stays.

This was not our first time stayed in Royal Plaza, but we came back because of great experience of the previous stays. It turned out it got better. We booked the promotional upgraded room from superior to deluxe, and when we checked in, the friendly front desk staff upgraded our room to Premier (better grade room) to our surprise. Undoubtely one of best value hotel in Singapore, especially if you're planning to spent most of your time wandering orchard area. Definetly will come back for another stays.
The suite was excellent, the staffs were attentive and the customer service was great. Easy access to shops and restaurant. The Infiniti Pool was really a great experience. No complain at all!!
This is our second time stay in this Hotel, and again we are satisfy with this Hotel. We will recommend this Hotel to everybody.

The staffs are very attentive, knowing I am pregnant during my stay, they provided me and my husband with a room that is easy access to the swimming pool at ground level. The room is very clean and comfortable. Great location.

The hotel's just a few steps off busy orchard road, so it's a wee bit quieter relatively. Across the street in contrast is perpetually crowded Ngee Ann City, but it's great to know that's very close by for whatever you need to shop for. Hotel itself doesn't shout luxury, but subdued class, with room and service par for the course. Quiet business meetings can be had at their tasteful lounge or the connecting Mandarin Gallery.

Had a memorable stay at the Orchard Hotel last week and it was such a pleasant surprise to have our room upgraded to the Signature Club. Very impressed with the attentive and efficient services provided by Front Desk and Housekeeping staff, and the location is superb for shopping in Singapore. Will definitely return and will highly recommend to friends.
Capella hotel has always been our favourite choice as all their staff have always try their best to cater to their guests need
A superb stay with all requests swiftly attended to with grace! Will definitely go back the next time we r in Singapore.
I find it an excellent stay as per what I had written on the 3 best things about this hotel!
location was great but I was a bit disappointed with the room amenities as well as the small gym.

Hotel rooms were very big and clean. Bed is very comfortable too. As we are traveling with a 4 year old kid, hotel is nice enough to give as an connecting room. Hotel staff are very helpful and friendly. Location is another plus point. It is location right in the centre of Orchard road, which is great for people who likes to shop. No worries for restaurants, as the hotel is located right in the Mandarin Gallery, with great dining options like Ippudo and Lawry's.
My husband and I have a pleasant stay at the hotel.
Very nice. Got a free upgrade to premium room. The view from the pool is great!

My great experience begun from the minute I checked in. The front office staff is very friendly and helpful, I felt like having a conversation with a friend. She explained the direction I have to take the next day for my meeting and, this is the best part, she upgraded my room while politely explained that the hotel was going under renovation so I might have to hear some noise. To be true, I didn't hear nor see any activities with regard to the renovation. I am so happy to find this hotel so I can stay away from the busy Orchard yet still within easy access to Orchard if I want to go there. Will certainly return.
We checked into the Deluxe Room and was surprised to find that it was spacious and very clean. However the tv was quite small and in a weird location.

Strange layout of the room though spacious. TV was on the diagonal right side of the bed in the room whereas the tv outside was far from the sofa. Both TVs were equally small and not modern looking. Internet was not fast enough and keeps signing out. Was impressed that the service crew made a point to do the rounds in the evening to replenish the room supplies like towels. water etc. Lastly, I paid over S$400 for the junior suite but i realised the price was slashed further about a week before i checked-in. And i thought it pays to be an early bird. Felt cheated :(
Very big comfortable room. However the checkin is a bit slow and there are no clear sign of checkin counter.

Our stay in the hotel was very enjoyable. The hotel located very conveniently close to public transport and local eateries. The staffs were friendly, helpful, and very attentive to the guests need. Definitely will recommend this hotel to my friends and family. The downside only that the hotel was under renovation on the main lobby, so the lobby feel a bit cramped when there were a lot of people there. And the carpets along the room corridor and inside the room need to be replace, eventhough they are not dirty or old, but very dusty along the corner. But beside that, it was a superb stay.
Great stay. Was upgarded to a premier room although i had reserved a superior upgrade to deluxe room. Staff was also friendly.
Great stay. Was upgarded to a premier room although i had reserved a superior upgrade to deluxe room. Staff was also friendly.

It is a very pleasing stay. I will definitely consider this hotel for my next visit. Especially due to its strategic location quite in the center of Singapore. Easy access to Orchard road, Marina Bay, Esplanade, and the City Hall MRT is within walking walking. The Chimes across the road is also a very great place for quick drink, while Bugis shopping area is also within walking distance.

I enjoyed my stay at v hotel coz i really liked the room very spacious for 5 persons, modern interior, very clean, relaxing, and the great thing about the room is the big glass window that overseas the entire city. All english speaking staff. Value for money. Very accessible to public transport mrt is just behind the hotel plus very near to cheap restaurants. I highly reccomend v hotel to those whos planning to visit sg.
Overall was great, easly access to the city, beside shopping mall, room also very big
Comfortable and i enjoyed so Much. I was working and afterhours laying down In My room was a heaven
Like it very much. Really enjoy it without leaving the hotel
Peaceful, clean and centrally located to my requirements.
It a nice hotel with fantastic room. Service are great surprising me is the huge bath room. Overall worth for the money and is idea for Couples.

Always stay here when go to Singapore. Comparing with other hotels In surrounding area, this hotel has the best price. Location also very very good. It's in the middle of orchard road. I really recommend this hotel. Many rests and shops near by and also close to the hospitals.

Check-in was easy and quick. Had to get my parking passes from the concierge. He was trying to give instructions to a non-Anglophonic guest on directions to some attractions on the mainland, and I felt he was quite rude when he did it. I was only given 2 passes for a 2 day stay. Guess they wanted us to stay on the island. Nonetheless, we were given a pair of Sentosa island passes so that we could go to the mainland and back. Although we had a smokefree suite, the smell of cigarette hits you the moment you stepped in. The outer ledge of the balcony was also littered with cigarette butts. Not pleasant. I was surprised at some of the smaller details in the bathroom, the curved curtain rod was droopy and that meant shower water was flooding to the dresser table in the bath room. The Hot/Cold tab on the tap was off, leaving a awful spot. The drain push-knob in the tub was missing !! I had to use a shaver to push to the button to plug/drain the tub. For collectors of hotel shampoo bottles, you will not find the small bottles in the rooms. Instead, shampoo, bodywash and hand soap were all presented in 300ml size squirt bottles. To cap it all off, we bagged a cake from the hotel restaurant for the wife's birthday. At midnight, we blew the candles and all and realised that we didn't have a fork. Room service took a few minutes to pick up the phone and wanted to charge usto bring a pair of forks to the room.

Amazed by the BIG room space, beyond my expectation for Singapore hotel which commonly known for their small room space. 2Queen size bed in each room is ideal for family with kids. Nice modern design. Balcony facing the pool. The swimming pool is awesome, so BIG! Kids can enjoy at the man made beach, while adult can enjoy swimming at the lap pool, or rent a pool side cabana to chill with friends. Best location, just 10mins walk to Univrsal Studio & The Sea Aquarium and main attraction at Sentosa Islands. Cons : Should provide Free wifi for guest. The design of the bathroom is weird, semi tranparent glass door might only suitable for honeymooner. Fitness centre too small, less equipments. No sauna/ steambath/ jaccuzi.

Very pleasant experience. Was upgraded to Club, enjoyed the space, room design and spacious bathroom. Very nice city and pool view as well. Staff was friendly and competent. Very good club facilities as well. It's also centrally located and next to mall.
Our family enjoyed tremendously the room upgrade to premium suite as our 2 kids had lots of space to move about. Kudos to front desk reception staff.
very fast internet access , good swimming pool view and clean room
internet and food is expensive rest all good
very friendly staff; both rommservice and at reception desk. we booked 2 times into Rendezvous Hotel and both times they gave us an upgrade to a better room. THANK you Rendezvous Hotel!!

Be careful when booking. I always choose a higher than standard room. I booked a split level Park Lane studio, assuming it was in the hotel. Unfortunately it was in a separate apartment building, and was not luxurious at all, very basic, barely 3-star standard. So I paid a lot but missed the luxury and service of the fantastic hotel. So be careful, the limited description on Agoda can be misleading and result in disappointment. Check the hotel website before booking.

Tell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stayTell us about your hotel stay
Poor hotel as smoke everywhere. Rooms were dirty with smoke in each floor. Poor room mgt by staff. Do not stay at this hotel unless you prefer smkoing all over the place.

I checked in at 8:30pm on 13.11.13 and checked out at 11:40 am on 15.11.13. At 5:30pm on 14.11.13, I discovered I lost my wallet at a Comfort cab at the time I got down from the cab. The cab went off and I was stunned. A hotel staff helped me to report to the counter at the first instance. However the staff at the Congieve was lethargic and no efforts to hasten the slow responding Comfort Cab Headquarter. Only at 9 pm on 14.11.13 I was asked to Comofort Cab Headquarter. The next day, I checked out and reported to the local Police Station at Killiney Road. As I lost the wallet, I specifically asked the Indian Manager at the Counter about my Autopass Card was lost along with the wallet and therefore I needed soemthing to get my car out of the hotel car park. I had already paid for the SS 12 parking fee. I was told by her there was no need to get any card but went striaght out. It was not the case and I was blocked at the exit of the car park. I conclude that the hotel staff were not helpful in recvoering my lost wallet and not bothered to help me to get my car out of the car park. I have asked the Police to look into the CCTV recording of the surveillance system to trace the cab and the events as the manager was not willing to investigate to the loss of my wallet.

Staff very unfriendly and unprofessional, never experience such bad service esp in 5 star hotels. Asked for morning call, never call. Staff attitude really needs to improve. Strongly advise never stay in this hotel.

we landed at 9 am and waited till 130 to get a room.. request for early checkin was requested earlier...had a flt to bali next day at 6 am. came back to hotel at 8 pm for an early retirement to bed but to our horror ,all the guests were in lobby due to power failure with less than 50% occupancy on same day and day previous....there was no urgency or concern by the management to relocate the guests ,as a matter of fact ,the manager of the hotel was in hidding with the technical team at boh.no one was concerned about relocating guests or to provide for dinner. ,did one team manager sneak us out to another shody hotel by 1 am ...for us to barely catch 3 hour of sleep... this hotel is so fantastically located ,why arent the owners wakening up to todays bussiness requirement
I am really enjoy my stay at the Golden House hotel and i will gonna go to stay there again for my next holiday
That was great indeed. I have been missing the room with mini bar which is in the room already. the internet was too fast to work and easily can workable. that was very good indeed.
That's OK Room clean and quite but little small I will come again .................

We have frequented BIG a Couples times but somehow this time round, things in BIG felt different, maybe with the setup of the wine bar at the 1st floor and the "dining" area which pretty much seemed like an ikea's dining space minus the hot food section or i was browsing at the food section of a tuck shop. We got our rooms and well, somehow everything that made BIG feel special, disappeared, as i was getting my hot water and ice out through the long walk down the corridor but one thing BIG still retains, the magically comfortable beds they have and the rain shower that goes along with it. Amenities too seem to be getting lesser to what i recalled. Maybe we got too comfortable with BIG and we started realizing the flaws and the details that we brushed off during our previous stays became an issue for us. Would not be returning to BIG for a long time.
The breakfast variety need to be improved.eg. More variety for eggs rather than one type - omelet

nice service and design rooms. Very near to all major attractions like the Universal Studio Singapore. Food and eateries are a plenty nearby. Nice facilities like the gym but swimming pool is a bit small for hotel of this size.

As mentioned this hotel was the best experience I have had at any hotel anywhere in the world so far. I travel throughout Australia and New Zealand weekly and internationally at least 5-6 times a year. The staff at Marina Bay Sands are the most professional, helpfull and friendly staff I have encountered at any hotel anywhere in the world.

It was excellent! Staff were very attentive, efficient and provide you with everything you need within minutes. Provides buggy service to and from the villa and everything in the villa (fruits, wine and drinks) were complimentary.

Probably not the most luxurious hotel in Orchard but the room and bed are very comfortable, we enjoyed the free minibar, staff is always friendly and helpful, easy access to public transport i.e. bus & mrt. Muslim friendly with halal food.

Tis is a different hotel as the designers where able to utilize all the space, and well the hotel is small you dont get claustrophobic . the room are very very small but they work. the bed is great and comfortable. very clean and a very good shower. It a one of a kind .

I initially booked into the Superior rooms which was dark, dusty and old. It was also located way at the back of the hotel which was like walking through a maze to get to. I asked to be upgraded to their deluxe room (at a cost) which was much better quality. The deluxe rooms are refurbished and has a balcony.
The carlton is a classic, you can't really go wrong there. Comfortable & spacious room
I'm very happy with stay in PARC Sovereign HOtel especially the swimming pool in this hotel. Strong recommend for business travel who has budget less than S$200.

We came in at 11 am and asked to come back at 2 pm. We came again at 1.45 and was asked to come again another hour. So we came again at 7.30 and was assigned to a room which was still occupied. We came down again and got another room. I am dissapointed that this could happen at Mandarin. No excuses can be given provided that the safety of the hotel is overseen. I was with my young son entering the occupied room and anything bad could have happenned. Then duty managers came to me to apologize and offered us transport to the airport. We do not need to be compensated. This is not important. Its the service and front desk system that needs to be closely monitored. Thank you.
The check in was delayed by almost an hour as they did not have the reservation from Agoda! I had to forward the email. Tiring and unpleasant wait.
I cannot understand a hotel of this standard asked me to pay if I want to use WiFi.

We booked two rooms as we have two big kids. size of beds are comfortable. The flow of the shower is a bit slow so I have to take a long time to wash my hair even I'm short hair. The water temperature is either too hot or too cold to shower. One thing I don't like it does not have door to close for the changing and make up area. The most disgusting thing happen in my life at this hotel is after shower, I open a towel to dry my body and saw a big brown dirty spot on the towel!
This is my 2nd time stay at the hotel. the staff, the accommodation and the services never disappointed me. Will choose to stay here again in near future.

I liked my stay at this hotel but if you do not have enough money to stay in it , I would recommend visiting it as its one of singapore attractions. I would go back to singapore but I'd rather staying in Sentosa island for children amusement parks or in Orchard street for shopping. Nothing much to do in the Marina Bay area.
There were no major problems. The hotel had service and comfort befitting its price. The pool is spectacular. There is a 24-hour food court in the adjoining mall which is very convenient.
We experienced noises from others who stayed at the hotel. Such as, they swim at late hours where the pool is already closed (pool closed at 9pm)
Satisfactory,as I feel comfortable staying there like my second home.
naothing to complain. very nice and i will be back some day,

The hotel is right in the middle of important sightseeing area, its very cultural and very unique. Its not your usual hotel, its a very localized cultural building by the river. You can see lots of happenings around this area. Its not far from the Railway Station too. Just a little difficult to get to the entrance because its just beside the river. But very value for money. Wifi isn't too good though.
the hotel is very near to the public transpotation , food court and shopping center the hotel is very near to the public transpotation , food court and shopping center
We have an excellent stay at the hotel. Very relaxing and comfortable. In addition, the shopping paradise is just around the corner, we even had time to enjoy the christmas decoration.
only negative things I will say is room size is small. it seems to me executive rooms are smaller than superior one!!
Staff were really friendly, felt like being at home.Always attentive.
I enjoyed staying at Hotel Michael. However, the hotel do not provide free internet, which I think it is common for hotels in Singapore.

I opined that parking charge of $12 should cover the 24hrs of the stay rather than per entry. Can you imagine if I have to enter in and out of carpark three times during the 24hrs stay? But I appreciate Agoda's goodwill gesture of paying for the $12.

The hotel was fine, and the location was superb. The major issue was construction noise. I was not told about the noise when I placed the reservation. On check-in, I was told that the noise was at lower levels and I would have minimal noise at my level. That was true in the first few days of my stay. For the second week, it was not true. The hotel did offer to relocate me, but I had established my office area, and I declined the disruption. My recommendation is to contact the hotel prior to making a reservation. Be sure that you are isolated from the noise if that is a problem for you.
The hotel is also a centre for language and so there is a small playgroup type school there. The rooms are spacious and would be fine for a family. The lift was very slow but everything works well.
it was nice to stay here, near to the sopping center, easy to find..

it was a good night i spend with my family, i can took them to see the beautiful city view of Singapore at night on Marina Bay Sands sky park. It give me and my family an experience that we never forget

It was a great stay but since this is a commercial hotel, if your expectations in relation to customer service is kept at reasonable level then, your stay would be enjoyable. The infinity pool is definitely a must-go and you should spend a considerable amount of time in it. The room which was given to us this time was better than the one three months ago. However, we have an issue with the luggage delivery and it was lost in the process. At the end, the luggage was delivered and I can understand that the hotel is dealing with huge volumes. Apart from that, the hotel is centrally located and it is very convenient to visit nearby attractions.
There's easy access to Mt Elizabeth Rd for a shortcut to the east side of Orchard Rd.

During my stay, my father should went to the hospital. The distance from hotel to hospital approx only 200 m. We can reach the hospital in 5 minute. It is a big advantage for us because we can easily come back and forth to the hospital. Despite that the room is very big and comfortable. We made a reservation for a room that have 1 queen bed and 2 twin bed, if travelling with children we do not need a coonecting door room. Especially when you have very young children. But the best of all, if you are a fan of asian food, the gulai kepala ikan at the restaurant (the only one restaurant that the hotel has) is the best gulai kepala ikan in town, the waiter at the restaurant also the nicest staff from the hotel. We really feel satisfied during our stay.
Centrally located, for an extremely affordable price. The room is comfortable, but slightly on the small side.
Ideal location, near Orchard Road shopping centre. Nice & clean environment. House many good food outlets. Convenient, staff friendly & helpful. Room got upgraded!
he ambience is delightful and the lobby service staff, the people at the front lines were amazing.

The location is perfect, allows guests to reach shopping center and botanical garden on foot. It is surrounded by beautiful hotels and apartments also and nothing to worry when the guest should go back to hotel alone at the late of the night.

The stay was pleasant. However, more trainings should be given to staff on their mannerism and politeness that are very lacking. Also, staff are not attentive, many times, they are chatting among themselves. The location of the hotel is quite good though.

My stay at the orchard Parade Hotel was pleasant and fully met my expectations. I chose the hotel entirely based on its location, as the closest hotel to the place which was the purpose of my visit to Singapore. As a business traveller, I need a comfortable room and bed, with a good internet connection. The breakfast could have been better, but overall I would recommend the hotel to my friends.
We had a lovely time, it was just what we needed!

We really had a great time staying at this hotel. My baby really enjoyed the wide space of the room. I also appreciate the friendliness of all the staff, you really had a good manager , thumbs up to all of you.

When we arrived, there was a bit of a maintenance job happening in the lobby but this did not interfere with the operations. Check in and out were smooth. The staffs were friendly to the point on helping me find this particular restaurant that I wanted to try out. It took a few of them to figure out what restaurant I was trying to find and in the end we found it. I would really be looking forward to stay here again.

The only problem was the fact that maintenance was being done, which caused a lot of banging, sawing and drilling. Nobody had informed us about this and it disturbed our rest during the day (I am 71 years old). On the last day, the noise was so bad that we had to complain. Only then did we get a letter of apology from the manager.We beleive we could easily have been shifted to another quieter wing/floor in advance.
Automatic upgrade only at a cost. I cannot say that the Orchard Hotel was especially good value at 940 Euro for five days. Better to cross the causeway to Johor Bahru.
I think overall of service at this hotel are very good. The hotel is near Bugis MRT station walk around 300 meters.

We enjoyed our stay and we felt relaxed and comfortable. Location isn't the best and if you have a room above the road junction can be a bit noisy late at night and early morning. We travelled by car and for others doing the same parking is not free will cost about S$10 per night. The breakfast was superb and gave you a good start to the day.
We really enjoyed our stay at Capella, rooms, service, food and the pool areas where wonderful.
I am satisfied with the place except that when u request extra things it takes time for them to guve uou but other things I have no problems and complains.
It was great! My business partner had a great meeting at the hotel lobby.

not good. This was the first time I was unhappy with the hotel. the room had a bad smell. Then they used a machine which produce Ozone to kill the smell. ozone is very bad for humans and can kill human if not use correctly. My throat started burning. Had to leave room for more than 3 hours.
Lose bathroom tap, toiletseat old, towels old, spa old, top harpour view
the room is clean and the bed is comfortable, place is quiet.
The hotel was great, the room was clean and surprisingly huge, a fantastic stay!
The room is surprisingly spacious, despite being an old hotel. The hotel is located at a central location right next to MRT, very convenient to travel to other places.
Rooms have been refurnished recently and generally in good condition. Lack of service staff in swimming and gym area. Reception staff are not as efficient but get things done as a matter of time.
Pleasant. Hotel is located near to Orchard Road,the shopping belt of Singapore. Orchard Road is just 5 minutes walk from hotel.

As the room is too small not comfortable to stay in the room. The male staff (a bit old) at the Reservation counter is not very professional, it took so long to check in. After about an hour waiting in front of the counter finally we got this very small tiny room at the corner of the hotel. The last time, the room we had was much better. Besides it was difficult to get a taxi in front of the hotel. But the Bellman is very helpful and he ordered a Taxi for us. We won't stay next time.
Fantastic...just agoda need to add breakfast including into the rate price for orchard parade with more value of money
Fantastic...just agoda need to add breakfast including into the rate price for orchard parade with more value of money
I was turned off by the smell of the bathroom. I wont stay here again

Room was very clean and comfy. Nice clean and soft king size big. Room had a wide range of cable tv channels for viewing. Good for Couples to have a good rest and relax time. Swimming pool was very small. Minus point for me is that there is no free wifi inside the room. Wifi charges are applied per hour...
