Well, we decided to give Parc Sovereign Hotel a try as we both have never tried any rooms there, granted it was near many art museums or instituions, that wasn't the reason for our stay. Upon check in, i encountered the first hotel that only accepted credit cards for their security deposit, as we never did bring our credit cards out for a night stay, other options too were shot down, such as cash or even debit cards. We spend the next five mins trying to come out with a solution, only to have the receptionist telling us that it was ok. We requested for a late check out at 1 pm which i'll get back to. Housekeeping was of no use as it seemed like when we asked for things at the receptionist, they could just tell us to wait and they gave it to us to bring it up ourselves. We entered our room and immediately, i felt like i was in a better maintained version of a budget hotel. Everything including the wall papers and toilet screamed out budget, the toilet had no doors, which basically wet the whole floor, the walls were so thin that i could hear each time someone came by or was closing their doors or anything. It was really unpleasant, which we opt to be out of the hotel more than being in it. The next day, as we were still sound asleep at 10ish, knowing our check out was at 1pm, my partner was rudely awaken by a receptionist, in which i took over the phone half awake who told us that check out was at 12pm, when i told her, we were given the late check out, throughout the entire time in her robotic voice, she insisted that hotel policy was 12 and the whole card system thing. I told her off and when i believed she saw the late check out memo, she backed off by saying that we had to leave by 1. Overall the room was small, toilet was small and crappily touched up, we quickly checked ourselves out. Do not let the grandeur of the exterior building fool you into thinking it might be a nice and cosy city hotel, cos there are better options along this area of singapore.

i was warmly greeted by front desk janice whose service exceeded my expectation. i was celebrating my anniversary, i didn't ask, she already upgraded my room and said 'congrats on your anniversary, i will see what i can do for u in the afternoon'. i was puzzled by what she said but didn't put it into heart cos front desk staff likes to give empty promises. i was also given a late check out at 2pm which i was so happy about, again i did not asked for it. janice took the initiative. in the evening, room service send us a basket of fresh fruit with a hand-written congrats card . definitely wasn't expecting that. the room is really comfortable, gave us a homely feel but the bed was too tall for me as i was only 153 hahaha, i have to climb up and jump off the bed hahaha... the toileties smells great, and my husband enjoy using the WC which have the function to wash your butt. i like the toilet bowl cos its warmed by heater... if i have the budget, i would love to staycation at this hotel every other week.
my stay was really comfortable the staff looked after me and a friend and the club benifits were a good value for money option would definitly go back to the hotel

Second time in York and certainly not the last time. better than the Elizabeth opposite and cheaper than Quincy. Only if you want to catch a cold or freeze your fingers to the cutlery, have breakfast here or go to the restaurant downstairs. The food cannot be but cold, since the temperature is unsustainable, unfortunately. Just go to a nearby restaurant, and you will be saved.

We were made most welcome. We had flown into Singapore from Paris, during the weekend of the Singapore F1, arriving into Amara at 8.30am and a room was made available thus enabling us to rest sooner. The staff on the front desk remembered us and recalled details we had discussed with them during our previous visit 3 weeks earlier. During our earlier stay we left behind 2 shirts we asked if they had been found and they were returned to our room within 10 minutes of our enquiry. Our stay in Singapore we enhanced by our stay at Amara.

Always good to go back to Amara as it is conveniently located. Not too busy an area and close to public transport which makes the whole of Singapore accessible. Food was readily available downstairs if not at the coffee house, then at the annex of the hotel that had many restaurants. A supermarket has also recently been added to the amenities close to this hotel. The high speed internet was also very good for the required browsing in any travel destination.

The stay had been pleasant, with clean room and comfortable bed and the staff is friendly and helpful. Although the hotel is some sort of isolated located at one corner but it is convenience to get around as it is near to shopping area, food court and also to major transportation hub.

The room, especially the decorative item beside bed and floor is very dusty. Found hairs on the floor. However, bed is clean. The hot and cold water is hard to adjust to appropriate temperature we want. Water running slowly, need long time to finish bathing.
The stay was overall nice, but I just don't like that the room can get so dark because of the yellow lighting
My stay was pleasant, more than pleasant actually. I was so in love with the room, balcony and the toilet! The bathtub is so amazing and there's a tv when you're soaking in the tub! It's fantastic!
the stay was good with moderate cleanliness and great location. The good restaurants were close by.
The stay was wonderful with a few choices for dinning. The only disadvantage is there is a lack of vegetarian food for those who are on vegetarian diet.
I found needles in the carpet of the room. The stay was horrible. Room was not clean.

I guess the only complaint i had was being on aaron carter and justin bieber's level.. It's also another hotel that has smoking rooms allowed, it has one of the most best pools for kids to adults of all ages. The only down part i had from the hotel was that the mini bar was spoilt and i waited foe nearly more than 30 mins, gave up and went for dinner allowing maintenance to change the entire fridge. Housekeeping was also spot on making sure they were not intruding. Time really past fast and it really felt like we didn't have enough to finish doing what we planned. many good restaurants at RWS itself, so there is no need to travel out.. Certainly a hotel that i would revisit once again..
My stay is really great . spend time with my partner feel so good .

We enjoyed our stay at RELC International Hotel, the front office staff members were very helpful and we got a free room upgrade to a triple, as we had two young children, plus a late check-out. Would be good if they can improve the restaurants and have a business center.
over prices! our room looks dirty even after the house keeping.i complained to the counter and they did nothing! very bad experience. i would never come back.

The room is large and the location is great just above Raffles City and City Hall MRT. However, for a hotel like this and at this price the service was way below what it should have been. We had asked for a baby cot to be in the room - no baby cot when we arrived. The baby cot sheet was not replaced other than on request. As a party of 3 we expected and requested 3 sets of towels but housekeeping only left 2 sets every day. Our bath robes were taken with the laundry and not returned. The soap was only replaced on request. The internet is a rediculous $28 per day. When I asked for help with the cases. After 15-20 minutes wait I made 2 journeys and took the bags to checkout myself.
Nothing spectacular really. Bed was alright, pillows were too soft. Room size was good, yet room was not that sound proof
The lobby terrible so old and smelly but the room really nice, and very close to MRT just 3 mins walks
They provide Good customer service but they should provide free internet for guest which staying in the hotel. When I stay at W-Hotel at Sentosa Cove they provide free internet service.

rooms are ridiculously small, bed can only be reached form one side the washbasin is not in the bathroom but in the bedroom. If someone is at the washbasin nobody can pass. Breakfast is a canteen system. There is no frig in the room. Wondering how such a hotel is called 4*
Intern of price, this hotel room rate is reasonable price. Good location just 5 minutes walk to orchard area for shopping Room size is qute good. Have wifi in the room. Bed quite big and comfortable.
Good. No issue at all. The concierge is very attentive, helpful and efficient. The lobby is rather dull, need some uplift. The scent is also too strong.

This hotel has a very good location and right next to the MRT station. It is very convenience for us to travel around. Even taking taxi is not very far away from the central area. The room is clean and has a great comfort level. I shall stay in this hotel again if i travel to Singapore.

I have been staying in this hotel since 2007. Almost in all my trips to Singapore, I have stayed in this hotel. I like the room comfort and cleanliness. Its also just walking distance from Muthafa center makes it very convenient to shop at late hours.
amazing.....i stay there from 27th -30th July. we found it is a perfect hotel in its category.
it was amazing, the price is worthed will coming back soon
Fantastic! We stayed before and after our cruise and would certainly return.
Fantastic! We stayed before and after our cruise and would certainly return.
I did not have warm water in shower & even after complaining 3 times to receptions nobody bothers to even repair. The pillow was very tough and heavy.
Generally OK stay. 10 minutes away from Tanjong Pagar MRT station.
it was mostly good front desk is not well organized wine bar was v good value
Excellent. This is one of the best hotel that we have ever stay in. Love every bit of it. Very helpful staff.
The room was clean but uncomfortably small eventhough we had picked a larger one.
too bad money lose at room, already report police ,stiil wait for answer, the room only 1 cleaner go in ,

The room was not pleasant as it was facing the lower terrace floor. No view of the city nor pool either as requested. Lifts were full all the time and overloaded since one of them was not functional. Waiting time for lifts was long.

It was just okay. Considering the amount that was being paid, definitely can recommend better hotels with better quality. Not enough amenities provided. Small bathroom and floors filled with water once finished shower. The loft room is located further away from the main hotel and it used to be called Parklane. The Aircon blow right in front of your face when you're sleeping. Very small TV. Not very clean room.

Disappointing, not easy to walk to fun area, poor reception, no special feeling when you enter this hotel and pay S$ 800 for 1 night! Hairdryer cord broken and hanging lose on floor in wet area (dangerous)Never again, next time Shangri La on Sentosa
room is old and amall with the money I paid bathroom is too old and should be rebuild to more model style like other hotel I been, even hotel is old but internal is quite model and comfort
Nice room and clean, near MRT station and Bugis Shopping Center
good. only that the air vent in my room was not functioning. :(
was all what I expected High end food good rooms though quite expensive
Great hotel. couldn't fault it. Good value for money.

The only disadvantage was the checkin-time, have to wait 30mins for the room to be ready and for request late checkout, i find it a lil strange that customer have to come down to reception to "validate" the card, as compare to many hotels i've been to, which can be done over the phone. Other than that, The room and pool view was great. Shops and amusement park is nearby and easily to get food past midnite.Staff is pleasant & friendly.

we stayed one night to celebrate my boyfriend's birthday . when we arrived , we were warmly greeted. we were asked to seat at the waiting area. all they asked for was the voucher and our passport . we waited less than 10mins and then the receptionist/personal assistant, syaz was her name . she gave a short tour around the room . very pleasant and soft spoken . there were 5 complimentary pressings. mini bar was complimentary too . the pillows were very comfortable . the shampoo/conditioner and the body shower were excellent quality . the churros we ordered was the best i have ever tasted ! the aircon was perfect . the breakfast spread at the knolls was extremely sumptuous. the service was great , couldnt get thier names coz they had no name tags on . overall, i had a wonderful capella experience .

Excellent hotel, very spacious room with large bath room. very quiet room. Front desk hotel staff are friendly and helpful, attending to your request. Very comfortable bed with extra pillows. provided both standing and bathtub shower. The only disappointment is no free in room internet, only charged wifi. However, they provide Ihome for IPhone user is an additional gadget. Suitable for family with small children stay.

I stayed here Couples of times with my friends and i found this hotel as convenient and near lots of public transportation as well as shopping centers. The staffs are very friendly and helpful for tourists like me
Always a pleasant stay like my three previous times in this hotel. The staff are helpful.
Always a pleasant stay like my three previous times in this hotel. The staff are helpful.
This hotel is closed to city hall and easy access by MRT. We got room with city view and I like it very much.
The hotel staff, including front desk, cleaners etc were fantastic to us. We were greeted by a "good morning" every day without failure. Our room was clean and comfortable.
6 star I don't know why I have to white 50 characters

The best five star hotel experience ever. Huge and luxurious bedroom and bathroom. Just right next to the Universal Studios, Sea Aquarium and Adventure Cove Waterpark. Great service. Free Shuttle bus in the resort world area
everything was nice except it could have been better if the rate we got included breakfast. we found the food portions at their all day dining restaurant a tad "tiny" for the price we had to pay.
TV is horrible, it always stopped for a while. I complainted to the frond desk, but noing is better
tehtejhteuyhttsherhserhreghrdgdrgrdgretgretserte5gergrsgergergersgrgrdgergezrg

It was very busy when we were there, and the rate was hugely inflated due to the Grand Prix. Breakfast was terrible both mornings. We were waiting for cutlery for over 15 mins, despite asking several times. They ran out of food, mugs, juice, plates and they clearly could not keep up with the hotel being full. Very disappointing, especially as we had to pay so much for it.

The hotel is conveniently located in the heart of the city. My experience staying in this hotel was bad. The room that I check-in could not be locked and the bath tub was dirty, with black marks! I had to insist changing the room at the hotel counter. The hotel staff did not apologize at all. I would not recommend this hotel.

my door was open widely when i was back to my room at 11pm. i called the staff and they found out that cleaner forgot to close the door after cleaning. they will give me a good response regarding on this matter after checking with the management. after two days no feed back from them at all. can you imagine that !!! i think this matter is not important to them. as a 3 or 4 star hotel, can you believe that ?

This is the email the General Manager ignored - The guest first checked into a room to discover an infestation of ants in the cupboard and the room in general disarray. He immediately asked for a change in room and was put in a different room. The second room was just as bad, if not worse!! Please allow me to elaborate further on the state he found the room. 1. There were oily fingerprint smudges on the mirror 2. The bedsheet had blood drops on it (blood drops!!!) 3. There were also various stains and long strands of hair on this supposedly clean bedsheet. The guest ended up sleeping at the edge of his bed to avoid all these stains 4. When he wanted to shower, he found a towel thrown over the extremely dirty shower head and he actually washed the entire shower cubicle himself before he took a bath!!! 5. When he wanted to unpack his clothes, he discovered his cupboard shelf covered in dust - so he has been living out of his suitcase, unable to unpack his clothes. I have never encountered such standards in a hotel in Singapore and your hotel for all it's new facade has serious internal issues. I even sent pictures!

Location is great. Rooms r ok n clean but the bedding is old n I could feel the springs in the mattress. That was quite uncomfortable. The bathroom was also showing signs of age but it was still clean.

hotel is under construction the taxi had a hard time to find out where's it located. terrible view looking out construction work. room is very small with bad insulation i can hear the people next door talking

Travelled to Singapore for business staying for one night. Had a very bad night sleep and would not recommend this hotel. Walls between the rooms are quite thin as I could hear the TV next door for most of the night. The most outrageous thing was that some drilling works started around mid night which only stopped after I called the manager. The service in the hotel was also extremely disappointing as nobody took ownership of the issue that the TV was not operational as there was no remote controller. The reception transferred my call to the housekeeping who answered rudely, promised to a replacement but never actually turned up. Overall this was extremely disappointing especially in a world class city like Singapore.
Hotel is unsociable with a Spartan restaurant where the temperature is just above freezing, in short no pleasure in dining at all. No internet at the room

tight bathroom space. toilet bowl was located too close to wall, making it very uncomfortable to sit on. Toilet paper was positioned in a very awkward point. large windows that face a block of flats opposite so there was a lack of privacy. Had to keep curtains drawn. Deposit cannot be made in cash, which was a tad inconvenient.

was given a free upgrade to a suit room due to lack of rooms available, it was huge! was really unexpected as i just wanted to do a short getaway and was provided with this awesome service. It is also cosy and quiet, something you wouldn't expect from a city hotel

It was remarkably unforgettably best experience ever. Great service and luxurious rooms. One of the best five star hotel i have stayed at. Just a shuttle bus away from Universal Studios, Sea Aquarium and Adventure Cove Waterpark. Really enjoyed the stay. The only bad thing is, we didn't have more time to enjoy it. You will never want to leave.

It was a awesome stay I had at Equarius hotel. The room is big, bathtub is big, bathroom is big, clean and nice design, bathroom equip with TV and audio system... and the list goes on. No forgetting to mention, the staff there are friendly and helpful. I had a wonderful stay and will definitely be back. Thumbs up! For the cost you pay, it's definitely worth it!

Our stay at this hotel was absolutely amazing. We did not want to leave! I booked a premier city view and oh my god it did not disappoint, that entire wall was a window and it was so beautiful and just the best thing to wake up to. We stayed at MBS for 2 nights and one of those nights was my boyfriend's birthday and we came back to our hotel room after shopping to find a slice of cake, a candle and matches - this was so lovely of the hotel receptionist who had known when she saw his passport and wished him a happy birthday. Oh and of course, that infinity pool.. breathtaking!!! Such a surreal experience. This hotel made our holiday unforgettable and I recommend it to everyone, such a great location, service and incredible pool - so worth it and will definitely be back again!
it was cherry on the dessert with my stay at marina bay, unforgettable memories
Stupendous experience. Everything was great. I will return very soon.
Took 30 minutes to check in Front counter staff say no room available - reason given the room was not ready Very unhappy and sad for this hotel Would not recommend to friends
there were no particular issues to be mentioned. everything was as expected.
Bed with bed bugs, carpets are dirty, room are not tidy lack of toiletries. Front staff not polite when told them of our issues they simply ignore my wife.
Check in staff is rude and unpleasant and delayed in check-in. The Q is very long and staff seems inpatient.

Our recent stay at the Park Royal on Kitchener Road was a complete disappointment and ruined our 9 day stay in the island city. I made the grave mistake of booking the hotel without looking through all the reviews and found out afterwards that all the negative reviews turned out to be true. The hotel staff is unprofessional and unpleasant to speak with. We were charged twice on the first night at the Spice Brasserie – when I tried to explain that a member of my dining party would like to pay with her UOB credit card, and asked the staff member to cancel the charge to the room, she was very unhappy, said it could not be done, and complain that I had messed up her system! Every morning, we had to wait about 20 minutes to get down to the lobby and the stairway was a fire hazard strewn with old furniture and trash. When I checked in, I was given the key to a room that was already occupied – I found out afterwards that this isn’t the first time it has happened! During our 9 day stay, we spent the first four days waiting around for room change first due to noisy neighbors, then due to a stale, mildewed room that made me ill after 2 nights. When we asked to pay the difference to move to the club floor, we were rudely told us, “Do you know we are fully booked; there are no more rooms” When I asked to speak with the manager, I was told “ Today is holiday you know – he does not work on a holiday!” I do not recommend this hotel to anyone who want a pleasant vacation – there are much better places in Singapore for the same or better price. Do not be fooled by the manager’s response to negative reviews --- read all the reviews, you’ll find there is a history of negative reviews and a history of the manager’s canned response – “I have pass on your feedback …blah blah blah…instead of taking some action.
My bed was not comfortable. Comlpained to manager.nothing done.came home to bad back
Didn't feel like I was staying a 5 star hotel. Poor room service.
Enjoyed it immensely, especially friendly and helpful staff. Will use the Intercontinental Club facility again, where breakfast good. Olive Restaurant menu not extensive but OK.
Disappointing. Rude, tactless front desk officer - MS WANG JIN. Not helpful at all. Was charged for a bucket of ice and even AN ICE BUCKET. Location wise wasn't too convenient either.
V good! Loved it! Would return Construction not too noisy so didn't spoil our stay
Good location, not good breakfast and hotel is old

The hotel just 5 minutes walk from the MRT, Room was clean and the staffs are helpful. We also had free WiFi access. However, there was a riot in this area (Little India) while I stay here. Even we're all safe but I couldn't keep myself from walking a little faster while we were staying here.
Great stay. Hotel deal was unbeatable from Agoda, breakfast and internet included. Would recommend this hotel for a centrally located business hotel.
The stay was great. Was upgraded to a club room as they want to promote the newly refurbish room. As we were driving from Kuala Lumpur, this hotel provide an ample lots for parking at no charges.
I'm very satistify with this hotel in Bugis. It's among the best in Bugis in term of price/4-star hotel. The swimming pool is GREAT ;)

Very good. Near to MRT, reception staff are helpful, value for budget. However, the room service is not so good, we have to remind repeatedly for replenishment of tea/coffee, shampoo, conditioner etc.
Relax, fuss free. Most of the basic stuff neede are all in. Price wise is reasonable.

One of the best hotel in town, and we are pleased that staffs are very helpful and thanks to their Front Office Director mdm Kho as well which is exceptional profesional at her work. Will be back again.
this hotel located near from mt elizabeth hospital, and easy to fing food and shopping centre
Great hotel to stay, convenient location and friendly staff
Good hotel centrally located with just right amenities
Our room was upgraded to a service apartment which was great. We had everything; like a mini home

Booked three rooms for one night stay and one of the room was upgraded to family suite when requested to have an additional bed. Very friendly and efficient front desk staff who attended with warm greetings.Toilet? Bathroom is big and clean but room a little outdated. We had a pleasant stay and will come back again
Great value. The hotel room is nice and spacious. The decor is very minimalist and modern. The rooms are newly renovated. The bathroom is nice as well. The free wifi in the room is a nice service.
1. Check-In was slow due to room-cleaning. 2. Comfortable bed / Well Equip Gym.
My stay was good the rooms are well prepare with its amenities

It is a pleasant hotel with the price i'm paying. Only setback is due to its location in little india hence we got a lot of indian checking in (which i don't really mind). Only they emit a smell which i'm not really comfortable especially in the lobby. However my room was nice and there isn't any smell at all. So i think its good value for money in Singapore.

From the exterior this hotel looks dated and as I understand it has undergone a few name changes. The rooms and the interior are pleasant and welcoming and part of the room I stayed in was refitted with the exception of the drawers and fittings. The toilet and bathroom is adequately sized and this hotel is value for money for many reasons. Firstly,the price you pay for what you get is very fair as it is very central location,quite near to Orchard Road,Bugis... Secondly,since it just across the road from Farrer Park station(a very short walk) it saves you from hailing a taxi(which I must say is very affordable as well) Thirdly,Mustapha Centre is right at the back.There are discounted branded goods to be had here which are cheaper than many outlets elsewhere.

Check in is fast and no hassle on check out too. Located within casino and universal studio makes it very convenient for us. Transportation is easier and convenient for stay in guests. There is also a monorail linking guests to MRT and Vivo City Shopping Mall.
Stay was comfortable and staff were very friendly and helpful
It is ok stay at RELC, but far from MRT. Only take cab or bus.
stay at big hotel was lovely as usual, staff are friendly, rooms are nice
Value for money business hotel. Friendly and accomodating staff

Value of money but need some improvement in service cos during check-in we queue for 30min & it's really very long queue. No rooms available yet at 3:20 & they told us hope you understand cos yesterday is full which is not our problem. During festive season, they must put festive decor like christmas tree Ambiance is also important to customers.
Its more than what I expected with the amount I paid for. The pool is longer & bigger than I expected. 5mins walk away from Bugis village & Bugis junction.
Good, as expected, no complaints, cntrally located, good coffee shop, friendly staff

overall stay is good. the only flaw is its paper thin wall - non sound proof. there were kids staying next to our room, me and mom was awaken by the noise (crying, screaming & shouting) from next door!
Although the check in was a bit slow due to being serve by a trainee, but overall stay is above average, for its cost, the stay is worth.

I enjoyed the stay at PSH. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The hotel is so clean and smells good. At night the area is quiet and serenity peace for sleeping. Accessible to town area and expressway. My first experienced here is unforgettable one with my partner.

nice stay, except the noisy on Christmas eve night. there were a group of Indians partying in the room, they went in and out, gathering on corridor, speaking laughing loudly until around 5am....i think the staff should stop them partying if the people don't behave themselves.

Very enjoyable. Happy with the cleanliness of the room and toilet. The only downfall is the bathtub as it was quite slippery but the standing shower is very nice. Near to MRT, eateries and also supermarket.

Basically the room was nice. Thing that really impressed me is the bed, is extremely comfortable. Thing that dissapointed me is the Operator staff, and i believe she is a Philipino girl. I called in to request for something as in this is actually is an anniversary staycation with my girlfriend, I know this is a very last minutes but she is giving me a feeling that she don't even bother or care what I need. This is very bad service.
Very good environment, close to casinos and entertainment.
1)Good food 2)Easy access 3)Good staff 4)Very clean room 5)Very friendly staff 6)Near shopping complex

Overall, the stay was ok for the price that I paid. However, their service were only mediocre. The room was comfortable and clean. The hotel was easy access to the nearby shopping mall and public transport.

Perfectly fine stay for solo traveller, free internet provided was sufficient for web browsing and checking emails. Hotel is centrally located, although beware there is construction going on next to it, hence the prices are attractive. I didn't mind the noise for 2 nights, it stops at 10pm anyway, so you will sleep comfortably.
i chose this hotel because of the location is easy to reach. and their service is also good. it was really good staying here
Consider good for the money we had paid. small but clean room, just nice for one person stay.
Good staff Clean room nice environment, location good for business travellers
Stayed in this money for many many times whenever it has good deals, which were really value for money. Room is ok size, clean, centrally located in bugis area, most facilities available.
Great, enjoyable and the most important is very value for money and I can watch British Premier League -Live.

The RELC International Hotel is an average 4* property and what you see is what you get, nothing more nothing less. By booking through Agoda we got a good rate for 3 persons sharing a triple bedded room (3 single beds, not rollaway) and we wanted a shower stall you could walk right into and this is what we got. All in all, a good stay for 2 night's.

We were upgraded to a suite for free and it was very beautiful and spacious. Large bathroom with television and everything was there. The living quarter were nice and the king size bed were comfy too.
Affordable price with large room and shopping area in surrounding

Enjoyed our stay here.Rooms small but had all facilities. a good location easy walking distance to shops and restaurants. Suggest the hop on hop off tourist bus if you want to have easy access to attractions. bus stops 5 min from hotel.
Pros : Strategic Location, Valuable Price, and Clean. Cons : Less Soundproof, Someone can hear from outside while we're talking

The hotel is centrally located with easy access to public transportation. Few minutes walk to TG Pagar MRT station. Quite area at night time but quite busy during day time (weekday) due to CBD. Room condition is new and big.

The hotel is centrally located with easy access to public transportation. Few minutes walk to TG Pagar MRT station. Quite area at night time but quite busy during day time (weekday) due to CBD. Room condition is new and big.
Amazing, enjoyed it. Hotel staff were attentive and very friendly. Room was spacious and clean. I'll recommend this hotel.

lovel & amazing hotel with professional, friendly, attentive, efficient & helpful staff & fantastic services. overall services was exceptional!worth for money! nice & comfortable room plenty of space & well appointed. room clean & comfortable bed to sleep on. near chinatown & mrt nearby. free wifi. next to hawker centre & various food to chose from. plenty of restaurants aso nearby.
Happy with the cleaniess of the hotel but the room is a bit small and cramp.
All was great until I took off my shoes, the cove area has a safe deposit box built in, that area is a 90 degrees angle and I kick my toes at the sharp corner.
it's a value for money stay during my visit at the special promotion rate. especially like the comfortable bed and clean bath room.

Our stay in Parc Sovereign hotel was a good one. The room was just enough for my family. Staff were polite and honest. Room is nice and clean and quite. They upgraded my room free of charge because they saw we have a baby. I will definitely come back or recommend the hotel to my friends.
Breakfast sucks and room is surprisingly spaces and clean, will come again.

I would think parc rank as highest among budget hotels in singapore (ie same px but better value vs. 81 or fragnance) but definitely not 4star Its centrally located and for travellers looking for a good internet cafe there's one just two streets down called khakabo

The hotel is kind of Budget hotel but you don't feel budget at all. It has a very comfortable 5 star bed. Compact room with NOT much of hanging facilities for your clothes. No bar fridge in the room. However, there is a convenient store just "2 doors" away from hotel main entrance. Location of the hotel is kind of in the middle of 2 different train stations, in terms of walking distance of 10-15 mins for me.
It's truly a value for money considering that this hotel is located right at the heart of the city with standard comfort expected.
It's truly a value for money considering that this hotel is located right at the heart of the city with standard comfort expected.

Positive Side * Clean Room, Secured, Fast Respond from staff when i had issue with door card, very quiet room even though it just on Level 4 considering the hotel is just beside the main road. Easy access to centrally located MRT station For Improvement * Free wifi internet access speed * Was not clear on the free bottle of mineral water avail. Better clarity would be great

Our stay was very pleasant and comfortable. We were in close proximity to Bugis MRT station which made it easy to travel around Singapore. We were also close to Bugis Street Market and the Albert Centre Hawker which meant that the walk to the hotel from the MRT was always interesting, and it also meant cheap dinners and snacks! Our favourites included the $3 hainanese chicken rice, Popeye's, $1 fruit shakes and $1 ice cream sandwiches. The room was always clean and had adequate toiletries. It was equipped with a TV, fridge, universal plugs, kettle, tea and coffee, and complimentary water. Internet was fast. Staff were friendly and helpful. We had a great stay here and we would definitely come back.

Our stay was very pleasant and comfortable. We were in close proximity to Bugis MRT station which made it easy to travel around Singapore. We were also close to Bugis Street Market and the Albert Centre Hawker which meant that the walk to the hotel from the MRT was always interesting, and it also meant cheap dinners and snacks! Our favourites included the $3 hainanese chicken rice, Popeye's, $1 fruit shakes and $1 ice cream sandwiches. The room was always clean and had adequate toiletries. It was equipped with a TV, fridge, universal plugs, kettle, tea and coffee, and complimentary water. Internet was fast. Staff were friendly and helpful. We had a great stay here and we would definitely come back.
although I stayed only for 1 night, it was enjoyable and hassle-free. bedroom was large and amenities were adequate
The hotel is quite good. If you are travelling on a very tight budget this might be the best hotel to stay compares to other similar price hotel. I'll definitely be back again.

Excellent We were greeted by very friendly and professional staff. Location of the hotel was quite central. marina bay, orchard, sentosa, and many other attractions were very close. surrounded by low end and high end restaurants.
Value for money/ very near to Orchard/ Value for money/ very near to Orchard/

our stay was pleasant and nice. thanks to arshad for facilitating our early check-in and giving us a room free from noise. special mention also to celeste who made us feel at home whenever we see her during breakfast time.

it's value money for singapore hotel, big room, location 15min walks to orchard. but lacks in room equipments, hotel sandal are not available. first time i got a room with broken shower. but the service is fast and its well maintain. they offer another room but i guess not necessary because the problem quick solved.
i like the hotel staff in very great helpful and friendly . room is big and clean . hotel environment is silent and clean .. definitely i will come back again if visit singapore .
i stayed there becos of the SC marathon. i booked last minute ard SGD167++ and it walking distance to the start point and importantly free parking.
Room size is very small but clean. Good location.
Very good. I was there on business so needed to be close to the MRT, have free fast Wifi access in my room and be able to have a good nights sleep. The hotel delivered on all counts.

we had a pleasant stay in the hotel.It is accessible to many historical buildings,malls and eateries either by walking or taking public transportations..the feedbacks that we do have is that the room that was given to us faces directly to the construction site......though the sound did not really bother us but still the view of the crane is a little disturbing.Perhaps for compensation due to the construction,the price of the rooms that are facing the ongoing construction site should be a little more cheaper .Another thing to mention ,there is a little damp smell from the carpet along the alley outside the rooms.Hopefully the management coud do something about it.

Staff are very attentive and they have initiative. It was my anniversary n they had prepared some surprises that I didn't expect for it! Staff can anticipate my needs and even questions. Just that bathroom is rather small and no bathtub.
Very average, hotel is small, need to use 2 lifts to get to your room.

This hotel is a typical city hotel, but much too expensive for the average quality. Superior rooms are dated but OK. The main issue is that these rooms do not have WIFI. The hotel provides a LAN cable + expensive daily package of course. H'ever LAN not useable in many laptops in 2013. So the lobby is packed with business people and tourists literally sitting on the floor or benches trying to get connected. This is a rather pathetic scenario in a first world country like Singapore and, as a business traveller, I would not recommend the Carlton on that basis. PS. Do not order the spaghetti carbonara.

The only good thing about this hotel is its great location being above mrt station. Only stayed for one night, but already experienced a really bad bad service. It took 4 phone calls and waited for almost 2 hours for them to send me an iron and iton board. No apologies, nothing. Never coming back! For what i paid, its totally not value for money.
it was very pleasant, checking in was a breeze. all the staffs were very helpful & friendly.
Happy to stay at Ibis Hotel will stay again if they have promotion again hope the rates for promotion can include breakfast in future overall everything is good
Great. I really love and view. and the MBS Shoppes is still one of my favourite shopping malls.
Very good and comfortable room, and next to grocery store.

Very pleasant. The room size is perfect. Walking distance to Orchard rd and very close to Mount Elizabeth. There is a bit of problem with the customer service when checking in. The time was not reasonable and the stafffs are kinda slow in processing our requests. Otherwise the stay was great.
It if very comfirtable and convenience for business or shopping persons. And it is not expensive but clear, large, wifi free and very easy to call a taxi.
very comfortable, due to tourist peak season, the Hotel is short of twin room, I was upgraded to the Garden view room. over all stay is good with friendly staff.

A very pleasant stay with friendly staff. As I was travelling alone, I felt very safe. The Marina and attractions are within easy walking distance, as is Orchard Road for shopping. Public transport is very close should you require it. I would definitely stay at the Carlton again and would recommend it to family and friends.

I was in Singapore for business and Rendezvous Grand Hotel was perfect for me. Public transport was very accessible, while I could also choose to walk. The room was very comfortable. I enjoyed my stay.

It was an extremely good hassle-free stay. The hotel was perfect not only for the older children but for my senior citizen mother as well. It was very accessible to all points of interest. Taking the MRT was a breeze for the kids, and so were all the taxi rides for the seniors. The staff was friendly and accommodating, and the concierge and the doorman were especially helpful.
There is nothing negative about my experience with this hotel. I would gladly stay again.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Nothing to complain about at all.

We were too early for checking in, so we had to leave our luggages in store room as we had many activities to do in resort world. We booked two rooms actually, but we've been upgraded to two bedroom suite which is very huge and luxury. We were very happy. The room is very clean, nice design, great service, and perfect for family with young children. We will go back again for sure..

Once I was given the correct room, (I was given a twin room instead of the King room I expected), the stay was comfortable. The bed is nice and I had a good night sleep. My stay was only 1 night so I was unable to assess other aspects.
Excellent., staff very friendly and helpful. Location very central. Restraints very good

Helpful, efficient and knowledgeable staff. Excellent location near all modes of transport. Beautiful lobby. Good variety of food/restaurants. Clean, neat room. The room rates were a bit high. Should include breakfast. We enjoyed our stay. Will recommend to all.
Comfortable, helpful, enjoyable. A good choice for us well located close to the MRT and with easy access to the delights of Singapore
Very nice hotel as it's the most comfortable and luxurious in Little India area. Very close to Mustafa 24hr superstore. All day and night dining are available close by especially for Indian food
Very enjoyable, no complaints, staff were very informative regarding local attractions and public transport.
Very comfortable, convent , good value for money paid, staff of a high quality

I was check in too earlier, room not yet ready, so I leave my luggage and go around to keep my work done and get back in the evening, the room is small but nice, the amenites suit 4 star hotel & bed was very convenient, strong shower & high speed internet connection and of course HD channel in every room.
impressive hotel, near to 7 eleven and supermarket

Very comfortable. My room was right next to the pool, which also has a playground area, and made me want to bring my family next time. The room itself was crowded by the large, clean and comfortable bed - this was fine for one night. Ensuite was also clean and pleasant. About 20 minutes and 15Singapore dollars to the airport early the next morning, before traffic, although I'm told it can take three times as long, depending on traffic conditions. Two trains and a ten minute walk by public transport.
My stage was brief but very comfortable and I booked Concorde on my return journey.

Though our staying is only 1 night, however we had a very comfortable time there. The room is nice, location is so convenient, breakfast is great, and good city view. From this hotel, we can walk to the shopping mall to buy surveniors, and also walk to the great mosk. It is also very near to Orchard and Marina, it takes only 10 minutes by MRT. Next time when we come to Singapore, we will definitely choose InterContinental Singapore.
Short but good stay, staff were efficient and helpful. Hotel is clean and tidy
A very relaxing and comfortable stay. Unfortunately did not get a late check out time. But overall was a good experience. Syed the staff at front was very friendly and helpful.
Very pleasant. Will likely go there again when in SIN

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at this hotel. The staff were very friendly. the rooms are large. very friendly staff. Internet was very fast. so, overall stay was good. The food was not very tasty at times. Another thing I didn't like was that when we reached at the hotel, it was early in the morning. Although the hotel staff could see that my mother was not well, yet she told me that there were no rooms left for us to check in early.
really nice stay, very comfortable rooms and very peaceful.

My family and I had an enjoyable stay in Equarius Hotel. This is the first hotel which offers us a spacious room with great fantastic harbour front view. Furthermore, it is well located where we can visit the places of interest conveniently. We will definitely stay in this hotel again.
it was a very memorable stay expecially its closest to Little India and convenient.

There was a flash sale when i purchased this stay hence, it was really value of money. the best hotel in RWS, very comfortable with nice, quiet, surroundings. theres also free shuttle service to the other parts of RWS so its not a problem.

I spent four pleasant nights at this hotel. The bedding and pillows were clean and very comfortable, the TV had regular TV programs as well as DVD movies. The best and unusual part of this hotel was the free loan of an ipad and free wifi in the room. The personnel was efficient, helpful and pleasant. But note that the room is small, without closet nor shelf space, therefore may not be adequate for those who require more space for luggage or to hang their clothing (two hangers provided).
very large room and comfortable bed high standard cleaning and room service very friendly staff and always ready to help This will be the hotel we stay next time when we go to singapore

Hotel is centrally located near to business center, shopping malls (right on Orchard Road!) it is also near to the MRT if you need to travel by train on the bus stop is right in front of the entrance of the hotel.the hotel is also close to some nice restaurants and shopping malls, which makes it easy to get a bite or to do your shopping. For the ardent shoppers - it's right on The Orchard road - so make sure you start your day early & wear a real nice comfortable sandals or shoes - lots of walking is imminent!!!

Hotel is centrally located near to business center, shopping malls (right on Orchard Road!) it is also near to the MRT if you need to travel by train on the bus stop is right in front of the entrance of the hotel.the hotel is also close to some nice restaurants and shopping malls, which makes it easy to get a bite or to do your shopping. For the ardent shoppers - it's right on The Orchard road - so make sure you start your day early & wear a real nice comfortable sandals or shoes - lots of walking is imminent!!!

I like staying at this hotel because it is conveniently located ie shopping,public transportation. But we were given a handicap room with their facilities which we were advised upon check in due high volumes. It was a bit intimidating but d room was nice nice.

Enjoyed our stay at the hotel although there were 2 issues during our stay. Bathroom door locked whilst I was inside and maintenance had to remove handle to open the door. Air conditioning in other room failed, was replaced but still didn't work. Were without air conditioning for 2 days.
Easy access to nearby local shops and malls, mrt station. Good staff and services
Great, facilities are great, not a large hotel so it has a personal feeling.

In general the stay was quite excellent. The service is more friendly than several years ago. The swimming pool is now accessible from all 3 towers. The staff at concierge are warm, nice and efficient. While the house keeping staff are a little bit harsh.
The Goodwood was a wonderful place to stay. Loved the very large room size. It was a very relaxing place. Close walking distance to Orchard road. We enjoyed the history of the Goodwood.
The only set back is the slow elevators. Even if they are 3 all of them are so slow

It is very convenicen to shopping or do business. And the hotel is not very expensive but room is big, wifi is good, and service is excelent. Expecially transports have many choice, taxi or bus or MRT.

I would recommend this hotel for the central location because it's just 5mins from MRT. The clean room and helpful staffs really made me a convenience to stay. Free of charge for fast internet is really great indeed for the traveller.

It was a memerable experience, hotel is located on top of the hill with very nice view and embiance, close to Resorts World @ Sentosa. Room is nicely set up with morden equipments and facilities. Hotel straff are very friendly.
Good location, easy to find. It is connected to Lavander MRT station.
Great time with friends on Aikido Seminar. Many great food options within walking distance and convenient to city area for sightseeing, shopping and attractions.
It was very convenient for me because it was very near from MRT station. And i appreciate the great service from the staffs

overall, this hotel is good. Room was nice, spacious and clean. but twin beds too small. Hotel restaurant a little too costly for what it offered. Hotel is located with walking distance from the metro station and just in front of a mall where you can find a variety of local restaurants at convenient prices.
very convenient hotel, will definitely stay again on my next trip
We enjoyed staying in Resorts World Sentosa. The attractions and food street is fine. But no free wifi.
Good location n great staff with lots of shopping n food mrt is just 5 mins walk. Love the hotel

Satisfactory but not outstanding. Room has one very strange problem that I have never encountered in a hotel before. There is no light or light switch by the bed. You have to get out of bed and cross the room in order to turn lights on or off. Take a flashlight if you stay here!

The room has a nice view of Marinan bay and pool. The negative part of this hotel is that the room is quite old, toilet was small with no separate bath and tub, also charging of internet access per device was expensive.

Efficiencly and friendly reception staff made checking in a pleasant experience. Hotel located in a very convenient location. Enjoyed the overall experience except for the absence of a casual dining restaurant like a coffee house. Have to go into a restaurant to have lunch. Not convenient if needing to dine alone.

Enjoyed the stay, great location with link from lift straight to B3 to MRT station. It is very convenient. The cable tv has room for improvement. It hang quite often. Enjoyed the complimentary coffee very much, also great view from bay window at 21 floor where I stayed. The staff is friendly. But the making of room is not efficient. I left the room before 8am and indicate to make up room. However, when i returned at 1pm, the room is still messy and there is mo sign of cleaning staff. The bathroom is great! I love the glass panel of the shower.

I had a great stay, The location is superb near Arab St and Bugis. The staff are excellent from check in through to the bell desk. Well done ! I will stay there every time now and i have stayed at alot of SG hotels.
have absolutely no complaints. It was a good experience.

I enjoyed my stay too bad its only for 1 night! Slept very well on the comfortable bed. The merlion is just few blocks away and I could find lotsa food at the RafflesCity shopping mall nearby. MRT station also very near. Airport is just 20mins drive away.

The staff were very welcoming, and always very friendly and eager to help us out with minor things (carrying bags, hailing taxis, etc). The room was beautiful, very well cleaned each and every day, with an amazing view overlooking the fire station. We found our room to be very quiet, only occasionally hearing other guests, or the busy intersection outside. We only ate at the buffet restaurant twice, but I wish we'd had breakfast there daily, as it was very good value. Lots of delicious choices, and the service was excellent. The location was perfect for us, as it was very close to a lot of attractions that we were interested in. Chinatown, museums, Clarke Quay, Raffles Hotel and many restaurants and shops were in very close walking distance. Others are a bit further though (Orchard Road, Marina Bay), but this didn't bother us, as we were fine with walking. However, the hotel is very organised and any time we did want to catch a taxi, we waited no longer than five minutes to get one. Overall, this hotel was a major factor in our enjoyment levels, and my partner and I were both very impressed with the interior, the service and friendliness of the staff, and our room. I will definitely look to the Grand Park franchise when I plan another trip.

The room was damn, old and dark. Electricity was cut twice Badly maintained Bed linen wet Far from the main building, pools and breakfast This section is not the main part of the Goodwood which is very different, luxury and well maintained
I was very impressed with the Goodwood park Hotel. The staff were exceptional and from check in to check out it was an enjoyable stay.
Very enjoyable, staff was excellent not very impress with the bathroom especially with the shower and the rooms were quite small overall was excellent
Very good
could not fault the hotel or the staff at all as they where so helpful and accomadating in every aspect of our stay
Excellent, quiet, staff very helpful. Room well set out and comfortable.
Excellent, quiet, staff very helpful. Room well set out and comfortable.
just about catered for my needs for a 2 night stay
Great location, great staff, mini bar is free. Very helpful concierge, very near ion shopping mall and lucky plaza

It was very good. It is a professional hotel and well managed. when I had a problem of switching on the coffee kettle, the concerned person reported in a matter of minutes to look into. Unfortunately, I had just one day stay there and hence did not use many facilities there. The bell desk had been very courteous and efficient. I had needed their help as our flight was in the evening and we had to check out by 1300 hours. The experience was very good.
I stayed only one day, therefore I have no experience about food, but I can say it is a friendly hotel, fair rates, good staff.
Good all around experience with very friendly malaysian staff. Location of the hotel was extremely convenient to do anything.

A great old colonial hotel that evokes the past of Singapore. My wife and I stayed for a night during our honeymoon and experienced fantastic service - even an upgrade to a junior suite! The room was very nice, with a view of the more private pool. The afternoon tea was excellent, if not a little high priced. The only issue and it is a small one - is that the bed was incredibly hard.
my only negative.. during happy hour cool drinks are full price (and at $10 a small can of lemonade a little expensive
Was ok, last time I had a much better room for the same price? However, I enjoyed the stay
Glad that the room is so spacious to fix 4 in one room. It is also centrally located in the heart of Orchard Area and within shopping area.
all okay except slow check in and out and why must complete min 50 characters, do you expect travelers to write nonsense.
The hotel was very nice,room was nice,lovely view but the hotel little bit old and the lift was slow.
overall im very satisfied, except for the toilet has old design
The stay was very good and comfy. Rooms were very clean and tidy. Would recommend it to all my friends travelling to Singapore.

superb,really had a great time.did my shopping by walking to the shopping centers. lots of good shopping malls and good restaurents. went to some good night clubs near the hotel.a very good friendly staff and they are speaking english very well.very cleanand the room service is very fast. lots of channels to watch when relaxing. sports channels are also their. i enjoyed the stay very much. definetely gonna stay at mandarin orchard next time also. cheers
All positive apart from no knowledge of swimming pool, gym and sauna being closed for renovation prior to arrival. A bit walking distance to the nearest MRT station and expensive bar.
a big room, nice view, nice buffet, and big bathup

Overall, I enjoyed the hotel. I was told by a family member that the large company he worked for put up some of their best clients here. And sure enough, most of my expectations were met. The design of the building was like an older club building, but the inside has been renovated and is quite delightful. I enjoyed the two pools, and it has a passable fitness center. I especially liked the service and getting wake up calls at the right time is important. The front desk even followed that up with a personal call to the room. Also they were spot on as far as reserving early morning cabs. The Chinese restaurant and even the more general café had excellent food, but was very pricy. Even the continental breakfast was 28 Sing dollars, the buffet, more than 35 sing dollars. I recommend ordering off the menu. I was able to get my eggs,bacon and toast with juice- all that I needed for $16 sing dollars. They cleaned the room each day and brought up an ironing board and iron when I requested. In the US, most rooms come equipped with one, but I only needed once. The big issue I had was finding a working electrical outlet in my room. There was only one in the bedroom, and I could plug my I phone into another in the bathroom. I found two others, which were on two different sides of the closet inside. A little like hide and go seek. Overall, the dim sum restaurant was one of the best I have experienced at a hotel. I visited it twice, and it was worth the splurge. I also had Peking Duck there, and it was great. I recommend the hotel as a great place to stay, especially with the pool. Its a 15 minute walk to the MRT, but near enough to good shopping on Orchard Rd. But its a $7 cab ride to most places and that can add up especially at night when there is a surcharge that almost doubles the fare. But in Singapore, you pay for what you get, and this was very good experience without having to really having pay top dollar for a four or five star tourist hotel.

Very good, lovely big hotel, ideal for shopping and centrally located on orchard road. Swimming pool small, breakfast very good and dinner too if want but makes sense to eat out as many good eating establishments close by.
Very pleasant stay. Well located, great staff. Spacious room. Comfortable bed.
I like this hotel, it only took a few minutes to many public transport.wife
Wifi signal was weakness. Can't connect wifit in the room
unforgettable stay, access every thing easily & prefer will come again. Thanks
Well located close to public transport (MRT), shopping, restaurants and Orchard Road. Staff are friendly and efficient, and all restaurants were excellent.
First time at this hotel and I was pleased with everything. Rooms are OK, the rooftop bars and restaurants may be expensive - but do it - you wont regret the experience.
A very comfortable hotel. The room is very clean, room cervices very fast, big pool and close to a park.
Clean room
Very good. Few issues but they were swiftly sorted. Would go back
Very comfortable and convenient. The rooms are large and the bed is very nice
location, taxi and money exchange. Mustafa Center is near by
2min from the metro. easy to approach everywhere including airport. Have food center nearby. Confortable room. But no free wifi.
very good location. but rate was slightly on the high side

Excellent hotel, very spacious room with large bath room. very quiet room. Front desk hotel staff are friendly and helpful, attending to your request. Very comfortable bed with extra pillows. provided both standing and bathtub shower.
Very good located hotel, friendly staff, clean room, fast wifi internet
Fantastic. Large clean rooms.Price could have been lower. Prefect location. Close to shopping area and MRT.
i like the hotel but the breakfast where strange.in most of hotel that are buffe breakfast u can look what u want to eat.
Our stay overall was excellent the only one item I would say is that the breakfast was quite limited, in a cramped room and very busy.
the gym is a bit small, there are two construction sites right next to the hotel which is a bit annoying.
Very good stay. My daughter was having a high fever and they let me have a late check out at 4pm so she could rest and leave for our night flight. Very considerate management

It was very pleasant. A comfortable, well designed room ( a little too small for two people) but very cozy. Felt connected with the city and the hotel's homeliness did support me and my family in our everyday itineraries. Love to stay there again and would recommend it to friends.
I had a great time. Staff has 100% customer service approach. It's a great location for shopping and major attractions.
Very good, very helpful staff…I was in town for a medical visit and felt comfortable all around.
Goodwood Park Hotel is a Palace in itself, Good comfortable rooms, friendly staff

Very good. Room was clean. The pricing of the room per night per stay is very affordable and reasonable. The hotel is well designed and many amenities around it. Popular nightspots are also just ten minutes away from it. The size of the room was also acceptable for its price. Definitely will return to stay again.

The staff was friendly. Checking in and out was a breeze. The hotel is centrally located and very accessible by all modes of transport. The room was huge and clean. The price of the room per night was also reasonable and affordable. We will definitely be back to stay again.
Room clean, the hotel near on Orchard road and comportable for children
Room clean, the hotel near on Orchard road and comportable for children
Very impressive service from the staff. Location is great. Many restaurants to choose from around the hotel.
Hotel is very nice and clean. Rooms are large with big sofa. Breakfast is very nice with variety of food. Hotel is located on Orchard Rd. very close to all shopping places.
close to a lot of resto and bar, near famous soup tulang
This was a superior hotel in a great location. The staff were as friendly as could be and very accommodating. I would recommend to anyone looking for a cozy yet chic stay in the city.

The is a nice hotel with very new and nice decoration. The room size is acceptable, but no free Wi-Fi provided. The breakfast is very good, but the customer service is not good enough. The staff reject our request for earily check-in. This hotel is very near the train station and Unverisal Studio and S.E.A Aquarium and Water Adventure Park.
The best quality and valued hotel i had ever been stay in Singapore. surrounded by lots of restaurants and shoppings
Had a pleasant stay!! Good value, clean, large and comfy room, very good service, and very good location

It was a nice hotel to stay in. Near to shopping area. Easy access to the casino. Easy access to public transport with the mrt and bus. Infinity pool offered the best view of Singapore. Disappointed with the sky bar as it was not covered and have to run for cover when it rains. Nice view from hotel room and can see gardens by the bay.

Every time I travel to Singapore, I stay at InterContinental Singapore Hotel. I like the location very much because is next to shopping mall. The room is big and comfortable. The breakfast is very nice and with variety of fresh fruit juice.
Strategic location near little India, just several steps from Mustafa, many Indian food options (inc halal food)
this hotel very nice for take a rest , good location for shopping area
very nice hotel i stay lots of time in this hotel in center location good hotel
It was great, surrounded by many nice restaurants and bars. The rooms were nice and the staff were very nice and helpful as well!
Good, nice room, good size, clean rooms. Nice pool, friendly and attentive staff. Lots of eateries nearby, also small mall downstairs and supermarket, very convenient.
Good, nice room, good size, clean rooms. Nice pool, friendly and attentive staff. Lots of eateries nearby, also small mall downstairs and supermarket, very convenient.
Quite good, clean room, good staff. Shuttle bus regularly to shopping districts

We spent a night in Equarius Hotel to celebrate our anniversary. The hotel is located in lush and green surroundings. It's located far away from the hustle and bustle of the city. We enjoyed the stay starting from the time we checked in until checked out. The room itself is huge. The bathroom is also huge, which includes his and hers wash basins, a bathtub that can easily fit 2, a shower cubicle and toilet cubicle. The room has a balcony overlooking the Sentosa Adventure Cove and Harbourfront. Shuttle bus is provided that ferries hotel guests to all other hotels and Universal Studios in RWS. One downside of the hotel is that the variety of TV channels could be improved.

The hotel was excellent. A good place to relax an enjoy your stay. Good clean room, excellent staff, good food. The hotel is very strategically located makes it easy to go shopping and attend business matters.
It is very near the famous chicken rice restaurant and the shopping mall. The room is clean and modern. The kids loved staying there.
Very nice hotel with good location. You can just walk to go to orchard road. Clean and large room. Nice staff and very helpful.
very comfortable and nice hotel, near shopping center
All very good, nice people clean room, central location, good value for Singapore these days….hard to find a decent place for under $100 US anymore. Already booked my next visit with this hotel.
So far so good, however, i still prefer Mandarin Orchard for the food.
The location was good, close to the temple, MRT etc. Hotel surrounding with plenty of food stalls and Sim Lim Sq in just nearby

It was Ok, nothing impressive. The room is very small but at least bigger than The Bay Hotel. Price is reasonable for bugis area. The staff is standard, looks like want to rush us even talking also very fast. Easy to get taxi and close to shopping center. Lots of food of course!

The Room is Good, The Staff services is very good and the Location is excellence Next the Hotel is Black Angus Steak Resto, and near the hotel is also Hard Rock Cafe, and when you straight walking the pedestrian you will find the Orchard Centre.

Just great!!! Centrally located, within very short walking distance to shopping Ã¡rea and great dining experiences nearby the hotel. Just the perfect place to stay at for an affordable price in a city like Singapore.
very nice hotel it makes you feel like u are wery far away from singapore fod are very nice to look at and presented exelent but Disapoints on flavor
nice room with morden deco and cozy. small bathroom and very expensive car park fees
Great stay. Swimming pool superb for kids. Rooms are big and bed very comfortable

The stay was good. Very polite and professional staff an the front. The location is also very good. Nice bars just opposite the hotel. You can notice the room is very old already. The bed sinks in the middle and I have a bad sleep throughout.

The stay at this hotel is a pleasant one. The room is very nice and comfortable. The service is good. Very good location as it is very near bugis junction and MRT. Will definitely come back again. Totally impressed.
I enjoyed the stay that's why I kept extending the stay in the same hotel

I want to stay this hotel. So I say to my friend to book for room 6 night stay. Very nice and my son also happy in this hotel room number 2022. I also happy this hotel because I always contact with my business at internet wifi. Thanks Peninsula Excelsior Hotel minzawpe@gmail.com Min Zaw Phay Myanmar
So Comfort to stay at Village Hotel Bugis By Far East Hospitality
very good. We stayed in BIG Hotel two days earlier due to an earlier booking and itinerary. the only thing that BIG Hotel has over this is better TV.
A-1 fantastic. Will come back next time I'm in Singapore
Very good stay at Mandarin Orchard. Enjoyed chicken rice at Chatterbox.
I LOVE THIS HOTEL!! this is the best hotel in Singapore. only few steps to Bugis Junction.

We find the stay pleasant and comfortable. The room although dated was clean. There was a free daily newspaper service and iced water ( with slices of orange) was provided in the lobby. That was handy and much needed because of the weather. The concierge was helpful. There is a shopping complex next to the Excelsior side of the hotel known as Funan which sells and repairs computers, mobile phones etc which we found very handy. We have a iphone 3 and the glass shattered. To replace it in Australia would cost between $70-$80 AUD but we got it replaced for $35 SGD.City Hall MRT was about 5 mins walk away.
Had a very pleasant stay at Grand Park Orchard hotel as usual, stayed there several times and always enjoy it. Staff and service are excellent and so is the hotel and it's location .
Trouble free and good service provide by the front desk staff
I would love to stay in the hotel again someday
real good experience....nice hotel,......friendly staff.....and centrally located
No problems, nothing outstanding ,service was average. Overall was good.
Very good. Very disappointing wifi internet.Very friendly staff.
stay was good. great value for money. check in and out was very fast, room as lovely, had a free upgrade to a big room with a bathtub

Had short stay there to attend conference at a nearby location. Very conveniently located on the city close to transport, bus and rail. Can book an airport shuttle bus with a Couples of hours notice. Two levels of breakfast, full buffet and quick continental, reasonable price. Walkin room rate is as good as you can get online. Close to shops and Bugis Street. Would stay again
the staffs were polite & helpful, the hotel is well maintained and in good condition. ver near to city mall shopping & cinema
very satisfactory,great breakfast,friendly staff and beyond expectations

my stay was very fantastic. this hotell is centrally located near orchard area. You can walk to the mall not too far. the room is large for this affordableprice. good for business travellers and family
wonderful stay with my husband, we enjoyed every moment, strategic location to nearby shopping and food and dining also to attractions. We will sure come back.
No complain on its facilities, services and other

Had short stay there to attend conference at a nearby location. Very conveniently located on the city close to transport, bus and rail. Can book an airport shuttle bus with a Couples of hours notice. Two levels of breakfast, full buffet and quick continental, reasonable price. Walkin room rate is as good as you can get online. Close to shops and Bugis Street. Would stay again
Very good. Clean, comfortable and well catered for. Old colonial building that has been looked after. Amazing staff.

very poor due to booked and even sent a request for a non smoking room and we were put into a smoking room for one night and them was moved to a non smoking room for one night. the smoking room stunk and i was feeling very sick and still do.very very upset and even asked to up grade and was denied.

Not good at all. Despite old parents being there and booking done 4 months before, the rooms were given in different floors. Daily house-keeping was not done at all. Used spoons, plates etc were not washed and left like that itself. Very unfriendly staff. In one room the bed was so high that my parents couldnt even climb it.

We had a great time here in Ramada. Staffs are really nice and helpful. It's 20 to 30 mins away from the airport. Although it is not right at the city centre, it not far to get to the popular attractions. Shuttle bus to the nearest MRT is available very 20 to 30 mins which is very convenience for us. Gym and swimming pool are also available at the hotel if needed.

This hotel is verg recommended, especially for shopping-lover. Located in the heart of orchard rd which easily access to public transport.. the room is also very cozy, surely will come back again to this hotel :)
We will back again to this hotel if we visit Singapore. Amara is a good hotel, with attentive staff, clean room, and nice swimming pool.

Very recommended! The rooms are very nice. Very clean and fast wifi. Very close to mrt since you only need to go to basement level. There are some nice restaurants and shopping area. The staffs also very helpful and friendly
This was our fifth visit to Goodwood Park. We find it an excellent place to break up our trip from Australia to England and find it a quiet Oasis in busy Singapore. We will use the hotel again.

Air-conditioning too cold. Many TV channels out of order. Appearance of property is important to me as an ex-hotelier. Looking down at the pool area from the room, I see a utility building next to the pool (Orchard Road side)the roof of which needs re-painting, as well as many coconut umbrellas that need re-thatching. The bathroom basin faucet needs re-aligning. Also I suggest to Agoda that hotel management respond in some ways to guests filling in these Customer Service comments, to give a personal touch and to show that they appreciate constructive criticism, otherwise one feels ignored and filling in future comments seem pointless.
Very good,but internet connection was poor,kept switching me from "guest" to "student" & then losing the connection.Staff at reception were most helpful,but this issue was beyond their control.
Though not so new, this hotel is excellent in terms of location, cleanliness and relaxed ambiance. The wifi and internet services were spotty at times but the breakfast buffet was satisfying.
Value for money and free minibar. Not many hotels provide free minibar.
Value for money and free minibar. Not many hotels provide free minibar.

This was my 3rd stay at this hotel. Booked Superior for three adults and end up with free upgrade to Deluxe Family for 4 persons. The room was so spacious, more bigger than our last Premier room. Great breakfast and helpful staff. Fast check in and out, but long queue during this process since only 2 staff manage this job, this happen to me during all my 3 stay.

It is located in Little India area. MRT Little India is only 2 minute walk, and there are many restaurants near the hotel. The hotel is not located on main street so it is quiet at night. The room is clean and the swimming pool is nice. I also got free internet ticket for all of my days of stay which was very nice.

Even tough we stayed one night, it was not the best experience we had so far. Tiny rooms, no decoration, bathroom you had to squeeze into, and very rude breakfast restaurant manager but were not interested anyway.

We didn't expect the small room for the price we paid. Very disappointing for us.u We did mention that one of us was on a wheelchair but they didn't give us a bigger room. So it kinda difficult for us to enter the room with our wheelchair. The room got more stuffy with the wheelchair and with our luggage. Mind you, we couldn't even unpack due to the limitation of the room and everything there. One more thing, although the location is in the well known Bugis area, not all taxi drivers know Parc Sovereign Hotel. Better give the complete address to the taxi driver to check in their GPS. That's what we did.
We had a very relaxing stay and were well looked after by the very professional staff
I enjoyed it very much. Hope to stay here again in the future.

Based on feedback from my kids, this is the best vacation ever!!! Will repeat to come here for sure. They really love the swimming pools. And the best part is, it is located near to many attraction such as USS, Admiral Cove & SEA Aquarium and near to MRT station as well. But....it's really hard to get Halal food & the toilets are not "Muslim" friendly.

Let's just say that the website oversells this hotel, which is not really a hotel at all, but an educational conference centre which also houses large rooms with beds in them. That's about it. Not so much no frills as what do you mean by frills?

Request a king bed room and but no balcony then call recept and explain that we have a baby and and we are smokers.. we got a switch within 10mins to a balcony room.. thumbs up for them.. but its was twin bed.. then wife and i decide stick to balcony room.. balcony very small.. toilet with no doors.. alot of sharp edges... its really a big turn dowm... should try festive hotel instead..
enjoyed every moment in hotel. we shall definitely recomend and share our experience to our relatives and friends and shall surely return on our first opportunity to singapore.
Had wait in a queue for breakfast.. Room condition was not good..
Room too small . Bathroom size can be compared to the B grade hotels in Tokyo . For the price we paid I'd give it a just above zero
My kids in Love with this hotel, very recommended

We really enjoy our stay in oasia. The room is comfortable with good size. Clean and modern bathroom. Complete room amenities. The bed quality is excellent. Located above MRT station, we are very comfortable to go anywhere in singapore. The internet is at good speed. Unfortunately we are a bit disturbed by a housekeeping staff that cleaned our room even when we were still inside. We were preparing to leave soon, but it seemed the housekeeping staff was trying to safe her time, so she did our room as soon as possible for her. We had to wait to changed our clothes because the housekeeping staf was doing our bathroom. The next morning she rang the doorbell but we didn't open it for her anymore. We learned to keep the "don't disturb" sign in our door on the next days. But after all, we definitely still will comeback to this hotel.
It could not have been nicer. The staff were friendly and helpful and the room was extremely comfortable.
very good service n we ll stay here again..hope the renovations ll improve the hotel rooms

Located in the heart of Sentosa, the villa that I have stayed in was set in a serene environment. Inside the villa was a whole new experience. Although the attached pool was a bit too small, it was enough for 2 person to go for a dip at the same time. The hotel also provided buggy services to different parts of the hotel.
Our stay was just perfect! The hotel is very clean with lovely rooms. The staff couldn't have been more helpful & accomodating. Would definitely stay here again!

Our stay was okay. The room is clean but small; likely normal for Asia but smaller than north American rooms. Wireless was free and room had nice features. We had an issue with the power in our room - it went out 7 or 8 times over the course of our stay (10 days). They finally unplugged the bedside lamp and we didn't have any other issues.
