Had to be reset in our room each time this happened. The staff came up quickly each time, but it was frustrating until it was resolved. Overall, this was a clean, comfortable hotel that was close to the area of town we wanted. We would stay again.

Getting off the cab/taxi upon arrival at the Grand Park, one would be taken straight into another era of time, the chandeliers, the marbled floor, we couldn't wait to get to our room. It was not a let down at all, i could just envision unwinding myself with a glass of scotch on the rock.The beds aren't as super comfy as the new aged hotels but stepping into the bathroom and just seeing the bathtub and the design of the entire place, i could stay in here the whole night. For all smokers, please note that this is one of the very few hotels left, that would allow you to smoke in the comfort of your own room. Please do order room service if you're just too tired to head out. We were not the least bit disapppointed.. Definitely, a hotel i would revisit and not just cos of the smoking rooms. haha
Room is great an confortable, near shopping area, MRT so you can go anywhere place in singapoer
5 minutes walk to paragon shopping mall and 2 minutes walk to mt.elisabeth hospital.
it was a good stay. the breakfast was gd. the tv was too small, had to strain to see. there was no toothbrush provided.
Was good enough. Could be cheeper a bit.Could be cheeper a bit.Could be cheeper a bit.Could be cheeper a bit.

I requested for a early check in while booking with Agoda specially as I was travelling with our two small kids,front desk did't cooperate and gave us a option to pay extra(40S$ per night) and check in to a their so called family room which was a disaster(Too Small & Shower was horrible)and after spending one night in that after a long discussion, duty manager was kind enough to upgrade us to little better room where at least the bathroom is pretty new and in a good condition. breakfast was with a poor variety!!!!!!
Was further away from orchard road than expected, had to walk a fair distance. Staff were helpful, allowed us late check out as we flew out late. Not bad for price
Was wonderfull, Comfortable room, Clean room & Child friendly balconies

In general, the roome is clean and tidy, however, the room is too small to allocate two beds (a big one and small one).The washing room is also small and has no window, it is difficult to take shower for an adult.
Got a great price on Agoda, but breakfast not included and exorbitant internet access charges. Remember to pick up a free Sentosa entry coupon as well as parking coupon.

For anyone who is celebrating their birthday at Hotel Michael, you would need to request for your own birthday cake, at least 3 days in advance prior to your stay. Otherwise, there is no form of birthday wishes to you from anyone when you stay there. Getting the room to be made up took more than 4 hours and at least 5 reminders. The reason given by the maidchamber when we asked her to clean the room was that she needed to clean the other rooms for check-in guests and that was nearly 4pm in the afternoon. It was after we have made the call to the front desk that we were able to get our room cleaned by 9pm when we were back from dinner.
Very nice 4 stars hotel and comfortable to stay. The interior is very nice and really recommendable to book this hotel again!
Very nice 4 stars hotel and comfortable to stay. The interior is very nice and really recommendable to book this hotel again!

location of hotel was o'k,took a very long time to check in.waited inline while staff were talking amongst themselves ignoring guess.no free wi-fi internet.very poor value for money.would not recommend to friends.

excellent as always. we are regular guests and are treated very well. the staff will accommodate our special requests when available. The rooms are spacious and clean. The gymnasium was fair considering the hotel's standard. The hotel food outlets are based too much on Asian cuisine, however outlets attached to the hotel have a greater selection. The hotel lobby bar was comfortable.
Though the room is quite small but this could compensate with the convenient location, good service from the staff.

The hotel is near from the Bugis MRT station and closed with Masjid Sultan. This is an advantage for me and my family as we could join in morning prayer. We can find lots of Muslim halal eateries here. The room was clean and also the bath room.
We planned to stay four nights to rest and recover from six weeks of strenuous travel and our room was inundated with building noise all night long it was extremely disappointing.

We really enjoyed staying at this hotel, the locations is totally great, not in the middle of orchard where it is too crowded, but we can easily walk to orchard. The breakfast is not superb but it's ok.
We found the Staff Friendly, Its very clean and the rooms well laid out we loved the Goodwood park Hotel !!

Our stay was pleasant even though we were out most of the time. The only thing is the room was near the lifts so noise pollution was a problem at night when hotel guests talked loudly. Clean room,comfortable beds and efficient staffs.
i enjoyed staying in Grand Park Orchard. Easy for me to access to the local commercial area, good food is available nearby and shopping centers are within walking distance
Decent stay, but hotel needs to upgrade. The carpet seemed a little dirty and the room feels a bit run-down. Good location though.
The check in and check out was fast and simple. The room was clean and spacious. Very easy to move around as the MRT is less than 10 mins walk.
our stay as in the past was very nice and it was great to see the old friendly staff and them taking their job to heart the hotel is well located and of high standard
It's a really pleasant hotel; spacious room; ideal for those who travel with children.

We booked 1 night at a deluxe room and another night at a family room as we were joined by other family members. But the receptionist upgraded us to the family room so we didn't have to move our staff from one room to another. THANK YOU. Overall, the staff, especially the cleaning staff, are wonderful. Very attentive and friendly. The receptionists were very efficient. The location is fantastic, as it is close enough to walk to orchard road, but far enough to avoid the noise and crowd. We love the quite surrounding. Paragon shopping mall is the nearest mall, and it has wonderful restaurants, shops, supermarkets and bakery. Mount Elizabeth hospital is also very near by.
excellent
We really enjoy our stay.. Very nice place we don't need to go out, everything is already there, delicious food entertainment, activities for younge & older kids.

we stayed in the corner club room thus we had more privacy. Club room comes with all day beverages & fruit, evening cocktail with canapes and also buffet breakfast all at The living room on 21st floor. It was a really relaxing stay with Oasia as the area was quite quiet thus very good to spend quality time with your love ones. we will choose to stay there again if we have the chance to!

We have no complaints. The staff was friendly and helpful. The rooms were clean and modern. I liked the layout of the room. There was a mall right in front so that made it very convenient. The Indian restaurants nearby served some tasty delights.

It was good place to stay at ochard parade hotel due to near city and easy to shop. We can even get simple food along the street of Ochard and will recommend to my friends and customers. Please keep up the good work. Cheers!
Great just to get away for the weekend. Staff very helpful and always ready to offer help etc.
It was a great stay, the hotel staffs are very friendly and attentive. The bed is not as comfortable as I thought it would be. However, the room is very spacious and clean. Overall, It's a good deal.

Staff of the hotel remembers and attention to detail was given as room number was given as requested in advance. Everything is as lovely as before except their customized toiletry was not so customized anymore.

The hotel room is luxurious and well decorated. It has a peaceful and quiet ambience. The service provided by the staff is excellent. It has the best location in Resorts World Sentosa nearest to Universal studios. The room has a very nice bathroom with a unique bathtub and jet spray. The staff are very professional and is excellent in attending to all your needs.

Very pleasant stay, largely due to the fact that the hotel is new. The designed is minimal but modern. The location is very convenient especially if you wish to sample local fare. Staff are very polite and professional.

was ok not my first time anyway but for the price the room should be either bigger than what they have or lower the price a little as they have 888 roomswas ok not my first time anyway but for the price the room should be either bigger than what they have or lower the price a little as they have 888 rooms
It was great, was able to rest well... every stay is a good experience
Comfortable and friendly hotel. Pleanty of good food and shopping nearby. Close to the MRT which allows easy access to the rest of Singapore
Strange way to get into the hotel from the Level 2 car park. Funky outlook but a bit pricey considering the tiny space.

This is one of the more affordable hotels in Singapore and with decent sized rooms. The hotel is a little older but is well maintained. Lots of large Indian families stay here Good gym and pool area. Next to the Mustafa centre and opposite a small mall and Farrer Park station
very good hotel in central location. Good internet, swimming pool, bar, local free shuttlebus

Had a very pleasant stay here. Recommend this hotel as it has a good price and is within 10 min walk of yhree different metro stations. Rooms are quite small but very modern fittings and still comfortable and you should be out enjoying the city rather than sitting in your hotel anyway. They had food downstairs in the lobby which was nice but fairly expensive.
great hotel for business traveller as heart of city

Ibis succeeds in making good design make up for a small room. Bed and shower were quite good, and even with a lot of luggage we didn't mind the size of the room. Front desk staff were efficient and we didn't have trouble waiting to get checked in or out. Location is not real close to anything except museums, but getting to anywhere is also pretty easy from their location. In pricey Singapore it was a good value on a clean and modern hotel.

We booked 2 rooms connecting for our stay. There was a line for check in and we had to wait for about 20 minutes. I believe this hotel is the tallest hotel in Asia. There were 6 elevators, but still it takes a while to wait for it. The rooms were great with a balcony. Housekeeping did their job well. The hotel is connected to shopping areas and MRT train station. Very convenient.

We had a great stay at Amara Singapore - the hotel is located in Tanjong Pagar which is near the city's financial district, but also near Chinatown, Duxton Hill, the Maxwell Hawker Food Centre and Tiong Bahru as well as Orchard Road. You cannot beat the location - lots of good food and interesting sites in this area. Also convenient for supermarket, local shops. The hotel itself is fine - with larger than average rooms and an excellent swimming pool.
reyhersyherherhertysertyreyersyergawtetv4sat4tvawvctasctcvaw4tvqw
I enjoyed my stay as always, the rooms are nice, the breakfast is good and the treatment is professional. its close to the irish pub which is entertaining and also with good home cooking

It is not my first time coming to BIG hotel. I have always chosen BIG as it is a new hotel with very clean and well designed rooms. The plus point was that the hotel room offers free movie shows for days you feel like staying in. There are also plenty of good channels like HBO and Fox Movies, which not a lot of hotels have. Location is within walking distance to Bugis junction & Bugis street, great for shopping.
Overall was good except that there can be more spread served during breakfast.

Very pleasant and accommodating. Easy access to all facilities. Great shopping district. Multiple vegetarian restaurants (I am a vegan). Helpful staff. In close proximity to the temples. Easy access via MRT to other parts of Singapore.

I went to Singapore for a short weekend trip. My stay at Grand Park Hotel was great. The staffs are friendly and attainable for any information u required. The room is big and nice. It's location at the Orchard Rd is very strategic for the shopping conveniences. I would say it was my excellent short and sweet trip.

Will never stay or recommend as was cut off from home and world due to NO WI-FI/INTERNET in room. EXTREMELY causing inconvenience. PLEASE FIX THIS PROBLEM as neighboring room had same problem and had to stand out to talk back home to family.
Need insulation at window/door to exterior to stop loud disturbing whistling noise.

We only stayed at Big Hotel for 1 night on our way to Sri Lanka however we found it to be in a convenient central location, close to the MRT station and local shopping districts. Our only complaint is that our room smelled a little musty when we first arrived but it wasn't a major issue. Certainly worth what we paid and would stay here again. The rooms aren't huge but they are comfortable and well designed. Having been to Singapore once we would love to come back and further explore this very modern and green city.
Overall, it was an excellent experience as we got upgraded to a larger room on a good will basis by the hotel. Caught us by surprise as it was also our anniversary. Great job!
Totally it was good but should have free wifi in the lobby area. It took too long for check in. Next to the mall and MRT, so easy for everything .

There was a staff called Mano I believe, He was the one who picked up my phone call that I did earlier to make sure my room was ready earlier before my check in hour. He is in deed a very friendly and helpful staff and I believe having such people is very crucial in service industry. Thank you so much Mano!! You've made my birthday celebration and stay a great and memorable one. Thank you as well to Rendezvous Grand for providing me with great service like free room upgrade and the free wine! Really appreciate that.

It was a wonderful stay. I was there with my husband to celebrate my birthday. The hotel gave us a birthday cake on my birthday. The toilet is large and clean but there was a fishy smell coming from the toilet bowl. Called the service desk twice, first time they clean the toilet again, second time they burn aroma oil in my room, they explain to me that cos of the rain, there might be some problem with the drainage system. But the aroma oil did keep the room smelling nice and relaxing throughout my stay there. I love the quiet surrounding, you can easily take the shuttlebus to travel within RWS. I would love to come back again for another stay!
It was centrally located and wont feel hungry in the hotel. It serve wonderful buffet meals and has plenty of Resturant. It was also surrounded by shopping malls

This is my 3rd check-in with Amara Hotel. Basically, I don't mind to pay extra price for the services and comfortable of room. Furthermore, all the staff are well trained with the good communication skills. The room design are contemporary and well maintain.

Exceeded my expectation as the staff are friendly and helpful. Execellent service! Room is clean and the surrounding is suiting. The hotel is near to public transport such as the MRT and ample of taxi. As the hotel is strategically located, moving from one attraction place to another is very flexible and convenient.

I had a 1 day staycation. Went there and upgraded my room to a split level studio apartment. Really had a pleasant stay at GWP hotel. The split level studio is located at the back of the hotel which means it's quiet. Overall, i would come back to stay again!
Nice memory in Singapore with wonderful stay in Village Hotel. Loving the swimming pool and the room design. :)))
Place was good especially the services provided. Stay was very fantastic.
it was a good for value money, the room were large and there is an mrt
Wonderful except that no tooth brush and laundry bag . Otherwise , can find nice food nearby . MRT station is just opposite .
it was wonderful, they even gave us complimentary cake and wine, rooms were upgraded and gave us 1 free night stay

The overall experience was great! Nazreen (duty manager) was very prompt when settling an issue that we had encountered with the security officer and was very professional about it. She put in a great deal of effort to make the rest of our stay a memorable one. The room was wonderful and clean.
it was very close to MTR and walking distance to Orchid Road. Also, close to major attractions as well! wonderful hotel
I truly enjoyed my stay at Park Royal. Will return if the price continues to be good.
Very good would love to go back, nice clean rooms, good service, great location and staff

It is always a pleasant stay in Royal Plaza. Big room, nice comfortable bed, fast free wifi. It is centrally located on Scotts Road. DFS is just next door. Near Orchard so you can expect shopping is the main activity.

It is always a pleasant stay in Royal Plaza. Big room, nice comfortable bed, fast free wifi. It is centrally located on Scotts Road. DFS is just next door. Near Orchard so you can expect shopping is the main activity.

Went there for a weekend. Good location next to shopping areas. The hotel has a unique style which makes us feel like we are staying in a chic French appartment. Very good staff performance has added value to our stay. Highly recommended.
Wonderful, i would like to stay in this hotel again. They have a friendly staff and very comfort hotel
Wonderful, i would like to stay in this hotel again. They have a friendly staff and very comfort hotel

initially booked a room for 2 days but ended up staying for 4 days! our stay at the hotel was wonderful. yes the room was small but the services and amenities provided made up for the room size. the rooms come with a tv that has lots of movies for you to watch plus radio stations that you can listen to if you don't feel like watching movies. the rain shower was a nice touch to the otherwise small bathroom. i had no problems with the size of the room since i only needed the room to rest and relax after a long day out. overall, BIG hotel surpassed my expectations and i would definitely return in the future.

This hotel is really rock! Lobby and guest rooms are very well designed. Staffs are very friendly and try their best to help in everything. Large swimming pool with beach is my children most fevorite place in the hotel. Breakfast is also nice and has variety of food, but you may have to come down early or have to wait in a long queue for table. I heard that many guests from Festive hotel next door also have their breakfast here. One bad thing is that they don't have free wifi in the hotel even in the lobby. Anyway, the hotel is in great location, lots of coffee shops, pubs and restaurants. It's very close to Universal Studio,SEA Aquarium and Adventure Cove Waterpark, the great attractions for family fun. The sentosa express station is about 5 minutes walk and it's just one stop to VIVO City, the wonderful place for shopping. We got free tickets for all attractions and sentosa express free pass from hotel package, so we tried everything and all of them were wonderful.

I really enjoyed my stay, it was a very last minute booking on agoda as I was unwell and needed a restful place to stay. The staff quickly located the booking (only made 15 minutes before) and kindly made arrangements for an early check in. I also stayed an additional night there. The staff are kind, professional and with good knowledge. The breakfast was very good quality. Thank you to all the staff.
It was an enjoyable stay. We requested for extra towels twice and they were quick with their service. The room was very big exceeding expectations!
Nice!! Love the high and comfortable bed. Also, a big room and bathroom. Enjoyed my stay !!

The Bugis Village Hotel has renovated their rooms and they looked better than previously. The room has a design but somehow I noted there is already some wear and tear. The room is good but can be noisy if your rooms happened to have the adjoining doors. The Wi-Fi speed is good and the TV channels acceptable except for the lack for Soccer Channels. Overall I'm quite pleased with the stay.

We registered at 12.30 and left our number but they forgot to call us to let us know when our room was ready. Still that didn't matter much. The hotel is a long uphill walk from the main road so its really great that they have buggies to transport guests up and down to the main lobby.. The room is huge and comfortable, no complaints at all! View from the large window is also great! I also liked the library, if I had stayed longer I definitely would've spent more time there, just sitting on a sofa and reading a book with a cookie in hand. We had dinner at the Knolls.. Aside from the bread basket the food was so-so.. Perhaps the chinese restaurant is better? In the middle of the night the room became warm - ? air con tends to switch off.. Not sure.. Tried to increase the fan but it didn't seem to work. A Couples of hours later it switched on again and the room became super cold...

The hotel gave me a free upgrade to the suite and it is a very big suite! I enjoyed my stay there! The room was clean. The check-in process can be further improved to quicken the process especially for those who have taken a "collect key ticket" before 3pm.
Good experience and friendly hospitality. The hotel was well taking care off and environment was cozy and safe especially for ladies traveler with an easy access to almost everything.
My overall stay at the hotel is great. Easy access to many eatery places and MRT.
Check in and check out were fast. Friendly counter staffs and its very accesible to all the shoppibg malls. Would definitely come.nack to stay again
Our stay is good. But i wasnt given a late check out.
Our stay is good. But i wasnt given a late check out.

The stay at Parkroyal was a wonderful one. Upon arrival, the friendly staff upgraded the room to a superior one to a deluxe one, and for the price 180SGD, this was a very very good room and it was an extremely pleasant stay. The room was big and spacious, with many channels available on the large TV. The bed was comfortable too and the vicinity was quiet. Additionally, it is easily accessible by MRT, with Farrer Park MRT just next door, as well as City Link Mall next door as well, necessities can be easily purchased from the supermarket there. There are many restaurants there too and it is just across the road. Overall, for the price and the location and the overall experience, this 4-star hotel is definitely one to go to when in Singapore (farrer park is pretty central too).
I am a regular guest. Always be my first choice. Nearby public transport and in walking distance to underground mrt.
Small hotel with small room, but staffs friendly, location convenience, bed comfortable.

We enjoyed our stay here very much. The room was clean and new, with luxurious furnishings and designer toiletries. Location was superb - everything you need is within walking distance. Some parts of the hotel is still under renovation but noise is minimal. We would very much like to return to this hotel again.

I have to compliment the manager of the club at this hotel. Her name is Sheda and she is so friendly and very good in accommodating my sons needs during our stay. She goes the extra mile to make sure that our stay is enjoyable! Wonderful service and we will definitely stay there again!
My mom and I enjoy staying here. The hotel is close to Mount Elizabeth Hospital and the shopping centers. The mall attached to the hotel has good stores and restaurants.

Went there for a night stay. The hotel is currently have renovation but services given are not sub standard. Got a free upgrade to a club lounge which was a surprise. Right outside the hotel is a bus stop, which is convenient for tourist. Shopping malls are within walking distant. A good place to stay if you want to travel around.

We truly enjoyed our stay here. Nicely designed room with very comfortable bed. Service was fabulous, staffs are all very well trained and helpful. Just a bit disappointed with the breakfast. Really unexpected to see the crowd and and guests have to queue for their turn to take food. Too little space to cater to their hotel guests, and it's also a bit disorganized the way they arrange the tables and the buffet spread. There's still a room for improvement I believe.
it was quite good, our room were even upgraded and staff is quite helpful
Very happy with stay; the hotel is clean, very close to a famous hospital and the staff are very friendly and cooperative.

Overall, it was a pleasant time for me and my wife to spend over the night. The View is amazing and love it so much, that's why they put the TV not right in front of the bed. You can either enjoy the view from balcony or from your bed. The hotel location is very easy to access.

Lovely, but for all the hype the rooms appeared to be standard. The experience was very nice, staff is real friendly, but way overpriced! Everything had an extra charge, vising the top deck pool area with friends I was asked to pay an additional per person. We justed walk to the bar, had cocktails ... a cover charge after paying a night for a room and having a dinner in their restaurant ... WOW, sad!!!
Nice place to stay. Near to shopping centers. Affordable room to stay. Room is clean and comfortable.

It's really a wonderful stay, we can't really forget how great it is to be upgraded in a presidential suite. We're really so thankful for everything, it is such a great blessing for all of us. I just pray and wish that it will happen again when i go back with my family, I really wanted them to experienced living in such great place... Love it so much... i will be forever grateful to it's management and staff... thank you so so so much...

no complain. everything is good : professional staff, nice, big comfortable room, and best of all is right in the middle of orchard road, where all the happening things are. best hotel to stay in singapore. Thanks
absolutelly incredible hotel with its facility, casino, shopping center, museum and many others. definitelly centrally located with wonderfull garden by the bay view
Excellent hotel. Would recommend it, and would also stay there again

It was the worst experience I ever had, it brought embarrassment and unhappiness to my father's birthday. The staff didn't handover properly, yet they were rude to us, asking us to understand the hotel's problem and giving solution like instruction to helpless guest.

It was a wonderful stay at Equarius Hotel for me and my partner. I requested for a birthday cake during my check in and it was delivered promptly. Great service! Also, the staff opened the back gate for our access to Adventure cove when we purchased the tickets from the hotel. The best thing is that they upgraded our deluxe room to deluxe garden suite. That was a pleasant news for us! The hotel provides free shuttle bus service to RWS which comes every 15 mins. Overall, we enjoyed the room very much.
Comfortable stay but no house guest parking. The front desk staffs have no manner and good attitude
It was wonderful and relaxing. It's located very near to Orchard so after the business meeting is done, we can shop and wander around without any problem.
It was nice experience, easy access transportation and walking distance to Clark quay and bugis.
It was good. Close to public transportation (MRT). Clean and big room.
Nothing to complaint. Overall pleasant stay and would come back to stay again. Love the large room and bathroom.
the stay in the hotel is good. staff there are very attentive and friendly
Excellent clean rooms and a very cheap price. Very convenient location with easy accessto city.

The hotel is decent and grand. However, the sheet has a little stain which cause deduction of several marks. Except that the room is clean. The bed hardness is very good and overall the living environment is comfortable. Another mark deduction is no free wi-fi, neither in room nor in lobby. This cause some inconvenience but on the other hand can let us have an internet-free holidays. The location is okay as it only takes less than 5 minutes walk to Tanjong Pagar SMRT station and less than 10 minutes walk to the famous Maxwell Food Centre and Chinatown. While from Tanjong Pagar station go many places need to change lines several times that cause some inconvenience. Restaurants and bars are abundant nearby so no concern on dining. There is also a 24 hours supermarket just across the road. The staff is very nice and can satisfy our needs.

The hotel is definitely not cheap, but the room can actually accommodate 4 people as they have a sofa double bed in addition to the king size bed. The city view from the room is amazing, and the infinity pool on rooftop is a must-go place and only the hotel guests can access.
The room was very comfortable, excellent location and friendly staffs.

9 out of 10 times my partner and I will choose to book this hotel because it has competitive prices, best service SG can offer, and it's location is mint. Through out 2013 we stayed at this hotel 4 times. I would say the only two things which I would really comment about is that the gym needs to be up sized and the rooms/corridors need a revamp. Needs a new paint job, wall paper...that kind of thing.

9 out of 10 times my partner and I will choose to book this hotel because it has competitive prices, best service SG can offer, and it's location is mint. Through out 2013 we stayed at this hotel 4 times. I would say the only two things which I would really comment about is that the gym needs to be up sized and the rooms/corridors need a revamp. Needs a new paint job, wall paper...that kind of thing.
ok cause it's near orchard road, just walking distance. room is spacious and clean.

The stay would have been more pleasant if the staff were a bit friendlier and not too arrogant. Gives the impression that they seem to give better treatment to westerners than Asians! Thankfully for a Taiwanese staff who helped with some complaints I had of the room. The local staff can really do with some improvement of their attitude! Remembered the staff used to be so much friendlier when I first started staying there many years ago when they first opened. The hotel is very strategically located. There is also a 24-hours food court just next door which serves quite good local food.
The hotel is in a central area of the city close to various attractions. The hotel itself is quite clean and offers enough comforts for a few days holidays. I'd stay again.

The staff were not only rude but extremely unhelpful. After waiting at the airport for over an hour for hotel transfers we took a taxi to the hotel and were met with a rude lady who was unhelpful, unapologetic and wasted half an hr of our time waiting to be checked in even though we were the only people in the lobby. We were told that we did not have transfers even though my itinery said we did. Still more excuses and no apologies. Later found charges from the hotel to my credit card with no explanation why or what they were for. Would never stay at this hotel again. a basic room and rude staff members.
Not good experience to stay in this small room hotel. 4 stars hotel look like 1 or 2 stars. Very disappointed & won't stay again. Not worth for money value.

not good value for the money, club room and floor was advertised not for small children but there were small children there, breakfast in the morning was cold as they cooked it well before opening time.

I  have stayed in Singapore before, but this was the first time at Marina Bay Sands. The cost of the room was a bit more than I comfortable paying, but I stayed for two days for one reason: to enjoy the Infinity Pool at the Sky Park, some 57 stories over the skyline of Singapore. I am not a typical pool person. Most stays at hotels with pools, I never make it to the pool. However, the pool at Marina Bay Sands has to be seen and experienced to believe. I did not take advantage of the many benefits at Marina Bay Sands because I was up at the pool. To get an idea of the wonder of it, do a YouTube search on the Infinity Pool at Marina Bay Sands. The videos give you a good idea of how great it is. It is hard to believe that there is a hotel pool in the world better than this. The pool made my two days worth every penny. Aside from the pool, the staff was very helpful and assisted me with grace and ease.
very good hotel, with good service and nice design

I booked this hotel for my family and they were very happy I chose this hotel for them. The room was big and it is very close to orchard road so shopping can be done anytime. The hotel also provide free shuttle to Universal Studios.

We were awaken by the loud prayers from the mosque nearby at 4am. When we checked in at night, we heard them too till close to 10pm. When we checked out and requested for the luggage to be left at the hotel and collected a week later, we were flatly rejected by the bell service. I've never been rejected by any hotel in the past before. I will not come back to this hotel again even if it meant I've to choose one further walk away from the mrt!

Pleasant stay at hotel no issues. Hotel clean but small, next to Bugus shopping which was great. Would not recommend for than 2-3 days in Singapore. You can drive around it in 1 1/2 hrs. Not much to see for attractions. Very expensive to shop or do anything. Watch your money. Locals try to cheat you every time you turn around. So hard to have a good time as you where always watching you money. Example;Went to local bar and ordered Heineken beer (small bottle)asked for check and it said $63sd That is about $60us for one bottle of beer. Explained too much and gave her $10sd and walked out. Taxi driver from airport did same thing. Asked lady who called cab over how much should it cost to go to my hotel. She say about $20sd, I say ok. Taxi Driver at arrival said $45sd. So it was difficult for me to have a good time thier. Was their for 6 days, ready to leave after 2 days. So cross Singapore off your bucket list. But positive note. Clean city, can walk anywhere within 1/2 hr from my hotel location. So got some exercise.
this is my first time ever with the digusting/stinky toilet bowl sits. bad experience.
excellent view, private, quiet, world class service.
